author: {'steamid': '76561198452058736', 'num_games_owned': 117, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 15405, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1330, 'last_played': 1681837866}
review:
Dungeon 2 is a fun and addictive game that puts you in the role of a dungeon master, tasked with building and managing your own dungeon while defending it against invading heroes.

The game's graphics are charming and whimsical, with bright colors and cartoonish characters that give it a lighthearted feel. The gameplay is also very engaging, with a good mix of strategy and action.

One of the things I love about Dungeon 2 is the ability to customize your dungeon to your liking. You can choose which rooms to build and where to place them, as well as which creatures to recruit and where to station them. There's a great sense of satisfaction in seeing your dungeon grow and evolve over time.

The game also has a great sense of humor, with plenty of witty dialogue and pop culture references that keep things entertaining. The heroes that invade your dungeon are especially hilarious, with each one having their own unique personality and quirks.

That being said, the game can be a bit overwhelming at times. There's a lot to manage and keep track of, and it can be difficult to balance your resources and defenses while still expanding your dungeon. But once you get the hang of things, it's a very satisfying experience.

Overall, Dungeon 2 is a great game for anyone who loves strategy games and has a good sense of humor. It's a lot of fun to play, and the charming graphics and engaging gameplay will keep you coming back for more

author: {'steamid': '76561198308530085', 'num_games_owned': 271, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 841, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 811, 'last_played': 1598680715}
review:
I absolutely love this game. The graphics and ragdoll physics are A1

The thing that has me sold on this game though is the commentator/narrator. The moment he called me The Flatulent Evil he had me

author: {'steamid': '76561198070254271', 'num_games_owned': 155, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 1393, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1393, 'last_played': 1495865724}
review:
[h1]Score: 7/10[/h1]
A fun condensed RTS dungeon manager carried by its comedic narrator and updated view of a classic genre.

[b][u]Pros[/u][/b]
+Great narration 
+Upgraded fresh look
+Satisfying gameplay
+Highly customizable dungeon designs
+Some story elements 

[b][u]Cons[/u][/b]
-Small predictable maps
-Massive unnecessary Game of Thrones spoilers in final act
-Predetermined enemy spawns make them easy to bottleneck and defeat
-Not classic style gameplay

Though this may not be the classic gameplay made famous by this genre of games it does serve as a great comedic intro to the mechanics of it. An enjoyable experience building and customizing your dungeon while setting traps to defeat enemies. Still leaves you wanting more with its limited scope means youll be looking elsewhere for a classic large open world dungeon builder though it still delivers with its own unique charm and story.

review: If you were a fan of the original Dungeon Keeper games, this is definitely a great alternative (same makers of Dungeon Keeper created this series). It still has the witty humor of today's genres that is reminiscent of the humor in the original games, though I will always miss the original narrator's "It's pay day" voice. If you are a fan of dungeon management and strategies, then this game has just right amount of challenge and easy going fun.

review: I really wanted to give this a good review because the narration was really funny. However what began as a fun game turns to a frustrating experience due to the games ai. The ai do not really listen to any instruction you tell them to do in the overworld. instead They just run up to everything they see even when they are told to hold their position. Overall what was sweet in the beginning turned bitter near the end. The game is unbalanced and unpolished. If you fancy the idea of building a dungeon for monster look elsewhere. Bad implementation of good idea really sour the experience.

review:
[h1] Мнение о игре [/h1]
Есть желание надавать леща оркам - [h1] Да [/h1]
Есть желание устроиться в теплом, уютном подземелье - [h1] Да [/h1]
Есть желание насадить пони-единорога на его рог - [h1] Да [/h1]

[h1] Плюсы [/h1]
+ Не надо постоянно контролировать экономику, выделил золото и ману и забыл.
+ Бунтуют твои рабы? Во внешний мир, путь выплеснут накипевшее.
+ [strike] ГРХМ, АЛЬЯЯЯЯЯНС САСАААТ [/strike] Радуешься за величие Орды.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007885823', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1008, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1008, 'last_played': 1595794138}
review:
The game is incredibly short and feels like a dragged out tutorial. I spent the entire time waiting for the moment where i can finally start playing the game.
Each mission plays almost exactly the same and most time is spent idling waiting for your minions to dig some rooms and gather gold.

The game sounds like you would build a neat little dungeon (similar to evil genius) and defend against waves of enemies with traps and minions. While this is technically true the execution is horribly underwhelming. You quickly realize that your base layout is completely irrelevant as all invading enemies are severly underpowered. To make matters worse your minions are immortal, as in they only get knocked unconscious and can immediately reenter combat after they are dragged into the hospital. Since there is no risk of losing anything to an enemy invasion you can ignore defenses completely and just let the minions that shuffle around your dungeon handle all the invaders wihtout doing anything.

The second part of the game is an RTS style overworld combat where you defeat some encampments with your minions. Similar to the dungeon part there arent many (if any) enemies on the overworld that offer much resistance. And even if your minions die on the overworld they just respawn in the dungeon a few seconds later. Yet another zero risk slog.

I have 16 hours logged at the time of completion, however the game was left idling for an evening so the actual playtime is well below 10 hours. I got it as part of a bundle so i cant complain about the price, however i feel like i wasted a weekend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079059535', 'num_games_owned': 443, 'num_reviews': 142, 'playtime_forever': 995, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 995, 'last_played': 1594537258}
review:
Um jogo de estratégia onde somos o vilão, muhaawahwhahaha.

Nosso papel é basicamente acabar com todos os heróis do mundo e reinar com a escuridão absoluta. O jogo é cheio de referências e é narrado por um carinha bem carismático, que em muitas vezes acaba até mesmo se empolgando.

Sua jogabilidade é a estratégia que encontramos em jogos como Age of Empires. Temos que coletar recursos para "comprar" soldados para assim então avançar contra os caras bonzinhos. O modo campanha é dividido em várias fases, cada uma com um objetivo diferente. Por mais que tenha alguns elementos bem chatos, como ter que pegar um soldado por um na hora de sair da caverna, tem uma jogabilidade interessante.

Uma coisa que me deixou encucado foi a otimização do jogo que é bem pesadinho para o ano em que foi lançado (ou talvez tenha sido um problema específico com meu hardware).

Quer ser do mau? Esse jogo é pra você.
Quer fazer churrasquinho de unicórnios fofinhos? Então cai pra dentro, porra.

Joguei em live para quem quiser acompanhar os vídeos: https://www.twitch.tv/collections/keEPYkX4HhZeXA
Faço live na Twitch de jogos variados: https://twitch.tv/loboshow

author: {'steamid': '76561198259523386', 'num_games_owned': 261, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 3335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3335, 'last_played': 1595181759}
review:
Содранный варкрафтовский арт, утянутые механики Dungeon keeper, отстройка подземелья в каждой миссии, героически тупые положительные противники, переизбыток пародии на всевозможные книги, фильмы и игры, море ужасного гиковского юмора.
Dungeons II, добро пожаловать в список моих самых любимых игр.

P.S.: Dungeons I не существует. А если кто-то говорит обратное, за ним придут зомби-пингвины-убийцы.

author: {'steamid': '76561198322516618', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 140, 'playtime_forever': 2953, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1689, 'last_played': 1596364849}
review:
I'm sure this review will be impossible to do without comparing with Dungeon Keeper (DK), so I will just simply compare Dungeons 2 to DK.

1. This game is a mix of Dungeon Keeper and WarCraft 3. Your dungeon has a heart you must defend.
2. You have 2 maps: one underground DK style, one at the surface War3 style. You go to the surface with your creatures to accomplish the mission objectives.
3. Just like DK: you train your creatures, put some traps, make your dungeon, be evil...
4. In DK there is a room to feed the creatures. Here there is a room to brew beer instead.
5. The 2 resources are gold and mana. Mana is only used to purchase spell, use spells and increase the population maximum of your dungeon. Gold is everything in this game, just like DK1. This is better imo than DK2.
6. The enemies can't dig but you must allow them a path (even if it's ridiculously long and full of traps).
7. In DK you couldn't build walls. Here you can put back walls and close accesses if you want (but you are forced to leave a path for the enemies to reach the heart).
8. The narrator sounds less evil than in DK but he has a lot more humor. It's actually very fun to play and he is very important to the experience imo.
9. One trap breaks the game and make it a lot more easy: the rolling rock. Put 3-4 in a row in a corridor and you won't need to defend your dungeon anymore.

Pros:
+ It's fun and entertaining.
+ The story is fun.
+ It's less repetitive than DK.

Cons:
- It's really easy. This game has almost no punishment at all!
- It can still become repetitive. Though I played 28 hours without getting bored. The game is quite addictive.

UPDATE (after playing games of winter DLC):

The difficulty is much better on this one! This is so much fun. You need this DLC after playing the base game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077042362', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 1718, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1708, 'last_played': 1594803667}
review:
Сразу скажу, что ни в 1 серии Dungeons нет главной ламповой фишки от Dungeon Keeper, которая называется камера пыток. Полноценная камера пыток! В Dungeons-1 есть тюрьма и пыточные приспособления, в которых герои тупо умирают. В Dungeons-2 есть чисто косметические камеры пыток. Завербовать героя через пытки нельзя. В Dungeons-3 есть кривая камера пыток, куда можно бросить героя. Далеко не все и не сразу вербуются, лимит 5 героев. Это полностью ломает смысл игры. Даже учитывая то, что в классическом хранителе мертвые герои превращались в скелетов без особых лимитов на население. В Dungeons с этим печально.

Dungeons-1 был какой-то галимой хренью. Даже не похожей на икону стиля - хранителя подземелий эпохи 640х480. Но в нем был какой-то челендж и свои трудности. В добавок, бесят вылеты и краши из-за устаревшей графики (рекомендуется понизить графические характеристики)

Dungeons 2 все-таки более похож на оригинал. Но добавили варкрафта: юниты могут выходить на поверхность и устраивать вакханалии уже на землях героев. Которые особо не охраняются. При этом управление - как в обычной стратегии, выделяешь и кликаешь, куда идти. Кормить юниты на поверхности, а также платить зарплату больше не надо. Есть 4 вида боевых юнитов и рабы-сопляки. Каждый боевой юнит может быть улучшен 2 раза, при этом меняется абсолютно все. Может стать лекарем, может стать стрелком, магом или танком. Улучшите лекарей и останетесь без лекарей. Бесконечно улучшать не получится - лимит населения 60. Юнит 3 уровня жрет 3-5 единиц лимита. 
Вся игра Dungeons 2 сопровождается закадровым голосом, который откровенно пародирует фентезийные игры и фильмы. Например, рассказывает о: волшебник Гендлдор, принц Бартас, эльфийская королева Энудриэль, Король Роберт и его сын Джофри, Граф Средний Палец и т.п. Игра проходится очень легко. Строить и улучшать юниты только долго, но не обязательно. Можно снести все это базовой армией. Кампания "зимние игры" это пародия на белых ходоков из игры престолов. Вот в ней сложности добавили. Есть еще карты-сценарии пародии на другие серии Игры Престолов.

Подземелья-3 - продолжение Подземелий-2. Работает шустрее, что необычно. Оптимизированнее. В Подземельях-3 еще больше контента и дополнений. А юмор и пародии стали скучнее. Во второй части насыщеннее издевались над фентезийным жанром.

review:
던전스3를 하고나서 던전스 2를 리뷰하는 거라 특별히 2편이 더 낫다고 말할 건덕지는 없다.
그러나 확실히 던전키퍼+RTS 요소를 잘 접목시킨 게임은 확실하고, 생각보다 B급 감성이 갠적으로 잘 맞아서 해볼만 했다. 플탐자체도 그렇게 안길고, 도전과제도 몇번 노가다 질만 하는거 제외하면 크게 문제될 요소도 없다.
솔직히 주관적으로 볼 땐, 던전스 3를 먼저 해보고 취향에 맞는다 싶으면 던전스2를 하는 역주행을 권하고 싶다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031599084', 'num_games_owned': 2170, 'num_reviews': 558, 'playtime_forever': 2525, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 223, 'last_played': 1662580568}
review:
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/38888018-United-Critics/] Please follow [b]United Critics[/b] for quality reviews[/url]

[h1]Dungeons 2 Review[/h1]
Dungeons 2 is a RTS/Fantasy RPG, it was developed by Realmforge and published by Kalypso media digital, it was released for PC and console on April 2015. Dungeons 2 is more of a direct homage to dungeon keeper games than its predecessor.

[h1]What’s new:[/h1]
Dungeons 1 got quite a lot of negative press when it came out back in 2011. People wanted a real spiritual sequel to Dungeon Keeper , but the devs chose to not follow in the exact same footsteps, developer of dungeons 2 tried something new. Rather than defending against hoards of heroes, we are now actively luring them into your lair and then outwit them through our strategically placed traps.
Dungeons 2 drops all of the redundant crap and it tries to do things the “Old School” way with a few new features sprinkled around, and it definitely worked wonders for them.If you have ever played any of the previous dungeon management games before, you will exactly know how the basics of this game plays out.we have to build the dungeon by selecting blocks for the minions to excavate, Rooms can be built onto empty spaces too, but blocks can be filled back in as well to wall off any particular area (well, you know the drill).
A major point where Dungeons 2 pivots from the orignal Dungeons is that the Overworld can now be entered through the same cave entrances used by heroes who raid the dungeon. Once we enter the Overworld, the game transforms into a real-time strategy mode, this allowed me to command minions as they attack the holdings in the cave. The overarching goal is the total destruction of a castle, but there are always few other dungeons holding quests too. 
The ever present narrator sarcastically narrates the Ultimate Evil's atrocious deeds, in which case it pushes us to the right path. There are tonne of humorous references like Dungeon Keeper, Warcraft, and fantasy series like Lord of the Rings and Game of Thrones (you’ve got to be a sharp eyed lad tho).

[h1]Gameplay:[/h1]
The main problem with the original game’s core was that we the players were always in a passive position, fidgeting with our thumbs and anxiously waiting for something to happen. Drooling over our perfect dungeon home is fun up to a point but gets pretty boring pretty quickly, Dungeons 2 understands that the evil overlords too need to keep themselves busy.To mitigate this, Relmforge added a new overland map, a kingdom of kind knights and happy folks,all of which is waiting for you to conquer and enslave. Rather than hopelessly roaming around in your dungeon, you have now got a bunch of specific targets to aim for.
Dungeons 2’s overland Real time strategy combat won’t be rivaling that of Starcraft 2 any time soon, but it doesn’t need to. The best missions in the campaign includes in them multiple objectives,all of which required me to keep an eye on both my dungeon exploration, and also my potential surface conquests.

[h1]Multiplayer:[/h1]
Once you’re done with the single-player campaign, which should take approximately 10 - 15 hours to complete, you’ve got an interesting bunch of multiplayer modes available at your finger tips to keep you busy. There is a deathmatch modes (which is similar to TDM from any other game), a king of the hill mode which tasks us with holding onto a certain area of the map (basically capture point mode), and a domination mode which gives rewards on basis of the total obliteration of your enemies.The Dungeons 2 also adds the new Demon faction, who have their own unique militant units with varied strategies and dungeon layouts.

[h1]Conclusion:[/h1]
Dungeons 2 carries within itself the spirit of the Dungeon keeper games while providing something new alongside it.While being fairly simplistic, the overland RTS/fantasy game provided me with a real sense focus for expansion, and building my dungeon kingdom. It also manages to capture the delightfully sadistic sense of humour that marked out the Dungeon Keeper games in its prime, Dungeons 2 is still a worthy tribute, and definitely well worth your time.

Rate: 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198886227993', 'num_games_owned': 168, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 5865, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1132, 'last_played': 1656597365}
review:
It's simply overpriced for the experience. The good points can be summed up into the lighthearted tone and jokes, and the passable gameplay.

The bad however needs a few bullet points:
- The game doesn't let you take your time in peace, the narrator will constantly bother you to make you go do whatever you're supposed to.
- The references to other media are a bit cheap and get overdone because there's one every five minutes.
- The story is mediocre even with the jokes, and it's not even completely done. As the game ends, it just tells you to buy the DLC for the complete story.
- The campaign is ultimately a glorified tutorial, you're "learning" something new every chapter.
- You don't get to really enjoy making your own dungeon as it's utterly pointless to bother to do so. Defending yourself from invaders doesn't take enough effort to make it worth it.
- Despite the previous point, you don't get to properly command your units within your dungeon, which is annoying because it would be much more effective to be able to do so, like outside of it.
- In turn, you invade about 3 other dungeons, but they're just barebones and pointless.
- Most units are useless in the campaign.
- Nearing the end of the game, you're suddenly given some other race to play for no real reason and you have to learn a new set of units and gameplay style... for just two missions. One of them just being a pure tutorial for a few units, the other one leaving you to your own devices to learn how the race works.
- All the previous points just tell you the game is meant to be a multiplayer game, but compared to other RTS games, it doesn't perform well enough.

Despite it all it's not a horrible game, and you can enjoy a weekend with it, but if you're going for it, just get it in a sale or some bundle.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960931103', 'num_games_owned': 483, 'num_reviews': 213, 'playtime_forever': 1212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1212, 'last_played': 1592935690}
review:
[b]Pros[/b]
+60FPS
+Fun to play!
+Nice graphics and art style
+Good narrator voice acting (although can be too much)
+Solid game mechanics
+Single player campaign fun (but a little easy)
+Underworld vs Overworld concept is neat
+All creatures are useful

[b]Cons[/b]
+Demon race difficult to use
+Mouse control vague sometimes (not clear where actual pointer is)
+Can’t zoom out much. Can’t rotate camera at all
+Initial population cap too low 
+Hard to find rooms in big underworld (mini-map icons maybe?)

I’m not usually one to play RTS games, but decided to give this game a go and was pleasantly surprised. I only played the campaign but thought it was easy to pick up, learn and enjoy. The beginning few missions are basic and mainly exist to give you an understanding of how things work. Throughout the other levels, you are introduced to more and more mechanics. By the last several missions I felt very confident and was able to easily dominate the Alliance. 

The campaign is fairly easy. I consistently had an overpowered army thinking I would come up against a tougher enemy. Tagging along on the campaign is the narrator. He is funny and very well voiced but can be too much. Numerous times, especially in the later missions, I just wanted to be left alone without any chatter.

There are 2 different races you will play as. The Horde (which is the main focus of the game) and the Demons. The Demons are quite a big departure from the Horde and took me several mission restarts before finally figuring out how to use them competently. It was frustrating but eventually got through it. 

You can upgrade your units, production facilities, upgrade facilities, etc. Not all of this is available right away. You must level up your dungeon first to gain access to them. 

I really enjoyed the underworld versus overworld aspect. The underworld is where you gather resources, upgrade, set your defenses and train your units. When you’re ready, you can drop your units onto the overworld and find things to destroy. You can be attacked (and you frequently will) in the underworld, so creating monsters early and setting some traps is a must. Speaking of traps, they generally feel useless. Almost every raid on your base it accompanied by 1 Bard which has an ability to disable traps. The AI will wait for him to disable the traps before advancing. I found the rolling stone to be effective at damaging the other enemy units before the Bard could disable it. 


[b]Conclusion[/b]
Absolutely would recommend this game. I found myself thinking about this game and when I’d get to play it next. Also, I would play for longer than I thought. Look down at the clock and 2 hours have passed?! To me, that’s the mark of a good game. Wanting to play it and easily passing time while playing it. 

[b]7/10[/b] Good

author: {'steamid': '76561198056488960', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 461, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 461, 'last_played': 1592881535}
review: As part of their homage to the original they adopted all of the bad and very little of the good. author: {'steamid': '76561198139304203', 'num_games_owned': 1208, 'num_reviews': 316, 'playtime_forever': 2174, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1447, 'last_played': 1590970606}
review:
RTSの素材集めを細かくしたようなゲーム。
ダンジョンは素材集めの邪魔をしにやってくる敵を罠やユニットで倒す。
WarCraftなど遊ぶ時(一人モード)はできるだけユニットを強化して大人数で攻めるのが好きなので、このゲームも楽しめました。やっぱりじっくりと準備をしてから一気に敵や建物を破壊していくのは気持ちいいです。
ユニットが死んでしまっても蘇生する施設があったり優しいです。

施設を覚えるまではどこで研究したり、強化するのかわかりにくかったです。
ユニットの人数制限が最大60枠までありますが、ユニットによっては3枠以上消費するのでそこまで大量のユニットで攻めるということができないのが残念です。

一度だけゲームが途中で強制終了してしまったことがあったので、オートセーブの間隔は短くしておくといいと思います。


追記
実績を残り1つになるまで遊びましたが、最後の1つはマルチプレイが必要らしく自分は諦めました。

author: {'steamid': '76561197979925792', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 5198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2429, 'last_played': 1624783995}

author: {'steamid': '76561198155934212', 'num_games_owned': 295, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 1600, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1600, 'last_played': 1564532125}
review:
I really like the older dungeon keeper games and it was very hard to decided to recommend this game or not. On the one hand the single player content is really well done and a good time. On the other is the abysmal multiplayer experience. The balance is all out of wack and leans way too heavy on turtleing up. The overworld mechanic also sucks. Having only one way to enter the enemy dungeon ruins the depth to the original concept of building and protecting an underground dungeon. Having to build up walls is also pointless if you cannot dig at all. I am also sad to see the same feature return for dungeons 3.

Just track down the original games.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960836265', 'num_games_owned': 445, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 592, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 592, 'last_played': 1590266189}
review:
Vale apena sim, o jogo é legalzinho se você pegar numa promoção. Acho que eu ganhei ele em algum lugar não lembro.
A história é bem ruim, quem escreveu não tinha a menor criatividade e simplesmente copiou partes do senhor dos anéis e game of thrones, alterou os nomes um pouco e achou que seria muito engraçado. Ficou uma porcaria.
Não adianta nada ter um conceito legal de gameplay como eles conseguiram e colocar uma historia bosta.
Gameplay = bom   -   Historia = ruim

author: {'steamid': '76561198266073876', 'num_games_owned': 571, 'num_reviews': 351, 'playtime_forever': 261, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1590193822}
review: This game is worth it's price. I have not played the earlier dungeons games, and this is the only one I've played. I think the dungeon management and rts mechanics are very good. Unfortunately, multiplayer is dead, which makes getting the last achievement hard, but there is a Dungeons 2 multiplayer group that can help you get it. Additionally, there are two factions in the base game, the "horde" and the "demons" with their own unique twists and units. Good voice and achievements are well balanced.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078376812', 'num_games_owned': 2287, 'num_reviews': 172, 'playtime_forever': 4245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2029, 'last_played': 1606405108}
review:

던전 키퍼처럼... 내 던전 만들 수 있는 게임이지? 그렇지?

어? 던전에 함정을 깔았어? 응 ㅈ까. 해제할거야~

그럼 워크래프트 같은 속도감은 있겠지...?

review: The control is horrible and the pace is boringly slow. You have to manually press WASD to move the camera whereby in other games of similar design, you just need to move your mouse to the edges of the screen to pan the camera. This game can't. author: {'steamid': '76561198082198072', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 27735, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4088, 'last_played': 1705556465}
review:
Dungeons II es un más que decente heredero espiritual de la saga Dungeon Keeper.
En esencia es un juego de estrategia de gestión de mazmorra que mezcla bastante bien las mecánicas de la Saga Dungeon Keeper y Warcraft.
El juego se caracteriza por una muy divertida jugabilidad y  humor en su campaña principal, que encantará a los fans de Dungeon Keeper.

[b]Nota Global: 8/10 Muy Bueno[/b]


[b]------------------------------ Desglose ------------------------------[/b]


[b]--- Gráficos ---[/b] 
Buenos.
El estilo gráfico es de tipo cartoon, con gráficos desenfadados y coloridos.
Los modelos 3D y texturas están bastante bien hechos pero algo simplificados faltando detalle.
El juego no cuenta con cinemáticas, sino con unos cuantos pases de animación hechos a mano.
La cámara no puede girarse libremente, solo disponemos de unos ángulos y zoom prefijados, igual que en Warcraft III, algo incomprensible y que resulta un paso atrás en este tipo de juegos.

[b]--- Sonido ---[/b]
Bueno
El juego tiene variedad de melodías que acompañan perfectamente a la partida. Sin embargo  no hay ninguna pieza especialmente épica o remarcable.
El juego esta doblado al castellano. Remarcar al Narrador del juego, que está muy bien doblado y nos causará constantes sonrisas con sus bromas y referencias a otros videojuegos u obras de fantasía.

[b]--- Jugabilidad ---[/b]
Muy Buena.
Dungeons 2 mezcla 2 estilos de juego distintos con bastante éxito.
La parte de la gestión de Mazmorra esta muy bien desarrollada. Como jugador podremos tener acceso a toda nuestra mazmorra y criaturas de forma rápida y eficiente.
En este módo de juego crearemos salas y trampas para nuestra mazmorra. Reclutaremos criaturas y las mejoraremos gracias a nuestras mejoras e investigaciones. Quizá el tema de la IA sea un poco menos trabajado que en Dungeon Keeper, donde las criaturas tenían varias pautas de comportamiento que hacian aflorar su temperamento y debiamos gestionar.
El juego además nos permite salir al mundo exterior y poder atacar asentamientos de la superficie. En este aspecto la jugabilidad es muy parecida al Warcraft III, pero un tanto más simplificada cosa que reduce un poco el componente estratégico. Aun así las criaturas tienen distintas cualidades y habilidades con las que podemos crear nuestras estrategias.
El juego presenta 2 razas jugables. La Horda y los demonios. En su expansión incluye además los No muertos como raza extra.
Incluye modo multijugador.

[b]Historia / Duración[/b]
Buena
La historia del juego es una mera parodia de otras obras de fantasía, como Juego de Tronos, Warcraft, El señor de los anillos o el propio Dungeon Keeper entre otros. El juego hace alusiones y guiños de forma constante a esas obras y su propia historia es un mero tramite para jugar la campaña. Esto por un lado hace el juego tremendamente divertido, pero por otro lado hace que el propio juego no tenga carisma, ni trasfondo propio.
En términos generales es muy disfrutable. La campaña principal cuenta con 11 misiones que nos entretendrán durante muchas horas de diversión.

author: {'steamid': '76561198137174846', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 8523, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5934, 'last_played': 1601991990}
review: This game is very fun. now, it may sound plain, but it really is fun; not overselling it. I enjoyed this game, it has a nice strategy to it, you can easily enjoy a 3-5 hour session on one of the more difficult skirmish maps, and there are possibilities as to with which faction to play, so there are varieties. Another great thing is the commentary on the campaigns - I bought the Game of Winter DLC and I personally think it is worth the money solely based on the dialogues - it's like paying to watch a movie, but you participate in it. all in all - it is mainly a fun game, but it is very good.

author: {'steamid': '76561198380047370', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 761, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 402, 'last_played': 1647446144}

author: {'steamid': '76561198089165346', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 2783, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2783, 'last_played': 1587236478}
review:
[h1]Respuesta corta: [/h1]
Un juego interesante, recomendado... cómico y con muchas referencias a los fans de la fantasía y el Rol, me sorprendió mucho y para bien lo interesante y profundo a ratos que es su gameplay.

[h1]Respuesta Extendida: [/h1]
[b]Historia:[/b] Buena, muy simple pero muy graciosa y con muchas buenas referencias.
[b]Diseño y Gráficos:[/b] Muy buenos gráficos y bonito diseño de personajes.
[b]Gameplay:[/b] Muy buena, al inicio parece difícil pero tiene cierto nivel de profundidad y también es muy muy adictivo, este juego es un poso de horas.
[b]Música:[/b]  Buena.

[b]Palabras finales:[/b] Un juego muy interesante, parece simple al inicio pero con un gameplay profundo y adictivo y una buena curva de dificultad. Lo recomiendo mucho a los fans de los juegos y libros de Rol (En especial Warcraft III), lo empece a jugar por el tributo que hace a otras franquicias pero digo con gusto que tiene suficientes meritos para quedarme y querer más de esta saga. Pdta: La dificultad del DLC es una basura, todo un reto…

author: {'steamid': '76561198958690351', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1402, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1130, 'last_played': 1589063237}
review: a little short and it almost feels like a poor mans warcraft 3 but its well made and if you like rts games its worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198218208509', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 2611, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2611, 'last_played': 1588579380}
review:
Прекрасны представитель Dungeon Keeper, не лишенный шарма. Интересная кампания, дающая море положительных эмоций. Отборные шутки рассказчика и бесконечные отсылки к культовым вселенным: Warcraft, Game of Thrones и другие. Именно благодаря рассказчику кампанию интересно проходить. Если в некоторых места кампания может показаться занудной, то рассказчик обязательно пошутит по этому поводу. Отдельно стоит поблагодарить за русскую локализацию. Озвучка прекрасная. 

Из минусов стоит отменить не самый удобный интерфейс, в частности перенос юнитов в Верхний мир. Короткая кампания за демонов не дает их распробовать, да и по сравнению с Ордой они кажутся слабее. Мультиплеер мертв. А в битвах нет разнообразия режимов.

Так что если покупать игру, то только ради Кампании. И она того стоит.

И пользуясь случаем… За Сильвию Вихрекрылую, за Абсолютного Вождя Орды!

author: {'steamid': '76561198800764460', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1285, 'last_played': 1601708278}

author: {'steamid': '76561197971042250', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 426, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 184, 'last_played': 1588476407}
review:
This game doesn't make any sense.  It asks me to place a trap, but no trap I place satisfies the game.  I can't figure out why I can't satisfy the game tutorial conditions and there's no explanation of what to do.  I'm only on the 2nd mission and the  game can't explain how to create traps nor how to place them to satisfy it's own explanations.  I have a 'room' of exclamation points which a YouTube video suggested I should find the solution, but all I get is game messages that I can't build a room there and can't place a trap inside a room which I can't build.  It makes no sense.  

I asked for help on the Steam game discussion forums.  Hopefully someone will explain inexplicably basic game dynamics to me.  Otherwise I'll uninstall and chalk this up to some scam or another.  I mean, how hard can it be to explain basic game functionality?  If you can't explain it to my level .....  you shouldn't be making games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011445274', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 822, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 822, 'last_played': 1587284370}
review:
Замечательная игра! Ни сказать что выдающаяся, но всё-таки лучше чем просто "хорошо". Я сравнивал её с Dungeon Keeper II и War for the Overworld. 
Плюсы:
1) Приятная внешность - очень напоминает WarCraft 3, только с тюнингом (мне больше не с чем сравнить в такой стилистике)
2) Увлекательный процесс. Жизнь обитателей сделана гораздо более жИво и разнообразней, чем в том-же War for the Overworld
3) Дополнительный режим игры - сверху над подземельем. Прибавляет разнообразие
Минусы:
1) Кампания очень короткая и лёгкая, под конец игры становится скучно, везде почти одно и тоже
2) Мелкие минусы:
- при выборе юнитов, нужно каждого по отдельности выбирать, чтоб "взять в руку", тогда как в предыдущих играх достаточно просто жать на иконку с числом юнитов. Благо что здесь их будет сильно ограниченное количество (как в WarCraft 3)
- нельзя менять скорость игры
- при переходе на следующий уровень, всё древо развития теряется
В целом, игру конечно-же рекомендую! Нету такой суматохи и каши, как в предыдущих играх т.к. число юнитов сильно ограничено. Развитие во многом строится на апгрейдах. В целом, 80% игры (субъективно) - всё тоже самое и знакомое. К сожалению, из-за слабой кампании повторно проходить пока не тянет

author: {'steamid': '76561198057839097', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 4060, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2058, 'last_played': 1682412651}
review: This game combines management with exploration and some battle in a way that I like. Battling is an important part of the game, but you don't have to put any thought into it if strategy isn't your thing. The replay value is pretty solid, too, because the different playable factions also have different traps, so dungeon defense requires different strategies. This is a game that I alternate with other management sims, because the mechanics are solid but relatively simple, so because I'm not in love with the story/aesthetic, I lose interest in it after a while and want to move on.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021403893', 'num_games_owned': 2603, 'num_reviews': 217, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1494537096}
review:
В данном обзоре я расскажу вам об игре Dungeons 2. От разработчика Realmforge Studios.  Обзор не содержит плагиата и написан целиком и полностью мной, Гвардом.



Игра Dungeons 2 относится по жанровой принадлежности к стратегии с РПГ элементами, этакий симулятор Злого Властелина и продолжение первой части.

Геймплей.
Играем мы собственно за Злого Властелина который должен повелевая ордами злобных существ защитить своё обиталище подземелье, а так же победить Добро на поверхности завоевав территорию. В наличии мы имеем три ,,фракци" включая фракцию мертвецов из DLC.
Демоны. Требуют постройки залов восхищения иначе откажутся служить.
Орда. Они же орки. Этим нужна пивоварня. Иначе становятся унылыми и несговорчивыми болванами.
Нежить. Собственно мертвяки. Войны нежити не умирают ибо уже мертвы, построив кладбище просто оживляем их.

Каждая фракция имеет свои уникальные постройки и свою тактику игры. Геймплей можно условно разделить на две части. Первая это обустройство нашего подземелья и постройка в нем сооружений. Постройка разных комнат в подземелье, дверей и создание ловушек — это все наша забота. Все существа имеют несколько уровней развития.

Вторая часть это непосредственно боевые вылазки на поверхность. Тут мы управляя нашими ордами нападаем на лагеря и базы Добра, уничтожаем их форпосты, а так же выполняем различные квесты как например на освобождение из плена змее людей. Попутно занимаемся сбором разных артефактов.Причем нужно грамотно распределять свои силы и следить за обстановкой сразу на поверхности и в подземелье которое тоже штурмуют наши враги. Карты локации в игре небольшого размера так что каких то огромных баталий тысячи мобов тут нет.

Стоит отметить качество сюжетной компании проходить которую очень интересно. А так же качество шуток так называемого ,,Рассказчика" который комментирует наши действия и общается с ним вставляя различные шутки.

В игре огромное количество отсылок к различным знаменитым играм вроде WoW или Героев магии и меча 3, Доте 2 и Властелину Колец. Особенно порадовала отсылка в виде NPC с именем Бартас которого переманили на сторону Зла. Привет Артасу из WoW!

Управление реализовано довольно удобно, как и интерфейс в игре, но не хватает возможности масштабирования. Так же искусственный интеллект наших подопечных на высоком уровне и постоянный контроль тут не нужен. Что не может не радовать.

Графика в игре выполнена в аляповатом гротескном стиле, что отлично вписывается в общую шутливость и несерьёзность происходящего. Тут нет кровищи и расчленёнки, но все нарисованною в узнаваемом фентезийном стиле. Качество текстур вполне хорошее примерно уровня Варкрафт 3. Спец-эффекты красивые, а локации наполнены деталями и красивыми пейзажами. Оптимизация игры достойная.

Особенным пунктом хочу отметить великолепную озвучу и музыку. Игра полностью локализована и слушать шутки Рассказчика или читать диалоги очень интересно и приятно. Вообще качество звукового фона и эффектов да и локализации игры это пример того как надо её делать на высочайшем уровне.

В игре наличествует возможность игры в мультиплеере. Проблем с синхронизацией или падением FPS не замечено.

Из минусов игры отмечу лишь довольно малую продолжительность компании и небольшое количество контента (существ,ловушек,зданий) в целом.


На этом я заканчиваю обзор данной игры, для вас старался Золотой Дракон Гвард. Всем добра!

author: {'steamid': '76561198307292082', 'num_games_owned': 19, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 5170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4978, 'last_played': 1587609341}
review: This game is worth it's price. I have not played the earlier dungeons games, and this is the only one I've played. I think the dungeon management and rts mechanics are very good. Unfortunately, multiplayer is dead, which makes getting the last achievement hard, but there is a Dungeons 2 multiplayer group that can help you get it. Additionally, there are two factions in the base game, the "horde" and the "demons" with their own unique twists and units. Good voice and achievements are well balanced.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970393752', 'num_games_owned': 791, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 1718, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1462, 'last_played': 1586951714}
review: Wem es nicht sofort auf den ersten Blick klar ist: Das Spiel ist ein Dungeon Keeper Klon. Und als solcher erfüllt Dungeons 2 seinen Zweck. Der Punkt, an dem sich wahrscheinlich die Geister scheiden werden ist der Humor. Es gibt tonnenweise Anspielungen auf Filme und Popkultur, im Grunde besteht die komplette Story daraus, und der Humor ist nicht gerade subtil, sondern eher von der Sorte mit dem Hammer in die Fre**e. Von Game of Thrones, Warcraft bis Herr der Ringe ist alles vertreten. Das reicht von Namen wie Gandeldor bis hin zu rezitierten minimal abgeänderten Szenen aus Filmen. Aber wie das mit Humor nunmal so ist, manche Leute werden es fürchterlich finden.  Mir war es teilweise etwas too much. Manchmal ist weniger mehr. Trotzdem hat das alles einen gewissen Charme. Die Grafik ist hübsch und das Artdesign auch. Finde es ehrlich gesagt sogar hübscher als Warcraft III Reforged, denn die Figuren sind nicht so klobig. Alles in allem hatte ich meinen Spass mit dem Spiel. Ebenso mit Dungeons 3.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023951163', 'num_games_owned': 3253, 'num_reviews': 435, 'playtime_forever': 1696, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1696, 'last_played': 1585741267}
review:
Да Вы же.... Абсолютное Зло. Приятная сатирическая стратегия о поражении Зла и его мести.

В плане юмора, отсылок и прочего эта игра прекрасна - много упоминаний прочих игр и сериалов и шуток над ними, а повествование рассказчика лишь усиливает этот эффект.

Геймплей - довольно прост, симулятор золотодобытчика и штамповки орков с последующим уничтожением всех хороших, добрых и так раздражающего Абсолютное Зло вещей. Забавная кампания, которая усложняется по мере прохождения. 2 играбельных фракции, а именно демоны (всего 2 миссии) и орда, каждая из которых опирается на разный геймплей и прокачку. Юнитов по 5 для каждой из фракций с возможностью их последующего апгрейда в более сильных боевых единиц. К минусам можно отнести лишь очень долгую прокачку - я не завершил ни 1 уровень прокачав все, что можно, так как это не нужно (это круто) и очень долго.

Графика - приятна, но мультяшна, что соответствует несерьезному стилю игры. Юниты милы и реагируют на длань ужаса (именно она руководит подземельем). Будь она брутальна и в духе темного фэнтези было бы выше всяких похвал, но это вкусовщина и тогда игра потеряла бы свой шарм и юморной посыл. Еще 1 небольшой минус - невозможность отдалить камеру подальше и сделать элементы интерфейса меньше, так, на мой взгляд, было бы гораздо удобнее.

8 Абсолютных Зол из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198069248329', 'num_games_owned': 110, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1377, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1377, 'last_played': 1548693999}
review:
Uma das descobertas por acaso mais sensacionais que já tive em relação a jogos que já tive na vida. 

  Recebi de graça e a princípio nem dei muita atenção de primeira, mas quando tentei lá pela segunda vez percebi o quão divertido esse jogo é. Ele mescla uma narrativa hilária com uma inversão de papéis que vai agradar todo fã de RTS em geral.

  Aqui você não controla a equipe que invade a dungeon, você cria a sua dungeon e deve proteger ela dos invasores humanos. Simples, direto e muito divertido. Nada mais precisa ser dito, apenas jogue essa beleza de jogo.

Jogabilidade: 7/10 Você pode ficar um pouco confuso no começo, mas dps tudo vai fluir melhor. Entretanto poderia abranger mais certas possibilidades que o jogo preferiu manter contidas.

Gráfico: 9/10 pra época e pra um RTS os gráficos são muito bons. Um prato cheio para fãs de Warcraft por ex.

Enredo: 7/10 simples e direto, o ponto forte na minha opinião é o narrador que deixa o clima hilário durante certas situações e certas cagadas que você faz no decorrer do jogo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198129628799', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 763, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 763, 'last_played': 1585088975}
review: Muy divertido! Ese narrador es épico! El juego también está muy divertido, algo corto.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999460221', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 384, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 384, 'last_played': 1585067052}
review:
Gold collection and overall game play is way too slow, I find myself tabbing out for 15 minutes waiting for enough to get the next room upgrade or to recruit a new soldier. If you want to speed things up you can recruit more Imps at the sacrifice of stronger units, only leaving you open to being killed by the next wave of Alliance.

The narrator is well voiced and well written, I enjoyed him a lot.

Levels are designed with obvious paths in mind with regard to mining out the gold tiles - which alongside the narrator makes me feel like the game plans and plays itself and I'm as much a minion to it as the imps that do the busywork.

Terrifically slow pacing and only a very basic sense of base management and minion control make this a poor overall experience.

I love the dungeon keeper idea and formula, but this one is a big swing and a miss for me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198221698860', 'num_games_owned': 374, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 725, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 656, 'last_played': 1587831688}
review:
Rts açlığınızı doyurur ama starcraft kadar iyi bir savaş sistemi yok. 
Bu açığını doyurmak için bol bol farklı şey var.
1-Baseinizi gerçekten donatma gerçek anlamıyla herhangi bir campaign bölümünde 1 saat geçirmek mümkün
2-Mizah bol bol mizah(Harry Potter,Game Of Thrones) gönderileri

author: {'steamid': '76561197991556719', 'num_games_owned': 680, 'num_reviews': 214, 'playtime_forever': 421, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 418, 'last_played': 1585345831}
review:
Rather convoluted and not challenging. The humor is doable but it doesn't have the little quirks that Dungeon Keeper had and rearing the minions isn't as much fun: there is no walkign around your dungeon, monsters always get along with each other, you have total control over what type of monster comes into your dungeon and you'll be held by the hand for most of the way... The dungeons feel uninspired and lack the cave-like feeling DK1 had. 

The GUI is just a mess. It's difficult to keep track of your gold and what you have already researched because the icons never disappear. And what's with the spells? Most of them seem fairly useless.

The mixture of over and underworld doesn't work well either. What is to stop you from bringing your entire army to the overworld for a boring steamroll? Most enemies can be defeated using a few rooms with traps near their spawn when they come into the dungeon.

The game seems to be lacking quick-binds which turns certain actions into real chores, like picking up all your monsters and dropping them elsewhere in the dungeon. Also having to find the right unit with a certain ability to use in the overworld is simply tedious work and more often than not, I just don't bother because the zerg rush will get 'm any way.

Granted, the original did not have this either but that was 20-odd years ago.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105762175', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 1481, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1481, 'last_played': 1568054709}
review: Простенько и со вкусом. Это не масштабная стратегия, это почти что интерактивная история. Местами остроумная. Ну и ностальгия по DK...

author: {'steamid': '76561197969643946', 'num_games_owned': 931, 'num_reviews': 179, 'playtime_forever': 669, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 669, 'last_played': 1584781064}
review:
Terrifically slow pacing and only a very basic sense of base management and minion control make this a poor overall experience.

The game wears it's Dungeon Keeper influence tattooed on it's forehead, and nowhere is that more obvious than with the narrator - yet the narrator is poorly written, mostly either too annoying or hand-holdy to retain the fun of the original. Every other line is a nerd-culture reference to game of thrones or lord of the rings, shoved down your throat without subtlety or humour.

Levels are designed with obvious paths in mind with regard to mining out the gold tiles - which alongside the narrator makes me feel like the game plans and plays itself and I'm as much a minion to it as the imps that do the busywork.

Overground combat is mediocre at it's best, but mostly boring select-all and right click affairs on even more linear level design.

The design of the minions themselves are all pretty bland and predictable, also completely lacking the charm of the game's ancestors.

I love the dungeon keeper idea and formula, but this one is a big swing and a miss for me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052287107', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2015, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2015, 'last_played': 1584623640}
review:
Ho scoperto Dungeons per via del mio amore di infanzia ovvero Dungeon Keeper, dopo aver finito War for the Overworld (vero erede di quest'ultimo), sono approdato su Dungeons 2, che dire gioco molto divertente, il doppiaggio interamente italiano ha una marcia in più e i riferimenti alle opere fantasy sono stupendi. Campagna principale portata a termine con un discreto livello di sfida crescente. Unico DLC che vale l'acquisto è a Game of Winter che introduce una nuova fazione ma alza il livello di difficoltà drasticamente, un paio di livelli mi han fatto penare, ma in un panorama dove tutto è semplicissimo è stato una piacevole sfida.
Consigliato a tutti quelli che amano la doppia dinamica strategica di costruzione espansione e quella RTS.

author: {'steamid': '76561197976799778', 'num_games_owned': 1287, 'num_reviews': 564, 'playtime_forever': 883, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 883, 'last_played': 1583833763}
review:
Dungeons 2 ist weder die Katastrophe wie der erste Teil noch ist es so gut wie der Dritte. Dungeons 2 ist eine Mischung aus Dungeon Keeper light und Warcraft 2 light. Dabei hat mir der Spieldurchlauf durchaus Spaß gemacht. Leider gibt es nur wenige Missionen (10 oder 11), welche ich nach 14 Stunden durchhatte. Für ein Spiel aus diesem Genre finde ich das eigentlich etwas wenig. Umso mehr störte es mich, dass die Level sich so langsam und gestreckt anfühlten, weil man so viel erforschen musste oder das Geld so langsam herein strudelte. Mit einem guten Pacing wäre das Spiel schon nach sieben Stunden beendet gewesen.
Wer Dungeons 3 mochte und noch mehr von diesem Spielkonzept haben will, kann hier für einen schmalen Taler ruhig zugreifen.

3/5

review:
Tenes que construir un Dungeon y prepararte para las oleadas de bichos, Vi varios del Rubro TD, esta bastante bien hecho, buenos graficos, narraciones, Sonidos, jugabilidad, Pero resulta aburrido despues de un poco de tiempo.

El juego o bien se podia hacer mas simple para perder menos tiempo aprendiendo funcionalidades Frugales o se podia complejizar agregando una curva de aprendizaje con mas y mas contenido.


Es un genero delicado donde puede salir una basura o una obra de arte maestra en poco tiempo dependiendo pequeños cambios.

No me gusto, pero no es un mal juego, Le pondria voto neutral.

review: Nicht so gut wie der dritte Teil der Reihe aber deutlich besser als der Erste. Kalypso schafft es sogar noch besser als der Urvater -Dungeon Keeper zu sein und das schafft kaum jemand. Anscheinend muss es wohl Kritik gegeben haben, dass das Hauptspiel zu einfach wäre, denn beim Addon: A Game of Winter, übertreiben die Ersteller hemmungslos und man hat nahezu keine Chance.. etwas schade aber I love you trotzdem Kalypso 😉. Hoffentlich kommt ein vierter Teil.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040352959', 'num_games_owned': 592, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1966, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1966, 'last_played': 1450010366}
review: Dungeon - спасение от типичного фэнтези, которое в свою очередь просто начинает надоедать обилием добра. Серия Dungeons, вместе с Keeper'ом и Overlord'ом, необходима для условного баланса добра и зла. Так много фентези, так много победы добра над злом, что даже обилие исключительно годного фентези начинает надоедать однотипностью отношений добро побеждает зло. "...Зло подтачивает даже самые отважные сердца, и даже если его изгнать, оно не исчезнет, оно рыщет во мраке и вынашивает месть..." Так что если есть свет, должна быть и тьма. Ну коммон, всем иногда охота побыть за плохишей, верно? А тут еще всё приправляется отсылками, юморком и просто очешуенным диктором/рассказчиком, а с этой "приправой" ты особо то и не замечаешь минусов, если их не ищешь конечно. Конечно простой и монотонный геймплей быстро начинает раздражать, но кампания короткая и заканчивается вовремя, так что это раздражение не успевает развиться в негатив. Кстати, если вы пришли по метке "Стратегия", вам следует скипнуть игру, потому что от стратегии тут одно название. В итоге получается хорошая, не напрягающая и забавная игра, одним словом чильная, которая оставляет после себя приятные эмоции и ощущение "сброшенного с плеч груза" от того, что и у зла есть  шансы на победу)

author: {'steamid': '76561198088721672', 'num_games_owned': 531, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2179, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1089, 'last_played': 1579664825}

author: {'steamid': '76561198025135223', 'num_games_owned': 573, 'num_reviews': 196, 'playtime_forever': 6330, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1933, 'last_played': 1599667652}
review:
DUngeons 2 est un jeu de gestion, nous dirigeons notre horde de monstres et devons vaincre les gentils chevaliers!
Autant je n'avais pas apprécié Dungeons 1, autant le 2 avec ses airs de Dungeon Keeper est une très agréable surprise.
C'est beau, agréable a jouer, la voie du narrateur, omniprésente, est fabuleuse! On s'amuse beaucoup, on ne s'ennuie pas, Dungeons 2 est réellement un très bon jeu.
Je le recommande!

author: {'steamid': '76561198049813652', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 1399, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1399, 'last_played': 1578398366}
review:
If you ever played Dungeon Keeper and liked it you MUST play this one. This is as close as you can get to it. There is no "Possession spell" here and you cant take prisoners and you cant make vampires from dead creatures or turn evil tortured prisoners. But you get to go upside and to burn that village of heroes, elven unicorn forest and other fun stuff. For those who hear about DK this is a game worth your money if you are into vice versa dungeon strategy game. That is controlling the evil side and prevailing against heroes. While having a loads of fun. The narrator is great, sarcastic, humorous and the entire game makes pretty good fun of popular fantasy. You will play as ultimate evil, controlling Orcs. Then you learn about another evil rising elsewhere, that would be chaotic evil. Then you will want to recruit some undead only to learn there is another evil. You get to control the chaotic evil in few missions. It was fun to play with demons for a change. You will not get to play as undead evil though :(
This game has nice visuals as well as voices and sounds. Good game mechanics. Easy to navigate. Not too many rooms or complicated mnicromanagement. 
The biggest downside worth mentioning is they live their own lives too much :D. Leveling of creatures - sometimes to get few creatures from tier one to tier 3 takes a lot of time. Together I spent maybe 4-5 hours waiting for that. The creature will start leveling when put to training structure. Then you have to click on button to increase tier and not level. It takes about 2-3 minutes to complete. Then an attack happens or you get distracted for other reason and get back to see that the training structure is empty (creature went to get bear or gold or else, "hypnotize" spell can help sometimes). Where is that moron again you ask and time goes by...
Then you get him back on track and he start leveling instead of increasing tier and you click button to increase tier and it start from beginning (sad lol)
Altogether, you will have a lot of fun, you get to kill a lot of fun fantasy characters and be evil incarnate while creating your own dungeon, defending with traps or creatures, attack with creatures above ground. 
I may be bad, but I feel gooood :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198049087862', 'num_games_owned': 263, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1457, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1457, 'last_played': 1578274649}
review:
It's a nice Dungeonbuider although it lacks customization and depth. 
The humor is very very on the nose, almost to the point of exhaustion, especially if your struggling.
I don't really see much replayability so you want to play the campaign. 
The Basegame campaign is something like 10 - 12 missions and plays incredible fast, like 15 hours tops, 16 if you go for all achievements. 
So this is already the point where you really need to consider buying this on sale only, but what really took the fun for me was the expansion Game of Winter. Holy **** did anyone playtest this thing? I just slaved away 3 hours on a the third mission, I guess they got feedback that the basegame was too easy so they put it way beyond anything sensible

author: {'steamid': '76561198031705864', 'num_games_owned': 272, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1146, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1020, 'last_played': 1578524418}
review: A fun game. The difficulty is almost non-existent, but that's not what the game is all about. Great writing with a well picked narrator together with the non demanding gameplay create a very relaxing RTS.

author: {'steamid': '76561198186215147', 'num_games_owned': 433, 'num_reviews': 156, 'playtime_forever': 1428, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 520, 'last_played': 1579587220}
review: A great classic take on the old school dungeon keeper series, the over world aspect is fun and this game is quite challenging. Worth the money.

author: {'steamid': '76561197962345227', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 2673, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1450, 'last_played': 1579471745}
review:
Somehow the baby of [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3720/Evil_Genius/]Evil Genius[/url] and Warcraft 2/3. Fun to build a base, explore the dungeon, and build up your horde.

The base building is more focused on resource collection and troop upgrade/management. Those expecting more of an emphasis on the defense/trap building aspect will be disappointed.

The campaign is fun with each map giving more units, and upgrades, and there's "skirmish mode" which lets you take more of a sandbox approach to any level.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045043619', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 6484, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2918, 'last_played': 1603228911}
review: Un gioco senza dubbio ben riuscito. Ho apprezzato molto il genere: uno strategico fuso con un GDR e con richiami anche ai GDR arcade vecchio stile (per quanto riguarda la generazione dei nemici). La storia è molto interessante e comica e il modo in cui essa viene raccontata è veramente geniale. Grafica cartoonesca in 3D molto carina con altrettanto bei personaggi. La cosa che ho apprezzato di più è che è un gioco parecchio difficile in particolare nelle mappe dei DLC. L'unica pecca è il multiplayer che sfortunatamente non è stato ben sviluppato in quanto non vi è una vera e propria ricerca degli avversari ma è più un multiplayer da giocare fra amici. Detto questo comunque rimane un bellissimo gioco da giocare in singolo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198314245448', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 4568, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2480, 'last_played': 1641388588}
review: Рассказчик просто шикарен.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004473981', 'num_games_owned': 1199, 'num_reviews': 180, 'playtime_forever': 2461, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2461, 'last_played': 1547240420}
review:
Кто бы мог подумать, что после Dungeons I могло появиться Dungeons II, в котором поменялось почти всё, и в противоположную от провала сторону?
Я вот не мог.
А получилось, однако, недурно. Дополнение A Game of Winter тоже порадовало. Чёрный юмор, присущий Dungeon Keeper, здесь заменён на карикатурность и сатиру, добавлены вылазки на поверхность (о чём мечтали все, кто видел финальный ролик DK2), оригинальность отстройки подземелья и некоторые свои механики в наличии, и, в общем... хорошо вышло. Но понравится не всем. Любителям DK ознакомиться явно стоит, остальным же надо крепко подумать.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055966698', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 7523, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3288, 'last_played': 1579646325}

author: {'steamid': '76561198070896661', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 2076, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2076, 'last_played': 1577634329}
review:
I can recommend playing this game. The concept is cool and the general idea nice. Graphics are good, only the narrator talks sometimes a bit too silly stuff. It seems as if this game does not want to be taken too seriously (the original Dungeon Keepr which I also played many years ago was somewhat cooler there). Alone - it does not fit my personal humour so much. Still, it was fun playing it.
Please note: you need the fighting pit to upgrade your units. Throw one in there and then select the pit again. In the little menu you can choose wheter you want to just train for XP or upgrade (I recommend upgrading some Nagas into Naga Queens whcih can heal). I missed this concept until the final mission... ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198011959785', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 159, 'playtime_forever': 1874, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 307, 'last_played': 1672871306}
review:
Познакомился я с серией недавно и начал с 3й части(в коопе). И судить могу именно в сравнении с 3й частью. Что ж... Визуально и геймплейно 2я часть в разы лучше(нет коопа, но чисто как игра лучше).
Шутки поприятнее, наратор как то лучше прописан - разнообразнее фразы и пр.
Чисто сравнивая с другими стратегиями - весьма хорошая игра для тех кто любит посидеть и поразвивать базу. стратегия в основном по типу - закидать телами, не считая непосредственно момента защиты башни. 
Считаю что игра стоит того чтоб с ней ознакомится, сам брал по скидке. 
ПС может я ещё не нашёл этого в игре или есть отдельный режим, но не хватает режима игры за добро. Я понимаю что игра строит себя как альтер эго другим сериям, но это и правда внесло бы разнообразие.

author: {'steamid': '76561198285918191', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 3120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1116, 'last_played': 1578572546}
review:
Better than the first Dungeons? Yes.

Dungeon Keeper-ish game in a nutshell. I enjoyed the mechanics and the narration (most of the time), and the characters are unique on their own way. The factions in the game (Horde, Demons, etc.) are pretty good, and you can upgrade them. Too bad that you can't convert the good guys in this game. You can play in your own pace without the narrator pestering you "anymore", but some people won't like it cuz' it will be too slow progress for them (just so you know). 

BUT

if you like dungeon games, and you just want to fill that void of emptyness, just take it. When it's on sale.

My only downside is it is very unstable compared to the other games I played on Steam. It keeps crashing every time I was in-game and the startup wasn't as smooth as I thought it would be. Always giving me errors when I tried reentering the game which ended up me restarting my computer and getting the chance for it to work was random (60-40 chances I would say), so why am I giving a thumbs-up? Cuz' I like the game, and maybe it was just my computer acting up; but you can take your chances.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128410639', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 5042, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2891, 'last_played': 1706796500}
review:
Всё понравилось. Приятнейшая красивая очень аккуратная графика, какую не часто встретишь. Геймплей может быть и не из типичных стратегий, и может быть он не требует особых умений в тактике, но игры по типу Хозяин подземелий и не имеют обычно особых тактических приемов, кроме отстройки самого подземелья. 

В общем, придраться если кто захочет - сможет, но по факту, минусов в игре нет вообще.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052175253', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 2355, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1298, 'last_played': 1576472472}

review: Très bon dungeon keeper like, avec un mélange de point&click façon RTS basique lorsqu'on passe du monde sous-terrain au monde exterieur bisounours, qui devient un mode chaotique au fur et à mesure de la progression des unités. Tout cela avec une pointe d'humour et de clins d'oeil de différents films et jeux bien connus de la part du narrateur qui nous accompagne pendant la campagne.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004614330', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 2521, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2369, 'last_played': 1697026490}
review:
Замечетельная игра, позволяющая ещё раз окунуться в мир Зла правящего в подземелье. Я до сих пор глубоко влюблена в Dungeon Keeper, и всё это время ждала достойного последователя подземной стратегии, и кажется я его нашла. 

Единственный для меня минус это то, что создания на поверхности не могу сами пользоваться своими умениями, хотя внутри подземелья они прекрасно справляются сами. Всё таки без паузы в бою быстро воспользоваться всеми умениями героев, созданий и ещё успеть скастовать магию - просто нереально. Это несколько обидно.

review: So here's the deal. If you ever played Dungeon Keeper, you're going to enjoy this game. It's not a hardcore strategy game. It's fun, it's silly, it's casual friendly (if that's your thing). It has some minor UX/UI flaws, but I didn't have any crashes or any tech problems whatsoever. I played for 14 hours and plan to play more.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990643240', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 4467, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1402, 'last_played': 1575354288}
review:
Grossly Unbalanced, Unending commentary from the AI about what a player should be doing, but not bothering to explain much.  Tutorial is quite the joke and has very limited information.  Once you reach the Troll stage, the upgrades they provide do actually nothing for your creatures. Same goes for the Arena, they can try to build up their stats all day long, and never will.  

While it is fun at some points, the game needs a severe work over to rebalance many of the issues.  

Also, the Very Limited amount of actual missions, leads to this being a short game usually, but because of the way the game has really poor mechanics, it will take you at least 23 hours to get to a halfway point, because you have to slow grind out everything.

Then wait for enemies to appear, to slowly level up your creatures enough that they wont die in the first 5 seconds of battle against the levels boss.

of a 5 star review standpoint, i give it 2 stars

author: {'steamid': '76561198030554225', 'num_games_owned': 227, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 288, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 288, 'last_played': 1574264703}
review:
I can't recommend this game at all.
Like it got some nifty things that makes it sorta interesting but... when a match drags on because the opponent you are facing spawns waves after waves of mobs that makes the main enemy immune again and again JUST as you are about to kill him...
Call it poor timing all one wants but, that shouldn't be a thing. Like either it should be consistant or not at all; it was neither of the two.

Its a neat game that falls into the category of "Its good because I played <insert nostalgic game here> when I was a kid". I'd describe this as nostalgia bait because for anyone who's nostalgic about the original game and still plays it to this day, sure... here's another version of the same game.
To anyone who doesn't live in the past, stay away from the game. It is slow, it is boring, it is cute but... being cute is not, at least for me, enough to carry a game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198170986881', 'num_games_owned': 389, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1427, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1427, 'last_played': 1574087938}
review: 上手简单，消遣时间还蛮不错的，还可以手动塔防，旁白好评。缺点就是人类方没有什么成长。导致我方前期太弱，后期又太强。用部落打了一盘不可能难度，无尽模式，前期被反复推到老家，依靠医疗床无限复活和弱智AI才苟过来，后期陷阱成型无脑开图就行了。推荐打折入。

review: To me, this is the spiritual successor to Dungeon Keeper II. It is a very similar game and instead of changing everything we know about the genre, it simply adds to it - the overworld. Brilliant in every way and very well balanced. The narrator will break a smile on your face even if you suffer from depression and have no mouth. Get ready for an overwhelming amount of memes coming from GOT, warcraft, DKII and way,way more. 9/10 Brilliant RTS - Dungeon manager

author: {'steamid': '76561198021901175', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 194, 'playtime_forever': 1541, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1541, 'last_played': 1573426587}
review:
Fun but flawed game.
Be the villain finally!
Once more like in the original Dungeons you get to play the Evil Overlord once more.
A fun mixup of Warcraft, Dungeon Keeper, Overlord and Fable... the game is satirical and full of jokes and references.
Basic but entertaining this is a fun romp though lacking somewhat in some regards:

1) Limited amount of troops.
2) You cannot play the Evil Overlord himself like in D1. Except by using a spell.
3) The game lacks a bit of scope and feeling of epic grandeur when you play the 'Absolute Evil'.

Still a good game and worth it at a discount.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983965158', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 2066, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1105, 'last_played': 1573667165}
review: Да, игру рекомендую... но! Играя в оригинальный Dungeon Keeper и потом в его сиквел - все казалось новым и интересным. Здесь же тебе впаривают просто боян в новой обертке. Да, по сравнению с DK2 - эта игра не вылетает каждые n-минут и играть можно без опасений что вот вот все улетит в тар тарары. Но во всем остальном? Могли бы уж привнести что-то свое, вместо побайтного копирования игры от компании Буллфрог... Но нет. Будем копировать, сказали разрабы и выкатили сей "шедевр". Шутки-прибаутки про современные сериалы и фильмы всю игру меня больше унывали, чем улыбали. Впрочем все эти мои стенания, что тут впаривают боян - будут совершенно не понятны поколению 2000х и выше :) они просто не застали DK и не знают что это такое. Для них эта игра будет прям олмазом (через о).

author: {'steamid': '76561197970590776', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 888, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 888, 'last_played': 1572287749}
review:
Je suis partagé à propos de Dungeons 2.
Je viens de terminer la campagne solo, et les nombreuses références à Dungeon Keeper et à Warcraft m'ont fait plaisir et me remémorer ces deux jeux que j'avais beaucoup aimé.
Mais le mélange des deux gameplay est souvent indigeste, et rend simpliste chaque aspect du jeu.
La partie gestion du donjon par exemple n'est pas très riche une fois compris le système de jeu. On invoque les créatures désirées, on les paie et on les entraîne, tout en profitant de leurs aptitudes particulières dans leurs salles fétiches: les gobelins inventent des salles ou leurs améliorations, les trolls font la même chose pour les troupes, et enfin les femmes serpents minent l'énergie mystique et cherchent les sortilèges. C'est à peu près tout... Les incursions des héros sont anecdotiques, quelques pièges bien placés, des coffres explosifs par exemple, ont facilement raison d'eux.
La partie RTS, s'inspirant de Warcraft, n'en a pas la richesse et est encore plus simpliste.
Bref, le gameplay ne m'a pas enthousiasmé et les parties peuvent s'éterniser.
Mais il n'en demeure pas moins que Dungeons 2 est beau (surtout la partie donjonesque) et a eu un petit goût de madeleine de Proust en ce qui me concerne, ponctué par les commentaires plutôt bien trouvés du narrateur (encore que les allusions à Game of Thrones finissent par agacer à la fin...).
Au final, je recommande donc, d'autant plus que la campagne a le bon goût d'être assez courte.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983128192', 'num_games_owned': 171, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1047, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 859, 'last_played': 1687675948}

author: {'steamid': '76561198011478984', 'num_games_owned': 2007, 'num_reviews': 217, 'playtime_forever': 1631, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1376, 'last_played': 1569671398}
review:
这是通关的第71个steam游戏了。
游戏看简介就知道是牛蛙的哪款地下城守护者的精神续作，还好地下城这个词没有版权。 一代我也买了，没中文玩不明白，二代就好了直接上中文。
游戏画面不错，差不多war3重置版水准吧，细节做得不错，黄金和工具箱，酒桶之类的一个个堆在地板上，房间铺满了墙壁会有装饰。陷阱要一个个箱子运过去组装。受伤了要治疗，在地面战死了还要电击复活，走的卡通风格，虽然是怪物也挺可爱的。 
游戏分成地下和地面。地下部分是地下城守护者的打法，挖挖挖，造造造，有敌方入侵可以拎起怪物扔到别人面前，不需要走位，怪物想怎么打，全靠ai了。地面就是普通rts了，基本就是战斗，可以编队，微操，手工操作。
游戏剧情呢，相当幽默，各种梗玩不停，主要就是权游，魔戒，魔兽等等，停不下来，有中文就是好。
游戏确实有多人模式，只是这种类型想不出怎么对战了，防守一方绝对有利。不过打打单人战役也挺开心的。游戏主要是操纵部落一遍作战，到中期后可以走恶魔线。不过恶魔的初级兵种太弱鸡了，跟部落这边娜迦+兽人+巨魔没得打。   打战役前期还好，到后期有点单调，总是一样的升级路线，快攻是不行的，受人口限制，只能老老实实一级级的升上去打，3级兵种才打过剧情敌人。 
说实话虽然加入地面战斗，这游戏还是不如原版的创意。且不说原来有附身魔法，可以在rts和fps间切换，就是地下城部分，原版各种怪物各种性格，有的放一起要打架，有的上战场还会逃跑，还有喜欢折磨人类的，不像这游戏里各个老实的很，除了欠薪怎么都不会造反。

author: {'steamid': '76561198061657440', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 450, 'playtime_forever': 155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1568660670}
review:
Yer altında büyüyen bir ork-goblin ırkının, artık mevcut kaynaklarının yetmemesi üzerine yüzeye çıkmaya karar verirler. Yüzey insanların kontrolündedir ve son derece huzurlu bir hayat sürmektedirler. Fakat bu yer altı ırklarını çıkışıyla bu hayat düzenleri bozulur. Aralarından bir lider, bu ırkın kökünü kurutmaya karar verir ve bir çok mağaranın içinde soykırım yapar. Bu durumu öğrenen ork liderlerinde biri intikam almak ister ve bir ordu toplayıp yüzeye çıkar. İşte böyle başlayan bir savaşın hikayesidir Dungeons. 

Oyunun mantığı ve farklı bir strateji oyunu yaklaşımı hoşuma gitti. Ama maalesef tam bir strateji oyunu oynadığınız hissine kapılmıyorsunuz. Çünkü çok fazla gereksiz detaylarla uğraşıyorsunuz. Oda kazma, yerleri parkeleme, altınların koyulacağı yerler, bira yetiştirme falan filan derken, doğru düzgün çatışma göremiyoruz. Ayrıca buna birde kontrollerdeki aşırı zorluk eklenincede oyun insanı bazen çileye sokuyor. Hep askerler savaşın olmadığı yerde toplanıp takılıyorlar ve sürekli onları savaşmaları gereken yerlere çekmek bir noktadan sonra sıkıcı gelmeye başlıyor. İşçiler illa ellerindeki işi bitirmek zorunda olmaları da ayrı bir saçmalık. Adamı alıp diğer işe koyuyorsam, o işe geçmeli eski işine dönmemeli. Çizimler,konuşmalar ve çevre tasarımı bir nevi warcraftı andırıyor. Ama diğer unsurlar dediğim gibi...

10/5

author: {'steamid': '76561198064243724', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1204, 'last_played': 1568575478}
review: So this is my take, the main campaign is fun, accessible, and not too difficult. The narrator does a great job of keeping things lively and the basic units are capable. What I can't recommend is game of winters. The first two maps seem sane, but are quickly by a map that demands you beat boss units from the previous campaign with level 1 units. In addition it seems to be strongly in favor of throwing waves of high level units at you. This spike in difficulty seems arbitrary and somewhat cruel. Compared to Orcs not a single undead unit really feels comparable. I throw seven or eight units plus Arthras at a squad of 4 and with no micro being possible, I'm lucky to have two units left after the exchange. So I recommend buying the main game, but skip game of winters.

review:
C'est un bon jeu, la narration décalée n'est pas lourdingue et met en valeur l'univers de Dungeons 2. La durée de vie est très correct surtout avec quelques DLC. La jouabilité et le côté base building dans un univers amusant me fond un peu penser à l'ambiance d'un tropico (la comparaison s'arrête là). 

C'est léger et pas prise de tête donc je recommande

author: {'steamid': '76561198105951465', 'num_games_owned': 214, 'num_reviews': 265, 'playtime_forever': 1540, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1540, 'last_played': 1566348935}
review: It's not for everyone, but for those like myself who love the RTS/citybuilding/similar genres, there's something to enjoy here. The game can be a bit slow paced, and the combat a bit simple, but if you're like me and are biased towards the genre then you can overlook them. It's easy to understand why that for a fair number of people the game's shortcomings are too much to bear. A strategy game doesn't have to have a lot to please me though, just give me some goons and a reason to use them and I'm good to go.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041769225', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 2152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2152, 'last_played': 1565354526}
review: Wer Holzhammerhumor und viele Anspielungen auf Herr der Ringe, Harry Potter und viele weitere Filme/Bücher mag ist hier goldrichtig. Das Spiel selber ist in Ordnung wenn auch der Schwierigkeitsgrad zu leicht ist. Man baut seinen Dungeon auf und hält einfallende Helden auf um dann zum Gegenschlag auszuholen. Die nette Idee von 2 Ebenen (Dungeon und Oberfläche) ist mal was anderes. Im Großen und Ganzen kommt es natürlich nicht an das gute alte Dungeon Keeper ran, fängt aber doch die Stimmung sehr gut ein.
