Der Erzähler sollte umbedingt auf "Alles" sprachlich gesetzt werden. Ernst gemeinte Ratschläge und sehr gute Anspielungen auf Serien, Bücher und natürlich Filme.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084198586', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 218, 'playtime_forever': 440, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 440, 'last_played': 1540582553}
review:
Si jugaste a Dungeon Keeper del estudio Bullfrog te encantará, porque es la secuela, en la que te explica de donde viene la mano del mal, los esbirros etc. Si no sabes lo que es Dungeon Keeper te gustará igualmente.
Gráficamente está bien. El narrador es muy divertido, al igual que su predecesor, en español.
El nivel de dificultad es el adecuado, podrás terminarte el juego con pocas horas.

En definitiva un juego simpático, económico, con el que disfrutarás jugando.

author: {'steamid': '76561198102700771', 'num_games_owned': 2113, 'num_reviews': 823, 'playtime_forever': 1562, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1562, 'last_played': 1540138288}
review:
This was kind of a nice surprise for free!

+ I really like a combination of dungeon management and then invading surface world.
+ Funny story narrator.
+ I like game mechanics but they are bit slow for my taste.
+ Typical story of good and evil with a lot of humor.
? I don't think this game is hard you just have to prepare your dungeon and troops but that takes time as I wrote above.
- Some rare small bugs.
+ Really enjoyed settings traps in my dungeon
+/- AI is ok...
+/? Gametime is about 20 hours and 4 for pumpkin DLC I didn't play other DLCs because I don't own them so I won't be counting them.
+ Real-time strategy suits this also well.

My rating is 7.5/10 So, yes you should play it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039458536', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 2625, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2625, 'last_played': 1539195303}
review:
Esta bastante bien, unas veinte horas casi pasarte todas las campañas. Los controles son faciles y las aventuras por la superficie son entretenidas. El diseño de la mazmorra no es la gran cosa. Pocos tipos de unidades y de salas. Termina siendo repetitivo realmente pero la voz del narrador metiendote prisa y haciendo chistes  lo ameniza muy bien. La historia tampoco es su punto fuerte pero tampoco es  muy mala.

Como juego para crear una mazmorra bien hecha no es la gran cosa, pero para divertirte y pasarlo bien cumple sobradamente. Tambien tiene version online para jugar con los amigos. Eso le da algo de vida extra pero bueno, con unas 30-40 horas esto ya no va a aportarte mucho más.

El precio de 20 euros no esta mal, podia ser menos pero alguna que otra vez aparecen descuentos y por la mitad de precio tienes muchas horas de diversion aseguradas. Incluso por 20 tampoco es mal negocio.

Edito: El multiplayer no funciona bien, muchas caidas de conexión y pocos muy pocos jugadores. Valido tirando de amigos que ya tengan el juego y poco más. Muy muerto.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057939746', 'num_games_owned': 278, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 1550, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1429, 'last_played': 1538930540}
review:
Игра очень интереная, не играл в первую часть, слышал что вышла третья, обязательно сыграю во все. В основном оцениваю игру по достижениям.
Достижения на среднем уровне, ничего сложного нет, 80% который выпадет если просто пройти игру. Одно достижение расчитано на кооп игру, мы играли с друзьями, так что все достигалось без особых трудностей. 
По самой игре: интересный коментатор который радует и веселит, и с нетерпением ждешь его новой реплики. Озвучка на высоте. Очень много отсылок. Сама игра проходится часов за 6-10. Впечатления положительные, воспоминания останутся теплые. Если вы хотите что-нибудь интересное, то смело берите эту игру.

author: {'steamid': '76561198145682814', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 874, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 874, 'last_played': 1538596256}
review:
Ein schönes Spiel im "Dungeon Keeper" Style. Es vermischt Aufbaumanagement im Dungeon mit Echtzeitstrategie in der Oberwelt, was gut funktioniert. Es gibt zehn Haupt- sowie zwei Nebenmissionen, welche jeweils eine eigene kleine Geschichte erzählen. Alle mit schwarzem Humor und Anspielungen auf andere Fantasy-Universen gefüllt.
Die Grafik sieht gut aus, die Karten sind schön inszeniert. Es sind mir keine großen Bugs aufgefallen. Einzig das Selektieren bestimmter Objekte ist bei zu viel Betrieb im Dungeon manchmal fummelig.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071613815', 'num_games_owned': 370, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 1491, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1491, 'last_played': 1496243398}
review:
Basically a mix of RTS and Dungeon Keeper in that you have to make your Goblins and Orks to work in your personal Dungeon so you can conquest the overworld kingdom those pesky humans have, The campaign takes a while to complete but all in all will feel satisfying once you take down the gods.
DLC and Multiplayer are included.
Take it if you fancy yourself making an army of monsters to conquer and doom humanity in the middle ages as the Ultimate Evil and have some fancy commentary on your work by Kevan Brighting who also worked on the Stanley Parable,

review: 怎么说呢，很像以前玩过的地下城守护者。挺喜欢这种当反派的感觉。不过这个有进步，可以反攻大陆。

author: {'steamid': '76561198009093962', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 284, 'playtime_forever': 789, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 789, 'last_played': 1476654944}
review:
In my opinion, the absolute greatest flaw of Dungeons 2 is that it sold its soul. I've been a fan of the classic Dungeon Keepers games (not including the latest disaster of a cash grab) from the time that I first laid eyes on them but the original Dungeons brought a unique experience to the table. Your goal was to lure the heroes in, not just to kill them, but to satisfy their needs before offing them for the biggest payout. It was a fun strategy game and it stood on its own merits.

Dungeons 2 cut all of that out and did everything that it could to become a Dungeon Keeper clone. It failed in the process. What I ended up playing wasn't a sequel to Dungeons but a completely different game that mostly just made me want to play the old Dungeon Keepers as they did everthing this game did but better. The innovations, such as the surface map, weren't particularly exciting to me and only seemed to take away from the best part of these games which is building your dungeons. The story was beyond terrible as well. Corny humor but not even corny in the way that you roll your eyes and laugh; the humor was just unenjoyable, uncreative, and based almost entirely on references. I normally give this genre a pass in story as long as the game mechanics can make up for it but in this case they absolutely could not.

I would recommend this game to someone who is desperately seeking to scratch the Dungeon Keeper itch but has played the classics so many times that they have lost their luster. Even then, I would recommend War for the Overworld first as I genuinely enjoyed that spiritual successor. Dungeons 2 is a game that tarnishes its own legacy by becoming a bargain bin version of a game that game out over two decades ago. I don't recommend getting your hopes up that it you'll be able to relive those days through this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198151163731', 'num_games_owned': 1632, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 498, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 498, 'last_played': 1554536156}
review:
I like this game very much: graphical style, narrative voice, game play... 
But there are so many bugs I could not bear it anylonger and I'll probably never play this game again.
I hope Dungeons 3 does not suck that bad.

Bugs I encountered:
[list]
[*] "videos" before missions most of the time crash the game
[*] crashes during the game
[*] some of your dead characters can be given orders (they would no longer be animated but you can still move them around, have a naga queen waste mana on them, ...)
[*] sometimes the game behaves really weird, like the animation for a character to destroy a tent for instance is replaced with that to drink beer, so you can actually watch your character drink a tent and the tent's hit points fly away, and when the tent is supposedly destroyed for some reason it is displayed upside down, your character in the middle of it, and the upper side of the tent hidden in the ground, the whole thing following your character everywhere you tell it to go...
[*] dead enemies are sometimes like statues, standing on their two feets, but dead and inanimate nonetheless.
[*] some enemy characters are sometimes walking back and forth like they are stuck in a loop, and that can actually prevent a (side)quest like it did in my case (the enemies would not manage to get out of their fort, which means they could not be reached and killed, and therefore the fort would not allow me in and I could not destroy it)...
[*] ...
[/list]

All of this happening way too often that I came to realize that I was paying attention to avoid triggering the bugs more than I could actually "play" the game and just enjoy it.

So no, could have been a very nice game, but it is not recommendable in this state.

author: {'steamid': '76561197966900558', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 246, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 246, 'last_played': 1537857993}
review:
Remembering Dungeon Keeper, I thought Dungeons 2 might be some more of that classic goodness. Sadly, it pales in comparison. The game is full of poor control over your units, a startling amount of imbalance, and it's quite buggy. I played through the campaign and took a break after finishing a level, well low and behold it didn't save after that! Tried the last autosave, it was at the beginning of the last area I just completed. I had used quick save a time or two and tried that, but then the characters were frozen in place. It did this every time I tried to load it, so I just gave up since I don't feel like repeating a level I just completed.

Went into skirmish thinking it would be better, as the campaign was very hand hold-y and felt like an extendedly long tutorial. I was pretty good at Dungeon Keeper back in the day, but the slow gold accumulation, the way you have to increase your population limit, and all the research you have to do to have even the most mediocre of traps makes the game insanely difficult. I tried very hard and was decimated. I knocked it down to hard, still absurd. You just barely get a few monsters and then the game is throwing wave after wave of good guys at you. Normal felt boringly easy. The game chooses the most ridiculous initial waves on anything other than Normal with multiple strong units that you'll have no chance against early game.

Very disappointed, as the way the game started out I figured it would be decent. It's not the worst game I've played, but really there's no point wasting time playing this unfun game. If you crave this kind of gameplay, it still looks like Dungeon Keeper has it locked down. Truly sad that no one can match it despite all this time. If you haven't ever played it, I'd highly recommend it despite the dated graphics. You may get a poor impression from playing something like this game of how much fun it is.

review:
This game is just awesome. Love RTS? Love Dungeons? Love references to films/games/books? Love comedy? Wanna just sit back and enjoy not very hard game, having laugh from time to time? This game is for ya.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002252866', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 525, 'playtime_forever': 1164, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1164, 'last_played': 1536260872}
review:
[h1] のんびり系ダンジョンマネジメント [/h1]

数あるDungeon Keeperフォロワーの1つ。

悪の権化であるダンジョンの主となってダンジョンを設計し、罠を配置し、モンスターを雇用して勇者をブチのめすという基本線は同じ。
本家Dungeon Keeperと異なるのは、ある程度の戦力がたまったらポータルを経由して地上に逆侵攻し、勇者どもの拠点を焼き払う必要があるという点か。

地上での操作は一般的なRTSに近く、これはこれで面白いといえる。

総じて悪いゲームではないが、敵のAIがあまり賢くないうえに敵ユニットがトンネルを掘って侵攻してきたりはしないので、あまり緊張感のあるタイトルではなくなっている。
一定時間ごとに現れる敵ユニットは、ポータルからまっすぐ中心を目指すだけ。

ならばタワーディフェンスばりに罠で片っ端から撃破･･･といきたいところだが、罠解除スキルを持つユニットを先頭に押し立ててくるため、事実上、モンスター頼りというのが中途半端なところ。
もっとも、のんびりとした敵の攻撃に押し切られることはまずなく、じっくりと戦力を育成できる箱庭的な面白さがある。

モンスター同士で喧嘩したり、不満が溜まっても逃げたりしないので、マネジメントもずいぶんと楽だ。
異論はあるだろうが、これはこれでいいかもしれない。
よりシビアなダンジョンマネジメントがお望みならば、『War for the Overworld』にすべきだろう。

ちなみに、いちおう日本語対応はなされているが機械翻訳もかくやの出来で、とても日本語話者が監修についたとは考えにくい惨状。
まぁなんとか読めるし、ストーリー主体のゲームではないので、あまり贅沢を言うべきではないだろう。

author: {'steamid': '76561198307616679', 'num_games_owned': 26, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1809, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1783, 'last_played': 1637427246}
review:
По сколько живу в Европе, и цены на игры то вдвое или в втрое дороже, я решил зайти на некоторые сайты, на которых продавали игры за 79 рублей. Вообщем с большим трудом закинул на сайт 79 рублей чтобы купить ведьмака, крутанул и мне дал ключ этой игры. Подумал вот не повезло, дало игру которую играть не буду и нафиг удалю в скором времени.

После того как я решил удалять игры, я начал качать их в стиме, запускал и если не нравилась удалял. (По сколько нападало куча ключей от игр которые в первый раз слышал и видел) Дошло дело до Dungeons 2. Качаю устанавливаю и запускаю игру.

С первым минут игры, меня эта игра затянула, человеком который рассказывает историю о Абсолютном Зле.

Система строительства, довольно таки простая. Хватило пару часов чтобы понять как можно улучшить работу комнаты до 130%. Графика хорошая. Нет лагов, нет фризов. 

Один только минус, как для меня, это то что последний трофей нужно только по онлайну получать. Если игра вышла, да можно получить трофеи по онлайну, если прошло уже почти 4 года от релиза, игру по онлайну не находит уже.

Жду когда будут скидки на 3 часть игры, а то за 50 евро не охота покупать.

9 из 10 по моему мнению игра.

P.S. в 99.9% случаев сайты на которых вы покупаете ключи для игр это кидалово. Только в 0.01% возможно получите игру которую крутите. Я потратил в русских рублях более 5000, чтобы просто проверить вероятность выпадения но итог был что я попадал под 99.9%.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045965284', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 2186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2128, 'last_played': 1540098209}
review:
四星。

地下城模拟器。这次要扮演邪恶的一方，在地下采集资源、征召士兵、强化军备，向地上进军，征服世界。有点像魔兽争霸的即时战略，不过地图有两种，一个地上一个地下，后者要在一大堆由矿石、石头和魔力水晶组成的迷宫中不停地开墙破洞，建造设施，甚至制造陷阱阻止敌方的入侵。鼠标指针就是至尊的手，在地下城可以随意抓取手下，扔到设施或别的地方什么的，也可以捡起道具，金币等等。

亮点是旁白，搞笑元素也非常浓厚，玩了大量西方奇幻梗，印象中涉及了魔戒、冰与火之歌和魔兽系列；甚至还有不搭边的「占领华尔街」关卡，看游戏发行时间算蹭热点。

细节不错。如果移动指针到士兵身上，他们甚至会向你招手；怪物没事时会虐待鼻涕精，体现了部落弱肉强食的生态，或是装饰美化墙壁，使地下城更有地下城的样子；恶魔阵营的士兵转职时，要先献祭一个仆从等等。

翻译质量可以，没有低级错误，也不生硬，可惜其他 DLC 好像没有汉化。

如果从来没玩地下城模拟器的话，可以试试，不过我看到别的地下城模拟器游戏资深玩家普遍不喜欢这游戏。如果有更好的同类型游戏的话就要将给为三星了。

有个成就要刷两种大量资源，太花时间了，所以不给五星。

支持 Linux。

author: {'steamid': '76561198035740752', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 251, 'playtime_forever': 185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 185, 'last_played': 1535656625}
review:
Le jeu est pas mauvais, voir bon, mais si je ne le continue pas c'est que je ne suis pas la cible de ce jeu.

Ce qui ne m'a pas fait continuer:
- Le narrateur trop dirigiste. La campagne reste un gros tutoriel. Alors autant j'aime bien apprendre petit à petit, mais c'est trop long. 
- Trop peu de servants différents. Au final une armée efficace est toujours la même. 
- Aucun intérêt à la géographie du donjon car vous faîtes les salles en fonction des veines d'or. Vous n'avez pas assez de population pour miser sur beaucoup d'ouvrier afin de rusher une géographie optimisée. Donc vous avez peu d'ouvrier pour avoir une force en surface et une force de défense. Donc vous avez des pics d'entrée d'argent pour avoir des pics de dépense.
- La limite de population oblige aussi à vider vos bâtiments de recherche pour optimiser votre attaque/défense.
- Vous devez creuser dans tous les sens pour espérer trouver des créatures cachées qui viendront grossir vos rangs en dépassant la limite. Donc dépenser un larbin pour ça. En espérant.
- Le curseur est trop gros et le jeu est intéressant quand vous micromanagez chaque troupe de combat (boost d'objet, retraite, soin...)

Bref le jeu a un bon potentiel mais il souffre du "Le mieux est l'ennemi du bien". Il aurait fallu quelque chose de plus affiné, des moyens d'automatiser, plus de possibilité de personnaliser le donjon
- sacrifier un gobelin pour faire fonctionner une recherche, donc le "perdre" et qu'il n'entre pas dans la limite de population par exemple
- créer de quoi augmenter le cap de certaines créatures
- système de recrutement pas basé sur l'or mais sur une jauge de "mal" (plus je suis maléfique plus je peux recruter des créatures puissantes, que je dois entretenir avec des ressources et une jauge de mal assez haute)
- sacrifier des ennemis capturés dans le donjon par un piège pour gagner du mana, les garder en prison pour entretenir des troupes
Enfin voilà, le jeu est bon quand même. Je le recommande pour des casuals qui ne cherchent pas un jeu avec de la gestion, mais qui cherche un RTS un peu différent.

J'ai bien aimé l'humour du jeu.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015219253', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1533875141}
review: I got this from the Humble Bundle site, and I've had a couple of goes at playing it, but I just can't get into it. As others have mentioned, the mouse feels like it's going through treacle and is so unresponsive (why this should be I don't know), the humour that is injected into the game would appeal to young children and that's about it - I just don't find it funny. I keep losing minions in caves that are neither my dungeon nor the overground, and struggle to get them back, and perhaps I didn't get very far into the game before my patience ran out, but you can only recruit about three different types of minion, and the population limit is very small indeed. I would recommend playing one of the Dungeon Keepers again rather than this.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979931562', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 2516, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1212, 'last_played': 1577140358}
review: Clever, addictive and hilariously narrated take on Dungeon Keeper with a hearty helping of Warcraft III thrown in. At only 15 hours for the single player campaign I suggest picking this up at a discount, then the length feels just right, and the game does not end up overstaying its welcome. Possibly a bit too easy, the enemy rarely attacks your dungeon outright and so much of the challenge is timing your attacks on the overworld so you don't end up having to take your horde back in a hurry. Even so, I love the dungeon builder/RTS combo, quirky style and many surprises that this game has to offer. Strongly recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015414486', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 515, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1549218909}
review:
Scrivo questa recensione da grande fan, ovviamente, di Dungeon Keeper 1 e 2.

Questo gioco, si può considerare un erede spirituale di DK1,2 anche se ha meccaniche e stile molto diversi. Sicuramente se dovessi compararlo a DK2 e soprattutto 1 (il mio preferito) non ci sarebbe storia perchè sono molto piu belli. 
Il gioco in sè merita, ovviamente non è DK però ci va molto vicino e se lo consideriamo un gioco a sè e non l'erede il gioco è ben fatto divertente, molto ben fatto nella parte "humor" e con una grafica accattivante; questo gioco, anche, implementa meccaniche molto interessanti tipo la gestione del "sottosuolo \ sovrasuolo" e un sistema di skill stile Warcraft3 dei mostri.
Molto divertente il narratore con continue citazioni ad altri titoli \ film \ ecc famosi.

Se vi piaceva Dk2, Dk1 non penso rimarrete delusi, anche se l'ho trovato un po' troppo facile per ora.

author: {'steamid': '76561197975786289', 'num_games_owned': 759, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 2332, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2332, 'last_played': 1533233446}
review:
Bought this on a whim - Thought, what the heck, looks funny, and I am having a hankering for RTS. Never played any other Dungeon Keeper type game, so brand new going into this.

Holy cow. 38.9 hours in the last two weeks. I played through the main campaign and the DLC winter campaign. So worth the money, I had a blast.

Some frustrating parts, for sure. Difficulty was a pain with the DLC in expanding into spider infested areas, but eventually came up with a good approach.

Check it out. If you are like me, you will go in, find yourself surprised, and be unable to stop playing.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978114813', 'num_games_owned': 2763, 'num_reviews': 911, 'playtime_forever': 1531, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1531, 'last_played': 1532866236}
review:
[table]
    [tr]
        [th]推薦給：[/th]
        [th]喜歡經營、地城規劃與RTS的玩家[/th]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [th]語言：[/th]
        [th]官方簡體中文[/th]
    [/tr]
[/table]

[h1]配合三代的推出，上市多年的二代，也加入官方簡體中文嘍～！[/h1]

我想大概是去年，遊戲有配合 Humble 免費發送，應該不少人都有領到，而就在上週正式迎來了三代推出時，官方承諾的二代中文更新；如果你領到 Dungeons 2 都還沒有機會嘗試，趁這次更新拿出來體驗一番吧！

Dungeons 2 與「地城守護者」有相當類似的外貌，因此兩者常常會被拿來做比較，但事實上除了地城規劃、經營的設計與地城守護者非常像之外，Dungeons 2 會更像是一款RTS遊戲；在遊戲中扮演「邪惡至尊」於地下城中經營自己的地城，收集資源、訓練手下，抵禦來襲的英雄，並要在適當的時間，派遣手下前往地表或其他地城掠奪與征服。

[b]雙地圖制，左邊是地表地圖，右邊是地下地圖[/b]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1457547873

[h1]優點：[/h1]
[olist]
    [*] 簡單、易操作的地城規劃。
    [*] 白爛的旁白註解（靈魂人物）。
    [*] 有趣、惡搞的單人戰役。
[/olist]

遊玩 Dungeons 2 請務必打開選項中的「每一句對話字幕」，因為這樣你才能完整的看到旁白的抱怨、碎念、諷刺！ 遊戲在單位、地圖設計、任務與旁白的台詞上，玩了不少魔獸、魔界，甚至冰與火之歌的梗，都會讓人會心一笑。

相較於 War for the Overworld，我覺得 Dungeons 2 的操作更簡便一些，鏡頭能拉的更近，單位的造型與動作更為明顯，而且單位有自己的名子，升級後會有稱號，辨識度更好，但相對在單位、房間的豐富度上，就遜色了一點。

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1456359754 

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1457548102 

[h1]缺點：[/h1]
[olist]
    [*] 單位、房間種類不夠豐富。
    [*] 缺少扮演壞蛋的樂趣。
    [*] 戰役關卡稍微短了點，而且不平衡。
    [*] 成就有BUG。
[/olist]

Dungeons 2 將獸人與惡魔拆成兩個種族，這使得單位與房間的總數相較於同類型產品少了很多，在規劃地城時總會覺得房間不夠蓋，還有很大的空間卻沒有新的房間能使用了；連經典的地牢、拷問間都沒做出來，這讓遊戲中扮演壞蛋的樂趣少了許多，故事設計上也比較像是單純的RTS，用獸人種族去征服人類這樣。

遊戲的戰役較短，但任務設計上還算有趣，不過會花很多時間在等待，等資源採集、等手下訓練、等技能升級...等，戰役的平衡不夠好，比如惡魔的第二關，前期很難，在只有基礎單位的情況下，要完成任務才能升級單位，就要花很多時間堆資源，利用RTS打帶跑的方式完成任務，結果單位一升級後就是碾壓過關。

最後就是成就有BUG，有一項遊玩足夠時間即可獲得的成就，目前在討論區有人四分鐘拿到，有人30分鐘拿到，大部分人說24～25小時拿到，但我一直沒拿到... 囧


[h1]購買建議：打折可以入手，領過免費的可以玩玩。[/h1]

官方中文還算用心，尤其是台詞有很多遊戲梗的情況下，翻譯還算到味！ 如果對地城類遊戲有興趣的人可以嘗試看看，但請別以「地城守護者」的期待感來遊玩，你有很大的可能會失望！ DLC提供一段「惡魔篇故事」與「偽冰與火之歌」的故事，有興趣的話可以購買。

[quote] 喜歡我的評論嗎？歡迎參觀我的[url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/31470152/] 遊戲私房菜[/url] 

 喜歡這篇評論，也麻煩點個讚，讓更多人能夠看到！ :）[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198019022165', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 471, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 471, 'last_played': 1508805742}
review:
I recommend this game.

This is a fun game. You are an evil overseer and must build a dungeons to go kill the good guys in a region. It's similar to Dungeon keeper in many ways.

The DLC that come with it add many hours to the base game, so get them and they are good.

Some map are much more challenging than other, even at normal difficulty. It's just that you need the right strategy to conquer those maps.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005333765', 'num_games_owned': 7226, 'num_reviews': 169, 'playtime_forever': 877, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 468, 'last_played': 1547128842}
review:
戰役很好玩 旁白就是來亂場的 經常拿錯魔獸世界和魔戒的劇本

本作以獸人為主角 他們經常被人類掠奪地下城 很慘慘豬

所以劇情為一步步的獸族掘起

戰鬥時 玩法類RTS 就是魔獸爭霸那類

經營的時候就是防守地城 掘礦 起陷阱 相當有趣

進功和防守 兩面需同時進行 再加上研究科技 訓練士兵.轉職 佈防 

魔法研究 其他地城探險 撿技能書 在有限的人口點數限制下

戰役不能選難度 整體一般 沒特別難過的關卡 

有些人覺得微操困難 但是本作不推薦微操

除了本身要放英雄技能 和魔法的情況下 

中期已經有復甦器建築 把死亡的士兵復活 前期死了就再招募過

非常建議在特價時入手

author: {'steamid': '76561198027994280', 'num_games_owned': 510, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 1107, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1107, 'last_played': 1532203898}
review:
Dungeons 2 is a great take on the "Dungeon Keeper genre". It's a really cool idea that you're not just managing a dungeon, but you come out to fight above ground as well.  

[b]Pros[/b]
[list]
[*]You aren't locked to your dungeon and you can go to the "world above" where the good guys are.
[*]The game is pretty balanced in regards to resources. I was never afraid to really run out of gold veins, but I definitely had to work hard to mine them and keep a little gold in my pockets.
[*]The good things of Dungeon keeper are kept in, but in a very original way. There are no "creature homes", however it's function (healing) is built into a hospital. There's no food, but creatures drink beer, etc. 
[*]A lot of names (creatures, your enemies, cities) are references to other games or real-life things with the name spelled slightly different. It's pretty funny, for example [spoiler]the city of Bentos, where people have amazingly fresh breath :D[/spoiler] 
[/list]

[b]Cons[/b]
[list]
[*][b]The narrator.[/b] Initially it's funny, but he just talks and talks and he is definitely not as funny as the devs had hoped. Most jokes are very lame.
[*]The strategy game above ground is a bit too easy. 
[*]You only have 1 worker type and 4 creature types. Those creatures have 3 variations (original and 2 upgraded versions) but they didn't feel very unique to me, so the creature type roster felt limited[/list]

Dungeons 2 is definitely fun, but not the best dungeon management game in the world. The RTS aspect is pretty original and a fun way for the game to stand out in all the other dungeon keeper lookalikes. 

Was this review useful to you? [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/26849460/]Please also check out the Izzy Reviews Curator page[/url] for regular updates on reviews for other games!

author: {'steamid': '76561198095905395', 'num_games_owned': 449, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 1515, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 166, 'last_played': 1592995428}
review:
Score:
=========================
More RTS than Dungeon Management game from what I have seen.

Score: 5/10

Summary:
==========================
☑ Graphics: Good
☑ Sound/Music: Ok
☑ Difficulty: Medium
☑ Game time: Long (10+ hours) + multiplayer time.
☑ Story: Rebuild your evil empire from scratch and take revenge on those that had you defeated.
☑ Game modes: Single Player and Multiplayer. Only played Single Player - Campaign.

Additional comments:
==========================
Narrator is funny but frustrating at times if you do not complete the level within the time window the developers thought. I found that the Dungeon Management part was the most fun of all, but it also seems to be the less important? The RTS part was a bit clunky.

Overall it is funny if you like these types of games. Would recommend to buy on a sale, not full price.

author: {'steamid': '76561197966086689', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1532049679}
review:
Popup Ad Simulator 2016.  That's right, 2016, not 2018.  I downloaded this today in 2018 and it's trying to install a patch from 2016 through some sort of janky third-party updater that looks and behaves like a pop-up ad.  Skip is an option but it's greyed out.

Unfortunately, I can't say whether a worthy spiritual successor to Dungeon Keeper truly exists here or not because all the pre-game BS drove me away.  It's a single-player game.  I should just click Play on Steam and it's supposed to let me play.  That's how video games are supposed to work.  Get with it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198313902156', 'num_games_owned': 532, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 1229, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 738, 'last_played': 1534309835}
review:
"В подземелье появились враги!"
Как ни странно, но эту фразу вы будете слышать на протяжении всей игры за одну только локацию около 20-30 раз.

Очень порадовало , что существуют разные классы воинов в Армии Всемогущего зла[spoiler]не сплошные орки да гоблины[/spoiler], Классная имитация Руки Лорда Тьмы в подземелье. Я постоянно всем с помощью неё лещей раздавал, довольно-таки забавно раздавать леща Оркам и демонам, у которых настрой довольно злой и они ещё хотят пива.

для меня до сих пор остаётся загадкой - почему есть пиво, есть золото, а эти тупые Орки не идут ни за первым , ни за вторым , так ещё и агрятся [strike]С*ука![/strike]

author: {'steamid': '76561197972447827', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 4513, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4055, 'last_played': 1532482411}
review:
[h1]When you just can't stand seeing another "I'm gonna be a unicorn today" meme.[/h1]

I have to hand it Kalypso, they know what they're good at it and they stick to it.  And they show it here in Dungeons 2.  Everyone else getting caught up in the "we gotta be trendy and cutting edge", and Kalypso is like "You know what, we're not gonna be different, we're gonna rock the same and be unique!  By... not being... unique... and... uh... yeah.  Screw it, I like killing unicorns and stupid Tolkien character mimics."  And they wear it well.

The gameplay is pretty straightforward.  Get some resources, build some units, kill fairies and dwarfs and all manner of good two-shoe rubbish.  You wanna get a little more in depth?  Try out the faux tower defense in your missions by twisting up the entrance full of traps and guards.  Hordes of snarling monstrosities not your thing, take a few stealthy units, or even [i]one[/i] if you dastardly enough, and wreak havoc on the fluffy world of rainbows and butterflies.  Only thing that should be fluffy is charred hair.

The game is extremely well put together.  The story is a sarcastic filled fest of jabs and slanders against every cliché fantasy, hitting things like World of Warcraft, Lord of the Rings, and more.  Well presumably, maybe... you know, can't tell for sure (in case Blizzard's or Peter Jackson's lawyers are reading this).  But any game that mentions the Winchester's is a friend of mine.  ... don't judge me, Supernatural is awesome.  Name another fictional tv show where no one ever dies!

The campaign is pretty lengthy, probably about 16 hours if you're straightforward, but not if you wanna dig up all the little secrets and explore all the upgrades.  The skirmishes are pretty straightforward, and there is an option for multiplayer too, which seems like a fun gambit.  Additionally, you get to play as three differing factions, which is always fun to try to switch up.

All in all, this is really good game if you like strategy and dry humor.  Easily worth $30 bucks, a steal at $10 if you find it on sale.  And when you find yourself gnawing on raw meat, dressed in black, and scowling at songs like "Happy", well, then you know that the Unparalleled, Unapologetic, Unilateral, Unequivocally Ultimate Evil has dug a soft spot out in your heart, like sweet little cancerous tumor.  Yay!

author: {'steamid': '76561198191334971', 'num_games_owned': 179, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 2195, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 280, 'last_played': 1694777542}

author: {'steamid': '76561198056046070', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2434, 'last_played': 1531668188}
review: Ich finde das Spiel eines was wirklich sehr gut ist. Das hat mich sehr gewundert als ich den ersten Teil war es langweilig und die haben versucht ein Dungeon Keeper Klon zu machen aber hier im zweiten Teil ist das anders. Sie haben 2 mechaniken im Spiel eingefügt das Klassische Dungeon bau und Echt-Zeit-Strategie. Ich bin einer der Beides sehr gerne spielt. Das Spiel hat mir so viel Spaß gemacht weil es lustig erzählt wird vom Erzählen und wie viel Insider das Spiel hat, Es hat Anspielungen von z.B. The Elder Scrolls, Harry Potter, Der Herr der Ringe, ... usw. Ich habe es 40 std. gespielt auch wenn die Story Missionen viel schneller vorbei gehen kann aber ich habe es meistens mehr hinausgezögert um ein Kommentar vom Erzähler zu hören und ich habe die Missionen sehr genau gespielt, jeden Fleck von der Karte zu sehen. Ich finde ein paar sachen bisschen Schade das dass Dungeon Aufbau bisschen grob ist also viele Räume kannst du nicht erstellen aber jedes Volk was man Spielt (Untote, Horde, Demön) spielt sich bisschen anders. Es gibt unterschiedliche Fallen um sein Dungoen auch zu sichern. Es gibt unterschiedliche zu Forschen um seine Kreaturen zu verbessern oder auch trainieren. Ich kann auch im Dungoen Gänge zubauen sodass die "Helden" einen anderen Weg gehen müssen so kann ich sie in die Falle locken aber man kann nicht ein Eingang zubauen sonst wäre es zu einfach. Jede Mission war immer was neues und nicht immer das selbe. Wenn man in der Oberfläche dann ist spielt sich das Spiel wie ein Echt-Zeit-Stratiegie Spiel, aber man kann nicht an der Oberfläche was bauen. Man kann auch unterschiedliche Zauber wirken um das Spiel zu beinflussen aber die Zauber funktionieren nur im eigenen Gebiet was man Erobert hat. Für mich hat der Kauf voll gelohnt. Ich empfehle das Spiel gerne weiter wenn man Dungeon aufbau steht und auch Echt-Zeit-Strategie. Viel Spaß

author: {'steamid': '76561198039766073', 'num_games_owned': 1272, 'num_reviews': 220, 'playtime_forever': 1236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1236, 'last_played': 1517160462}
review:
This is my first attempt of a Dungeons/Dungeon Keeper game.

In the campaign you play two different factions and with every map you get more access to new rooms and machanics. Both makes the game diversified.
Of course it is always the same, you build up a dungeon until maximum and then go for the win.

The narrator can be quite fun, but can also be annoying, either when it is too much or the "fun" is not yours.
Graphic and gameplay is fine for me.

To sum it up, this is not "the best game of the year", but it is also not a bad game. I liked it, so I recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008883618', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 158, 'playtime_forever': 5151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2546, 'last_played': 1691525573}
review: Way better than the sequel. The narator brings this to life. He messes with your head, is comedic and makes this game good. They even make a joke around the fact he is from the Stanly Parable. The references get a little forced but still not bad. The DLC forces him to interact with a main character constantly and that kills the magic, but other than that, this game is truely a perfect sequel that surpasses the first, and it's sequel. How many other games can you say that about?

author: {'steamid': '76561198030545819', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 983, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 416, 'last_played': 1532849477}
review:
I played the original Dungeon Keeper when it was new.  Maybe not an all-time classic but it's one of those games you never forget.  It's amazing to be playing again after all these years.

The manual is horrible and that makes it hard to figure out what you have to do except by trial and error, and losing a lot of skirmishes while you scratch your head.  The interface is clunky, especially the oversize hand that grabs things (I can hardly ever pick something up with the first try because who knows which exact part of that hand is the actual "tip").  

It's crashed once or twice on my Mac.

Despite all that it's just a wonderful game with possibly the best vibe you could ever hope for, it's just plain fun to build your dungeon out, lay traps, etc.  I could personally do without the overworld stuff, I just want to build my dungeon and stay down there making trouble.

4 of 5 stars.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992378804', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 682, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 661, 'last_played': 1693860397}

author: {'steamid': '76561197968979321', 'num_games_owned': 252, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1531656318}
review: Da vecchio amante di Dungeon Keeper ho provato questo gioco con scetticismo ma devo dire che è veramente molto simile, simpatico e semplice, lo consiglio a tutti quelli che come me sentivano la mancanza di Dungeon Keeper 1 e 2.

author: {'steamid': '76561198411061777', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1633, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1633, 'last_played': 1531077904}
review: Ich habe den ersten Teil mal vor Ewigkeiten gespielt und er hatte mir sehr gut gefallen, weshalb ich mir den zweiten Teil beim Summer Sale trotz semi guten Bewertungen gekauft habe. Ich versteh die schlechte Bewertung nicht ganz, was wohl daran liegt Dungeon Keeper nie gespielt habe. Ich für meinen Teil finde Dungeons 2 wahnsinnig witzig. Das komplette Spiel wird in einer Art Geschichte erzählt und ich liebe die Stimme des Erzählers (Kann es sein, das es die Stimme von Rufus aus Deponia ist? <3) Für meinen Teil ist Spiel genial. Besser noch als der erste Teil und ich freue mich schon darauf den dritten zu spielen <3

review: Thumb up !

author: {'steamid': '76561198028834705', 'num_games_owned': 502, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1851, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1851, 'last_played': 1530471133}
review:
You build a dungeon, protect it from invaders and send your warriors to the overworld to accomplish various objectives, RTS-style. All of these mechanics mingle together well but are all a bit shallow. The campaign is pretty easy, but manages to stay fun throughout anyway because it is well-paced and varied. The later DLC-missions add quite a bit of difficulty, I'd recommend them as well.

All in all a good game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198015998593', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 1091, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1091, 'last_played': 1529260750}
review:
這款遊戲其實讓我有重搭玩 WarCraft3 的感覺。雖然故事很短，又要花很多時間在內政方面，要搜挖地圖中的資源，但遊戲構思不錯，使用Orc 去攻擊人類，比傳統用人類出發去展開故事來得有趣。

休閒遊玩，值得一玩！

author: {'steamid': '76561198031263689', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 6606, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4167, 'last_played': 1531529614}
review:
Guter Erzähler immer einen guten Spruch.

die Story ist sozusagen geklaut von bekannten Fantasy Geschichten, aber genau darauf baut das Spiel auch auf und macht sich drüber lustig durch den Erzähler. Das Spiel macht echt Spaß. Einziger Knackpunkt ist finde manchmal die Steuerung, aber nicht unbedingt schlimm.

Die Erweiterung "A Game of Winter" ist auch sehr zuempfehlen.
Wegen neuer Kampange und neue spielbare Rasse die Untoten.

author: {'steamid': '76561198162625464', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 128, 'last_played': 1532697812}
review:
Für mich ist War For The Overworld der bessere Dungeon Keeper Klon, allerdings bietet Dungeons 2 ebenfalls für ein paar Stunden anständigen Spielspaß. Imps verprügeln ist eben bei jedem Dungeon-Building-Spiel unterhaltsam ;)
Die Idee mit der Oberwelt ist auch ganz nett. Alles Andere kennt man bereits von anderen Titeln dieser Art und ist insgesamt nicht ganz so umfangreich bei Dungeons 2.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990663999', 'num_games_owned': 294, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 2265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 900, 'last_played': 1649788518}
review: Отличная ненапряжная смесь стратегии и изометрической рпг. Отлична подойдёт тем, кто хочет расслабиться. Без понятия почему ей поставили столько негативный отзывов.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029876202', 'num_games_owned': 1524, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 1915, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1915, 'last_played': 1530455706}
review:
Проиграв 23 часа и вылетев с откатом сейва на ~1 час, я зашел сюда писать негативный отзыв.
И так, МИНУСЫ:
1) сюжет, линейный  .... долго думал как обoсpать, но на даже деpьмо не такое линейное.
2) каждый уровень нам как бы намекают "у нас сюжет, короткий так что отстраивайся заново". Ок пох... отстроимся, но эта дибильна прокачка мобов просто отвратная!!! То им срать, то им пива, то еще че, ударишь бегут хилится (имею ввиду хаос мобов) и из-за этого кузница прокачиватся со скоростью 1 способность в час. то есть из 23 часов игры (в момент написания отзыва) я разносил таблетку противника 1 час в сумме.. наверное, остальные 22 часа тупо ожидание когда ебучие огры зайдут в кузницу и прокачают навык.
3) управление, а именно рука зла... к ней спустя 23 часа я так и не привык! Что ей надо то из кучи и возьмет и пофиг что ты хотел взять книгу и посмотреть что за навык там, нет подержи лучше моба!
4) группировка - смысла от нее нет вовсе, что бы выйти из подземелья, все равно приходится брать каждого мобы в руку зла и скидывать в проход. Дибилизм...
5) У меня 2 монитора... При запуске игра прыгает не на основной монитор... не сильная проблема зайти в настройки, но все же, каждый раз выходить из полноэкранного разрешения заебывает!
6) Скилы руки зла. Смысла от них почти 0 в пещера они почти нахрен не нужны кроме молнии, а на поверхности они не работают, поиграете поймете почему не работают! Идиотизм беззубой кобылы! Я зло, где хочу там и юзаю свой скил, но нет ......

Плюсы:
1) хорошая озвучка (НО юмора я не заметил)
2) ... затягивает....(это вроде какбы плюс, но минусы, делают из этого пункта множитель разочарования!)

author: {'steamid': '76561197981354175', 'num_games_owned': 867, 'num_reviews': 190, 'playtime_forever': 1070, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1070, 'last_played': 1529744742}
review:
I vaguely remember receiving this game for free a while back, but I never got around to playing it. When I finally did I'm happy to say that I had fun!

It's been a long time since I've stepped foot into any management games let alone RTS. I've struggled for years to find a replacement for Tiberian Sun, Myth and Metal Fatigue. While this game definitely isn't the same and is a far cry from bringing the same joy those games did, it managed enough to 'scratch the itch' so to say. I also like the dungeon management elements, but feel like they're a tad too shallow. I would've liked more. And while I have several small gripes and nitpicks, it's overall a good game.

So first thing I want to say is that the cartoony style is...interesting. It fits how colorful everything is and makes the 'corruption' effect better. It's acceptable and even in some cases enjoyable, but I'll be honest in that I like my games a tiny bit closer to realism in the art department. Not like A LOT more, just a bit. Closer to WoW's graphics before they overhauled them and made them toonier. That sorta demi-realism where you don't hit uncanny valley, but there's enough atmosphere and detail to where you feel immersed in it. So yeah, the graphics are fine. If you like the way it looks from the previews the you should enjoy it.

As far as controls they're mostly good too. Pretty smooth and work well. Most of the time. There's a few things that feel weird. Firstly the precision for picking things up is a little off. You kinda gotta learn where the sweet spot is and it feels awkward until then. I also don't like slap and drop being bound to the same button without a delay. I hate dropping a buncha guys and then slapping them because my right mouse button sucks ass. But that's my personal problem and shouldn't affect you.

In terms of gameplay it's good. Feels fairly fleshed out. It's not complex though by any stretch of the imagination. I was certainly left wanting more. I'm also not really big into the plot. I understand that this game is inspired by dungeon keeper and I've played dungeon keeper as well and can safely say this approach is better. But there's a lot that is lost. Mostly in terms of depth. The game isn't as deep as dungeon keeper that's for sure. The RTS elements do make up for it though. They're not amazing at all and usually my fights consisted of just bum rushing everything and clicking all the spells and skills I could get my hands on. I did like when traps were thrown at me and using the sneaky goblin to disarm them. Sneak attack felt poorly implemented, but I did still like it when I could use it.

I also felt like the whole 'dungeon building' aspect was missing something. Building a new dungeon works for 'challenges' so to say, but I kinda wish that I could just build a dungeon up to use constantly. Though I know the resources would run out. Alternatively more exploration oriented would've been nice. The big reason I say that though is that I didn't find the story all that appealing.

Speaking of which, lets talk about it. It's parody and a shit load of references. So I'm gonna go ahead and tell you now that I'm not a comedy gamer. I think I might be interested in like 'romcom' if I could find a pairing I actually liked, but realistically I don't like comedy all that much in gaming. Parody is typically one of the less interesting kinds of comedy for me because it feels like treading old ground except there's a voice in the air poking fun of the material. This is boring to me usually. It's also why I don't care for references. I think I got most of the warcraft, warhammer and just general references they threw out, but I really didn't care. 

I prefer original material and I'm not a kiddie who giggles at the mention of their favorite game. Those games were my favorite games because they didn't do that. Any references they made were easter eggs and hidden out of plain sight, not smushed up against my face the entire game. I don't know if I laughed even once.

Ok I'm digressing a bit too much. What I'm trying to say though is I didn't care for the story. The Narrator presented it very well, I just didn't like it. In fact I think this game does presentation the best. It's very well presented and feels nice from the standpoint of just having a nice look at things. The way the world corrupts when you blow stuff up. The vibe fo the dungeon itself and the lovely feeling of looking at those mountains of gold.

Oh yes. That gold looks so nice. They did a great job on it. I wonder if that's indicative of their desires...

Moving on though, the audio was pretty forgetable. All except the sounds of slapping, the way the orcs respond to being picked up and a lot of what was 'repetition' I remember. The music and ambience was...pretty generic I feel? Unremarkable and forgetable. Not horrible though. Just lukewarm.

Ok so it might feel like I sorta don't like the game, but trust me it's a fine game. Just don't expect amazing. It's very much the type of game where you'll most likely enjoy it a fair amount, but it's not Myth. I'll say that I enjoy it more than dungeon keeper overall though in spite of the lack of depth. There's a good reason for that, but I'm going to save it for after I finish dungeons 3. I have a lot to say about that game and I'll explain why I prefer this over dungeon keeper there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013944972', 'num_games_owned': 444, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 809, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 801, 'last_played': 1603842670}
review:
Ich bin Dungeon Keeper Fan und immer zu haben für einen Klon der ein paar Stunden Spaß und Erinnerungen verspricht.

Hier handelt es sich ja wirklich fast um einen Klon.. mit Ausnahme der Oberflächenwelt, die es damals nicht gab.. und der hier deutlich geringeren Anzahl an Räumen und folglich auch Monstern. Ansonsten spielt es sich sehr ähnlich und macht streckenweise Spaß. Den Imps mal wieder die altbewährte Ohrfeige verpassen, wenn sie trödeln. Das hab ich vermisst.

Meine ersten paar Spiele sind alle schnell zu Ende gewesen.. nachdem meine Monster bei der Verteidigung glanzlos versagten. Also der Wechsel von Großen zur kleinsten Karte mit nur einem Portal. Dann fand ich mich auch zurecht mit den Forschungen und Fallen. Und ich gewann die Oberhand.

Das ist es dann aber auch schon.

Offenbar muss man hier lediglich Tower-Defense spielen um die regelmäßig spawnenden Feinde abzuwehren. Hat man das einmal geschafft.. baut man nur noch den Dungeon in aller Ruhe aus. Kurz an die Oberfläche um genug Energie für die letzten Upgrades zu erhaschen.. und dann wird oben aufgeräumt.

Ich schrieb weiter oben, dass es streckenweise Spaß macht. Es ist streckenweise aber auch recht öde.. auf die nächste Forschung oder das nächste Upgrade zu warten. Also wirklich warten und sonst nix tun. Und sobald man an die Oberfläche kommt räumt man wirklich nur schnell alles auf. Bis auf die paar Boss-Gegner die mehrmals im Kampf ihr Schild plötzlich wieder aufladen.

Stirbt der letzte Boss.. pausiert das Spiel ganz unvermittelt.. es erscheint ein lebloses "VICTORY" auf dem Schirm und man darf ins Hauptmenü zurück.

Das Spiel als solches würde ich nicht wirklich empfehlen wollen. Immerhin läuft es aber recht flüssig. Ich konnte es jetzt mit DLCs für 12 Euro kaufen.. auch das finde ich noch etwas zu teuer. Lieber noch ein paar Jahre warten bis man es für 5-7 Euro bekommt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061912601', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 372, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 372, 'last_played': 1530390296}

author: {'steamid': '76561197970997322', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 796, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 796, 'last_played': 1530397466}
review:
I'm a huge DK/DK2/WFTO fan and had hoped this game was similar. I bought this a while ago and just recently got to playing it so I could then play Dungeons 3, which I hear is better. This game has too many frustrating aspects to recommend. The humor is forced and dry, the cursor is so big and clunky you end up giving items to the wrong minion, workers cost...gold? Resource distribution is garbage (Imps have to do way too much, which necessitates dedicating >20% of your population points to them, "upgrading" creatures with the training pits is incredibly flawed, and the AI in general is garbage. Also, population points are really dumb because each campaign basically gives you enough extra minions that you can win easily.

I've found the game to be very linear with really dumb things such as certain creatures being completely immune to damage until you complete certain objectives, then they magically die! I also found myself forced to savescum through the dungeons because your minions would do dumb things like smack exploding traps. Games like DK, DK2, and WFTO pull you into the game and are so enjoyable that actually completing the mission is almost disappointing. In this one, I've found myself trying to get to the end as fast as possible to see if there is any actual progression of the plot (there isn't). Hopefully dungeons 3 is better because this one is nothing but disappointing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043408684', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 212, 'last_played': 1530146508}

author: {'steamid': '76561198035124845', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 142, 'playtime_forever': 8441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2281, 'last_played': 1532859154}
review: This feels like a children's game. However, I really like it. It is simple and enjoyable fun. Like Warhammer but with fluffy bunnies. The names of the characters I thought funny. Good save system, easy on the eye type stuff.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022305964', 'num_games_owned': 99, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 1491, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 155, 'last_played': 1614471161}
review:
My friends, and I, listened to the reviews. So we thought this was going to be "Dungeon Keeper worthy." We were wrong. We were so very very wrong. =/

I suppose Dungeons 2 can be enjoyable at times ... but the maps are small & linear, the camera is clunky, assets look like they were ripped from World of Warcraft (they even joke about it,) the music is completely unoriginal (and probably ripped directly from Harry Potter,) plus in-game V-sync is totally broken! What a pile of dog crap!! 

I recommend getting "War For The Overworld" instead. 

Trust me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198393844606', 'num_games_owned': 116, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 6087, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2771, 'last_played': 1566165713}
review:
Tiene algunos fallos, pero el juego definitivamente engancha, mas que nada por que has de estar atento y cuando estas avanzado en un mapa, has de administrar los recursos (osea, cuanto mas tiempo pasa y mejores tu mazmorra/tropas, mas has de mirar por los recursos restantes) y por que siempre quieres tirar a más con las tropas y hechizos, que aunque simples, ayudan mucho si tienes a tus tropas de combate fuera de la mazmorra.
Lo que menos me gusta posiblemente es el poco tiempo que tienes para preparar tu mazmorra, asi como la inutilidad de los minios en algunas ocasiones ( siempre haran lo que mas cerca les coga, en caso de que tengas varias acciones planteadas, espero que la tercera entraga que voy a jugar pronto no tenga el mismo problema ) tampoco da cavida muchas veces a poner la mazmorra como te gustaria, pues el juego te obliga a estar atento a los invasores y a erradicarlos cuanto antes cuando no tienes hechizos aun o muy poco mana, claro que esto es parte del desafio del juego, asi que no lo cuento como aspecto negativo.
Lo mejor, en mi opinion, son 3 cosas.
1: `Evolucion´ de tropas, mola mucho verles hacerse mas grandes, cambiar y dar caña a los enemigos con sus habilidades y nuevo cuerpo (las animaciones se agradecen, especialmente los saludos, dan mas carisma al juego y a las criaturas).
2: El hecho de que has de cuidar de tus tropas, desde darles atencion/bebida y lo que me ha sido mas raro pero interesante tambien, UNA PAGA cada cierto tiempo.
3: La administracion de tropas, cuando prefieres que esta suba de nivel, o que esta otra trabaje, y que cada una TENGA UN PROPOSITO EN LA MAZMORRA, hace que el juego tenga vida propia mas alla de su mezcla de world of warcraft y dungeon keeper, muy bien combinado por cierto, estoy deseando hincarle  el diente a la tercera entrega.
Punto extra: El narrador, lo habreis tenido que adorar durante la creacion del juego por que es bestial en su trabajo, como diria el mismo, se merece unas palmaditas en la espalda.
No es el mejor juego de este tipo en mi opinion, sin embargo, es definitivamente uno que encantara al que le vaya este tipo de juegos, por lo que lo recomiendo muchisimo, incluso si solo eres de uno de los aspectos del juego (administracion de mazmorra o RTS), te gustara bastante.
PD: El trabajo y opciones de la mano del terror molan, pero espero que este mejorada su capacidad de seleccionar criaturas o recursos en las futuras entregas, se hizo un tanto engorroso al principio aprender a usarla).

author: {'steamid': '76561198043910754', 'num_games_owned': 1034, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 2430, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 944, 'last_played': 1691090852}
review: This game is very entertaining, the narration in story mode is hilarious. While it's not a super challenging game, it's quite fun, it may take you some time to get used to the controls. The game is separated into 2 parts, the overworld and your own dungeon, inside your own dungeon you have very little control over what creatures do, you issue orders and try to keep them happy so they oblige and set up traps to deal with intruders, on the overworld it's more micro intensive but nothing too extreme. If you like RTS games this one is areally fun one that mixes up the formula quite a bit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088264980', 'num_games_owned': 604, 'num_reviews': 302, 'playtime_forever': 176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 176, 'last_played': 1531030295}
review:
И вот снова Сатирическое Зло решило попытать счастье в написании обзора на игру про самого себя. Пафосно сложив руки замочком и вывернув руки так что бы пальцы сделали отчетливое «хрусь», зло преступило к набиранию текста на своем ноутбуке. Не смотрите что ноутбук был обклеен розовыми единорогами, просто НикогдаНеСпрашивающиеРазрешение Зло «одолжило» его у одной фейечки, все равно вряд ли оно ей еще когда-нибудь пригодится!

[code][url=store.steampowered.com/curator/11769719/] Еще больше обзоров на кураторской страничке Dreams of Genesis! Подписывайтесь, с нами весело!	[/url][/code]

Вы никогда не чувствовали отвращение к всему миленькому, розовому и пушистому? Нет? Ну тогда проходите и не задерживайте очередь. А всем любителям тьмы, боли, страдания и черного пречёрного юмора добро пожаловать. Вы можете не любить стратегии, но вы просто обязаны любить Dungeouns 2. Это закон и это не обсуждается. Да я как сам не фанат стратегий был действительно приятно удивлен. Нет не механикой… И не геймплеем. Хотя должен признать тут они довольно приятные и простые в освоении. А удивлен я был тем количеством юмора, что течет на нас с экрана монитора. 

Мы выступаем в роли Коварного Абсолютного Зла, которое проводит будни в прохладных пещерах. Но Амбициозное Зло не собирается мирится небольшой пещеркой, поэтому отдавая приказы своим соплякам мы постепенно будем увеличивать свое подземелье до вполне подобающих размеров. Эх, чего только стоят комнаты усыпанные золотом. Конечно, мерзопакостные герои так и норовят у нас его увести, поэтому стоит подумать о укреплении защиты подземелья, а в точно рассчитанное время БерущиеНаШтурмЗамки Зло выведет из под земли свою орду и завоюет весь мир!

Графика в игре вполне симпатичная. Да конечно не топ сегмент, но вполне нормальная. 
Отдельного упоминания заслуживает полная русская локализация. Она тут поистине шикарная. Наполненная до краев черным юмором, отсылками к гик и поп культуре. Да что тут говорить, это надо слушать!

Если вы еще не знакомы с данной серией, то Абсолютное Зло уже идет за вами. Шутка. Но вы все равно остерегайтесь, ведь оно действительно может прийти за вами. Вот! Оно стоит у вас за спиной! Не повелись? Что за молодежь пошла, могли бы и притворится что попались…

author: {'steamid': '76561198327242354', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 3937, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2167, 'last_played': 1663481077}
review: 从《地下城2》的身上，可以看到一些被应用在《地下城3》中的设计理念，当然，没有2代的话，也就无从谈起3代了。其实2代中的一些设定也不错，比如三个种族间不同的兵种，各具特色的风格，引人的剧情，还有各种恶搞的游戏梗。但是缺点也很明显，由于各单位在干活时容易开小差，所以游戏的整体速度很慢，无论是建造还是研究科技，包括出兵作战都是如此。而且在前期没有复活建筑的情况下，一个好不容易培养出来的高级单位一旦挂了，就又得重新慢慢培养，非常耗时间。

author: {'steamid': '76561198120567690', 'num_games_owned': 939, 'num_reviews': 135, 'playtime_forever': 2891, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2891, 'last_played': 1517998596}
review:
Dungeons 2 is a dungeon builder "simulator", very similar to Dungeon Keeper from 1997. It's so similar, that it's basically the exact copy of the classic game. I have never seen such a shameless reproduction of something in video gaming history: the whole summoning and picking up creature procedure, the existence of a "dungeon heart", carving out tunnels for rooms, placing traps, etc. concept is the same. It's as if the developers thought: 'hey, 1997 was more than a decade ago, so let's act as if that game had never been released'. The only innovation this game provides is the possibility to go and invade the surface, something the original Dungeon Keeper always lacked. This being said, the game isn't bad, it just doesn't feel right to play the duplicate of something (the developers apparently made a whole series of this game, which I think makes it even more inexcusable).

Just like in Dungeon Keeper we play an evil lord's spirit (represented by the throne room) operating below the ground. We have to carve out tunnels and caves and build the necessary rooms there while also collecting gold through the process. For this work we need 'snots' (imps in the original) which we can simply summon. When the rooms are finished, certain types of creatures are going to arrive in our dungeon. While we have a certain amount of control over them (we can pick them up and throw them down) we can't command them directly: they act and attack a bit on their own while they also need nourishment (beer), wage and entertainment. They can get upset when their needs are not fulfilled and they may refuse to execute our orders (they will still fight though if they are thrown at the enemy - in the original Dungeon Keeper they left). The creatures gain levels as they fight (and may be healed or even resurrected by throwing them into the hospital).
The buildings (or rooms) are pretty much the same just like they were in Dungeon Keeper: some of them are renamed, some of them aren't. Certain types of creatures will gladly work in some of these facilities (nagas/medusas will produce mana/magic - a substance necessary for magic spells -  in the temple for instance). We can also place traps to soften up the waves of attacking humans (there's a third side with whom we can also play a short campaign) and improve the skills of our creatures.

The only new feature is the chance to visit the surface world, the kingdom of the humans and kill their leader there. The game functions as a so called 'real time strategy' game under these circumstances as we are unable to revive our fallen creatures for example when they leave our dungeon (our nagas have the ability to heal their teammates so having a few of them is heavily advised). To be honest I enjoyed some of these missions, the one called 'A blood-red wedding' was particularly fun, where we have to catch (/kill) a group of randomly appearing guests attending to a royal wedding and thus provoke the ruler of the land into attacking our dungeon (and leave the safety of his castle).

The graphics are quite basic, the game uses the exact cartoonish style (and quality) as the one seen in Warcraft 3 from 2002. It's a cheap way to avoid being called crappy or bad, but it's still very dull looking.

All our actions are narrated by a cynical voice (meant to be funny, using references from other fantasy themed novels and games, but it's quite irritating sometimes), which also provides hints at times. Needless to say, the idea was also present in Dungeon Keeper.

The game contains multiplayer (up to 4 players) with different game modes, which can be fairly entertaining.

For people who haven't played the original Dungeon Keeper (or DK 2) the game could be a fun experience. Still, I would advise them to search for and play the orginal instead. Why? Because I prefer not to recommend a decently made replica instead of the original idea, even if that original may appear a bit dated now.

PROS
+ exploreable surface world
+ some entertaining missions
+ different multiplayer modes

CONS
- an absolute rip off of the original Dungeon Keeper
- narration tries to be funny, but often fails to be
- a bit overpriced for a replica
- basic graphics

RATING
4/10

Thanks to Sh33p for playing multiplayer with me! :)
(Also check out his [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1263673934] Dungeons 2 Guide[/url])

author: {'steamid': '76561197972318014', 'num_games_owned': 541, 'num_reviews': 199, 'playtime_forever': 180, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 180, 'last_played': 1528182814}

author: {'steamid': '76561198005689168', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 163, 'playtime_forever': 130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1527911917}
review:
My review is mainly from the perspective of comparing against the original DK series and WFTO.

Honestly, I think I would have liked this alot more if I hadn't played WFTO first.  Long story short, I found the game in limited offline and online play to be overly simplistic when it comes to a DMG.  Compared the WFTO or the orignals, I just kept being irritated by the lack in variety of creatures and rooms.

Now, to be fair - I think the game is really targeting a new kind of hybrid experience.  It's not a bad game but I think it would appeal to people who are not looking specifically for a dungeon management game.  The hybrid approach and lack of variety for someone like me who really wants a DK clone is just an aggravation.

In terms of general appeal, the controls are an abomination IMO.  Not a deal breaker but just beware.

So, when it comes to a recommendation or not I would break it down like this.  If your looking for a DK clone, I would skip it and play WFTO.  If you are open to a hybrid experience with some light dungeon management then it might hold more appeal for you.

For me, looking for a DK clone I have to give it a thumbs down since there isn't really a "not for me" option.

review:
If you remember good old funny and thrilling Dungeon Keeper then ship to the Pros and Cons. But If you don't then continue reading. Dungeons is RTS which revive good old funny and thrilling Dungeon Keeper. 
You are Ultimate Evil and building your dungeon with creatures [spoiler](you can be also Chaotic Evil and building dungeon with demons :-) ) [/spoiler] and fighting against GOOD. 

Pros:
* Funny story
* Good memories of the Dungeon Keeper
* Allusions on various movies and humorous narrator
* Nice graphics 

Cons:
* Mouse control
* Micro in fights
* Too easy for me

author: {'steamid': '76561198017081271', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2239, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2239, 'last_played': 1503164147}
review:
Soyons clair et concis :
Dungeons 2 est un jeu d'un petit éditeur qui ne veut en aucun cas devenir maitre du monde. C'est donc un jeu perfectible où certains trouveront sans doute du copié collé  d'autres jeux, mais ça n'en reste pas moins un jeu plaisant avec des trés bonnes idées de gameplay et avec un humour bien à lui, bourré de référence.

-C'est facile à jouer ,et meme si ce n'est pas vraiment la meme chose, si vous êtes un vieux de la vielle qui a aimé Dungeon Keeper, vous vous y retrouverez
-Ce n'est pas moche
-Ca manquerai juste d'un peu de contenu. (quand vous avez fini la campagne à la durée de vie "correcte", il n'y a pas de grand interet à recommencer).

author: {'steamid': '76561197979676784', 'num_games_owned': 505, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1527410345}
review: Preety much a well done game - It's fun being an the evil one but... it did not get through to me fully. The title is modeled on Dungeon Keeper series and both takes a lot ideas and mechanics from it, while at the same time implementing a lot of new features. The best way to describe is dungeon keeper meets sugar-like warcraft. People who played games like dungeon keeper or war for the overlord and had fun would enjoy this title. The game itself has a mechanic that changes how the game is played. Underground we menage our dungeon, keeping the gold flowing, making traps etc. with no direct unit control (we can only grab and drop units like in some tycoons) On the surface we control our units like in any rts game. The game itself as I said earlier is well made and has no major flaws, but at the same time it just does not have any strenghts that keep the gamer playing. In conclusion, if you are a fan of the titles I listed you should definitely try it out. However, if you never played such games and dislike slow paced strategy/rts and menagement games you should stay away from it, as it will keep you at your seat for only a couple of hours. As for me the game is just to slow and repetetive , but still some people would love it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077147190', 'num_games_owned': 1268, 'num_reviews': 219, 'playtime_forever': 1903, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 819, 'last_played': 1533452837}
review:
Das Spiel ist zwar nicht schlecht, macht aber auch nicht wirklich viel Laune. Es geht im Prinzip immer darum, in der Unterwelt einen kleinen Dungeon aufzubauen und seine Monster dann an die Oberfläche zu schicken, um Missionsziele zu erfüllen (sprich: alles zu töten). Richtiges Dungeon Keeper-Feeling will aber nicht aufkommen, dafür ist das Spiel einfach zu rudimentär. Anstatt all die Tore und Fallen zu erforschen, zu finanzieren und zu bauen ist es zur Gegnerabwehr einfach effektiver, seine Truppen wieder in den Dungeon zu holen. 

Der Schwierigkeitsgrad der Missionen ist auch sehr unausgeglichen. Eher am Anfang gibts z.B. eine, bei der von drei Seiten Gegner in den Dungeon strömen. Ich wollte also eines der nervigen Gegnercamps zerstören, damit ich nur an zwei Fronten kämpfen musste. Das ging aber nicht, da das Camp wie so oft durch ein unzerstörbares Tor gesichert war. Im Vergleich dazu gibt es gegen Ende des Spiels eine Mission, bei der man 11 Wellen von Helden davon abhalten soll, zu einer Hochzeit zu gelangen. Ich glaube nach der dritten oder vierten Welle hatte ich die ganze Karte von Feinden gesäubert und musste dann jedes Mal 6 Minuten warten, bis die nächste Welle kam. Die letzten Wellen hatten dann zwar Gott sei Dank nur noch einen kleineren Timer, aber dennoch gab es in der Mission insgesamt etwa eine 3/4-Stunde lang nix zu tun, außer zu warten.

Richtiger Spielspaß will so nicht aufkommen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198288941871', 'num_games_owned': 355, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 11151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 392, 'last_played': 1566652354}
review:
Как мы уже устали играть за отважных слащавых героев, которые готовы отдать жизни во спасение беззащитного. Хватит! Пора проявить свою темную сторону и сыграть в игру «Dungeons 2». Как и в первой части, играть вы будете за Лорда Подземелья, но на этот раз воевать вы будете не в аду, а на поверхности Земли. Ох уж эти жалкие людишки, они прикрываются милосердием, состраданием, любовью, но душа многих прогнила уже давно. Ваша задача - заставить их страдать! Соберите небольшую армию из самых жутких тварей подземелья и отравляетесь на поверхность захватывать земли. Держите своих воинов в страхе, только так вы сможете ими командовать. На вашем пути будут появляться самые различные герои, победить которых будет не так-то просто. В Dungeons 2 очень много черного юмора и отсылов к известным произведениям, что делает игру на порядок лучше.

Уже после успеха первой части было понятно, что не за горами продолжение. И вот, наконец то, вышла вторая часть отличной RPG стратегии, где главный герой является главным злодеем. Отличная графика, сюжетная линия наполнена веселыми и неожиданными моментами. Возможность прокачки героя заставляет вас внимательно исследовать мир и стараться получить максимальное количество очков.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987947626', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1941, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 953, 'last_played': 1534600172}
review: To start off, Ive played DK 1 & 2 and WTFO and i like how this changes things up a bit where you go above ground and destroy the alliance. I enjoyed the campaign but i feel it was a bit too easy. With the narration, I felt like i had a book being read to me as i played. Even with the game being easy, I enjoyed it and would recommend it. In fact I am looking to get Dungeons 3 eventually

author: {'steamid': '76561198104798475', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 4276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2235, 'last_played': 1530295754}
review:
Играешь и думаешь - блин, какая же офигенная игра была Dungeon Keeper... 
Нельзя вселиться в существо - ладно, решили FPS составляющую заменить RTS. Да, механику разнообразили дополнительными локациями и режимом управления монстрами, но почему камерой то крутить нельзя? Плюс скатились в линейность. В DK конечно тоже были туннели в неразрушаемых скалах, которые намекали где зарыт рояль в кустах, но они были изредка. В Dungeons2 ты едешь по рельсам сценария никуда не сворачивая. Без этих рельсов не проапгрейдить тронный зал, фактически что и когда строить - задано сюжетом карты. После первых миссий настроение "ух ты, как в детстве" сменилось на "а нет, очередная казуалка". В общем, жанровый паразит, лучше переиграйте в DK.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055301588', 'num_games_owned': 1093, 'num_reviews': 217, 'playtime_forever': 3123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1807, 'last_played': 1501025109}
review:
[h1]Dungeons 2 ▸ Écrit[/h1]

Dans Dungeons 2, vous allez incarner le mal incarné (oui la répétition est faite exprès, c’est pour être plus diabolique). Dungeons 2 est un jeu de stratégie mi-RPG mi-Management mais quand même surtout stratégique.

Le but, très clairement, c’est de castagner les autres ; si vous faîtes la campagne, vous castagnez de l’humain. Si vous jouez à plusieurs, vous vous castagnez entre vous. Bon c’est un jeu de stratégie quoi… 

Dungeons 2 est différent. En effet, dans celui-ci, vous avez toute la structure d’un jeu de stratégie mais enrobé dans une touche d’humour pas piqué des hannetons. M’enfin c’est pas tout. Sinon on irait pas bien loin. Dans Dungeons 2, vous gérez votre fortune et votre armée en vous terrant littéralement dans votre grotte. Grotte que vous pouvez piéger et améliorer. Et c’est d’elle que vous enverrez votre armée de gobelins ou de morts vivants, au choix. 

Bref, pour faire court, Dungeons 2 c’est un jeu à l’aspect stratégique regorgeant d’humour et assez agréable ; la campagne notamment. Cependant il est souvent en promo (voir gratuit sur humblebundle parfois), donc ne le prenez pas plein pot… Surtout depuis que Dungeons 3 est sorti. 

[quote]Vous pouvez suivre la page curateur ici : [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/28282773/]Sacrez'Art[/url].[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561197960499853', 'num_games_owned': 1512, 'num_reviews': 279, 'playtime_forever': 624, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 624, 'last_played': 1525002473}
review:
Siguiendo los pasos de la vetusta saga Dungeon Keeper, en Dungeons 2 encarnamos al señor del mal y gestionaremos una mazmorra en la que reuniremos y mejoraremos una horda para luego mandarla a la superficie y conquistar el mundo, siendo todo lo malos que se pueda en el proceso.

El desarrollo del juego se divide en dos mapas bien diferenciados: La mazmorra donde nos pasaremos la mayor parte del tiempo gestionando nuestros recursos y dando órdenes a las criaturas para trabajar en nuevos hechizos, mejoras y salas de producción, y la zona superior, donde estas mismas criaturas se manejan como en un RTS típico, matando a todos los enemigos que encontremos (con cuidado de no morder más de lo que se pueda masticar).

El juego tiene un tono muy desenfadado, más incluso que el Dungeon Keeper original, y hace innumerables referencias a otros títulos de fantasía (incluidos spoilers a mansalva de Juego de Tronos), de hecho en ocasiones resultan excesivas. El doblaje del narrador es excelente y le aporta bastante gracia a todo, al mismo tiempo que nos deja claro el siguiente paso en la misión.

Como pegas, diría que las misiones tienen un ritmo inconstante: La mayor parte del tiempo, me sentía como esperando a que sucediese algo (terminar de investigar una nueva tecnología, esperar a que se consiguiese suficiente dinero para comprar una mejora, o simplemente esperar a que la siguiente oleada de enemigos de la misión atacase) , sin que mis acciones pudiesen reducir gran cosa esas esperas. En otras, pasaban muchas cosas a la vez y me costaba seguir el hilo (batallas en la superficie y la mazmorra al mismo tiempo, criaturas buscando la sala del tesoro para cobrar su sueldo...). 

Algunas misiones pueden llegar a durar más de una hora y no da la impresión de que debiesen durar tanto, sobre todo teniendo en cuenta que en general me ha parecido un juego muy fácil: Dado que las criaturas muertas pueden recuperarse (mediante hechizos de teletransporte o una mejora tecnológica), no existe realmente mucho riesgo en mandarlas a la superficie si se tiene algo de cuidado. En cualquier caso, el narrador y la relativa variedad de objetivos de las misiones permite mantener el interés durante toda la campaña, así que no se hace aburrido.

En resumen, un digno sucesor de Dungeon Keeper. Podría mejorarse un poco el ritmo, y el cambio de interfaz entre superficie/mazmorra no es todo lo intuitivo que uno desearía, pero resulta agradable y entretenido.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090549054', 'num_games_owned': 782, 'num_reviews': 476, 'playtime_forever': 907, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 616, 'last_played': 1645628180}
review:
Игра сама по себе красивая. Только здесь ты будешь играть не за добро, которое ходит по подземельям и уничожает мобов, а за то самое зло в подземельях. Будешь управлять гоблинами, орками, нагами, будешь улучшать своё подземелье и мстить тем, кто запечатал тебя. ВЕЛИКОЛЕПНАЯ ИГРА. В ней даже присутсвует юмор, над которым иногда даже можно посмеяться.
Это стратегия с сюжетом, многопользовательским режимом и прекрасной локализацией. Совету всем в неё поиграть

author: {'steamid': '76561198009656079', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 1001, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1001, 'last_played': 1524717278}
review:
Good not great.
Narrator isn't as funny as they think they are.
Victory on almost all levels was dependent on fighting in the overworld which functioned like a horribly primitive RTS. For a game that pitched itself as a dungeon management game, my dungeons often felt like unit generators for a significantly less fun game.
Still, getting your dungeon fully automated and protected got me into an enjoyable zen like sate.
Which then got ruined by a grating narrator who would literally tell me I was taking longer then the developers intended on the level, clicking all my combat units, then sending them to attack+move across the overworld.
I'm offiacly hooked on the genera, and am looking for something better.

And my virus detector decided 13 hours in, despite neither program updating, that dungeons2.exe was a virus. In light of the fact that I had to pull the game out of quarantine I don't feel like going back and doing any of the challenges now.
