author: {'steamid': '76561198009474997', 'num_games_owned': 2216, 'num_reviews': 1072, 'playtime_forever': 15142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15142, 'last_played': 1583379087}
review:
Dungeons 2 Review


A very grand tale awaits…., full of dark humour and plenty references from a variety of other fantasies. 

Some key points that this game offers:

1.	Dungeon Management.
2.	Real Time Strategy
3.	Grand Story line.
4.	Multiplayer.

Gameplay & Controls:

The game can be played completely with the mouse if you prefer, or you can use both the mouse and keyboard; either way is fine and very comfortable here. The game does support game controllers to some extent for those that prefer controller.

The gameplay changed quite a lot from previous titles, and in all the right ways. The game offers two variants of gameplay at any given time. While you are in your Dungeon it is all about dungeon management and when you send your troops to the Overworld you have a full RTS (Real Time Strategy) experience.

Dungeon management has been taken to an entirely new level; instead of catering to Hero’s this time, it is all about killing them from the moment they venture into your dungeon. This can be done with a variety of traps and other nifty gadgets that can be built in hallways to deter them. If that fails you can send forth your minions to pounce on them. As you go about building up your Dungeons riches and power you can send forth some troops to venture into the Overworld; this time is isn’t just about fending off invaders you get to be an invader yourself taking the fight right to the enemy.

Graphics:

The visuals and graphics have received a very decent improvement from previous versions as well. Character models are cleared with a lot more detail to them. The game shadows have also received an upgrade along with the lighting. Everything this time looks more vibrant and welcoming, the dark theme that the game casts is just a black cherry on top.

There are several settings that you can make use of to further customize your game. 

Sounds:

Simply a joyride… The narrator does a marvellous job of keeping you entertained completely. The Comedic dark humour really sets the tone for the game; It enhances it and makes it so much more fun. The voice acting was done beautifully and incorporated just as beautifully.
The in-game sounds and soundtrack have been implemented just as well to bring us a masterpiece. 

Replayability:

This game is so fun that you will gladly replay it over and over; there are numerous maps that can be played solo or online with friends.
All in all, Dungeons 2 will keep you busy for a while.

MGR Gaming’s Conclusions:
Spoilers ahead:

Realmforge Studios did an amazing thing with Dungeons 2; for many of us this is a game type we have been waiting for for a long time. It fills the hole beautifully. We have a very enjoyable campaign with a captivating story line to enjoy. 

The game mode that we get to play this time around was a great surprise at first; but a totally awesome one. We get to build the dungeon of our dreams; massive in scale and crawling with our minions, carving it out or merely patrolling the hallways for things to bash.

There are numerous in game minions to make use of; and this in two different armies; The Horde and then The Demons.  There are several buildings that can be build. Everything has a purpose… serving the Ultimate Evil in his conquest. Brew beer for your minions to gorge on, Forges so that weapons and armour can be upgraded and so much more. 
Dungeons 2 will blow you away.

Score 9
By: MGRza
Date: 30 April 2015

Additional info:

Platforms: PC: Mac: Linux: PlayStation 4
Genre: Strategy: RPG: Management: Fantasy: Comedy: Dungeon Crawler: RTS: Simulation: Base Building: God Game: Sandbox
Censor Rating: Mature
Age Rating: 16
Developer: Realmforge Studios
Publisher: Kalypso Media Digital
Release Date: 24 April 2015

author: {'steamid': '76561198004233477', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 2211, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2027, 'last_played': 1525901576}
review:
EDIT: Various issues were "fixed" by me upgrading to High Sierra from regular Sierra, however, notice the game says it's for 10.9 and higher, not 10.12. If you do not have High Sierra or higher, this game may still have issues.

Issues fixed by my upgrading to High Sierra:
- Skirmish mode now works (at least, I can get to the Skirmish screen), which means I can play as the demons (Undead are not included in the base game, I got their icon confused with the random faction icon)
- Multiplayer quick game puts me in a queue, but it won't match me with anyone
- I can use "Create Game" in Multiplayer

The fact that the game is advertised as working at a lower OS than it truly requires, and the multiplayer mode doesn't have the option for the player to create a game and allow random players to fill in, is why I am leaving this game with a negative review, even though it's fun.

ORIGINAL REVIEW:

I love RTS. I love fantasy + comedy. I had some good times playing this game, but I simply cannot recommend this game because it doesn't really work on Mac. I've played it on two different Macs, both pre and post Sierra updates, and had the same sets of issues with Dungeons 2:

- Skirmish mode doesn't work on Mac
- Multiplayer "new game" mode doesn't work: matchmaking mode won't go past the connection screen
- Multiplayer quick matching mode doesn't work: it won't connect to any games at all
- Inability to do multiplayer on a Mac = inability to unlock the last achievement I need for the game = inability to 100% the game
- Various other people have complained about these issues and the issues are still a problem, years later
- Game has issues where it gets stuck on loading and I have to force it to quit and restart it to make the game work
- Game specifically has issues loading the campaign scenario selection map

Any game that is sold as compatible for Mac, that isn't 100% functional on a Mac, gets a negative rating from me, because it means I wasted my money.

There are various quality of life issues with the game:

- Various features that are useful aren't explained in the tutorials or in campaign mode. For instance, you can build walls and you can lock doors. You can customize and trigger an evil laugh, but this is never hinted at anywhere, and I learned about it via the options menu. None of this is covered in the tutorial.
- You can move various resources (gold, beer) to different places in the dungeon. However, the Lil Snots will automatically move the resources to a room of their matching type. e.g. if I place gold near a Mana Crysta so the Nagas don't need to leave the room to get their pay, Lil Snots will remove the item and take the gold to a treasury. The game should know the difference between items that are placed on the "wrong" floor type due to, say, restructuring of the dungeon, and items placed on the "wrong" floor type due to user input.

The voice acting is great, and most lines are pretty funny.

The game has a cartoony World of Warcraft type of fantasy aesthetic. There's three different races you can play as: Horde (WoW horde type of creatures), Demons, Undead. Unfortunately, given skirmish mode is BUSTED, I can only play the campaign mode, which primarily focuses on the Horde, meaning I can't use the Demons or Undead for a real full game (as most campaign scenarios have limtis to what technology can you unlock, etc.)

The main campaign lasted me about 23 hours. The rest of the time was spent trying to finish the mana achievement (hit 250k mana accumulated over all games, however, unlike most Steam achievements of this ilk, there is no meter that lets you know how close you are to hitting the goal.

If you have a PC, maybe this game is worth it. I don't know if PC has the same issues as Mac. If you have a Mac, I'd look at getting another Dungeon Keeper type of game, or getting Dungeons 3 if Dungeons 3 doesn't have the same issues as Dungeons 2. I haven't played Dungeons 3 yet, so I can't provide any meaningful info on that.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077911638', 'num_games_owned': 2909, 'num_reviews': 225, 'playtime_forever': 3005, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1946, 'last_played': 1627239307}
review:
Отличная игра, отличный комментатор и валом всего еще отличного)
По сути - стратежка, по факту - не только. Тактики тут не так много, в основном "орда на орду", ну изредка что то менее явное (если речь про кампанию). Ресурсы тут...гм...Изначально не проблемны, чуть позже... "Оказывается они не бесконечные" :) Ну это любителям раскопать всё подземелье) Ведь на первых уровнях нас приучили к плюшкам от этого, а вот в последних - это уже более средство виживания. Наставить ловушек, запутать ходы, найти все жилы. 

На поверхности всё более... Скучноо? идем и месим, зато скилы своих воинов можно прожимать. Баланс... Точнее гемплей. Совсем разный. Демоны хиленькие, но дамагерные. Орки - толстокожие и со средним уроном, короче не зря их изначально давали) Хотя по обороне... Вторые своими ловушками никого не подпустят)
Дали бы еще готи издание/апгрейд для интереса)

Вообщем рекомендую!) Хоть игра не такая и длинная, но стоит потраченого времени с лихвой. 

P.S: комментатору вечное "ура!" и хвала, да и редактору/сценаристу, или кто там, по сути)

author: {'steamid': '76561198018450069', 'num_games_owned': 811, 'num_reviews': 596, 'playtime_forever': 612, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 612, 'last_played': 1523394058}
review:
Dungeons 2 is a very enjoyable game. A story is neither rich nor extensive but the game has a simple formula to hold us for countless hours. 

I highlight the narrator who is phenomenal. It's extremely funny and entertaining, he turns out to be something I we're always expecting for another crazy comment he has to make. 

The game itself is not graphically phenomenal, but I enjoy is "cartoonish" style. The game mechanics are simple and somewhat repetitive, with little diversity of different creatures. But overall is a fun game and I fully recommend it. 

Here is small YouTube vide with the first minutes of the gameplay if you wanna check it out:
https://youtu.be/ajC97RECSkA

review: Прям погрузило в ностальгию, как и многих любителей данжен кипера) Приятная графика, простой сюжет и геймплей отлично позволит расслабится после тяжелого дня, а рассказчик еще и пару раз улыбнуться заставит. Из минусов могу лишь назвать, что пришлось колдовать, что б запустить, ибо без галки "запускать от имени администратора" не работала. 9 гоблинов из 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080349471', 'num_games_owned': 536, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 1263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1263, 'last_played': 1521932928}
review:
Dungeons 2 es un entretenido gestor de mazmorras que nos pone en la piel del Mal en su cruzada por conquistar el mundo exterior. Tiene una jugabilidad sencilla y tremendamente entretenida, que te puede tener viciando horas y horas sin que te des ni cuenta. Los gráficos y las animaciones cumplen, además está doblado al castellano de manera magistral con miles de referencia a la cultura popular más reciente (juego de tronos, god of war, warcraft...)

Para no extenderse, lo bueno y lo malo del título:

LO BUENO:
- La personalización de la mazmorra: con el tiempo vas obteniendo mejoras y nuevas salas que hacen el trabajo más rápido y eficaz, así como nuevas trampas para echar a los intrusos sin necesidad de herir a tus esbirros.
- La variedad de criaturas: al empezar la campaña solo usamos a la Horda (orcos y goblins) pero más adelante se nos da la opción de seguir el camino del "Mal Caótico" y sus demonios y súcubos.
- La campaña: un sólido "modo historia" con dosis de humor a más no poder. Nuestra misión: Conquistar la superficie. Por el camino: matar a personajes como Joffrey, Gimli, Jon Nieve y 'Crotos' el Semidios. Esta campaña nos puede llevar de 15 a 20 horas completarla.
- La jugabilidad es accesible, tiene sus partes de estrategia y gestión pero cualquiera puede divertirse, para mayor dificultad es mejor usar al Mal Caótico.
- Duración infinita.

LO MALO:
- El launcher, en serio kalypso, déjame jugar al juego sin tener que omitir cada vez que lo abro la pantalla de la cuenta kalypso.
- Los menús, la interfaz y algunas miniaturas de los personajes podrían estar más pulidas.
- Falta una opción que permita priorizar el trabajo de los nimios (esbirros obreros): siempre pican oro donde les marques, lo que al principio te puede llevar tanto a tener escasez de bebida como de oro si haces que dejen de picar. Estaría bien poder dárles órdenes de priorizar oro, bebida o abrir nuevos caminos.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997829089', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 253, 'playtime_forever': 1439, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1383, 'last_played': 1521151091}
review:
A VAST improvement from Dungeons 1 which was a pile of shize! Dungeons 2 is more like dungeon keeper 2 light. This game would have been much more fun if it wasnt so basic and repetitive. The biggest innovation this game has is that you can go up on the surface which is a fun idea but unfortunately they just implemented it so poorly. 
You only have your basic workers and 4 other creatures with different evolving features but they all do the same as when not evolved. The enemies are the same as well, you can´t do anything with your enemies except killing them, you can´t put them in prisons, you can´t torture them, you can´t sacrifice them or anything fun at all! 
The magic system is not good, they dont do much since you can´t even cast any interesting spells on the surface where all the action is. All mission levels is very much the same, build your base from scratch, upgrade everything, attack the surface and win. There is no tactics involved or different approaches to how to finish the missions either. There is no threat in the underground what so ever. If you dig up a room with spiders (thats basicly all there is) they wont harm you until you harm them. Why is there no surprises to find? Why is it all the same wherever you dig? There is no lava or water or hidden treasures or anything!
The narrator in the game is good with funny lines, the story is funny in a goofy way and i like how the surface turns into a dark place whenever you conquer it piece by piece. 
Dungeons 2 has the potential to be better than dungeon keeper 2 but it just lacks so much that i dont think this game deserves a thumbs up!

author: {'steamid': '76561197979308325', 'num_games_owned': 181, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 5489, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1790, 'last_played': 1699765680}
review: É um baita jogo. Muito engraçado, com bastante coisa para fazer, uma história divertida, simples, animação bonita, apenas dois pontos negativos: a campanha é muito curta e algumas vezes fica repetitivo, apesar disso, vale a pena jogar e comprar todas as expansões (ele é muito melhor que o dungeons 1, que é complexo demais e muito dependente do seu personagem (no primeiro jogo parece que o dungeon lord, você, precisa fazer tudo sozinho))

author: {'steamid': '76561198124179434', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1107, 'last_played': 1519935305}
review:
Me encanto, es la mescla casi-perfecta entre warcraft 3 (que lo amo) y un tower defense. Osea si te gustan estos 2 generos dale para adelante, a todo esto tambien tiene guiños a todo tipo peliculas y series medievales y cosas demoniacas ejemplo: supernatural, el señor de los anillos, etc para no cagarle la sorpresa no agrego todos.. me hizo cagar de risa de varios chistes y al principio, el gameplay es confuso  pero cuando te acostumbras podes pasar horas y horas viciando..
Como te dije si te gustan los generos mencionados anteriormente es compra obligada, no te vas a arrepentir!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198012534726', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1627151936}

review:
Un buen sucesor espiritual del Dungeon Keeper, que además le da mayor importancia a las aventuras en el mundo exterior. Además de tener contenido para expandir las horas de juego. En algunas ocasiones llegaba a crashear pero fueron realmente pocas. La voz del narrador excelente. Recomendado.

Consejo: Siempre guarden la partida antes de entrar a algún portal.

author: {'steamid': '76561198337188865', 'num_games_owned': 193, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 655, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 655, 'last_played': 1519042447}
review: Juego muy divertido que me salió gratis pero que ahora que lo he jugado hubiera pagado por él. Me recuerda a Warcraft III pero con un toque de humor y gestión de mazmorras que lo hacen muy completo. author: {'steamid': '76561198021422660', 'num_games_owned': 3620, 'num_reviews': 1228, 'playtime_forever': 205, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 205, 'last_played': 1516215909}
review: До чего же нудное зло... Сидел залипал в эту игру. Денег не хватает как обычно, миньоны тупые и очков населения как всегда мало. Сидел сидел и что-то подзадолбало малость... К тому же в начале постоянно выскакивает баннер с учётной записью. В GOG такого нет. Но оформление в целом симпатичное и напоминает третий варкрафт, но здесь всё более тормознуто либо у меня ноут просто отстой.... Но не смог. Хотя дубляж нормальный, всё на русском, карточки, облачное сохранение. Но не моё....

author: {'steamid': '76561198028619144', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 3204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2927, 'last_played': 1573861852}
review:
Dungeons 2 ist ein eher ungewöhnliches Aufbaustrategiespiel im Stil von Dungeon Keeper. Man lässt seinen Dungeon ausheben und legt darin Räume an. Diese dienen zur Forschung und Herstellung von Waren, die man für weitere Forschungen sowie den Dungeon-Ausbau und den Unterhalt seiner Kreaturen braucht. Des öfteren tauchen Helden auf, die den Overlord töten und den Dungeon plündern wollen. Diese kann man natürlich mit seinen Geschöpfen und Fallen aufhalten. Und schließlich kann man auch mit seinen Kreaturen die Oberwelt überfallen und Chaos und Schrecken verbreiten.

Positive Aspekte:
[list][*]Sämtliche Inhalte sind übelstes Fantasy-Klischee, aber das ist durchaus beabsichtigt, um sich über sich selbst und andere Fantasy-Franchises lustig machen zu können.
[*]Äußerst unterhaltsame Kampagne mit zahlreichen Anspielungen, mitunter auf Game of Thrones, WarCraft, Herr der Ringe, Harry Potter, Warhammer (kein Anspruch auf Vollständigkeit).
[*]Man kann seine Kreaturen aufwerten. Dadurch verändern sich Stats und Fähigkeiten der Einheit, sodass sie im Kampf andere Funktionen erfüllt.
[*]Es ist wichtig, seinen Ressourcenhaushalt im Auge zu behalten. Ist z. B. die Bierproduktion zu gering, werden die Diener langsam sauer und treten in den Streik.
[*]In der Oberwelt kann man per Tab bequem zwischen den Einheitengattungen wechseln, um ihre verschiedenen Fähigkeiten einzusetzen (ähnlich zu WarCraft 3).[/list]

Negativaspekte:
[list][*]Die Kampagne ist insgesamt zu einfach. Eine Möglichkeit für höhere Schwierigkeitsgrade wäre schön.
[*]Des öfteren herrscht Leerlauf beim Dungeon-Ausbau. Wenn man nicht wie in der Kampagne vom Erzähler zugetextet wird, kann das schnell langweilig werden.
[*]Es erfordert ein wenig Geduld bzw. Erfahrung, Einheiten im Dungeon exakt auswählen zu können.
[*]Manchmal ist die unterschiedliche Steuerung der Einheiten zwischen Dungeon und Oberwelt etwas verwirrend.
[*]Das Balancing scheint mir nicht gut gelungen: Fallen und viele der Zauber scheinen ziemlich schwach im Vergleich zu den Dienern. Die stärkste Verteidigung ist meines Erachtens, sämtliche Krieger aufzuheben und kurz vor den anrückenden Helden hinzuwerfen.[/list]

Fazit: Insgesamt finde ich Dungeons 2 großartig. Der Grafikstil, der Humor des Spiels und die bewusst innovationslosen Inhalte passen perfekt zusammen. Das ist das eigentlich Wichtige bei diesem Spiel. Wer mit der Comicgrafik oder den dummen Witzen und Anspielungen auf andere Fantasy-Settings nichts anfangen kann, für den ist dieses Spiel definitiv nichts. Und obwohl die Spielmechaniken an sich nicht wirklich komplex sind, kann man sich ewig damit aufhalten seinen Dungeon zu planen, auszubauen, mit Fallen zu "verschönern" und sich allmählich darauf vorzubereiten, die Oberwelt zu unterjochen.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991103051', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 252, 'playtime_forever': 231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 231, 'last_played': 1518397187}
review:
Its very very slow. I expected to build up my dungeon and amass troops to conquer the outside world. What you will actually be doing is follow an incredably slow tutorial through the campaign missions which will have you unlocking one thing at a time and constantly restarting your base.

I ended up having more fun with the sandbox mode where you have everything unlocked from the start. The downside of this though is you dont have anything to work towards. Once you build up a decent dungeon you are kind of out of things to do.

Techniqually the game works fine and is moderatley fun for a few hours but I was kind of hoping for more.

review: I have become absorbed with this game.  It's like Warcraft III and Dungeon Keeper 2 combined.  The only negatives I have to say is that it could use a bit of refining on picking up creatures quicker, and the tutorials could be a bit more detailed (they never do explain what the books and potions do, not even in the manual).  It is a beautiful and enjoyable game, and I will definitely be putting many hours into this!

author: {'steamid': '76561198376479253', 'num_games_owned': 984, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 1545, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1383, 'last_played': 1574083596}
review:
Pros:

>A unique blend of RTS and dungeon management gameplay 
with some very minor role-playing elements.
>Unique setting.
>Some unique features.
>Above average singleplayer campaign.
>Some well placed humor.

Cons:

>Unit control elements on the RTS side is 
just average and could have been done better.
>The interface can seem confusing at times.
>The pace of gameplay is somewhat slow especially at the start of missions.
>Some repetitiveness in terms of the gameplay itself such as resource gathering, 
building & researching however this would depend on the person.

The RTS elements is not where this game shines,
It is the dungeon management elements and the well placed humor.

Overall I give it a 6.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197998621856', 'num_games_owned': 396, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 65, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1517176268}
review:
Clusterfuck. Dungeon controls like Dungen Keeper, overworld a bit more like traditional RTS and missions require micromanaging singular units. Too many ideas in one place for no apparent benefit. Humour feels very forced, they tried too hard and sometimes what was supposed to ne funny is tiring instead.

Have to admit - I like the visuals, audio is decent but that's not enough to make it worthwile.

author: {'steamid': '76561198097681875', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 119, 'playtime_forever': 1849, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1849, 'last_played': 1516469631}
review:
Un juego que no se porque no es mas conocido, cuando es de lo mejorcito que he podido probar en los ultimos años. Un humor irreverente, similar al que podemos encontrar en los overlord pero mas gamberro. Referencias a la cultura friky por todas partes y al mundo del cine (creo que soy de los pocos que pillaran la referencia a El arbol de la vida). Un manejo simple pero fluido. Unos objetivos claros. Y una campaña corta en numero de pantalla, pero que si juegas bien, puede durante tus 30 horas pues los mapas pueden tenerte facilmente 2 o 3 horas si lo investigas y exploras todo. 

Es un juego definitivamente recomendable para cuando quieras paras un rato de buen rollo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049469951', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 3043, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3043, 'last_played': 1516276527}
review: La digne suite de Dungeons Keeper. Pleins de références à Game of Throme, World of Warcraft, Seigneurs des anneaux.... Bref c'est un petit jeu génial et qui ne coute plus rien. Franchement foncez, vous en aurez pour votre argent et vous passerez un agréable moment.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030542550', 'num_games_owned': 423, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1527, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1527, 'last_played': 1516309562}
review:
I haven't have so much fun with a game in a long time.

PROS:
+	Great sense of humour.
+	So many references to fantasy franchises like, Warhammer, Warcraft, LOTR, DnD, Game of Thrones, etc.
+	Graphics
+	Dungeon Keeper very strong vibe.
+	Making fun of EA and their p2w mobile game
+	Same narrator as in Stanley Parable, making fun of Stanley as well.

CONS:
-	Doesn’t evolve the genre, but at the same time it doesn’t have to.
-	It felt a little easy, but I’m good at micro and macro in RTS (the combat is RTS style in the map above the dungeon)

author: {'steamid': '76561197978957789', 'num_games_owned': 6132, 'num_reviews': 207, 'playtime_forever': 2032, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1475, 'last_played': 1519758123}
review:
El juego no es como el anterior Dungeons o como aquel Dungeon Keeper que nunca se ha vuelto a ver algo parecido...
Si es verdad que casi todo se cuece en las mazmorras , y alli es donde te haces poderoso y fuerte , pero esta vez no solo tendras que defenderte de aquellos que vienen a destrozar tu mazmorras, tendras que crear un ejercito y salir fuera y conquistar al invasor.

El juego es adictivo , y graficamente muy bueno , lo recomiendo si quieres ser malo , y crear mazmorras ,trampas,  criaturas etc :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197994333970', 'num_games_owned': 162, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 2045, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2045, 'last_played': 1515173172}
review:
Oh boy.

While I am sad that the really awesome blend of game mechanics from Dungeons 1 is completly removed to be more "Dungeon Keeper-y" my god they overdone themself again. This has A LOT more content then Dungeon Keeper, A LOT more variety in the campaign. AAAAAAND a shit tone more lore, objectives and fun. The asthetic can put you off easilly but if you go deeper in the campaign the really hard core shit will be avaiable on higher tiers and things start to feel more evil. They still keept theire childish asthetic tho but the game mechanics are so GOOD and ballanced that i just didnt bother anymore.
The Winter Expansion is a must. It is not just a really good tide up of the whole story that sounds cheesy looks cheesy and B movie rated but it actually gets better and it has multiple twist in it wich seriously i didnt see it comming. Prolly cuz they made it that you just dont expect anything major, but there is :D. The extra race you get in winter is SOOO brokenly op it begs to belive.
But i get ahead of myself. Point is that the game internally superballanced (in dungeons 1 and its expansion these guys already shown that they are masters of game mechanics ballance, gameplay ballance)
The whole experience is soo smooth and polished. I had like 1 crash thats it. And the controls are specific but the unit AI is really really good. They like perfect pets doing exectly what you want thhem to do, the enemies are challanging the maps are varied all around, never you feel doing the same and it makes you rethink youre build order what to focus on, how to make a good combination. Its a far fetch but it feels like Xenonauts on turbo. How you biuld matters, how you equip youere units matters, what you research in what order matters, where to and when to expand matters. So much things are so out of the chart the units are soooo different that it just offers themselfs to a trully tactical feel like.
It is arcady and basic but thats enough for a game that doesnt even focus on that. There were maps i had to restart even after i was hours in just like a long Xenonauts run i had to abadone.

Seriously this beats DK by far, (altho not in every way but more ways then not, atmosphere, sound design, music, and scale, and asthetic DK wins.) But in everything else, Graphics, Animation, game mechanics, ballance, variety, gameplay, game lenght, options, lore, story, and i can go on and on. So good RECOMMEND!

author: {'steamid': '76561198070451027', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 629, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 629, 'last_played': 1515256138}
review:
Ich hab dieses Spiel damals Vollpreis für 43€ gekauft und hatte dann nach den ersten 4 Missionen das Interesse wieder verloren und nur noch CS:Go gespielt.

Nun Jahre später hab ich ihm noch eine zweite Chance gegeben.
Ich hab gut Spaß , auch wenn es längst nicht perfekt ist.

+ +  Eine Mischung aus Dungeon Keeper 2 und Warcraft 3
Das Spielprinzip ist einfach knuffig.
Ich baue wie in Dungeon Keeper unterirdische Räume (Brauereien , Kampfarena, Zauberschule , Krankenlager etc etc..) , heure Kreaturen an , Forsche Zaubersprüche und Waffen/Rüstungen , werte mein Haupthaus auf und baue Gold und Mana ab.

Zudem kann ich allerlei Fallen erforschen und dann plazieren um mein Dungeon gegen immer wieder eintreffende Heldenwellen zu schützen. (Soweit so gut wie in Dungeon Keeper 2)

Insgesamt gibt es pro Rasse (Im Hauptspiel Dämonen oder Orks...im Addon dann noch Untote) 4 Einheitentypen in je 3 sich teils deutlich unterschiedenden Variationen. z.B  Goblin Schurke der sich unsichtbar machen kann oder Fallen entschärfen und Goblin Kampfroboter der 3x so groß ist und mit Flammenwerfer Feinde röstet.
Macht also 12 verschiedene Kampf Einheiten. + Arbeiter

Zudem steigen Einheiten duch Kampferfahrung im Level auf was ihnen mehr Hitpoints und mehr Kampfstärke verleiht.
Ein Level 5 Ork Häuptling  macht aus einem Level 1 Orc im Handumdrehen kurzen Prozess

++ Die Grafik ist soweit sehr atmosphärisch in einem lustigen Comic look umgesetzt. Das ist sicherlich Geschmacksache aber ich mag es. Erinnert sehr an Warcraft 3.


++ Der Umfang ist dank Addon recht gut
9 Orc Missionen 2 Dämonen und 8 Untote Missionen sorgen für ca 25h Kampagnen Spielzeit. 
Zudem stehen mehr als 10 Skirmish karten gegen die CPU zur Verfügung die sicher nochmal für 15h+ Spielspaß sorgen können.

++ Die Idee mit der Oberfläche ist ganz Nett.
Ich kann mit meinen Armeen die Oberwelt verwüsten und sammle für das Abmurksen von Soldaten und das in Brand stecken von Häusern  Erfahrung und Boshaftigkeit.
Boshaftigkeit ist eine Ressoruce die ich brauche um mein Haupthaus auf Level 2 zu techen, was sehr viele Räume und verbesserungen freischaltet



--   Die Steuerung ist manchmal arg fumelig.
Vor allem ist es etwas gewöhnungsbedürftig dass sich das Spiel an der Oberfäche wie WC3 und im Untergrund nur indirekt über Befehle steuern lässt. (d.h ich kann nicht mit der Maus einen Rahmen um 3 einheiten ziehen und diese markieren und zu Ort B schicken, sondern muss in ein Dropdownmenü für Orcs , dort die 3 Orcs einzeln auswählen, dann habe ich sie in der Hand und muss sie dort abwerfen wo ich sie haben will )

Auch an der Oberfläche ist das Micro management teilweise arg fumelig.
Attack move auf  F zu legen statt auf A (wie in jedem normalen RTS sorgt bei mir auch immer wieder für Fehler)

Die Steuerung über die Einheitenleiste funktioniert zwar prinzipiell wirkt aber irgednwie träger als z.B in WC3 und daher ist es etwas schwer gezielt einzelne Einheiten auszuwählen die z.B gezielt eine angeschlagene Einheit heilen soll.


-- Ballancing in der Hauptspiel kampagne.
Die Missionen sind insgesamt im Hauptspiel eher leicht und der Kombination aus 5 Level 5 Orc Häuptlinen + 5 Level 4-5 Naga Königin Heilerinnen ist in den Missionen nahezu unaufhaltsam.
Die schwer gepanzerten Orcs ziehen den Schaden auf sich und teilen ordentlich aus , während die Naga Königinnen im HIntergergrund unentwegt heilen.
Sowohl in Mission 6/9 als auch 7/9 der Orcs hat diese Kombination ohne Verluste alles plattgewalzt.

-- Dauer des Hauptspiels
Die Kampagne des Hauptspiels ist eher kurz.
Mission 1-5 Orcs und 1 Dämonen sind reine Tutorials die die Mechaniken erklären aber spielerisch nicht fordern.
Bleiben 4 echte Orc und eine echte Dämonen Missionen übrig.

Nur 5 echte Missionen mit insgesamt ca 10h Spielzeit finde ich schon etwas wenig für die Ursprünglichen 43€ die ich gezahlt habe.
Das Addon welches im Wintersale für 4€ im Angebot war bessert hier allerdings aus und liefert 8 neue Missionen



Fazit... für ca 10€  Hauptspiel + Addon ist es auf jedenfall Wert wenn man sowohl Dungeon Keeper 2 als auch WC3 mochte

author: {'steamid': '76561198146320257', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1025, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 997, 'last_played': 1699771905}
review: I got this for free so I didn't really know what to expect when I started playing it. Now I'm about 3/4 of the way through the "map" of locations to conquer and I look forward to finishing the game. The narrator is pretty funny and while the actual gameplay can get repetitve and monotonous at times, I think it's still got enough variety and new things at each location to keep you interested. Since I've never played anything in this line before, I was pleasantly surprised that you play as the "bad guys" to destory happiness and goodness and unicorns. Haha. My only complaint is the multiplayer game options are pretty boring.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037152947', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 9515, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2660, 'last_played': 1669579024}
review:
Sono un amante dei game manageriali tipo dungeon keeper 1/2 e questo gioco è il degno erede !
La voce narrante che ti guida e sovente ti prende in giro con continue citazioni a telefilm e film d'autore ,è semplicemente geniale.
Ho finito questo gioco in 21 ore ma ho subito acquistato tutti i DLC perchè sono rimasto "affamato" di questo fantastico gameplay.

author: {'steamid': '76561198070689169', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 1974, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1974, 'last_played': 1514853234}
review:
Dungeons 2

Мне очень сложно писать обзор на данную игру. Просто потому, что игра МАЛЕНЬКАЯ ! Игру хочется назвать браузерной. Ну вот и подумайте, что можно написать о браузерной игре ? Многие играли в приложения в ВК по типу "Осада" или "Кризис", в том же стиле выполнена и данная игра... Начнем с приятного. В игре много юмора, который разносится из уст не затыкающегося комментатора, который всячески высмеивает буквально всё во круг, а поскольку игра линейная, то и комментатор записан на пленку, что говорит о том - игра на 1 раз. То есть в игре нет никаких смешных названий, озвучки юнитов, смешных текстов перед миссиями, да и вообще ничего смешного нету, обычная стратегия браузерного типа (строй, улучшай и сражайся) только в место доната вы уже купили эту игру и ничего нового в ней вы больше не увидите... Прошли компанию и хотите еще посмеяться ? На этот случай вам сделали некоторый дополнительный контент в виде новой компании... Покупайте её и наслаждайтесь ! Только предупрежу сразу, новая компания на много сложнее базовой. И вот тут начинаются отрицательные моменты... Вы начинаете сливать и перезапускать миссии, а комментатора никак не заткнешь, он вас просто начинает бесить, прямо, как Петросян.... А если вы еще раз слили, то игра превращается в муки... И я скажу честно, хочется её просто удалить и никогда больше не видеть. Собственно об этой игре и сказать то больше не чего. Могу только добавить, что покупал её дабы понять, что такое линейка "Подземелья". Ну посмотрел.... Третью часть я точно покупать не стану, как и первую... Музыки нет, графона нет, сюжет жиденький, я его даже не помню в основной компании.... Короче. Всю игру вытягивает комментатор, который эту же игру и добивает при определенных условиях. 

Данную игру я рекомендую покупать БЕЗ ДОП. КОНТЕНТА ! Пройти базовую компанию 1 раз, как хороший фильм. И перелистнуть все эти подземелья к черту ! :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198321740054', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 256, 'playtime_forever': 29, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1514599496}
review:
A Dungeon Keeper clone that sadly feels too much like Dungeon Keeper 2 - a good game, but one that is also almost 20 years old at this point. I recommend instead War for the Overworld, which is a similar game that just does everything better in my experience.

If you're a dungeon simulator fanatic and you've played everything else, then by all means, give this one a try. It gets as cheap as 75% off on sales so it's definitely worth it at that price - just shouldn't be you first option for a dungeon sim at all.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993762379', 'num_games_owned': 581, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1111, 'last_played': 1514439366}
review:
This game is worth the full price. I regret buying it on sale and not fully supporting the devs. Its great mixture of tower defense and RTS. I've had four nights in a row staying up till four AM because i couldn't put the bastard down.

Biggest problem i had was building too few snots and only having one treasury. Fill your dungeon with snots in the early game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198075880603', 'num_games_owned': 213, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 572, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 572, 'last_played': 1509177390}
review:
Podria haber llegado a ocupar el puesto de Dungeon Keeper titulo al que le dedique muchas horas de mi vida y me enamore de los juegos de esta categoria, como juego de gestión de mazmorras es aceptable, quiza una mera copia intentando arriesgar en los puntos incorrectos y con un toque que pretende ser desenfadado llegando al humor y referancias fuera de lugar que le quitan toda la personalidad al titulo, la contratación de topas bajo mi opinion personal destroza parte de la gestion que se habia establecido en la gestión de mazmorras.

Los niveles son lentos y costosos, no dificiles ya que la dificultad del juego esta en llagar al final del titulo, cosa que no llegue a logar, la historia va por los mismos pasos que el titulo, pasa de ser desenfadada a absurda... dejando de lado a que eres el malo de la historia... un titulo totalmente prescindible si jugaste a Keeper ya que te va a dejar un mal sabor de boca.

Su unico punto positivo es que añaden una mecanica de dos mapas o más en los que realizar las acciones de combate, una gran idea que esta muy mal desarrollada.

Valoración final:

Música: 7/10
Gráficos: 8/10
Historia: 2/10
Mecánica: 4/10
Niveles: 1/10

Valoración final: 4.4

Duración:

Completar el juego  12-18h
Completar el juego al 100% 24h
Rejugable: No

review: Лично мне зашло на ура. Рекомендую всем фанатам Dungeon Keeper. Приятный сюжет, чувствуется атмосфера подземелья. Битвы над землей вообще выше всяких похвал. Эдакая смесь Overlord и Dungeon Keeper в самобытной обёртке.

author: {'steamid': '76561198210981415', 'num_games_owned': 192, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 446, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 446, 'last_played': 1514346013}
review:
Este juego es en todo lo que Dungeon Keeper (El primer juego de este tipo) tendría que haberse convertido. El juego es divertido y el modo campaña es excelente. 

El narrador del juego se lleva todas las felicitaciones, es simplemente graciosísimo, con sus chistes y referencias a El Señor de los Anillos, al mismo Dungeon Keeper y un montón de cosas más de la cultura millenial. Excelente juego.

author: {'steamid': '76561198418549470', 'num_games_owned': 1157, 'num_reviews': 654, 'playtime_forever': 339, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1520796750}
review: (Update: noticing some random system-locking crashes on Ubuntu Linux...) Very happy to play a spiritual successor to Dungeon Keeper. Orchestral music, captivating voice narrator, and funny worker animations. Even with rose-colored glasses, I can remember that the original game had some problems. This game runs more smoothly, it has some interesting quests, and it has a different approach to dungeon building. It is certainly not exactly the same as the original, with the above-world below-world maps. For me, however, it is everything I expected and more. Recommend it highly for someone looking for a create-your-own-lair game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998455537', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 809, 'playtime_forever': 796, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 796, 'last_played': 1514112253}
review:
[h1][b]THIS IS NOT DUNGEONKEEPER![/b][/h1]

Yes or no? I think Dungeons 2 is barely a yes but falls short. I want to give a yes but there are problems. Dungeons 2 is a supposed parody of the Dungeonkeeper series. However, it is only partially similar to Dungeonkeeper. Everything in Dungeons 2 is like a parody. From the story, to the gameplay, to the design. Dungeons 2 is a real-time strategy (RTS) game that looks like Dungeonkeeper. Dungeons 2 has a joke story, parodies characters from other games/novels and doesn't seem to have anything original to add. All of that simply reeks of laziness and in-your-face attitude. Parodies might be enjoyable if you don't try to blatantly ripoff other people i.e. an in-game joke, but Dungeons 2 is an entire parody based off Warcraft 3, A Game of Thrones, Dungeonkeeper, Lord of the Rings and God of War. It's not fair to other developers who take the effort not to copy. Kalypso may think that it's funny and is engrossed with making big bucks. 

Gameplay-wise, it's RTS, not Dungeon Keeper. Your aim is to build up your base in the underground map, grow your foces and send your minions into the Overworld to complete objectives. There are 2 different control schemes which are very confusing and depends on whether you are looking at Overworld or Underworld.

Overworld, RTS style where you group units using CTRL and right click move. You can micro-manage your units to attack specific targets. Spellcasting is limited to friendly spells and you can't use certain spells like Lightning. This is odd as lightning normally strikes from the sky, in the open. 

Underworld, you have a hand that can pick up minions. You cannot micro-manage your units here. You can only pick up them, drop them or slap them. All spells can be cast in Underworld.

Conclusion, Dungeons 2 is actually a no that can turn into a yes, if Kalypso Entertainment can improve the game greatly. It has to choose how it wants to play. Do you want RTS or Dungeonkeeper? Don't do both, please.
 
[h1][b]PROS[/b][/h1]
1. Interesting Builds
Buildings E.g. the larva and the different upgrades for each creature

2. Defribilator
Really nice. I like the resurrection idea a lot. It looked really cool too.

3. Innovative Traps
I like the innovative traps a lot. Spider egg, portal to hell, etc

4. Easy Pick Up
Just click on the top bar and pick up all the units you want. This is very useful. It would be great if there was button to pick up all the units at once.

[h1][b]CONS[/b][/h1]
1. Confusing 
Minimap is bad. 2 control systems that work differently above and below.

2. Only 5 Main Units To Work With and Upgrade
Snot, Goblin, Naga, Orc and Troll. It's too few. I think 7 would be just nice and you get to pick and choose which 7 you want.

3. Bugs/Glitches
a. Models fly across the screen when you pick them up in the dungeon

4. Inelegant and Confusing Teching/Research
Do you want to upgrade a Troll to a Troll Juggernaut? It's not Troll (Level 1) -> Rockthrower (Level 2) -> Troll Juggernaut (Level 3). It's Troll (L1) either Rockthrower (L2a)  or Troll Juggernaut (L2b). L2b only appears when you upgrade your dungeon to L3. Imagine the confusion when you have to do it manually.

Then they create a demonic evil which is a purple version of the Absolute Evil and that one upgrades L1-> L2-> L3.

5. Inelegant Room Building
Every single room has to have add-on structures built onto them. E.g. Brewry need 2x3 for a kettle. Can you just auto build the kettle when you make a 2x3? The only elegant one is the Treasury which doesn't need any kind of special spacing and has no add-ons.

6. Can't See Beyond 4 Research/Builds
If you queue 4 research, you will only see 3. 

7. Attack move is the F key
Why the F key? Why can't you just use A?

8. Parodies and Tropes
A Game of Thrones, Warcraft 3, Lord of the Rings, God of War. Creating a parody is one thing but this is quite overboard. 

9. No sign that you are Attacking Buildings
Attacking units will flash a red circle. Attacking buildings is just a guess that you are attacking it.

10. Minimap on the Bottom Left and Right
The bottom left is supposed to be Overworld and bottom right is Underworld. It is so hard and confusing to look at 2 maps on opposite sides of the screen.

11. 4 Resources, Possibly Too Much Junk
Gold, mana, beer, crates. Way too many things to pick up. The mana bubbles and crates are major problems. The crate model is way bigger than gold and really easy to accidentally pick up. Why do you even need to create so much junk?

12. Compulsory Trap Placement Space
Why does the spinning trap have to have 3x3 grid to work? Why couldn't you just use spinning blades on a rotating pole? It takes up 1 square but you have to have 8 empty spaces around it to place it down. This is so annoying.

13. No Possessing Your Minions
That was really fun in Dungeonkeeper.

14. Reloading of Traps/Doors
You have to have crates, lot of crates to reload your traps. 

15. Similar Race Different Skin
The Horde and the Demons have very similar same base mechanics. The only difference is that you rearranged how the units upgrade. One does training, one does sacrifice. It would have been better to combine them into one, just like Dungeonkeeper.

[h1][b]SUGGESTIONS[/b][/h1]
1. Beer Meter
Replace Beer Kegs with a Gauge that shows how much liquid is still on tap. No need to stack beer barrels and no accidentally clicking on the beer barrel. 

2. Trap Boxes / Door Boxes
Want a door? Goblin makes 1 crate = door. Want a trap? Goblin makes 1 crate = trap. Snot moves crate to location and unpacks it at the location. Smooth with no clutter. 

3. Mini-map
Place Overworld mini-map above the Underworld mini-map. That way it's easier for everyone to reference.

4. Choose a Control Scheme
RTS or Dungeonkeeper? Pick one and stick with it, please.

5. Combine the Horde and Demon
You have good concepts that players can use if you were to combine these 2 races. Mechanically, you can see that they are similar. 

Instead of 
Snot = Servant
Orc = Succubus
Goblin = Infested
Naga = Shadowstalker
Troll = Fire Demon

Do the following
Snot = Gold Digger
Orc = 
Goblin = Trap Maker 1 
Naga = Researcher
Troll = Forge Worker 1
Servant = Mana Worker / Researcher 2
Succubus = Work Encourager
Infested = Spiderling Summoner
Shadowstalker = Stealth Assassin/Scout
Fire Demon = Heavy Damage/Forge Worker 2

Give each creature a different gameplay style and you will have 10 different units. What does Forge Worker 1 and 2 mean? If you want super fast research in the Chaos Forge, put a troll and fire demon together. One heats up the fire and one hammers and forge.

6. Black Dragon to Guard the Gold Hoard
The treasury looks useless to most players, right? Time to bring in a massive 3x3 black dragon to guard the hoard.

[h1][b]List of differences between Dungeons 2 and Dungeonkeeper[/b][/h1] 
a. No possession of minions. You cannot posses your minions unlike Dungeonkeeper.
b. No grab to rescue. If your minions are on Overworld, you cannot  
c. No flag to summon/call troops by default. It's a spell that you must research.
d. Picking up and dropping minions only works in the dungeon (Underworld). The Overworld reverts to a Warcraft 3 styled RTS mode.
e. No need to capture territories with your minions. No need to influence/build floors with imps. Everything Underworld belongs to you.
f. No need to reinforce walls. 
g. No hold to charge a hand spell. Just wave your hand back and forth to cast lightning multiple times.
h. Lots of crates instead of Trap Box/Door Box.
i. There is no water, so there is no need to build bridges.
j. Minions are not attracted by building rooms or calling to them. Instead you have 5 base units that can be automatically summoned the moment you build a prerequisite room, pay the gold and have the population space.
k. There is a population cap that can be upgraded.
l. No Dungeon vs Dungeon multiplayer. The Skirmish is just another Underworld vs Overworld campaign map.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025622309', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 6528, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5309, 'last_played': 1536953137}
review:
I really liked this game. A little repetetive but if you like expanding your dungeon, building traps and generally boosting your army before heading forth then this is the game for you. (Yes, when I used to play 'Command and Conquer' I'd try to have an army of a gazillion tanks before heading out...)

Once I'd finished the game, I started again with the "Hell" set of characters but didn't get past the first level as it all felt so similar - maybe I need to leave it a lot longer before I come back.

The first run through was great though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065161972', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 8970, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2374, 'last_played': 1676241557}
review:
Was soll ich sagen, seit bestimmt 10 Jahren das beste Spiel, wenn nicht sogar das beste Spiel aller Zeiten.
Auf der einen Seite ist es recht komplex, aber nicht so komplex, daß man es nicht mehr verstehen könnte. Man braucht kein Studium des Spiels um es auch spielen zu können und dank des Sprechers und der vielen lustigen Anspielungen macht es von Anfang bis Ende einfach nur voll viel Spaß.

Wer also lustig dahin daddeln will, ist hier wirklich bestens aufgehoben. Wer allerdings erst einmal ein Studium des Spiels machen will und sich dann nach tausenden von Niederlagen endlich zum 2. Level durchschlagen konnte und daran auch noch Spaß hat, dem ist es zu leicht. Eigentlich kann man es gar nicht verlieren, aber Laune macht es dennoch :)

Also von mir 10 von 10 Sternen!!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198037992801', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 2575, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1344, 'last_played': 1621746751}
review:
Ich habe Dungeons 2 gespielt weil ich ein früheres Spiel dieser Art sehr gemocht habe.
Der Humor der Macher ist sehr gut, und die ziehen so einige lustige Sachen aus Game Of Thrones...

Kann das Spiel nur Empfehlen bei mir auf win 7 64bit mit 16gbRam hat es fehlerlos funktioniert.

Klassisches Aufbauspiel mit Minions, erinnert Stark an Starcraft.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007353595', 'num_games_owned': 238, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 2388, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2177, 'last_played': 1513520319}
review:
Dungeons 2, despite being the follow up from the first Dungeon game, works very different in mechanics. Dungeons 2 goes more back to the classic strategy game. You still build an underground dungeon, but now you actually get to control your army and often need to take it above ground to fight the allied forces on their own territory.  Neither do you 'control' your lord and he just sits chained on his throne.

The game is way easier to pick up because of that. No more complicated ways to get energy by making complicated dungeons and you can satisfy your bloodlust right away to your hearts content while your minions happily doing the gathering.

The story is filled with silly references to give you some good shuckles. It's a very light story which is hard to take serious filled with references to other games. Personally I found it quite entertaining.

The combat is a bit messy. Your army like to run out like brainless individuals, not caring whether their ally is under attack or million miles apart and it makes it quite hard to succesfull target a specific unit in a heat of a real battle.

All in all, I'd advice this game to anyone who enjoys the slapstick humor and references. It's, in my opinion, the best thing of the whole game. If you're more into serious organized and well balanced gameplay and combat. Then you might want to pass on this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093302153', 'num_games_owned': 688, 'num_reviews': 823, 'playtime_forever': 1067, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1067, 'last_played': 1512856757}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198049868043', 'num_games_owned': 268, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 352, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 352, 'last_played': 1509200868}
review:
[h1]Классная игра... Но только не за такую цену[/h1]

Сразу к вопросу о рекомендации к покупке. Нет, не рекомендую, если Вам её не подгоняют бесплатно или, скажем, за 5 рублей, тогда можно взять. Теперь перейдем к тому, почему такая оценка.

Сама по себе игрушка по началу даже ничего, интересная, веселая, задорная. Сразу бросается в глаза мультяшная графика и сатирическая озвучка, которая в какой-то мере "спасает" игру. Вы в роли Абсолютного зла, которое не может нормально существовать и поэтому ему приходится приходить к помощи тупоголовых идиотов, которые ничего толком нормально делать не могут. Каждый воин или кто бы там он ни был, требует что-нибудь или не требует, но все же, когда дело доходит об исследовании или создании чего-то, то им срочно нужно погулять. Тролли и вообще основные боевые единицы передвигаются так медленно, что можно пойти сделать чай, пока они дерутся или идут на другой конец карты. А идти Вам обязательно придется, ведь вдруг внезапно Вас убьют! Битвы сами по себе достаточно скучны и надоедают быстро. Обустройство подземелья из миссии в миссию тоже надоедает, меняется разве что карта и стратегия победы, остальное такое же однообразное.

Если быстренько подвести итог, то можно сказать, что игра не рыба, ни мясо. Быстро надоест, достаточно недолгая кампания, которую я даже не допрошел до конца. На вечерок сойдет, но не более. Найдите за 435 рублей игру получше этой. Ну или если обзоры не впечатлили, то Вы должны обязательно вернуть деньги. В случае, если хочется игру в коллекцию, то только по скидке или на халяву.

[i]Вообще задумка неплоха, но можно было и лучше сделать.[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198092766815', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 3328, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2172, 'last_played': 1688824454}
review:
Играя за Абсолютное Зло нам нужно уничтожить альянс людишек, убивать единорогов, разрушать деревни фей, срубить древо жизни и даже устроить кроваво красную свадьбу Джоффри (да-да, тому самому). В игре множество отсылок к сериалам, фильмам и другим играм, даже наги имеют имена вроде Лэд-Гага и Кардашь-шьян, что порой очень забавно. Все наши действия сопровождаются коментариями, подсказками и шуточками невероятно крутого рассказчика. А чтобы проиграть, нужно ооочень постараться. Игра легко проходится, не напрягает и оставляет массу положительных эмоций.
Копай золото, создай свою армию зла, строй ловушки, выходи на поверхность и круши все на своем пути, расслабься и играй в Dungeons 2.

author: {'steamid': '76561197975525971', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1668, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 424, 'last_played': 1528010228}
review:
Den eigenen Dungeon bauen und beherrschen ... nur diesmal ganz anders.

Obwohl Dungeons II viele Ideen vom berühmten Dungeon Keeper aufgreift geht das Spiel seinen eigenen Weg. Die Anzahl der Einheiten ist begrenzt. Pro Seite stehen euch nur 5 Einheitenklassen zur Verfügung, die sich allerdings im späteren Spielverlauf zu mächtigeren Versionen aufwerten lassen. Dazu können sie mit Abzeichen ausgerüstet werden, wodurch sie zusätzlich einen dauerhaften Bonus erhält. Insgesamt fühlen sich eure Einheiten wesentlich wertvoller an, da sie nicht automatisch in euren Dungeon kommen, sondern jeweils für einen gewissen Betrag gekauft werden müssen. Auch aufallend: Es gibt ein Einheitenlimit, wie man es aus machen Strategiespielen kennt. Dadurch ist es wichtig eine funktionierende Ballance zwischen den Einheiten zu finden, so dass der kontinuierliche Ausbau eures Dungeons gesichert ist.
Was Dungeons II dabei von ähnlichen Spielen abhebt ist die Möglichkeit mit seinen Kreaturen die Oberwelt zu erobern. Dabei ändert sich die Steuerung, so dass sich eure Kreaturen an der Oberfläche, wie für ein Strategiespiel typisch, mit der Maus gezielt bewegen lassen und auf eure Befehle warten. In euren Dungeon beschäftigen sie hingegen, wie gewohnt, selbst und bringen ihre Fähigkeit in den zur Verfügung stehenden Räumen ein. Für diesen Wechsel zwischen Ober- und Unterwelt stehen euch zwei Karten zur Verfügung, so dass ihr jederzeit das Geschehen über und unter der Erde verfolgen und notfalls durch den gezielten Einsatz von Fähigkeiten einschreiten könnt. Untermalt wird dieser Wechsel zudem mit einer sehr hellen und farbenfrohen Oberwelt, welche im Kontrast zum eher düsteren, aber dafür gemütlichen Dungeon, steht.
Leider betrifft diese übertriebene, heitere Stimmung auch den Erzählstil. So sind die Dialoge zwar gut gemacht, jedoch fällt es dem Erzähler schwer einige Minuten ruhig zu bleiben und er erinnert regelmäßig an die zu erledigende Aufgaben. Hier wäre etwas weniger mehr gewesen, besonders wenn man die in der Kampagne neu erworbenen Räume oder Fähigkeiten ausprobieren möchte, anstatt sich gleich auf die nächsten Gegner zu stürzen.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971348411', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1016, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1015, 'last_played': 1513204045}
review:
Als ich dies Spiel mal eben ausprobieren wollte, ging es mir gesundheitlich nicht so gut... aber schon nach ein paar Minuten Spielspass verbesserte sich meine Stimmung zunehmendst ! Es ist lustiger und besser als ich erwartet habe. Endlich konnte ich mal den blöden Barden verkloppen, der mir ständig mit seinem Gedudle auf den Nerv ging... ich kann diesen wiederliche süßen Kaninchen und blöden bunten Einhörner endlich den garaus machen... den Paladin die Kekse klauen und endlich mal richtig böööse sein!  Dem Erzähler zur Weißglut bringen, weil ich nicht das mache was er will  :D Köstlich ! Und nebenbei noch den ganzen versteckten Reverenzen zu all möglichen Spielen, Filmen , Serien, Büchern usw.  lauschen.
 - Definitiv sein Geld wert ! -

author: {'steamid': '76561198301344324', 'num_games_owned': 582, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 3147, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1712, 'last_played': 1520393024}
review: Capo. Una sola cosa no más quería decirte, me agradó mucho tu juego, en serio, es de lo más sensacional que he visto por el momento, es una obra de arte, sin exagerar, es algo que, a simple vista, podría haber sido hecho por el mismísimo Da Vinci, la genialidad que tiene se puede notar desde kilómetros de distancia, ni siquiera la peor de las malas lenguas podría decir que no nos encontramos ante una majestuosidad vista una sola vez cada mil años. No he visto en todos mis años de vida algo de esta magnitud, te provoca una sensación indescriptible, una alegría inmensa a pesar de no haber hecho acción alguna, un sentimiento raro de encontrar pero fantástico, algo así como lo que se siente una brisa en un caluroso verano, o ver la alegría de un niño al abrir sus regalos de navidad, o simplemente estar con esa persona que tanto queremos. No hagas caso a las malas lenguas que critican sin cesar a cualquiera que no cumpla con absolutamente todas sus expectativas, solo créeme a mi y a todos aquellos seres que consideran y admiran a tan grandiosa obra de arte. Siempre va a haber personas que te van a decir que lo que hiciste no tiene valor, pero el secreto está en ignorarlas, esas personas darían lo que fuera por haber creado algo tan magnífico como lo que estamos viendo. Así como Dios en su infinita sabiduría creo la humanidad, o así como un hombre enamorado crea un poema para expresar sus más profundos sentimientos, o como un pintor crea una obra de arte de algún tiempo que ni siquiera él conoce, así es como fue creado este juego, de la misma forma. Puede parecer que estoy exagerando, repito, pero no es así, ni de cerca, exageraría si dijese que no me encuentro ante una creación admirable, increíble, de una belleza de proporciones bíblicas. De hecho estoy tan encantado con semejante aporte que decidí escribir un poema al respecto, se titula "mis ojos te lo agradecen", aquí va: -"Mis ojos te lo agradecen, ya que han sido acariciados, mis sentimientos te alaban, ya que han sido despertados, mi corazón te idolatra, porque lo has hecho bailar, y mi ser te dice gracias, por tan delicioso manjar, estaré esperando nuevamente, que me compartas tu alegría, aún en medio de la noche, o en el más radiante día, solo sigue creando, creando hasta que las manos pesen, así te diré nuevamente, mis ojos te lo agradecen"-. Espero que hayas disfrutado mi poema tanto como yo disfruté escribiéndolo, te diría que lo disfrutes como yo disfruté tu juego, pero no creo que haya situación en el mundo que se asemeje a tanta dicha. Para terminar siendo breve, te quería agradecer de corazón, uno en esta vida se encuentra con situaciones que lo ponen de malas, piensa que no va a encontrar nada bueno en estos días y de repente se encuentra con algo así, es difícil decidir donde uno va a dejar sus puntos, y de hecho ya cansa denunciar la mayoría de los juegos que ve, siento que muchos son creados por trolls y personas con ganas de molestar, nada que ver con lo que estamos observando, aquí uno piensa todo lo contrario, simplemente lo ve y se dice a si mismo "no debe haber lugar en esta tierra, ni en el cielo ni en el inframundo, ni en otros planetas, galaxias o universos, donde sea mejor dejar mis puntos, he encontrado la verdadera Atlantida, aunque no sea un lugar físico, su simple belleza es suficiente para no titubear en hacer dicha comparación". A veces me pregunto cuanta destreza o cuanta habilidad hace falta tener para poder realizar una creación de esta índole, a veces me comparo con los creadores de hermosuras como esta y pienso que no soy si quiera un simple ser humano, al lado de dichos creadores me siento como una hormiga frente a un imponente elefante, como un peón al lado de una reina, como un niño frente a un super héroe de estas historietas que tanto gustan leer. A veces veo al cielo y pregunto "¿podré yo crear algo que, al menos, pueda compararse con este juego?" "¿podré algún día ser tan genial, tan creativo y talentoso como el creador de esto?" "¿que debe hacer uno en esta vida para conseguir tanta genialidad?" pero por mucho que pregunte y pregunte, jamás consigo respuesta. Sueño a veces que despierto y delante de mí, junto a mi cama, se encuentra un juego como este, pero en mi sueño el juego tiene algo diferente, el creador soy yo. Sí, se que parece una locura, algo tan glorioso como esto no puede ser creado por un simple ser como yo, pero no hay que olvidar que se trata solo de un sueño. Si pudiera pedir un deseo, ese sería que este juego jamás saliera de la home, que las futuras generaciones puedan observar su magnificencia y llenarse de dicha con lo que ven, llenarse de felicidad, de locura, de pasión... Si todos los juegos del mundo fueran como este, no habría guerras, no habría dolor, olvido, tristeza. Levantaríamos la cabeza y entonando un canto al unísono, cual coro de arcángeles diríamos: "yo creo en el mañana"

author: {'steamid': '76561198058689288', 'num_games_owned': 831, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 2800, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2779, 'last_played': 1527322947}
review:
Dungeons 2 — это игра в жанре стратегии. Лорд Подземелий вернулся и на этот раз он серьезен как никогда! Помогите герою осуществить свою месть, собрав команду жутких монстров со всех уголков подземного мира. На сей раз Лорду будет недостаточно прибрать к рукам подземный мир — он также намерен подчинить себе и верхний мир, населенный людьми.

Управляя могучим Лордом, организуйте целую сеть уникальных и жутких подземелий. Заручитесь поддержкой наводящих ужас созданий и примите командование двумя новыми фракциями. Приготовьтесь защитить свое Королевство от назойливых героев, затем поднимитесь наверх и обрушьте свой гнев на населенные людьми города. Управляйте своими приспешниками с помощью «Длани Ужаса — отдавайте команды и раздавайте пощечины, чтобы держать их в повиновении.

review:
Dungeons 2 is great. I made a video with the good and the bad. Here it is:

https://youtu.be/Yke4v-EEGAU

Too long, didn't watch? Dungeons 2 does good by Dungeon Keeper's legacy and adds a strategy spin literally on top of it. It's an excellent game with a main campaign that's too easy and a DLC Undead campaign that's too hard. Totally worth the money, though.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986132958', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1017, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1000, 'last_played': 1511618345}
review:
I bought Dungeons 2 because I wanted to re-experience 
that old feeling of Dungeon Keeper.

It started out good, the gameplay felt exactly the same, but after 2 hours of playing I realized that
I had run out of new things to try.

Now in the old Dungeon Keeper, you had many different creatures you could attract, and you could play agains both heroes and other dungeon keepers.
In Dungeons 2, there are 5 different creatures, yes 5. in your dungeon.
there is only one good way to build your dungeon and win you dont have to make choices. I promise you after 2-3 maps you will feel like youre just repeating yourself in a horrible way.

You only play against heroes, never another dungeon, and the multiplayer is dead.
I tried 'quick join' and just sat there and starred at the screen for 30 minutes before realising I would never join a game.

Conclusion: the first 1-2 campaign maps will give you that dungeon keeper feel. Then you will realise you are missing 90% of the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197976261452', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3342, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3321, 'last_played': 1511704552}
review:
+ Mischung aus Dungeon Keeper und Warcraft 3
+ Erzähler 
+ Anspielungen auf eine aktuelle Top-Serie
+ DLC: A Game of Winter
+ Unterschiedliche Gameplays mit den drei "Völkern"
+ Sieht ansprechend aus

- Wenn man den dreh raus hat, dann wird es manchmal langatmig
- DLC: die anderen sind nur Gefechtskarten und ohne Erzähler, da merkt man dann, wie wichtig er überhaupt ist :) 

Fazit:
Klare Kaufempfehlung für alle Dungeon Keeper Fans, aber auch für Fans der Aufbaustrategie.

author: {'steamid': '76561198410743806', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 329, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1520758797}
review: Отличная игра , дружелюбный интерфейс , сюжетная компания просто 12 из 10 маст хэв , признаться честно когда вышла у друга в пиратскую играл , потом увидев в Стиме купил сразу и не о чем не жалею . Немного обидно что ААА проэкты с сюжетом уровня сочинения в детском садике продаются лучше чем сие ШЭДЕВАР . Рекомендую к покупке (p.s.Разрабы игры любитя стебаться над другими вселенными ,очень улыбнули некоторые шутки)

author: {'steamid': '76561198010200356', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 13140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5110, 'last_played': 1702326189}
review: Il degno successore di Dungeon Keeper, divertente e pieno di citazioni. Per goderselo appieno praticamente obbligatori i DLC. Peccato che a game of winter, che completa la campagna principale, forse un filino troppo facile, sia invece  decisamente difficile. Gli altri DLC sono delle serie di mappe dove si può scegliere la razza e la difficoltà oltre ad altri parametri. Nel complesso, soprattutto se scontato, un acquisto obbligato per tutti i nostalgici del capolavoro di Molineaux.

review:
Makes no sense. click to select unit. right clictk to select to destination. Very quiclky, nowhere to go and these bloats swiping at me. Can't get to them. Very poor design. I'm sure your game is very genius, but how do  I go get them? Dumb waste of money.

I expected to be bulding a dungeon against adventurers. Instead, there's just a boring town where nobody can hurt me, and a castel. Nothing  I click does anything to move the game forward. What's the magic click to keep playing? Waste of money. Poor game design.

author: {'steamid': '76561198159731747', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 480, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 471, 'last_played': 1508551461}
review: Dungeons 2 ist ein sehr unterhaltsames Spiel mit einem etwas schrägen, manchmal recht albernen Humor, einer netten, comichaften Grafik und einem interessanten Gameplay. Man baut einerseits in Echtzeit unterirdisch seine Basis aus, während man sich periodisch erfolgenden Kämpfen mit Truppen und Fallen zur Wehr setzen muss, andererseits geht man oberirdisch selbst in die Initiative, wobei dort reine Echtzeitstrategie ohne jeglichen Aufbau gefragt ist. In seinen besten Momenten erinnert Dungeons 2 an Warcraft 3. Für einen nicht allzu hohen Preis empfehle ich das Spiel auf jeden Fall mal anzuspielen, am besten gleich online mit oder gegen Freunde.

author: {'steamid': '76561198238252608', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 5190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1465, 'last_played': 1511609778}
review:
[h1]Du hast das alte [b]Dungeon Keeper[/b] geliebt?[/h1]
Dann brauchst du nicht weiter lesen und darfst direkt zum Einkauf über gehen!

Ich habe auch [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/230190/War_for_the_Overworld/]War for the Overworld[/url] gespielt. Es war nicht schlecht aber [b]Dungeons II[/b] macht vieles besser.

Es versucht nicht krampfhaft an den alten Erfolg von DK anzuknüpfen sondern hat versucht dieses "Genre" weiterzuentwickeln, mit Erfolg wie ich finde!

Dazu eine salzige Prise schwarzen Humor, popkulturelle Referenzen und ganz ernst nimmt Calypso sich selber nicht.

Einfach [b]legen[/b] ...Es kommt gleich... [b]där![/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198183167599', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 1326, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 742, 'last_played': 1636039846}
review:
Симс для парней или симулятор обустраивания холостяцкой берлоги.

Для начала хочется поблагодарить создателей за отлично проработанный внешний мир, отсыпать похвалы лвл дизайнеру, нашему дубляжу, музыке и в принципе лору данного проекта. Все на хорошем уровне и придется по вкусу любому непритязательному игроку, которому не плевать на жанр стратегии. 
Отличный интерфейс, удобное управление, хорошо озвученный даже в русском дубляже голос, направляющий игрока и двигающий повествование с мертвой точки, не забывающий подгонять любителей благоустраивать свое подземелье сутки напролет. Юморная стратегия, с красивым гейм дизайном, милыми орками, гномами, нагинями и прочей нечестью и Вы, игрок, в роли длани зла, сеяющей страх и разрушение на своем пути, что может быть лучше? 

10 мертвых единорогов из 10!

author: {'steamid': '76561198031441304', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 960, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 740, 'last_played': 1508303905}
review:
Muy buen juego, algo corto pero divertido, durante el juego, tendremos un narrador que, obviamente, nos irá contando los sucesos de cada capítulo según vayamos avanzando, pero también servirá de guía si nos quedamos atascados. Si en algún momento realizamos una acción contraria a la que deberíamos hacer, como ir por otro camino y meternos de lleno en una emboscada, o tardamos mucho tiempo en cumplir determinado objetivo, hará algún comentario al respecto o chascarrillo, generalmente burlándose un poco del Señor del Mal.

Durante sus momentos de parloteo, podremos identificar en sus palabras (y en otros aspectos del juego), referencias a libros, series o películas, desde la descripción del agujero hobbit de Tolkien hasta el “legendario” de Barney Stinson en Cómo conocí a vuestra madre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198075640662', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 2445, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 973, 'last_played': 1593178724}
review:
Ich habe den ersten Teil bereits gespielt, und fand ihn eine nette Abwechslung. Allerdings war der noch darauf ausgelegt, nur Gegner abzuwehren. Diesen Teil, Teil 2, habe ich durch eine Aktion von Humble Bundle erhalten und habe ihn mir angesehen. Also hier, meine Meinung:

Die Kampange: ... ist viel viel kürzer als in Teil 1, aber dafür um ein viel faches witziger, da eine ganze Menge bekannter "Legenden" der RPG Spiele und Fantasy Filme & Serien nach allen Regeln der bösartigen Kunst parodiert werden. 

Die Spielmechanik: ... ist auch ganz anderst als in Teil 1. Weg von der Tower Defense, hin zu einem richtigen Grabe und Baue  Simulator. Jetzt können wir endlich den Dungeon so gestalten wie wir es wollen. Und wenn uns diese Quälgeister von Helden zu sehr auf den Geist gehen, gehen wir eben die Treppe endlich nach oben und verhauen sie in ihrem eigenen Keller. Jetzt ist Schluss mit dem Dungeon-Crawlen. Zurück zum altmodischen Raiden!

Die Beteiligten: ... Ohne Synchronsprecher, wird alles im Deutschen von niemand geringerem als Monty Arnold (zumind. im Deutschen), der bereits in Deponia seinen Sarkasmus unter Beweis stellen konnte. Eine gute Wahl, wie ich finde.

So, das ist der Grobe Umriss, Zeit für das Ergebnis:
Die Spielmechanik hat sich im Gegensatz zu Teil 1 auf jeden Fall verbessert, und ich habe die Kommentare von Monty Arnold wirklich genossen. 
Die Kampange war echt kurz, zugegeben und auch über den eigentlichen Preis können wir uns noch einmal unterhalten. (Als ich es damals gekriegt habe, kostete die Vollversion, ohne DLCs noch fast 50 Euro, echt Glück gehabt mit Humble Bundle)

Also ich persönlich gebe diesem Spiel einen Daumen hoch, und wer ein bisschen Spaß zwischendurch sucht, kann beruhigt zugreifen. Aber vlt. doch nochmal warten, bis es einen großen Rabatt gibt, UND ich empfehle das Zombie DLC, das noch ein weiteres Volk, und ein paar kleine weiteren Kampangen Missionen erweitert.

review:
De pequeño fui fan de Peter Molyneux; mi saga favorita era el Black and White (el 2 es de mis juegos favoritos), fui descubriendo otros tranajos suyos pasándome la trilogía Fable, jugando a l The Movies, probando el Populous y también enganchándome a los Dungeon Keeper, juegos que siempre quise volver a recordar pero adaptados a los tiempos de hoy.
Después de pasarme el modo historia del Dungeons 2 a mí personalmente me parece un heredero más que digno de los Dungeon Keeper y quizás en algunas cosas hasta mejor.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970609667', 'num_games_owned': 647, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 2033, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2033, 'last_played': 1511617636}
review:
What a great game!  I really didnt think much of the 1st game, it felt limited and didnt have that Dungeon Keeper feel. I'm not sure what happened to the dev's, but damn they turned things around.  

This game has to be the closest I have found to date that put me in mind of the old DK & DK2.  Having tried most other attempts/spiritual successors, Dungeons 2 is by far the closest anyone has come (that includes War for the Overworld).

It is exactly the type of game for a oldie like myself that wants to sit back and enjoy a dungeon sim, building up creatures, setting out rooms how I like them, mining until im content and then when im ready off to finish the mission.  The added above ground section of this game just makes it even better.  Took me a few minutes to get used to the 2 minimaps, but once I did, I really liked the Idea.

The narration is great, found myself laughing at the randomess of some of the comments and geek culture references. Not to mention the out right P take of the story.

I can honestly say that once I started playing this game I was totally hooked.  Love it.  It doesnt end with the main campaign either as there are added dlc if you want more.  Believe me, I couldnt give them my money fast enough for more of this game.

This one scores high for me (bonus for the nostalgia) 

9/10  Would slap my imp again!

author: {'steamid': '76561198048972409', 'num_games_owned': 544, 'num_reviews': 137, 'playtime_forever': 617, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 617, 'last_played': 1510687515}
review: Oyun gerçekten çok keyifli iki farklı mekanizmaya sahip strateji oynu bu tarz bir kaç oyun olmasına rağmen (construction and management simulation)  bu kadar komik ve akıcı olanı oynama şanısım olmamıştı. Bol hikayeli dlcleri var bendeki güzeldi keyifle oynadım.
