author: {'steamid': '76561197995132155', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 46722, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32214, 'last_played': 1689892890}
review:
Way more fun than I thought it would be.
The graphics are cute and cartoony.
The narrator is funny without being boring.
Just a great game.

Pros:
+ it's basically dungeon keeper
+ difficult but not too difficult
+ you get to go to the overworld
+ it has multiplayer with several MP modes
+ the variety of units is nice with upgrade options
+ it has a demon faction
+ campaign missions replayable
+ option to play demons in campaign for 1 or 2 missions

Cons:
- the tutorial is short and sweet, most people I've seen play totally missed it at first
- the missions can drag on forever
- the demon faction is not balanced vs the horde, you will need to know your stuff to counter the horde
- the undead faction should HAVE been included for multi-player :-(
- there is no option to play teams vs. AI
- there is no AI option in multi-player

Overall: more fun than I thought it would be, especially if you liked the Dungeon Keeper games.

UPDATE:
Forgot to mention I got it free as a humble bundle giveaway.
However, had I known what to expect I would have gladly purchased the game..

review: Even though I do find the price point a tad bit too high, it's a good grab when on sale. It's fun, can be played  casually  depending on mostly your mood and your mindet, and while you'd expect to mostly get a dungeon building experience, it comes bundled with some super oldschool RTS elements. It's mostly a joke on everything Warcraft and Lord of the Rings franchises ever did, and the result is a colorful, lighthearted, fun game with a lovely atmosphare.

author: {'steamid': '76561198076094874', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 2039, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2004, 'last_played': 1504429299}
review:
Я с давних времен большая поклонница Dungeons Keeper2. И эта игра тоже смогла меня покорить. 
[b]Перейду к Плюсам: [/b]
	[i]+ Юмор. Все серии подобных игр всегда имеют бесподобный юмор. Винчестеры, Слендер и еще много о ком вспомнил рассказчик.
	+ Озвучка. Она бесподобна. 
	+ Великое Зло и Абсолютное Зло. Такие разные и такие классные две стороны одного Зла. Вы можете играть за 2 разные фракции, с разными комнатами и подручными, но с одной целью – уничтожить армию альянса. 
	+ Открытый мир, подземелья. Надоели душные подземелья и постоянные враждебные гости? Отправьте армию на поверхность и разгромите близлежащие деревеньки. 
	+ Ловушки – не пройдет ни один враг. А если надоело смотреть как ваше войско разбивает гостей, то можете сами вступить в битву за свое подземелье (последнее заклинание). 
	+ Достижения. Ну и еще есть мультиплеер.
	+ Ну и главный плюс: Сюжет. Интересный, сказочный, волшебный, юмористический. Одним словом – классный. 	[/i]
[b]Ну а теперь минусы, ведь без них никак:[/b]
	[i]- Опять же сюжет, он слишком короткий. Да и комнат маловато. 
	- Мультиплеер как бы бесполезен. Играя с другом, мы не могли друг друга победить из-за ловушек. Все войска просто погибали на ловушках, и так же быстро воскрешались в больничке. Ходили туда-сюда и все, до сердца не могли добраться. 
	- Достижения. В принципе все легко получить. Все кроме «Да прибудет с вами сила». Я потратила очень много времени на это достижение, но так еще его и не выбила. Остальные же получила уже давно. 	[/i]

В целом игра очень классная. Вывод: играть стоит, особенно если вы фанат подобных игр. 

9 импов из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561197992229015', 'num_games_owned': 1184, 'num_reviews': 778, 'playtime_forever': 1481, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1481, 'last_played': 1504203642}
review:
Oh my, this game was quite long...23 hours for the campaign and the expansion (without any skirmishes or scenarios).

Dungeons 2 does A LOT of things right compared to its predecessor, but it also still has some glaring flaws. More on that later. Basically every mission has you expanding your dungeon, doing research, recruiting units and sending them to the overworld where they fight like in an RTS. Which is funny, because there's a game called "war for the overworld" and that has nothing to do with fighting on said overworld :D

The core gameplay works surprisingly well, but also, unsurprisingly, both dungeon building as well as the RTS component aren't as good as in their big role models (Dungeon Keeper and probably Warcraft III). Building a dungeon is way easier than in War for the Overworld (WftO) for example and fighting within the dungeon also works very well. Contrary to Dungeon Keeper (DK) and WftO though you will not be fighting any rival dungeon lords or alliance bastions in your dungeons -  at least not in the campaigns. Your dungeon will regularly be invaded by armies though, which you have to repell with your troops, spells and traps. Annoyingly, traps can be easily disabled if you don't pay attention and become completely worthless. Moreover, ordering your units to attack the enemy costs mana and you need to have the relevant spell researched. Otherwise you have to just pick up the desired units and drop them in front of the enemy (which in itself is difficult, since you only have small thumbnails in the creature list as well as their obscure names, but not which tier they are)...that is tedious. On the other hand, using the "rally" spell means ALL units will drop what they're doing and rush to meet the enemy (and more often than not their death). It would have been great to be able to create warbands like in WftO, so that your weaker "production units" can continue working.

What I mean by that is that Dungeons 2 has 3 unit tiers. You start at level 1 and have to manually upgrade each unit twice to get the highest tier (which isn't even the best in every instance...for example, you don't want to replace all your healers with more specialized units, so you have to be careful what and when you upgrade). Anyway, weaker units die very quickly, but you may want to keep some around to keep your production going, while the rest of your army fights the enemy off. Speaking of production: It was perhaps not the smartest idea to a) have your actual workers count towards your army cap (a separate cap would have been fine), since you do need a lot of them in the beginning to excavate, build, mine and produce, but having to rely on fighting units to keep your dungeon production going is just annoying. It's also going to cause some weird "build paths" that are just unnatural.

The rest of the game plays out on the overworld, where you can take direct command of your units...at least in theory. The goals are pretty much always the same: destroy this or kill that, but the campaigns have enough diversity to not get too boring. Sometimes you have to invade a rival dungeon, which gets messy, because you're in a dungeon, but you're also still in the overworld...but there's no minimap for it!!!! Speaking of campaigns: the "Game of Winter" DLC is probably the only one you want to buy, the others are just unvoiced scenarios that string together into "mini campaigns" so to speak. Not really worth the asking price imho, but Game of Winter has a complete 8 mission long campaign and introduces a third faction: the undead.

This brings the game to three distinct factions. All play basically the same, but have different units and traps. The undead are, in the beginning at least, the weakest however. At least in my opinion. They do not get access to a healer at tier 2 like the other 2 factions and their units do not really regenerate hit points. The other factions have healing chambers which quickly heal units up after a fight. The only real "advantage" the undead have is that their units will instead revive if they die anywhere, including the overworld. The other 2 factions have to invest more heavily into research to get to that point and even then it's a very slow process. With the undead you "only" need to research a grave yard and build enough graves and you can revive your army within 2 minutes or so. The other factions also have to drag their "dead" to the healing chambers for them to revive, which is impossible during a fight, since your workers will just run away. The undead shine later in the game with powerful ranged units and devastating aoe abilites like blizzard or bat swarm (which turns the bloodsuckers from being not used at all too absolutely overpowered).

Sadly, the AI is just terrible and your units will simply die in droves in the dungeon and require a lot of micro on the overworld. Collision and pathfinding is also a bit of an issue, with units just mindlessly walking into each other, instead of letting other units through...

Dungeons 2 offers a very funny campaign and a good expansion for a pretty low price now. I'd say it's worth it, but maybe you're just not a fan of the silly humour. Check that out beforehand, because I think that's what a lot of the enjoyment may come from. And please, devs, for the love of all that is evil implement a persistent upgrade system like in WftO in your next Dungeons game...to have to research the same stuff over and over again in the campaign is just tedious, especially since the game is SO slow to get going.

review:
Мало кто знает, что Dungeros 2 это отсылка и стеб над серией книг "Песнь Льда и Пламени", по которой снимается "Игра Престолов".
Весь список отсылок, которых я нашел(благодаря только сериалу и то, начав его смотреть только недавно - неделю назад):
[olist]
[*]СТЕНА(Оригинальная игра)
[*]DLC "A Song of Sand and Fire" - Жрица(Либо Красная женщина, либо Дейнерис) в пустене сжигает всех.
[*]DLC "A Game of Winter" - армия нежити, которая расположилась за... СТЕНОЙ, а Джон.... Пардон, Бартас Снег отправляется за дядюшкой Банжо.
[*]DLC "A Chance of Dragons" - драконы(Намек на драконов Дейнерис?)
[/olist]

author: {'steamid': '76561197980254106', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1366, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1366, 'last_played': 1503895779}
review:
Un jeu juste énorme un tantinet court pour la campagne solo je dirais 15h mais je ne prend pas toujours mon temps :)

Le narrateur est vraiment extra il ma fait marrer maintes et maintes fois avec ces citations en tout genre et le tout est bien goupillé que ce sois les graphisme ou le gameplay.

Attention  à ne pas comparer avec dungeon keeper il y a des similitudes mais ça n est pas son successeur ce jeu mérite qu on s y attarde je vous le conseillle vivement.

Ps: parfois petit bugs en solo les personnages qui se mettent à ne plus bouger et tout qui freeze redémarrez le jeu et tot ira bien n oiubliez de sauvegarder souvent votre partie et y aura aucun souci.

review:
Шикарное продолжение "той самой игры из детства, где рука в подземелье давала подзатыльники гоблинам". С хорошим юмором, своей атмосферой и простой понятной механикой. Увы, под конец приедается, так что осилить всю компанию сил не хватило.
Желающим понастольгировать по ДанженКиперу, любителям Оверлорда и тауэр-дефенс (ибо механика похожа, только можно навалять приходящим обидчикам, выйдя на поверхность) брать обязательно!

author: {'steamid': '76561198076277797', 'num_games_owned': 633, 'num_reviews': 112, 'playtime_forever': 1643, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1107, 'last_played': 1594193010}
review:
I have never played the first Dungeons game, but I have played and beaten Dungeon Keeper 2 many times and as of writing this review, I have beaten the entire campaign of Dungeons 2, so I feel comfortable writing this review.

- Excellent Aesthetic

The game looks great. I don't really need to elaborate much on this, because you can see this for yourself with screenshots and videos. All I can say is that the animations look good, the transformation of lands that you claim in the Overworld are cool to watch and overall the game is very polished aesthetically.

- The Narrator and Humor

The same man from the Stanley Parable (something I only realized after he made a reference to it), you can expect a lot of humor from him and this game is definitely a more tongue-in-cheek successor to the original Dungeon Keeper series. While I think the humor can be a bit of a downside (what are "Little Snots"? The name isn't horrible, but it isn't great, either), it's also plenty refreshing. The narrator will spend most of the game prodding you when you're being lazy and commenting humorously on the events of the game. I'm willing to bet they spent a fair amount of their budget on him alone and it shows.

Expect him to make many pop-culture references to the Lord of the Rings, Supernatural, Warcraft and so on. This game is a bit of a parody, but stands on its own two feet, as well.

- The Gameplay

There are plenty of cons that I'll get to in a minute in terms of gameplay, but if you've ever played Dungeon Keeper 2, you can expect this to play quite similarly. There are technically two groups you can play in this game, but at first you'll start off with the Horde, who are very well balanced, I feel, and the easiest to play as. The others I won't spoil, but while they are fun and quite powerful after upgrading, they are very imbalanced and easily toppled if you don't prepare plenty of traps early on and build up your forces. The more time you spend building your dungeon and playing about, the more likely it is they will be obliterated.

The Horde doesn't have this problem, however. As long as you recruit plenty of Orcs and provide a Hospital (earned in later missions), you'll be fairly safe. Later in the game it will help to also focus on traps, but unlike the second faction you can play as, you won't be in any immediate danger if you just avoid taking huge risks like digging out obvious spider nests underground or antagonizing the Overworld faction too much (called The Alliance).

Now I'd like to talk about a few cons of the game. Specifically, I'd like to state that while it's a very close Dungeon Keeper game, it is a bit lacking. Not enough that I'd say "don't get this game" because it's totally worth getting, at least the base game, which I've enjoyed immensely. What's lacking, though, is a sense of progress. You recruit a lot of factions, but the game feels like it cuts off to encourage you to buy the DLC. There's a third faction that they clearly sectioned off behind DLC and your character, "The Ultimate Evil" never fully recovers his form. [[[REDACTED]]] It's a fun dungeon-building/RTS game (the RTS part comes in when you toss your minions out into the Overworld, where you control them to destroy the Alliance buildings and forces).

I'll summarize as quickly as possible in a TL;DR.

Pros:

- Great Dungeon-building, plenty of units and upgrades to keep things fresh.
- Enjoyable humor, excellent narrator (from the Stanley Parable).

Cons:

- Felt a little (and I stress the word "little" as much as I can) cut off and intentionally unfinished. You get a resolution to one problem, but it's clear the DLC is where the rest of the game is finished.
- Second controllable faction is unbalanced and can be hard to start off as. I hear the third faction in the DLC is even harder, but I haven't purchased that yet (though I very likely will).

I recommend this game. Absolutely. Even without the resolution to the story that I wanted, it had a decent one and I really enjoyed playing it. I say that even after playing one of the levels as the second faction and getting obliterated early on because of its imbalanced start, so I'm praising the game even while I'm frustrated by it. That should give you an idea of how much I enjoyed it.

I don't know if I'd recommend it at full price, but $15-20 on sale? Yeah, sure. Definitely worth that. I'm eager to try out the DLC when I can get it. Hopefully it isn't as frustrating as I've heard and offers a finale to the story that is really needed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063257143', 'num_games_owned': 455, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 1779, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1594, 'last_played': 1507681561}
review: Pretty fun mix of an RTS like warcraft and dungeon keeper

author: {'steamid': '76561198041990871', 'num_games_owned': 882, 'num_reviews': 254, 'playtime_forever': 163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 163, 'last_played': 1503291573}
review:
The best part about this game is the narrator. The concept of the game is great, but could have been better executed.The gameplay is alright, but not great. The AI that controls the minions is really bad at times. 

The idea of building traps in the dungeon is great, until an invading unit can nullify all of the traps he walks over. This means I have to have some attacking minions in the dungeon and some in the overworld doing the story part of the missions. I would rather build up the dungeon a bunch, then go raid the overworld, not have to split up my very limited units between two places. 

Overall I wanted to like the game, but after a couple missions it just got tedious to keep playing.

author: {'steamid': '76561197964867567', 'num_games_owned': 259, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 1374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1374, 'last_played': 1502849596}
review:
The easiest way to review Dungeons 2 is to say that it is clearly trying to mimic the style, gameplay, and humor of the Dungeon Keeper series by Bullfrog Productions, and succeeds admirably. If you've ever wanted DK3, you'll feel like you finally got your wish playing this game.

The original Dungeon Keeper series placed you in the role of the villain, building a mighty underground fortress populated by foul creatures ready to destroy any foolhardy "heroes" that came calling. It was a humorous and engaging take on RTS. Dungeons 2 starts there, and adds on an "overworld" element; your minions can leave your dungeon, and when they do are controlled like a traditional RTS game. The narrator (voiced by the amazing Kevan Brighting) is great from beginning to end, and there are other bits of humor throughout the game, such as the spell and upgrade descriptions or the names of the Naga that fight for you.

The campaign was enjoyable, and there are plenty of maps available for skirmish or multiplayer, if you want more after you've completed it. The one annoyance I had with the game were the couple of missions that placed you in charge of another faction; they seemed tacked on as an afterthought, and felt like they should have either been a second campaign entirely or simply removed.

Full disclosure: I did receive this for free as part of a Humble Bundle giveaway. That said, I'm looking forward to buying Dungeons 3.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031771958', 'num_games_owned': 1712, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1861, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 577, 'last_played': 1535043641}
review:
Un gioco ironico, complesso, vario e... lento!
Dungeons 2 e' un misto di gestionale e RTS, con le migliori caratteristiche dei due generi. La voce narrante in italiano e' meravigliosa, ironica e sempre presente. La trama e' 'cattiva' ma senza scadere nei contenuti per adulti e il gioco in se diventa adatto anche ai bambini. Per i fan degli RTS con tante unita' decisamente non e' il gioco ideale. Qui al massimo se ne comandano qualche decina. Il gioco non e' difficile e in generale per vincere occorre molto tempo. Le sfide della AI non sono eccezionali, basta sapersi difendere e in realta' prima o poi ogni schema si riesce a finire. 
Nel complesso un ottimo gioco, soprattutto se ottenuto a un prezzo inferiore rispetto a quello del negozio.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047954730', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 1848, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1156, 'last_played': 1518983353}

author: {'steamid': '76561198030947036', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 920, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 158, 'last_played': 1506962420}
review: Rispetto al diretto concorrente (War For The Overworld), più user friendly e localizzato in italiano. Per quanto riguarda il gameplay, rimane un clone dei DK, e ben sappiamo che, sia per nostra nostalgia, sia per differenze nel gioco, nessuno di questi cloni raggiungerà mai l'epicità dell'originale. Detto questo, godibile se trovato in sconto o gratis (lo ho preso su H. Bundle gratis con un loro bundle) per qualche oretta di campagna spensierata, giusto per staccare da giochi più impegnativi. Il diretto concorrente rimane leggermente più interessante e più simile, anche per grafica, a DK, ma la mancata localizzazione fa perdere molto.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002913302', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 5175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4087, 'last_played': 1566484376}
review:
Dungeons 2 is a dungeon management meets real-time strategy game. You are the Ultimate Evil who tries to rid the world of those pesky goody-two-shoes like elves, dwarves and “heroes” who live on the surface and regularly invade your dungeon to steal your gold. You fight back with your evil horde consisting of orcs, goblins, trolls and snake-like nagas which you first have to train and slap into proper shape while trying to keep them [strike]fed[/strike] drunk and entertained, and mining gold to pay for it all. 

Sounds familiar? Then you are an old fart, most likely, because the original Dungeon Keeper Dungeons 2 is based on came out in 1997!  You can still play it; DK was re-published in 2011 by gog.com. DK and the equally brilliant Startopia (available on Steam) were games that for a lot of people, and certainly for me, started a live-long love of management/god games but very few games managed to strike the same balance of humour, love of detail and well-balanced game mechanics.

Dungeons 2 holds up really well as a DK clone and it adds another level, quite literally, because now you can also carry the fight to the surface and defeat these tree huggers once and for all in a campaign and several skirmish maps. On the skirmish maps, you can play either as horde or as demons with slightly different mechanics, which adds replayability.


 [h1]Dungeon[/h1] 

The dungeon management works basically the same as in Dungeon Keeper. You have to dig for gold, maintain traps, conduct research and upgrade your troupes while defending against waves of invaders. Since you have only a limited number of population points, you have to balance your need for simple workers and your different fighting units. Fighting in the dungeon consists of simply dropping your units on top of the enemy, they do the rest automatically.


[h1]Surface[/h1]

To beat a map you need to evilify the surface, i.e. defeat those hippies and replace their sickly sweet architecture bit by bit through wholesome graveyards, tentacles and freshly glowing green lakes. Fighting requires a bit more effort on your part, here. You can highlight individual units, groups*, or all of them at once and tell them where to go, whom or what to attack, and if they should use their special abilities. 

I found that working with two or three groups of tanks/melee fighters, ranged units and possibly units with special abilities worked best. Ranged units are usually relatively weak in melee combat, by ordering them to stand back a bit they are way more effective.

*[i]You form groups with ctrl + [number], then use the group with [number].[/i]


[h1]Campaign and skirmish maps[/h1]

The [b]campaign[/b] consists of [b]eleven maps[/b] that you have to beat to win, loosely connected by a story told by a narrator. He also gives you tips during the game, tells you what to do and not to do, and berates you if you don’t listen to him. I found him pretty amusing but if he talks too much for your taste you can adjust how much he says in the settings. 

I would have liked the campaign to be a little bit longer and maybe a bit more difficult. Since the first few maps double as tutorial, they are relatively easy and quick. E.g. you can’t upgrade your dungeon, so you are stuck with basic units and a relatively low max population. There are a few extra tasks during the campaign maps that make them slightly more diverse than the skirmish maps, though.

The [b]ten skirmish maps[/b] of the base game are considerably harder than the campaign. You can play as both horde and demons, and individual maps can take quite a while to beat since you usually have to upgrade your dungeon to max to win. You can adjust the difficulty and you can start with a higher dungeon level if you want to shorten the playtime a bit. 

I had a lot of fun with the skirmish maps, although they could have been a bit more diverse. Some of them are relatively similar to each other, and there isn’t any narration, either, which could have provided some unique flavour to them. 


[h1]Artstyle[/h1]

This is where Dungeons 2 really shines. There are so many great details, e.g. your evil hand makes the sign of the horns when you don’t move it around for a while, orcs do push ups when you don’t move your troupes on the surface, your minions wave at you when your hand hovers over them. It’s almost a shame you don’t have a lot of time to simply look around. There are lots of funny little details to discover, it’s obvious that a lot of love went into this game.


[h1]Conclusion[/h1]

Purists probably won’t like the fighting on the surface but, in my opinion, it provides a nice change of pace when you want it and it adds another layer of difficulty. If you liked the original, generally like the genre, or want to get more proficient at multi-tasking you can’t go wrong with Dungeons 2. It has a lot of replay value and if you ever get bored with the base game, there are two DLCs with three skirmish maps each available as well as one DLC with a completely new narrated campaign and two new playable factions (A Game of Winter).

author: {'steamid': '76561198046523434', 'num_games_owned': 173, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 1191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1191, 'last_played': 1502189227}
review:
Если в целом, то игра понравилась. Напомнила старые добрые Dungeon Keeper. Конечно, здесь не такое разнообразие всего и вся, но тем не менее играется приятно. Карту на компании проиграть в принципе не возможно, если только не сделать это специально - это не минус для такой игры, просто особенность.

Отмечу плюсом фишку с легким переключением между подземельем и поверхностью. Да и вообще бои на поверхности( в первую часть не играл).

Получил положительные эмоции и ностальгию по DK.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994833498', 'num_games_owned': 1757, 'num_reviews': 102, 'playtime_forever': 266, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 266, 'last_played': 1502146630}
review:
It's good... but not great.
On the plus, the narration is great, the story is decent, and the gameplay is a little bit unique.
It is funny to listen to the narrator get upset for taking too long,  though that makes me want to take ever longer which causes the levels to drag out much further.  That is my own doing I admit, but I can't help it.

My main gripe is that the game doesn't give you much freedom.  Everything unlocks at a specific pace.  Every plot in the story goes on a liniar path.  There is little room for you to make your own dungeon compared to say WotO and the original Dungeon Keeper.  Unit varation is very bare bones.   So I suggest the game,  just not at full price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037988877', 'num_games_owned': 240, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 221, 'last_played': 1519505419}
review:
Na, wer stammt auch noch aus der guten alten Dungeon Keeper Zeit? Also ich jeweils nicht, aber dennoch hat mich Dungeons 2 mit seinem tollem, dem Original nach empfundenen, Spielkonzept und Humor gefesselt.

In Dungeons 2 spielt man den so genannten Keeper eines Dungeons, der seine Lakeien antreibt ihm Reichtum anzuhäufen und das Gute und dessen Helden aus seinem Dungeon verzuhalten. Um dies zu bewerkstelligen lässt man seine Arbeiter Gold abbauen, baut spezielle Räume für seine Ungeheuer und hebt eben diese aus um sie gegen das Gute antreten zu lassen. In der Kampagne wird man von einem Sprecher begleitet, der einen mit blendendem Humor gerade anfangs jeden Schritt auf der Karriereleiter des bösen erklärt und dabei hilft ein richtiger Lord der Finsternis zu werden.

Von der Story will ich ungern zu viel verraten und lege nur jedem ans Herzen dieses begnadete Spiel einmal selbst zu spielen. Klare Kaufempfehlung!

author: {'steamid': '76561198063920099', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 94, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1501876115}
review:
Well, let's see.
The controls suck, for the mopst part. Clicking on what you want tends to be very hit and miss with sweet spots being very small. A glowing indicator on the hand is helpful but also doesn't do much. Not only that, but deleting characters may be the most cumbersome I've ever seen in a game.
Click the character to pick them up with a slight delay, drag them to the throne room and then try your best to hover them in the five pixels above a pit where you can click and drop them which then takes a few seconds. Couple this with the inability to freeze time while enemies are constantly invading your dungeon, and you have a frustrating time.
Now, if the game was just a dungeon maker, it would be a bit dull since there isn't much to it overall, but it also includes squad RTS in the overworld. Now, if this was by itself when you head out, it would be okay. But your dungeon can be attacked WHILE in the overworld or in a cave or a castle and switching back to the dungeon is a pain unless the throne room is attacked, and then you need to hope everyone gets there in time or drag them quickly.
Now, in the midst of this, the game has the worst tutorials possible.
"We want to teach you how goblin assassins can turn invisible and sneak past enemies but there's a time limit based on energy, so don't ever look away from them. Also, our dungeon is under attack again and your orcs are in a cave far from it and will never make it in time while switching out of the goblin assassin will kill him and you'll have to start over."
Any tutorial level where you can fail multiple ways out of your control is a terrible tutorial.

Overall, the game is mediocre at best. If you got it for free, congratulations. Still not worth playing.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983033252', 'num_games_owned': 846, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 1399, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1398, 'last_played': 1501677243}
review:
[h1] TL;DR review	[/h1]

[b] Liked: [/b] Good RTS with phenomenal narrator. Got this free from Humble Spring Sale.
[b] Didn't like: [/b] Intro was dull.
[b] How much should I pay for this game? [/b] Less than 3€. (23 hours to complete the game /10). After all, I got it for free...

[h1] Score	[/h1]

Gameplay: 8/10
Story: 9/10
Music & Sound: 7/10
Graphics: 8/10
Narrator: 10/10
Replayability: 6/10

[h1] Score: 8/10	[/h1]
 
The best thing here is the narrator. All the stories are made in tongue in cheek, mocking everything related to the fantasy genre, especially Game of Thrones. The gameplay itself is old classic dungeon keeper, where you build your dungeon, set up traps for the enemy and prepare your army to conquer the surface and the realm. The story is little less 20 hours long (some might beat it much faster). I played only the campaign so I don't know about the skirmish or how the multiplayer works.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122737955', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1498933811}

author: {'steamid': '76561198274202366', 'num_games_owned': 94, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 902, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 862, 'last_played': 1589373783}
review:
14小时通关战役模式，我觉得这速度可以的了，看见别人都22小时以上，我就很开心，嘿嘿，说正题。
推荐这个游戏，
第一，支持地下城系列游戏，毕竟已经很少看见或者有新的了。
第二，策略游戏赛高，不解释。
第三，可以忽略的旁白，虽然声音很好，但是，还是建议忽略掉，玩你的游戏好了。反正你也看不完，也看不懂。。。
第四，没有英文虽然是弊端，但是，还是可以通关的，毕竟战役模式和新手模式差不多，也是层层递进的。（不会的话，当前战役全技能解锁就好了）
第五，免费游戏可以让人玩那么久，证明这游戏不是免费无聊的游戏，可以一试（不用想了没中文的了，人家都免费游戏了，哪有钱翻译啊？？？）
等等
一周目成就没全刷完很难受，我还会回来的！！！！！！！

review: Aunque no jugue la primera entrega puedo decir que me sorprendio gratamente este juego y me recordo un poco los años en que jugue warcraft 3; de por si es un juego de estrategia que sabe combinar bn lo que es el humor junto con una interesante historia sobre todo el narrador mas de una carcajada te sacara aunque OJO el juego en la historia principal no te durara mas de 15 horas en total, tanto su modo multijugador tambien llega a divertir al jugarlo con amgos. Si te lo llegas a topar en oferta es mas que recomendado, yo tuve la suerte de encontralo en esa ofertas de humble store que lo dieron de manera gratuita asi que si lo llegas topar de nuevo gratis mucho mejor

review: A tribute to the good old Dungeon Keeper. Easier and more streamlined than War for the Overworld (Which is, on the other hand, much more true to the original DK), but tremendously enjoyable, provided that you're willing to withstand some of the dankest jokes ever featured in an entertainment product.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080316691', 'num_games_owned': 206, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 6564, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4262, 'last_played': 1619787398}
review: An interesting take on DK. I like what the developers have done with the idea of combining warcraft with dungeon keeper, the latter being the dominant part in the mix. My only gripe is that skirmishes can last a little too long.

author: {'steamid': '76561198110339723', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2261, 'last_played': 1637414168}
review:
던전키퍼의 아류작. 
아류작이라서 나쁘다는게 아니고 아류작이라도 플레이 할 수 있어서 행복하다.
던전키퍼가 음침한 던전에서 쿰척쿰척하며 인싸 애들이 쳐들어 오는 것을 막는데 포커스를 뒀다면,
던전스 시리즈는 던전에서 쿰척쿰척하며 쳐들어온 인싸애들을 막고 더 나가 인싸 세상을 정ㅋ벅ㅋ 해야 한다.

이게 조금 아쉽다. 
던전에 쳐들어온 건방진 인싸애들을 감옥에 가두고 사나운 채찍질로 타락시켜 부하로 삼는 던전키퍼의 재미가... 없다는게...

author: {'steamid': '76561198055039801', 'num_games_owned': 140, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 329, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 329, 'last_played': 1501155808}
review:
Dungeons 2 — это наглядный пример того, как можно и нужно делать работу над ошибками. Не слишком удачная первая часть была пересобрана заново, и в итоге на свет появилась пусть и неидеальная, не слишком хорошо оптимизированная, но все равно очень яркая, веселая и увлекательная игра.

Плюсы: интересный игровой процесс; возможность управлять бойцами и выполнять квесты на поверхности; сюжетная кампания, сдобренная юмором и иронией; отличная озвучка и музыка.
Минусы: игра плохо оптимизирована.

author: {'steamid': '76561198341493220', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1804, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1804, 'last_played': 1482984123}
review: Semplicemente sensazionale. Il narratore onniscente è qualcosa di magnifico con molte battute che richiamano film, serie tv e altri giochi. Definitivamente raccomandato.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967431446', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1838, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1709, 'last_played': 1507589177}
review:
Great sequel ! Total revamp of Dungeons 1.

Dungeons 2 is a mix between Warcraft 3 and Dungeons 1 to made things short.

Dungeons 1 was great but i don't know why, i was falling asleep after 30 minutes. But Dungeons 2 solved that emptyness with a great narrator who bring death to that omnipresent silence who flooded his 1st sequel. The game is fast paced now, you have plenty to spent and you have actions each minutes. Multiple layered maps, so you can go outside to cause chaos and comeback to your dungeon to heal and upgrade. Now you have control of your creatures, they are no more stupid ai who protect their spawn points. 

I think Dungeons 3 will be a mix between Dungeons 1 and Dungeons 2 with VR integration.

I hope hardcore gamers will give a try to Dungeons 2, espacially if they love Wacraft 3 and Dugeon Keepers.

Bump that game PlZ, i want a sequel !

review:
Ich habe die Kampagne durchgespielt und bin sehr zufrieden. Das Spiel ist eine Mischung aus Dungeon Keeper und Overlord. Der deutsche Stimme aus dem "Off" ist witzig und bringt gute Gags mit häufigen Anspielungen auf anderes "Kulturgut" (Buffy, Supernatural, Game of Thrones etc.)
Die Grafik ist zugegeben etwas angestaubt.
Das Spiel habe ich bei einer Gratis-Aktion bekommen, ich denke 29,99€ ist vieleicht etwas viel für ein "altes" Game.

review: cualquiera diria que es una copia de Dungeon Keeper... bueno la verdad es que asi es xD... en fin solo quiero jugarlo por que me gusto el juego de dungeon keeper en su  epoca.. ahora quiero un juego semenjante y este es muy bueno... en fin... es un gran juego para pasar el rato y entrenerse con las bromas del narrador y las burlas de varios juegos este mismo . es muy divertio lo recomendo a todo publico xD

author: {'steamid': '76561198101871748', 'num_games_owned': 667, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 1244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1183, 'last_played': 1500665086}
review: Las primeras pantallas están bien, pero a medida que vas avanzando necesitas más y más tiempo para pasar las siguientes haciendo lo mismo una y otra y otra y otra vez, la ultima pantalla se me hizo superpesada pero para nada dificil (aunque el juego tambien tiene algunos "bugs", como ir a destruir un castillo que esté al lado de un final de camino y quedarte atrapado en sus ruinas). Tampoco me gustan los controles, cambian mucho de forma entre dungeon y fuera de dungeon. La musica brilla por su ausencia y tenemos un narrador con unos chistes más bien malos. Los logros la mayoría fáciles aunque han metido los tipicos en los que necesitas meter muchas horas para conseguirlos como recoger un millon de oro, paso. Juego muy facil que no pasará a la gloria en mi biblioteca aunque por el precio que lo he conseguido no debería quejarme.

author: {'steamid': '76561198340006641', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 520, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 520, 'last_played': 1500673487}
review:
Hra mě velmi překvapila.
Jedná se o napodobeninu Dzngeon keepra. Hra je velmi detailně zpracovaná, z pěknou grafikou, poměrně dobrou hratelností a hlavně pěkným vtipným příběhem. U hry se opravdu často zasměju, takže to není jak ostatní strategie a hra určitě není nuda.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965408361', 'num_games_owned': 199, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1864, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1864, 'last_played': 1456329506}
review:
就很像以前的地城守護者，建設、產兵、挖礦、挖水晶、訓練妖怪，再加一點塔坊的感覺。

難度不算高，容易上手，前半段十分很有趣。但後期會覺得比較缺少戰略性，不需要戰術，多半是照順序發展就可以過關。玩到後來會有點單調，跟人類的戰爭也很好打。如果覺得難，撐下去用人海戰術就會贏。

review:
one of the few games i've finished in the recent years. 
it's a fun little game. very nice story, easy control, good graphics.
 you are an ABSOLUTE EVIL that must kill all that is good.
unlike other dungeon games, you go out to attack the surface. 

i did not got it for free. got it a lot before the HB promotion. just forgot about it (sad really).

all in all 9/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005406191', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 295, 'playtime_forever': 2384, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2384, 'last_played': 1500360770}
review:
Greetings Again!  Today I’m going to be talking about Dungeons 2 the sequel to well…dungeons…yup.  Anyway, I wasn’t secretive by my distaste of the original as it ended up feeling more like a tycoon game instead of a dungeon builder.  But!  I can say with great glee that this game is significantly better in almost every way possible.

Get out of my dungeon:  The most significant improvement right off the bat is the trashing of this ‘let the adventurers in your dungeon to be happy and steal souls stuff’.  The previous game created an environment where you basically gave the invaders what they wanted but had to chase them down before they left.  This game is much more about building a dungeon and going to the surface and killing everything; admittedly not always the most intricate missions but fun none the less.   This alone would make this game enjoyable by comparison but the game goes further.

Stop Cluttering:  Gimmicks are removed and so are spawn points; you are left with more of an evil genius style game where you mine gold, carve out space and build rooms with the ultimate goal of moving to the surface to destroy everything in your path.  The different monsters (or demons) are unique to each other and even are unique in many ways between the two factions.  I would have liked to see a third one (undead) as the story kind of hinted to it).  Instead of a theme park you are left with an underground base building game with a touch of RTS for good measure.

Stupid Penguins:  There are a few small problems; the most annoying for me is the finite amount of resources.   I am not a fan of timed games in this genre artificial or direct and this game has one for every mission.  Ultimately there is a finite amount of gold on the map and your monsters need paid about every 5 minutes.  Though it never happened during the campaign I did feel rushed on a mission or two as I enjoy exploring the map and training my monsters which ends up taking longer than more aggressive players.  There were also a few annoyances like dumping monsters into the exit can be annoying to line it up exactly (why not just have a larger exit hit-box) and clicking the top monsters can sometimes be difficult as the menu’s appearance covers a bit of the pickup icon.  It also would have been nice to just drop them on the map entrances instead; especially when you have multiple locations to spawn from and they don’t line up on both maps.  Finally, it would be nice to have maps for the mini dungeons like my dungeon or world maps.

I think you all see where this is going.  I enjoyed this game; love dungeon building games and this one had a bit of RTS mixed in and wasn’t done poorly.  So, overall, yes you should get this game.  I would even if it wasn’t on sale.  I would like to see more story and campaigns as the skirmish maps (even the DLC ones) only last me so long!  I hope you all enjoy as I did.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965519042', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3617, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3353, 'last_played': 1644757115}
review:
Ein tolles Spiel, es hat mich direkt gepackt und ich habe gerne sofort mehrere Stunden damit verbracht. 
Es fesselt einen sofort und man macht sich auch direkt Gedanken wie man die Räume anlegt und wie man weitere plant.
Sehr schön ist auch das man nicht direkt unter Zeitdruck gerät und erstmal machen kann was man will.
Der Sprecher ist einfach grandios und trägt auf jedenfall zu dem großartigen Spielerlebnis bei.

Später merkt man allerdings das das Gold nicht sehr schnell beschafft wird und man sehr viel für die Aufwertungen benötigt. Aber auch da bleibt das Spiel fair und man braucht einfach etwas Zeit und es gibt ja auch noch genug anderes zu tun.
Allerdings finde ich das man die Aufnahme der Einheiten für Aussen-Missionen verbessern könnte.

Das Spiel bereitet mir sehr viel Spass wie nur wenige andere.

Auch hoffe ich das es beim dritten (angekündigten) Teil diese angenehme Spielweise beibehält und für andere Spieler die sich etwas mehr Herausforderung wünschen einen entsprechenden Schwierigkeitsgrad anbieten.
Eine längere gute Kampagne würde ich mir auch wünschen.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992266582', 'num_games_owned': 438, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 1282, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1282, 'last_played': 1499675240}
review:
Całkiem przyjemna gra, nawiązująca do dość już starego tytułu - Dungeon Keeper .
Trochę strategii, trochę RTS, misje prowadzone przez zabawnego lektora, działa płynnie i intuicyjnie.

Tylko brakuje dodatkowych kampanii / dlc porządnych, bo te dostępne nic sensownego nie dodają do gry [ i dużo kosztują ] .

author: {'steamid': '76561198075195936', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1452, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1452, 'last_played': 1500216402}
review:
The game is not a challenge at any level.
Need more resources? Digs deeper... Going in surface in pointless.

It can not be defined as a strategic one, because you can easly win sleeping. The winning strategy is this: start the map, produce 4 units of war (2 worrior, 2 distance) and all workers. Than dig the whole map, all of it. Sometimes monsters come out from a "secret rooms", well kill them with the 4... they will always win...

Attack from heroes? No problem 4 units are enough to protect your self for a good half an hour, after increased population capacity creates other warriors and the map is over...

Traps are completely pointless (in a duangeons game!??!?!?). Of course you can create a labyrinth with traps but it is a waste of time, warriors are more than enough.

The battles on the surface to win the map? 3 healers, 1 medusa, 4/5 warriors, 2 trolls throwing stones, 2 goblins machine and you will destroy everything without ever coming close to death ...

In the end Dungeons 1 was much nicer, you had to build labyrinths, made traps and attractions and be carefull that the heroes did not die too soon otherwise you would not have accumulated points ... this game goes away miles from that kind, I do not know what they have created, but it is a pointless game. 

Loss of time and money. 3/10

review: I received this game as part of a bundle I bought a while back and played it on a whim one day.  I have to say that I absolutely love the premise of this game.  It is a combination of a world builder and a tower defense game.  All of that and you play from the villain point of view and this game is truly great.  I enjoyed it so much that it made me want more games of the same.  Sadly, there are very few games like this one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077847290', 'num_games_owned': 112, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 37, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1494672327}
review:
In theory, this is idea was clever! Moving into the endgame of a Dungeon Keeper-like management game has never been satisfying, so replacing it with an RTS battle might’ve been a good payoff--thematically appropriate too, as it connects the idea of an underground evil corrupting a totally different surface. The central idea of Dungeons 2 is a good one. As a personification of Ultimate Evil, you’re playing a Dungeon Keeper-like strategy game belowground — indirectly controlling your creatures to build rooms for efficiency, sending little imps out to find caves and gold, managing entertainment for bored creatures —all this stuff works. When you’ve got a decent little army, you send them above the ground, where it’s a conventional real-time strategy game in the Warcraft vein: direct control over troops, right-click to move and attack, and so on.

And it feels like playing Warcraft...the first one, from 1994. There’s no major strategic element--you just find enemies and smash them. Nor is there’s a significant tactical component. Things like attack-while-moving, or formations? Not present. A few units have skills, like upgraded orcs who can buff nearby units with a Battle Cry, But you’ll have to wrestle with the interface to get to them. There are hotkeys for the special skills, it turns out, but Dungeons 2 never makes this clear.

Obfuscation of important information, or poor explanation, is a consistent problem throughout Dungeons 2. It tells you what you need to do (often, and annoyingly, during the campaign) but rarely how you might go about doing it using the confusing interface. For example, on one campaign map, you have a mission to build an arena and train a unit with it. I did this, and consistently dropped my units on the new fighting pit. He or she would sit there, whack the training dummy for a while, gaining experience...and the narrator would continue to tell me I needed to train units. It turned out that by “train,” Dungeons 2 meant a much more specific use of the Arena: I had to drop the unit onto the pit, then click on the Arena and select a unit upgrade. That would get the narrator off my back… half an hour later. That was simply the most egregious example — far too much of my time was spent trying to figure out how to navigate three or more levels of maps, or why, despite clicking the “attack” button that appeared over an enemy trap, my troops were simply standing there and letting it kill them.

review: Dungeons 2 does an admirable job of channeling that old-school Dungeon Keeper feel into a new title, and fans of the series will find some enjoyable evil to be had in the dungeon-sim genre. Swapping between dungeon and overworld can make the game feel schizophrenic at times, but once you get the hang of it, it’s not a significant detractor.

review: Oczekiwałem czegoś innego. Myślałem, że gra jest podobna do War for The Overlord, tylko bardziej rozbudowana. Okazało się wręcz przeciwnie. Rozrywka jest mało dynamiczna. Rozbudowa lochu trwa długo. Stworków jest niewiele. Interferjs jest nieprzejrzysty i mało intuicyjny. Czary generalnie nieprzydatne. Komnat niewiele i ciężko skumać do czego służą. Trzeba dużo się naklikać, aby osiągnąć zamierzony efekt. Zmęczyłem kampanię i tyle. Możesz zagrać, jeżeli kupisz w dobrej cenie. Ja zapłaciłem kilkanaście złotych. Gra generalnie jest słaba i niezbyt grywalna.

author: {'steamid': '76561197975011895', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 865, 'last_played': 1709935800}
review:
I like this game.

It feels like the original, the humor works, the gameplay is decent.

It is a RTS, and somewhat classic.
You have your underworld where your basebuilding takes place, create and furnish rooms, hire creatures, upgrade and train. Most of the management in the underworld are indirect, you set a piece of ground to be demolished and a minion will do it once it has the time, (and you can slap them to work faster). In the real world there is direct control of your troops, that is not different from many other (older) RTS games. The differemce is that you have left your base, with parts (or all) of your army, but you can still be raided, so remember your traps.

Most of the humor is expressed through the narrator, that have the role of reminding you of your assignments/tasks, so you will always have an idea of what will progress the story and are both entertained and helped.

review:
Un juego divertido como pocos, se me pasaron rapido las 30 y poco horas que estuve dandole caña siendo el malo malissimo, la mismissima maldad en persona xD.

Sin duda el punto fuerte del juego es el narrador. Y esa historia absurda jaja.

Ya tengo ganas de saber como será su tercera entrega.

Si tengo que mencionar alguna pega, es que la campaña se te hace corta y te quedas con ganas de mas. Pero bueno, el juego esta a muy buen precio sobretodo cuando esta de oferta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059901454', 'num_games_owned': 419, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 210, 'last_played': 1499333555}
review:
Ambientato in un mondo fantasy, [b]Dungeons 2[/b] ripercorre il piccolo successo del primo capitolo, con la sua onnipresente ironicità e una buona profondità delle meccaniche.

Inizialmente il gioco guida il "Signore oscuro" intepretato dal giocatore in un tutorial utile per imparare tutte le meccaniche di base come la generazione delle truppe e la loro... dipartita forzata (essenziale per mantenere l'equilibrio delle varie unità), dopo un divertente preambolo veniamo guidati in una campagna Storia, non incredibilmente originale ma divertente, basata sulla guerra tra bene e male in cui noi interpreteremo la parte malvagia.

La Campagna è simpatica e permette al giocatore di scoprire tutte le truppe e il loro utilizzo, ma la modalità più giocata è sicuramente Giocatore Singolo con la creazione della propria base del male.

I [b]combattimenti[/b] sono quelli di un RTS qualsiasi, niente di eccezionale ma perfettamente tradizionale e godibile, con la possibilità di evocare i propri servitori, raggrupparli e potenziarli tramite Power up trovabili durate la costruzione del proprio Dungeon o nella mappa di gioco.

L'ilarità e la buona base RTS conferisce a Dungeons 2 un buon motivo per acquistarlo a chiuque voglia uno strategico in tempo reale non eccessivamente impegnativo, ma allo stesso tempo divertente e "tradizionale".

author: {'steamid': '76561198080344368', 'num_games_owned': 178, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 3120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2570, 'last_played': 1499082377}
review:
The game can be useful only as a time killer.
Dungeons 2 is closer to DK1-2 than its predecessors. Unfortunately, gameplay is simplified almost to a point where it feels like a tablet clicker. Excessive use of references and primitive jokes (mostly about Warcraft 3 and Game of Thrones, although there are refs to LotR, God of War and a dozen of other universes) cannot mask the shallowness. To say that campaign playstyle is linear is to compliment the game, which is further worsened by constant kicks of the narrator urging you to walk the corridor plot.
Given some writers' love it could become a pleasant parody game. Unfortunately, now it is not. Jokes aren't required to be shallow in order to be fun.

+ Consistent and quite likeable visual design. Don't expect it to have any grimness of DK though.
+ Strives to be a DK follower. A rare case.
+ At long last, surface combat
+ Two stylish races to choose from (three, if you have the Winter DLC)
+ Effective and interesting traps

- Usability is severely lacking in some places. There's no speed slider, picking several creatures one after another (or gold, or anything) quickly becomes torture - the game is rather inresponsive. The same inresponsiveness when digging or placing rooms/traps. It simply doesn't highlight things and catch mouse clicks good enough.
- Horribly slow workers. Even more so when they are carrying something. Even with all the upgrades. You will find yourself carrying gold instead of them more often than you think.
- Exploration is almost nonexistent, both on surface and underground. Unlike DK2, there are little to none interesting places or secrets on the map. At most, you will find some small constant buff to apply to one of your warriors.
- Combat is extremely simplified and mechanistic. There are unit vs unit priorities but following them requires tons of micromanaging. You will most probably ignore them and stick to microing just to keep your troops alive. The same with combat abilities - you will rarely have time to use them. Your units have no understanding of formations, so placing ranged at the back and tanks at the front (and rotating tanks) is something you will be doing with frustrating frequency (Something Warcraft 3 always tried to do for you).
- Magic is mostly useless. The last one or two "ultimate" spells are useful when the enemy will be mass-rushing you. Evac spell has some usefullness (if you have time to cast it). Direct damage spells are too weak.
- Resources on the map are limited. If you ran out of them before you complete the objective, you fail. Unlike you, the enemy has no real economics, so you can't damage it (although he has little chance to damage yours - workers will mostly flee, and rooms/traps are indestructible).
- Surface raid is "grab some soldiers, kill everything on sight, repeat". There is literally nothing on the surface except enemy units and spawner buildings. Automatic conversion of territory is fun at first, but quickly gets boring, and its only function is providing visibility (aside from visuals). No useful things, no interactable things, no neutral things. You can't even select enemy "buildings" - they are just destructible decorations, nothing more.
- The plot is a lie. The game has it, but even War of the Overworld's one is deeper. Jokes are good as spices but make up for a poor meal.

author: {'steamid': '76561198204705835', 'num_games_owned': 200, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 36, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1494642011}
review:
Este juego nos narra la historia de Jimmy, un burro con piel naranja al que discriminaban por ello. El solo queria ser como los demas(tener la piel morada). Para conseguir su objetivo se embarca en una aventura hasta el arbol magico cambia color que se encuentra en el paramo del UNO. En el camino se encuentra con los grandes amigos que le acompañaran en su aventura, Estetoscopio, el planetario gigante, Aquabona, la figurita de skylanders con vida y Sully, el ticket que le dieron en el carrefour cuando fue a por unas patatas y que resulto estar encantado y tener vida propia

La verdad me ha encantado el juego y me ha parecido impresionante y emotivo. 10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198204993356', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2357, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1970, 'last_played': 1586336892}
review:
Une véritable surprise ! Ce jeu est délicieux ! 

Les Plus : 
- Une voix OFF délirante !
- Des Seigneurs du MAL spécialisés en espèce de larbins (Orcs, Démons et Zombies)
- Des DLC vraiment intéressants 
- De l'humour parodique (genre Barthas Snow pour la référence ;) )

Les moins : 

- Des campagnes linéaires
- Des I.A peu intuitives

Ce qui fait le charme de ce jeu c'est clairment un savant dosage et une bonne pincée d'humour. 

De plus jouer Le Seigneur du Mal entouré d'incapable n'est pas sans rappeler certains jeux de plateau ;) (Dungeon Lords et Dungeon Petzs de Vlaada Chvatil) !

Pour finir, j'me suis vraiment amusée ! et je m'amuse encore !

author: {'steamid': '76561198080873939', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1804, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1752, 'last_played': 1506435665}
review:
Played only 3hrs but non stop
One of the most fun games i ever played
I HAVE NEVER BEEN SO DISSED IN MY LIFE
the narrator's commentary on your gameplay is just epic!! 
I have been called a mentally challenged, sucidal, slow and other things and normally those would piss anyone off but the way the narrator says it just wants you to hear the comments so i purposely slack and get dissed :P
It keeps the gameplay fun and interesting 
The Easter Eggs are fun too

Buy it if you want to roll on the floor and laugh
10/10  WANT MORE GAMES LIKE THIS

PS : For best gameplay play like a total noob

author: {'steamid': '76561198036876885', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 7962, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3782, 'last_played': 1677543781}
review:
You get to chose your evil laughand your army runs on beer. 10/10

A nice, albeit simple/restrictive, dungeon building game. Being able to send your orcs out to raid the overworld is a nice touch. The voice acting is hilarious and the names for all your orcs (and what have you) is pretty funny.

With 2 factions to choose from, there is a degree of replayability to the skirmishes (and a nice little divergence in the campaign) Though I think the Demons were a bit of an after-thought. 

I have had very few issues with running the game (crashes, excessive load times, etc) and the UI is quite accessible.

The first half-dozen Campaign missions are an excellent tutorial for how the game works and I strongly urge you to run a few missions before diving in to Multi Player or Skirmishs play.

I quite enjoy the game and recommend it to anyone who enjoys a semi-casual, base-building tower defense.
9/10

La svolta giusta dopo il disastro di Dungeons!

Magnifico gioco soprattutto per gli appassionati di DK, grafica "morbidosa" meccaniche atipiche (ad esempio quando si esplorerà la superficie si passerà da ordini generici ad un RTS) ma non meno divertenti.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037867798', 'num_games_owned': 164, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 3203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1568, 'last_played': 1541834563}
review:
He aquí un excelente juego estilo city builder, pero de calabozos. La mecanica es la de un RTS como Age Of Empires, con un giro de tuerca; aquí habra que armar nuestro propio calabozo desde los pasillos hasta las trampas, sin dejar de lado las variadas salas que nos daran recursos y nos permitiran mejorar a nuestras tropas, hechizos, etc... porque sí, tenemos salas con diferentes opciones que nos daran cosas como mana u oro, pero además nosotros tenemos hechizos propios del Mal Absoluto que usaremos para auxiliar a nuestras tropas en batalla. 
Hay varios tipos de tropas con diferentes características y habilidades, sin mencionar que estas pueden evolucionar. Dichos esbirros no solo seran para luchar, si no que tendran funciones específicas en el calabozo, porque además de ser el manager de tu propio dungeon, tendrás la oportunidad de salir al exterior... que digo... DEBERÁS salir a la superficie a expandir el mal.. o sea, a ver, el mundo no se conquista solo no?.
Cabe destacar que una de las mejores cosas que tiene es el narrador, y su constante parlataneria que te hara tirarte unas risas de cuando en cuando puesto que acostumbra a romper la 4ta pared y tratarte como un papanatas; para que me entiendas, cuando vayas a hacer el tutorial, hazte esperar, y veras como el señor pierde los cabales porque te estas tardando un siglo en hacer cosas básicas. Así por toda la campaña y eso es algo que me encanta, siendo fan de la saga Overlord, estoy acostumbrado al maltrato psicologico de un narrador.
Dentro del calabozo podras tomar y mover a tus tropas a donde quieras para ahorrar tiempo, y en la superficie los controles son los de cualquier RTS, seleccionar, moverse, atacar, etc.
En cada pantalla habran secretitos y cosas lindas para descubrir así que asegurate de explorar bastante las profundidades!
Si terminaste la historia y te quedaste con ganas de más, siempre esta el modo escaramuza donde podras gastar horas en hacer tu calabozo como tu quieras y hacerte cada vez más fuerte, para así poder conquistar la superficie, y es que el juego se gana así, cuando tengas el dungeon petado, vas a tener que tomar todo el territorio y derrotar al boss, y sinceramente, es increible la diversion que te puede dar.
El modo escaramuza cuenta con varios mapas, y si te apetece, puedes comprar los dlc cuando esten de oferta para agregar una campaña, unos cuantos mapas mas, y otro tipo de tropas al juego; que me olvide de mencionar, en la campaña controlaras a la horda, pero tambien podrás controlar a los demonios que ya descubriras quienes son...
Conclusión; imagina Age Of Empires con un enfasis en la fortificación y tendras una buena idea de lo que te espera... eso sí, no hay mucha variedad de tropas como civilizaciones hay en AOE, pero en sí, es muy parecido.
El multiplayer no tengo idea de si funciona o no, intente conectarme a una partida solo para ver, pero espere unos 20 segundos y lo cancele porque queria hechar otra partida de escaramuza jajaja. Por ahi vi que podías conectarte a una partida por p2p pero no indague mas por el simple hecho de que no buscaba jugar el multi.
Espero que Kalypso se ponga las pilas con Dungeon III (sep, lo anunciaron :D ) y agregue muchas mas cosas como mapas, una herramienta para que los jugadores los hagan, workshop, mas tipos de tropas, más salas, y aún mas profundidad, siendo también fan de la saga Trópico, espero mucho de ellos con respecto a Dungeons III y Trópico 6.
En fin, excelente juego, totalmente recomendado, en especial si eres fan de tal juego llamado Dungeon Keeper.

author: {'steamid': '76561198075458492', 'num_games_owned': 163, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 300, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 300, 'last_played': 1498609891}
review:
Oyunun temel mantığı hbaya hoşuma gitti ^^ Özellikle espriler günümüz fantezi dünyasına vurdurmalar vs. güzel bir oyun. Zaten yıllar öncesinden ufakta olsa takipçi kitlesi kazanmış ve 2017 sonbaharında hem hikaye devamı olarak hem de daha gelişmiş mekanikleri ile 3. oyunu da geliyormuş. Beni pek ilgilendirmiyor ama meraklılarına duyurulur ^^ Kötü yanlarına gelirsek koskoca campaing modunu traningle doldurmaları. Oyundaki normal basit bir üniteyi bile campaign modunun yarısına geldiğimizde üretiyoruz. Bilal'e öğretir gibi öğretiyor biraz. İlk iki bölümde herşeyi verip sonra salsa bizi daha hoş olabilirmiş.

Oyunda çok boş konuşan ama bazende güldüren abimiz adına  5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198067916056', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 3822, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2350, 'last_played': 1510831603}
review:
(Úgy írom a véleményemet, hogy se az első részével, se a Dungeon Keeper-ökkel nem játszottam.)

Próbáltam kontrollerrel játszani, de nekem úgy lassú a reakcióidőm.. :D Tehát maradtam a jól bevállt bill.+egérnél (főleg az egeret használtam). Itt említenék meg egy negatívumot: 
- a jobb oldali skillekre nem mindig sikerült kattintanom, és/vagy elcsúszott a kép... Ez rém idegesítő tudott lenni, főleg mikor támadtak..

A nyelvi hiányosságaim miatt kicsit nehéz volt megértenem, miként működnek a démonok, mert úgy vettem észre, hogy stratégiailag is különböznek a másik csapattól. Igazából más rossz élményem nem is igazán volt.. :D Bár egy kis furcsaság, hogy a démonok póktojásának olyan hangja van, mint a goblinok szerszámosládájának.. :D

Nekem nagyon bejött a játék, elsőre megfogott, aztán beszippantott és nem eresztett napokig - ahogy egy jó játék esetében ennek lennie kell... ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198026813200', 'num_games_owned': 358, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 739, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 675, 'last_played': 1498563679}
review:
I got this game for free from some promotion so I thought I would give it a shot but DAMN did I enjoy my time with this game!

This is definitely the Dungeon Keeper experience I have wanted from a newer game. I completely enjoyed the dungeon building experience thoroughly. I was hesitant about the Overworld RTS part of the game but I soon learned to enjoy that as well and had great fun sending my horde out to kill camps and towns while slowly turning the map evil.

I am now a fan of this franchise and I cannot wait to continue when Dungeons 3 releases!

author: {'steamid': '76561197977473283', 'num_games_owned': 890, 'num_reviews': 118, 'playtime_forever': 721, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 721, 'last_played': 1498405470}
review:
Oh boy, oh boy, oh boy! I sure did love Dungeon Keeper 2 when I was younger! And this game has all the elements, and MORE! What could go wrong!?

Well, in my case a few odd and unenetraining game design choises, mostly the fact that bards make gauntlets of cool traps utterly useless, and the cringeworthy 'jokes' the writers filled the game with all went terribly wrong. The attempts at 'comedy' would have felt dated and cringey back in 2015, but as the years go by, the jokes age about as well as a slice of pizza left to sit on a pile of compost. Not well, is what I'm saying (and I know the metaphor sucks).

Gameplay-wise Dungeons 2 is a fairly solid attempt at duplicating the basics of Dungeon Keeper 2. Even here the devs have suffered from some minor issues, though. Some spells are difficult to grasp and poorly explained (you can cast an ongoing spell again to dismiss it) and picking up minions and items can be fiddly due to the MASSIVE size of the cursor and the often missing indicator of what it is you are actually about to click on.

Add to all this a lackluster suite of music, barebones and basic assortment of sound effects and a narrator who tries, oh how he tries, and sadly fails to deliver on the level of quality as seen in the Bullfrog classic. My heart goes out to this guy, though. Any and all of his attempts to bolster the tone of the game are swiftly shot in the foot by the writing of the game.

Alas: can't recommend.


Playtime: 12+ hours (Partial campaign playthrough, no completion)

Ratings (1-10)
Visual: 8
Audio: 9
Story: 2
Gameplay: 7
Overall: 6

author: {'steamid': '76561197991892678', 'num_games_owned': 836, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 2086, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2086, 'last_played': 1498704981}
review:
[h1] Dungeons 2 [/h1] 
Nunca tinha jogado um games desses, criador de dungeon, apesar que não tem muitos nesse estilo no mercado, e pelo que andei pesquisando os melhores são dungeons 2 e o war for the overworld, e ambos valem a pena, pois são games diferentes. 

[b] Mecânica do game, campanha e surpresas [/b] 
Agora começando pelo que eu achei quando joguei um games desses, tive uma grande surpresa, um dos melhores jogos que ja joguei ate hoje, é uma mistura de management, onde vc tem que controlar o numero certo alimento dependendo da facção(sendo 3 para escolher) se for os orcs, admiração se for os demônios ou um lugar de descanso caso jogue com os mortos vivos(DLC a game of winter). 

O Campanha do game se trata de uma serie de missões que vai te ensinando sobre como jogar, e a historia, wow que historia, faz referencias a varias series, filmes e games recentes, muito bom, mas a que mais tem referencia é a serie game of thrones, ilario, vc vai amar a historia, aqui vc é o mal em pessoa, vc defende uma dungeon, cria armadilhas e cria um exercito maléfico para destruir toda a civilização humana. Dentro da dungeon o game é um sim management, fora da dungeon, vc controla suas tropas, e  leva elas para o ataque em vez de defesa como dentro da dungeon e o game vira um warcraft 3, onde vc upa as tropas(dentro ou fora da dungeon) coloca perks nelas, pode transformar elas, tipo um troll normal, troll lançador de pedras, ou o troll gigantão tank. 

Quando vc esta fora da dungeon vc ataca as construções humanas e pode quebrar o ciclo de waves que eles mandam na sua dungeon e vai dominando os territórios dos humanos e destruindo suas lindas florestas verdes e cheias de unicornios, coelhos e raposas e deixando tudo incendiado pelo caminho, literalmente isso acontece, pq ao dominar o território dos humanos o cenário muda em tempo real pra tudo destruído, é um espetáculo.

[b] Tipos de games e qualidade do game [/b] 
No game vc tem a escolhe de modo campanha ou o modo custom/cenario onde vc tem objetivos predefinidos, sem uma historia em si, podendo escolher pra deixar o mapa infinito mesmo destruindo tudo o jogo continuara, ou com objetivos predefinidos como limpar os humanos do seu território e do território deles.

Os gráficos são lindos, cartoons e estilizados, as vezes vc simplesmente para para observar as animações onde as succubus descem o chicote nos seus minions ou os orcs batendo o sarrafo nos seus minions ou os trolls trabalhando e zumbis apertando botões aleatórios que dão choque, ou os seus monstrinhos trabalhando nas paredes para deixar o cenário mais dark entre muitas e muitas mais animações, são lindas as animações e o tamanho detalhe que foi depositado no game, uma obra de arte. 

[b] Conclusão [/b] 
Recomendo o game para qualquer fan de management ou estratégia, principalmente se for como eu, nunca tiver jogado um game de criação de dungeon é muito, muito bom, principalmente quando os heróis vão invadir sua dungeon esperando pegar aquele pacote de loot mas no fim é um baú cheio de dinamite esperando eles abrirem e explodirem no processo... Humanos gananciosos... Vc aqui banca o papel do vilão, é muito bom, Muhuahahahahah...

author: {'steamid': '76561198015794586', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1507, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 960, 'last_played': 1633365257}
review:
Hallo ihr bösen Buben,

ich bin 25 Jahre jung und habe immer noch Spaß an diesem Spiel. Wenig Strategie gepaart mit viel Witz und noch mehr Spaß dadurch. Grafik ist jetzt nicht übermäßig geil, aber die Sprüche des Kommentators machen das alle male wieder wett. 
kleiner Tipp für wen mit viel Zeit. Warte mit der Erfüllung der einzelnen Aufgaben mal eine Stunde. Ich musste herzhaft lachen bei den Sprüchen ;)

Absolute Empfehlung für zwischendurch ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198072543615', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 3876, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3454, 'last_played': 1501267060}
review:
함정종류가 별로 없고 적들이 멍청해서 아쉽고 .. 조작할때 시야랑 움직이는 손이 조작하기 불편하긴하지만.. 
처음부터 끝까지 재미있게 했어요 도중에 나오는 유머도 재밌었음 
평을 보니 재미없다는 사람들이 많은데 취향에 맞다면 재미있게 할 수 있을듯 . 
던전 막기만 하면 지루할 것 같은데 지상까지 올라가서 싸우고 하는 것도 재밌었음 
캠페인 다 깨고 일반 맵같은거 하는데 넘어려워요 ...ㅜㅜ 
너무 재미있게 해서 더 재미있다는 워오브오버로드를 사봤는데 그래픽이 너무 별로라서 못하겠더라구요 ㅜㅜ 
잊을만하면 생각나는 게임 !

던전스 3도 기대합니다 3도 한글화 되어서 나오길 !

review:
Wunderbares Spiel mit sehr viel gutem Humor.
Der Erzähler gestaltet die Story unterhaltsam. 
Das Gameplay ist hervorragend und unterscheidet sich durch die 2 Standart Fraktionen sehr stark von einander. 
Die Grafik und die Gestaltung der Karte ist sehr gut gelungen.

Alles in allem ein gutes Spiel.

review:
Absoloutly Love playing this game. My brother recommended it due to my love of DK/DK2 and war for the overworld and I've lost hours upon hours to this game.

It lacks any of the lag of WFTO (anyone who plays that will understand what I mean) and introduces an interesting 'above ground' element of play. Strategy players will really love this game.

review: This game is ok, not as good as Dungeon Keeper but comes close except you can go up on the surface. I have now reached a part in the story where it feels like I cannot complete so have just given up entirely. I am sure the more gamer savvy will be fine with this but Dungeon Keeper wins.

author: {'steamid': '76561198075055296', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 946, 'last_played': 1507361801}
review:
Шалом алейхем, мои дорогие [strike]израильские агрессоры[/strike]. Сегодня я имею сказать пару слов за одну очень замечательную игру под названием Dungeons 2. Вы, таки спросите, почему замечательную и почему не Dungeons 1? А таки всё очень просто: её раздавали за бесплатно! Не буду говорить кто раздавал, шобы не делать им бесплатную рекламу.

Итак, имеем стратегию в реальном времени, в которой управляем не абы кем, а самым что ни на есть АБСОЛЮТНЫМ ЗЛОМ! И это я сейчас не про свою тётю Фиму из Львова. Вы таки умные люди и смотрели фильм Властелин Колец, а значит помните тамошнего главного злодея Саурона Мелькоровича. Ну так вот, здесь мы играем за такого же злодея, но другого. Наша цель состоит в изничтожении всяких эльфов, пильфов, курильфов и других фэнтезийных шлемазлов, которым не повезло оказаться у нас на пути. Ах да, чуть не забыл, один момент против нас выступает Хаотичное Зло – поц, возомнивший себя нашим конкурентом и посягающий на наш монополизированный бизнес.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=950962391
АБСОЛЮТНОЕ ЗЛО таки имеет помощников в своём нелёгком деле: рабочих и воинов. Рабочие (или растяпы) – самые полезные, на мой взгляд, юниты. Судите сами: безмерно вам преданы, работают, не покладая рук, а самое главное, не требуют зарплату! Сносят пещеры, а на их месте возводят всё, что душе угодно. Вы таки можете через всю карту проложить свою собственную Дерибасовскую с домино и марамойками! А какие тут можно строить сокровищницы! Вот только бы и делал, что создавал сокровищницы и смотрел, как рабочие наполняют их золотом. Если бы не эти гои-герои, что приходят в подземелье грабить золото и таки резать-убивать рабочих. И таки кто после этого – зло? 

И таки для защиты от [strike]Палестины[/strike] сил добра, у нас имеется армия из классических фэнтезийных представителей тёмной стороны силы. Орки – обыкновенные дуболомы для ближнего боя. Наги – стрелки и лекари. Гоблины – специалисты по стелсу. Тролли – танки, закидывающие врагов валунами. А самый цимес в том, что помимо своих прямых обязанностей – устраивания мордобития и членовредительств, эти поцы производят улучшения для подземелья. Наги создают ману и заклинания. Гоблины [strike]переводят фильмы[/strike] работают в мастерских, улучшая строения и ловушки. Тролли [strike]троллят школьников в интернете[/strike] апгрейдят армию. А орки… ну, орки просто развешивают тумаков рабочим, заставляя их работать быстрее. В общем, были бы идеальные солдаты, если бы не требовали зарплату. И пиво. И развлечений. Короче, рабочие мне больше нравятся.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=950962374
Эх, а знали бы вы какой тут закадровый голос. Этот комментатор мочит коры, шо твой Жванецкий и Гусев вместе взятые. Авторы не стесняются заимствовать и обсмеивать персонажей и события из многих известных франшиз, типа Властелин Колец, Гарри Поттер, Игра Престолов и т.д. и т.п. Шоб я так жил, как они умеют избегать обвинений в нарушении авторских прав!
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=925005168
Игра поддерживает стим-облако, поэтому вам не надо тратить место на флешке, чтобы записывать свои сохранения при удалении игры. А самый большой плюс – наличие карточек, и их таки можно продать!

Обзора на DLC нет, потому что DLC таки стоят денег! Вот, если бы мне их кто-то подарил, то я бы обязательно в них сыграл. А если бы ещё и чуть-чуть заплатили, то и обзор бы сделал.

Спасибо за внимание, рад был с вами поговорить, но мне пора ехать в Иерусалим. 
[spoiler]Шоб вы так жили какую оценку поставите за этот обзор. ;)[/spoiler]
