author: {'steamid': '76561198035297348', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 2678, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2648, 'last_played': 1487697986}
review:
I enjoy playing this game.  The campaign went by quick.  I have only played multi-player once, but had a good time doing it.  If you like real-time strategy games, I suggest trying this game.  

The game is a fairly normal RTS.  You manage a dungeon - collecting resources (gold and mana), digging out or filling in rooms and hallways, assigning rooms to various purposes (keeping your troops happy or upgrading rooms/troops), and placing traps to slow or kill would be adventurers that invade your dungeon.  There are a variety of mosters, each with different purposes and combat abilities.  The game covers most of what you would want in a dungeon management style game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028724797', 'num_games_owned': 1480, 'num_reviews': 240, 'playtime_forever': 728, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 728, 'last_played': 1487086669}
review:
Voto: 7/10 (6/10 se non sei esaltato dall'idea generale)

Volevo davvero giocare un gioco come questo. E' praticamente dungeon keeper ma con grafica e gameplay migliorati. A parte costruire il dungeon e difenderlo dagli attacchi degli eroi, manderai le tue truppe all'esterno per conquistare il mondo della superficie. Questa parte è gestita come uno strategico in tempo reale. L'interfaccia grafica è ben fatta e il ritmo del gioco non accelera troppo, ma è davvero facile. 
Però la parte migliore di questo gioco è costruire il tuo dungeon! Non è mai impegnativo ma è divertente. Altra nota positiva c'è anche un po' di buon umorismo (ben recitato dal narratore) e un sacco di citazioni alla cultura pop

+ Divertente
+ Ambientazione molto figa
+ Un po' di buon umorismo

- Mai impegnativo
- A volte troppo lento

author: {'steamid': '76561198001625053', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 338, 'last_played': 1480526450}
review:
[h1]Dungeon Keeper lässt grüssen[/h1]

Du vermisst die guten alten Tage mit Dungeon Keeper? Nun Dungeons 2 kommt da ziemlich nah dran. Sehr lustiger Humor und jede menge Seitenhiebe an die alten Dungeon Keeper teile und dessen Charaktere. Die Missionen sind durchgehend sehr Lustig geschrieben und meist auch mehr oder weniger anspruchsvoll. 

Mein Problem damit ist jedoch, dass es sich zu sehr an DK anlehnt um es als eigenes Spiel zu diesem Preis zu rechtferigen. [b]Bei einem Sale >50% kann ich es nur empfehlen ansonsten eher weniger.[/b]

[b]Für wen ist das Spiel geeignet?[/b]
[list][*] Fans der DK-Reihe
[*] Fans von schwarzem Humor und Ironie
[*] Fans von Aufbaustrategiespielen
[/list]

[b]Pro[/b]
[list][*] Sehr Humorvolle Story
[*] Viele Seitenhiebe und Referenzen zu DK
[*] Schöner Grafikstil
[*] Guter Erzähler
[/list]
[b]Contra[/b]
[*] Für mich stimmt hier Preis/leistung nicht wirklich. Für ein remake eines Klassikers doch eher teuer obwohl die Umsetzung eigentlich gut gelungen ist.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020824886', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1729, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1529, 'last_played': 1483031219}
review:
Hands down one of the -best- Dungeon Keeper games made. While it is certainly a much more tactical game then DK ever was, with more refined control of your minions and full on RTS controls on the surface world. It remains faithful to the DK core and allowing only limited influencing of your minions decission in the underworld but still providing enough control so your not screaming at your screen for your minion to defend your core while he is hungery and trying to wander off.

The humor in the game is very tongue and cheek and is very very aware of where it came from. The narator does a superb job in every aspect and the writing is solid to the core for what they wanted to achieve. Over-all, one of the funnies and most enjoyable games I've played in a long time.

If you like DK games and enjoy tongue and cheek humor, this is the game for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000109010', 'num_games_owned': 212, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 11541, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2352, 'last_played': 1707489974}
review:
Yay! I ‘m going to review Dungeons 2! Oh those Roman numerals, I decided to put a ‘2’ instead of “II” because those are really just two “I’s” (eyes) stuck together. Why Roman numeral why!

So what we begin with is the main menu. There is a campaign, skirmish, and for all you crazy option loving crazies out there, options. I won’t spoil what happens in the campaign, But I dare do say it’s fun, and funny. A combination I adore, plus you get to be evil. Plus, you’re building a dungeon! How cool is that?! It’s fun to me because I enjoy the carving out your dungeon aspect, hiring units, (once the proper room is build of course,) researching upgrades, (There are general upgrades, as well as unit specific upgrades,) and the mana aspect (cast spells, etc,) Oh! And traps. 

And it’s funny...because of the narrator (and the slaps you may dole out to your minions). I have to be honest and say I have read other reviews, and they say, he can be...oh, what’s that word…annoying? Anyway, I found that if you sat there during the campaign, the narrator would remark something witty and funny, and, actually, the narrator tends to say funny words, on scripted spots of the game, (There is a LOT of references to movies and games) . This is a given, You may not like it. I do, enjoy the comments of the narrators wit.

So, you may be asking yourself, “Big deal, it’s another dungeon game.” Yes, but it helps keep it fresh by allowing you play with more than one faction! That is, two factions. Yes, two factions does not seem like a lot, but you can switch them up between plays in the skirmish maps. (There is a third playable faction, but only if you buy the appropriate DLC!) These two factions play somewhat similar with the same goals, but their style differs. For example, Faction ‘A’ requires the thirst of your minions to be sated. You can stock up on beer and store these good for your minions. The other faction, ‘B’ demands that your minions be admired by your basic workers, something that cannot be stocked up upon and must be dealt with as the minions needs arises.

There’s not a lot of skirmish maps to play with, unfortunately. There is DLC for that too. Also, I don’t believe you can make your own maps. It may have to do with how the overworld ‘evilfies’ as you rampage across the surface. It would probably be hard to design a way to allow the freedom of map making while also having changes of the map being ‘evilfied’. Like say, if I hypothetically created a map on here, some things may not ‘evilfy’ correctly. There’s integers to worry about, there’s zones, actions, boolians, true’s and falses, parameters that must be set, flags, and the different doodads that must be placed appropriately when creating a map to ensure it all works when things get all evil looking on the surface.

There’s not a whole lot I dislike about the game. Sometimes the hand can be picky on what it picks up, it takes a bit of practice. There is no way of prolonging enemy waves of coming into your dungeon, (unless you kill them before they arrive,) it’s ether fight or die when they come. It usually starts out with two or three pitchfork presents, then works up to stronger units attacking you as time progresses.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000154494', 'num_games_owned': 474, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 868, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 868, 'last_played': 1488068193}
review:
Awesome game which I preordered paying full (crazy) price! Game is really good, review is negative. Had stutter issues since release, not been able to enjoy the game. Kept buying DLC's and installing patches with high hopes, game still doesn't run correctly for me. 

Gtx 970, i7 4970, 16gb ram, I run ultra battlefield 1 or whatever new game you say at ultra or semiultra, 1080p.

War for the overworld, which isi similar and I also own, has best performance, but I don't like it as much as this one. And that one has no negative review at all, but this one does.

I gone through official support since release, lots of tickets, attempts to "fix" stuff on my end, etc. Not even with a different high end computer I had that problem. I was suspicious it was a problem with their unity engine, but no, it's game's problem.

I had a few fps problems with Vermintide on launch, which afaik uses another not mainstream engine (autodesk Maya / Stringray) and through patches and some workarounds, performance was solved, with a game much more graphic intensive. 

Comparisons are always hateful, but it's a way to show the problem this game has.

Negative review comes now even if I preordered years ago, why? Cause after many patches and DLC's, I tried to give this game another go! And hell it was still very enjoyable and interesting to me....but the stutter while playing, scrolling though the dungeon etc, despite less noticeable, was still there.

So of course, negative review, spent idk, a total of 60-70€ in this game with all dlcs? And I cant still enjoy it having thr worse performance from most of my game's library. 

Also owned previous dungeons game with all dlc's, so I am not exactly a hater, haha. Nice game, you can enjoy it, or blow your mind thinking why the hell the game doesn't run as good as you would, and have to decide to keep playing with bad performance...

Update: Gave thumbs up to this game after playing it again, with good / decent performance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025057845', 'num_games_owned': 520, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 2864, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2134, 'last_played': 1507398867}
review:
Ez egy kiváló RTS játék, aki anno régen szerette a Dungeon Keeper 2 nevű játékot, az nagyon nagy valószínűséggel ezt is kedvelni fogja. Alapból rendkívül szűk a Dungeon alapú RTS műfaj, csak néhány cím létezik, de a Dungeons 2 a jobbak között van, sőt! Erről a játékról nem lehet úgy írni, hogy ne hasonlítanánk a régi DK2-höz, hiszen akkor az bizony korszakalkotó volt és a máig a műfaj egyik jeles képviselője. A német Realmforge azonban a picit gyengécske első rész után egy igazi mesterművet rakott le az asztalra. Itt a fő gonoszt testesíti meg a játékos, mi irányítjuk a különböző lényeket a föld alatt, azonban itt a játék szerves részét képezi a felszín is, egységeinkkel ki tudunk, sőt ki kell menni a felszínre, mert ott a "jók" földjét kell leigázzuk és a magas rangú vezetőket a másvilágra küldeni. Ennél több cél nem is kell egy ilyen játékba.:)

Először én i egy kicsit aggódtam emiatt, hogy "milyen már ez, hogy fel kell menni a felszínre", de semmi ok az aggodalomra, kiválóan hozták össze. Nagyjából úgy kell elképzelni, hogy vannak kis zónák és ha a zónán belül minden hősi épületet és egységet megsemmisítünk, akkor a táj a szemünk előtt változik át színes élettel teli vidékről halott, lávás pusztasággá, vagyis így foglaljuk el a területeket. Nagyon ötletes és az animációk is nagyon jók lettek, a felszínen kicsit olyan Blizzard-os jellegű, de szép. A zene is nagyon szép lett (legfőképp a hős vidékeken)

Saját birodalmunkban a szokásos módon föld blokkokat kell ásni és a kiásott területre tudunk építkezni. Az egységek itt nem portálokból jönnek, hanem azokat mi tudjuk megvásárolni a főépületnél, ami szerintem nagyon is jó, hiszen így tökéletesen kontrollálni tudjuk, hogy milyen típusú lényeket szeretnénk a csapatunkba. A lényeknek itt nem étel, hanem ital, egészen pontosan sör kell ellátmányként, valamint zsold, így a pénzre is mindig figyelnünk kell. Nagyon sok szoros kapcsolat és hasonlóság van a DK2 és e között, azonban egy fontos különbség, hogy a Dungeons 2-ben sokféle fejlesztés áll a rendelkezésünkre, az épületeinkhez és egységeinkhez is fejlesztéseket eszközölhetünk, ami szintén jó ötlet volt és jó lett a megvalósítás is, érezhető a különbség a fejlettebb egységeknél. A mannát itt nem automatikusan kapjuk , hanem bizonyos lények termelik ki nekünk egy megadott épületben amit csak egy kristály köré tudunk felhúzni.

A játék legnagyobb hátránya, hogy - főleg a Dk2-höz képest - meglehetősen nehéz. Na persze az első 1-2 küldetés nem, de a 3-4. küldetés környékén drasztikusan elkezd nehezedni, de végig fair marad. A nehezedés a gyakorlatban annyit jelent, hogy egy küldetés elején pár perc leforgása után hullámokban érkeznek az ellenfelek és ha addigra nem készül el megfelelő védelem (csapdák vagy harci egységek), akkor garantáltan meghalunk. Ez arra sarkallja a játékost, hogy már az elején ne tököljön sokat, már az elején érdemes egy védelmi vonalat felállítani, mert a kulcs a jó ritmuson van. Ha el tudjuk hárítani az első néhány hullámot, akkor később sokkal-sokkal könnyebbé válik a játék, csak a a küldetések elején kell egy kicsit kapkodni, de főleg az utolsó 2-3 küldetésben, de ott nagyon. A vége felé volt olyan küldetés, amit kb. 10-szer kezdtem el elölről, mert túl hamar jöttek az ellenek, vagyis túl lassú voltam. Persze egy picit bosszantó volt, de tudtam, hogy még lehet javítani a tempón, megpróbáltam mindig egy kicsit más stratégiát kialakítani, míg végül siker lett az eredménye.

Ha megvan a megfelelő támadó csapatunk, akkor a felszínre érve hagyományos RTS módba kapcsol a játék, vagyis ott az egységeinket közvetlenül tudjuk irányítani akár egyenként akár csoportban, mint bármely más RTS-ben. Ez nagyban megkönnyíti a csatákat.

A játék második felében van egy második gonosz frakció is (igen, nem csak egy gonosz van), akik opcionálisak, vagyis a hozzájuk tartozó küldetések nem kötelezőek, nélkülük is végig lehet vinni a kampányt (viszont nagyon érdemes kipróbálni őket is!)

Technikailag a játékkal semmilyen komolyabb problémám nem akadt. Amikor már nagy a birodalmunk, akkor néha hajlamos a Unity Engine a mikro akadásokra, de ez a játszhatóságra semmilyen kihatással nincs, ez inkább csak szőrszálhasogatás. A látvány viszont szerintem igen szép lett, olyan apróságokat is kidolgoztak a fejlesztők, mint például az aranyat cipelő munkások útközben elszúrnak belőle egy picit, vagy említhetném azt is, hogy a ima ásásnál a föld blokkok szépen esnek szét, apró morzsákra. Ezek ugyan nagyon apróságoknak tűnnek, de hozzátesznek a játékélményhez. A kamerát lehet zoomolni, így közelről is megnézhetjük lényeink életét.
Belső nézet nincs, így senki ne is keresse (DK2-ben a Posession Spell segítségével lehetett belső nézetbe ugrani)!

A játékot nekem 36 órámba telt végigvinni, de ezt úgy, hogy volt olyan küldetés, amit sokszor újra kellett kezdenem a nem megfelelően kiválasztott stratégiám miatt. Ezen felül nekem "pöcsölős" stílusom van, vagyis órákig el tudok lenni semmit tevéssel, kizárólag nyersanyag gyűjtéssel és építkezéssel, szóval másnak lehet, hogy csak fele ennyi ideig tartana, de szerintem 20 óra min. van benne.

Na és akkor még nem beszéltem a szintén zseniális narrátorról! A játék tele van szellemes és kreatív megjegyzésekkel, ráadásul ha valakit ezek egy idő után bosszantanak, nyugodtan finomhangolhatja a beállításokban, akár ki is kapcsolható, szóval mindenki tökéletesen testre tudja szabni magának, csillagos ötös!

Összegezve tehát minden RTS rajongónak/kedvelőnek bátran ajánlom, illetve a DK2 rajongóknak pedig egyenesen kötelező darab!

Pro:
- szép látvány
- technikailag semmilyen komolyabb probléma nincs vele (Unity Engine)
- fantasztikus atmoszféra
- szellemes és kreatív beszólások a narrátortól
- jól sikerült újítás a felszínen való leigázás
- kiváló harcrendszer a felszínen

Kontra:
- a küldetések eleje nagyon lassan indul be (túl kevés épület/egység/pénz)
- a legtöbb küldetésben nagyon hamar érkeznek az ellenfelek, így a küldetések legelején "kapkodásra" van kényszerítve a játékos.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970758506', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 2262, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2262, 'last_played': 1486313906}
review:
Eines der besten Spiele die mehr als eine Hommage an Dungeonkeeper sind, Ich meine Dungeons 2 ist die Evolution von DK!

Es hat eine grhörige Portion schwarzen Humors und dazu noch Kämpfe an der Oberfläche um dem "Guten" auch mal in den Arsch treten zu können :D 

für moch 9 von 10 Punkten!

author: {'steamid': '76561198066349665', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 3326, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1032, 'last_played': 1697315068}
review:
e1: recently played the Extra Campaign. I have to say the constant enemy waves are only annoying... in later missions there are spawning worms in your dungeon which are really cumbersome, and you have only 5sec to react or its basically game over bcoz they spawn strong AoE minions every 10s or so. and you will get 2, and later even 3, of those at once. if you havent saved up mana AND have your creatures already in your hand ready to drop this is game over... not a fun experience tbh.
last mission is even harder, as you have to deal with 3 different enemy camps and a super boss.

i found myself building really long one space tunnels from all entrances to get some time to breathe. felt like cheesing
/e

not a challenging game if you have played RTS before, but an incredible entertaining one.
the game shines through a satisfying playstyle, combined with many fun comments and homages/pub references. i played ~2h per mission when it could've done within 30mins ;)

i would love to have a replay-factor, like NG+ with harder/more enemies!

11/10 would buy again

author: {'steamid': '76561198165413614', 'num_games_owned': 283, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 796, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 334, 'last_played': 1549509537}
review:
The Dungeon Lord is back — and this time it's serious! In Dungeons 2, you will have to give way to the insatiable vengeance of the Lord Dungeons and fearsome new monsters from all corners of the underworld to do his evil bidding. This time to conquer the underground world is not enough — now the Dungeon Lord will extend his dominion over the puny humans and attempt to conquer the Overworld too!
Take control of the mighty Dungeon Lord and craft a network of unique and terrifying dungeons, recruit an army of fearsome creatures and command two new factions. Prepare to defend your Kingdom against those pesky heroes, go up to earth to go to war on their human cities and use the hand of terror to take control of your minions, to command and give slaps in the face to keep them in subjection.
Advanced mode is the historical campaign filled to the brim with the most black humor that made the hit original version of Dungeons, and is replete with numerous references to various fantasy novels, movies and TV shows. In addition, you can test your strength in four different game modes in multiplayer for up to four players, battling it out with other Dungeon Lords over LAN or via the Internet.

Features Of Dungeons 2: 

• Thanks to exciting single player campaign with 2 playable factions, 26 unique creatures, multiple types of heroes and game modes, Dungeons 2 is the simulator controls the dungeon in which you have been waiting for.
• Dungeons 2 offers unique gameplay: simulator dungeon in the underworld and tactical real-time strategy on the surface.
• Using the hand of horror, you can always keep control of your subordinates and give targeted commands.
• Leave the darkness of the underworld and make a foray into the upper world, drawing in the ruins of the most beautiful human city.
• Four competitive multiplayer modes for up to four players via LAN and Internet

author: {'steamid': '76561197990112820', 'num_games_owned': 494, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 1364, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1194, 'last_played': 1518937580}
review:
It is indeed very well made game that greatly well inherits the nostalgia of Dungeon keeper, which was also great game, a god-like game, a Fxxkin' masterpiece game. but, sadly, Its' campaign, which should motivate the player to play some sandbox or survival after it finished, seal the game itself after when we barely feel the tutorial is finally over.

even though campaign feels like never ending tutorial, due to many of abilities and rooms and creatures and etc locked away even after half of the campaign finished, It gives you very good gaming experience, because of good sense of humor, distinctive objectives, and well, unlocking another features that game locked away.

but yet again, when you finally feels like the real game started, It suddenly over. you can't actually get enough chance to play with full feature of the game in campaign. plus, It does not entertains you with variety features of 'what's becoming evil dungeon lord'. did you wanted to make some muscle creatures happy by build arena and throw them into pit-fighting? or scam the paychecks away by build some casino and bars in your dungeon? or see some dumb things that creatures do because they are dumb creatures? That's too bad. creatures in this game will show you nothing but eating and sleeping and well, decorating walls.

so, what made this game cost that great feature? answer is, not so interesting surface adventuring! with bad control! of course, It is great leap for the evil lord that always dwells the grim, dark, humid, underground. but, again, to conquer and corrupt the holy surface land and kingdom, you does not need to be more challenging, like use some dark rituals, or build some great artifacts and such. you just send a bunch of orcs, which seems like all-round perfect soliders, and just walk over it. ta-da. how frustrating.

but this game genre -being evil god like something and managing shits- suffers from old chronic depression that caused by very low birth rate of the game. you don't have much of choices. so, go on.

oh, If you finding other successors of Dungeon Keeper, go check 'War for the Overworld' too.

author: {'steamid': '76561198086461511', 'num_games_owned': 459, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 158, 'last_played': 1485984531}
review: 4/10，这还是情怀加了分。 我是冲着前作来的，但是实在是玩不下去了! 最开始看见画风的时候我内心就咯噔一下感觉不妙，但很不幸的是这种感觉变成了现实。最大的问题是操作方式，首先两种控制方式切换就有点难受；其次rts部分控制起来也不像传统rts那么自如；而地牢里手抓取东西的感觉也很不精准。糟糕的控制手感导致我完全没有心思去体验后面的内容。所以再见吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561197986262991', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 371, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 346, 'last_played': 1485788577}
review:
I started playing Dungeons 2 then stopped after a few missions, it just wasn't gripping me.  I also always felt rushed, you also always have this feeling that you're about to run out of gold by next pay day and scramble to keep unearthing more gold veins.

I then decided to give it another go this weekend, continuing the campaign where I left off and the game has managed to open up a bit more but now I'm feeling not only rushed, but also overwhelmed.  I constantly need to be doing stuff above ground as well as needing to defend underground, I have to keep the gold flowing which has it's own risks of unearthing spiders and the like.

I have yet to actually build an arena on any map and now I also have a forge to build.  I don't get enough gold / time to research all upgrades in any of the places (tinkerer, forge, mana place) and even if I had been able to build an arena, I'd never be able to use it because my forces are either busy fighting above ground or defending underground.

It's just rush rush rush from the minute the map starts.  I keep getting this feeling I'm missing the "cookie cutter recipe" of how you're supposed to approach every map.  Almost like DOTA, start map, press this key combination to buy these things and get to that specific lane ASAP.  There's just very little "fun" factor and I'm not getting any actual time to "explore" the game.  I've started redoing each map after playing it for 5-10 minutes just so I can get a little "exploration" into the game mechanics.  It feels much like diving into an FPS that has you fighting aliens non stop from the second it loads till it's finished.  You don't actually get to try out the cover system or the vault system because you're constantly overwhelmed and the second you're done killing everything the mission abruptly ends with no option to continue playing in order to explore the mechanics.

I felt much the same way about Dungeons 1, never finished it.  Still, it has that nostalgic feeling that reminds me of many happy hours playing DK2 as a kid which is why I'm trying so hard to like it.

TLDR; Definitely has potential, get it on sale and even if you don't end up finishing it, you should get your money's worth.  Will be buying War for the Overworld in the hope that it'll be the one that will scratch the itch.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055511711', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 880, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 880, 'last_played': 1485057446}
review:
Its an interesting game. Fairly simple for the most part. 

Pros
*The creativity of the game is amazing and funny.
*Obviously the narrator is another plus.
*Playing as the bad guys for once.
*Dungeon management is fun.

Cons
*The hand is not very accurate to pick up units with.
*The little snots do not like brewing. As soon as they do one barrel they go back to mining. This gets bad when you start to build up an army and they need to start drinking.
*The mana system seems just thrown together and random.

author: {'steamid': '76561197977668765', 'num_games_owned': 423, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 1557, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1557, 'last_played': 1485589589}

author: {'steamid': '76561198185251262', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 8004, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6057, 'last_played': 1515882077}
review: Первая игра была сложной для освоения, с своей уникальной механикой, требовавшей длительного наблюдения за поведениями героев, за их потребностями и д.т. и т.п. В первой части мы делали из подземелья ловушку для героев, своеобразный парк ужасов. Не все радостно встретили первую часть, ибо во второй разработчики решили просто кардинально поменять концепцию, притом практически целиком. Начнем с того что подземелье для вас уже не сложная система ловушки, для завлечения, развлечения и убийства героев, нееет, мы теперь просто строим подземный город. И все кто придет, приходит к нам не имея ничего ценного при себе и движем одной лишь целью: уничтожить сердце подземелья, и это несколько удручает. Довольно быстро становится скучно отбивать одно нападение за другим, притом достигнув своего определённого максимума по силе, отряды врагов становятся предельно однообразны и глупы. Теперь в кузницах оружие делается не для жадных героев а только в интересах вашей армии, а точнее делаются грейды, и улучшений весьма таки много разных. С вашей армией тоже произошли изменения, теперь она есть. Нет правда, в первой части существа были лишь куклами для битья, постоянно появляясь на пиктограммах, и небыло никакого контроля над ними. Теперь же у вас действительно существа, со своими потребностями и обязанностями, которми можно худо бедно управлять, правда степень влияния на существ даже на поверхности оставляет желать лучшего, в подземелье же они вообще действуют полностью автономно, вы можете только лично брать и перемещать их. И да, появилась возможность выходить на поверхность, чтобы просто порушить пару зданий альянса, и всё, маловато возможностей. Теперь ваше подземелье целиком ваше без каких-либо областей влияния, делайте там что хотите. И да, ввели просто архиважную возможность закапывать обратно проходы и помщения, чего нехватало в первой части. Если в первом даеженсе были 3 разных уровня подземелий(катакомбы, храм майя и адская дыра) то теперь у нас вместо этого 3 разные рассы, что весьма любопытно, ибо рассы довольно различны по совему характеру. Тут скрыт маленький нюанс что 3-ю, пожалуй самую весёлую рассу, вы можете получить только купив дополнение зимние игры, без которого вообще играть на самом деле не рекомендую, там и компания по интереснее. Была серьезно переработана экономика, теперь всё повазано на золотых запасах. Притом эти запасы ограничены в подземелье, а других источников золота нет, и есть один крайне раздражающий фактор: зарплата. Каждые 5 минут вашу существа просто забирают себе часть имеющегося у вас золота. Куда? Зачем? Нафига золото вон этому зомби? Или зачем оно нужно этому демону? Еслибы тут была система как в majesty, тоесть ваши существа на это золото что-то покупали, но нет. В итоге под конец игры у ваших орков на руках будет по добрых 5тысячь золотых. Это же гениально, сделать основной ресурс не только ограниченным и медленно добываемым, но ещё и утекающим непонятно куда, извините, но я не могу с этим смириться. Игровой процесс медлителен, одна игровая сессия может занимать около 5 часов, но притом, несмотря на это, он увлекательнее чем в первой части, хотя и потерял той глубины механик. Ещё есть мультиплеер, который был бы интересен, еслибы в него играло больше 1.5 человека. Если у вас нет друга у которого тоже есть данж2 то вы очень врядли сможете в него сыграть(хотя идея о противостоянии двух подземелий крайне любопытна) В общем как и первая часть игра наполнена интересных идей, но требует более тщательной проработки. Надеюсь франшизу не забудут и 3я часть возьмёт лучшее от обоих предшественников.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059909414', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2068, 'last_played': 1580673155}
review: I never played the original Dungeon Keeper and just jumped into this game without having a clue what it would be like. It turned out to be an incredible fun experience, the type of game that makes time fly until you suddenly realize it's light outside again. The two game modes blend together very well, and having to switch from one to the other while adjusting to a completely different gameplay mechanic and also keep track of two maps keeps things from ever going stale. There's also a funny narrator who I absolutely loved. Not all his jokes land, but he gives it his all, and really makes the game come alive.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019820859', 'num_games_owned': 214, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 9785, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7146, 'last_played': 1608667290}
review:
I took my time getting through the campaign, the expansion, and the DLC maps.
The winter expansion was rough.  I'm still on the last mission on that one.
But 116 hours?  This game was/is definitely worth every penny I spent.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040053691', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 3695, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3695, 'last_played': 1482703210}
review:
Отличное сочетание сюжета и игрового процесса – всё по делу, без скучных заданий, единственная цель которых – растянуть игровое время. Управление подземельем стало проще по сравнению с первой частью, что позволяет  с головой погрузиться в игру, не утопая в микроменеджменте.

Просто замечательная работа переводчиков, постаравшихся перевести шутки так, чтобы они были смешными и понятными. Много юмора и качественная русская озвучка(!).

Да, пафоса в этой игре нет – она ехидная, не очень серьёзная и скорее высмеивает штампы про Зло, чем является его симулятором, но по мне так лучше качественная пародия, чем плохой эпик. 

[Рекомендую дополнение Game of Winter  - новая большая кампания, в которой можно поиграть за «мёртвое Зло», понравится всем любителям некромантии]

author: {'steamid': '76561198033541518', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 872, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 814, 'last_played': 1485181882}
review:
Dungeons 2 is very similar to dungeon keeper in various ways in terms of building new rooms and expanding your dungeon. The campaign however is very good as well as the tutorial but the multiplayer is a bit on edge in terms of spells for example) by the time your opponent reaches dungeon level 2 and has required the Evil Strikes Back Spell theres no way to kill him he wipes out your army in a matter of seconds and by the time you've built up your army your opponet would have his spell already up making it pretty much impossible to kill your opponent. In terms of defence the traps are a bit over powered as well making it extremely difficult to get into any dungeon depending of the length of the hallway to your dungeon.

Overall the game is really good for single play skirmish and campaign but not so well in multiplayer death match  in terms of certain spells and equipment the only thing i'd recommend if your going to play this game with a friend on multiplayer is to make a rule to not use or get the EVIL STRIKES BACK spell because of its insane power of wipping your army out in a matter of seconds.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067327711', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 560, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 496, 'last_played': 1485381403}
review:
J'ai eu ce jeu dans un bundle pour quasiment rien, je ne savais même pas si j'aller y jouer un jour mais j'ai fini par le lancer.

C'est un petit jeu sympa. Petit, oui, parcequ'à vrai dire je n'y passerai pas mes journées, on en fait vite le tour. Le contenu n'est pas énormissime, le gameplay est vite redondant, néanmoins on s'y amuse les quelques heures que l'on passe dessus.

Il a le mérite de me divertir, donc je donnerais un avis positif. Par contre si je devais me fier au prix initial...

Donc cette évaluation pour dire que si vous le croisez dans un bundle ou en très grosse promo (genre 5-10 euros grand max), il pourra vous faire passer un peu de bon temps. Par contre ne l'achetez surtout pas hors promo, ça n'en vaut vraiment pas le coup !

author: {'steamid': '76561198049006077', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 218, 'playtime_forever': 279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 279, 'last_played': 1485136694}
review:
Some promising ideas and amusing narration falls short.
Good enough to keep me playing through the beginning.  
Bad enough that I stopped as soon as it was no longer easy.

+separates offensive overland missions from underworld base defense.
+unit independence: units choose their actions automatically unless directed.
+digging for gold + territory.
+amusing narrator

-Bad cursor.  Hard to select units.
-Difficult to manage base + armies: large and spread.
-Hard to find the right upgrades.  
-Base builds tend to disorganized sprawls.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035537655', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 125, 'playtime_forever': 184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 184, 'last_played': 1438900639}
review: Fantastic

author: {'steamid': '76561197976318470', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 935, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 935, 'last_played': 1483834603}
review:
This game is very well made.  Good graphics, funny commentary, no bugs I could find.

However, they changed the game from the first Dungeons.  Now you no longer lure heroes into your dungeon, instead, small raiding parties always invade and bring no extra gold with them.  In its place is the ability to explore above ground in a almost Warcraft 3 style.

Basically, this iteration of the game moved more towards RTS from Dungeon building SIM.  One thing I did not like about the original Dungeons was that you had to spend so much time making each room look good and then start over again in the next match.  This game has your monsters decorating/improving the walls in your rooms in their free time.

If I could improve anything about this game, I would like the dungeon space to either be larger or some additional way to provide more gold.  Adding more gold veins or bringing back the old Dungeons mechanic where exploring heroes would drop gold would help.

The campaign itself is pretty good and the narrator adds a very nice touch.  It did feel like the ending got chopped off, but I think there is more story/content in the "A Game of Winter" DLC.  There is a final "battle", but the story doesn't completely wrap up.

I did like the ability to upgrade my monsters.  You can upgrade in three ways.  One is transforming your monster into a different but related creature.  My favorite is the regular goblin to goblin riding a flame throwing mech.  Another way to upgrade is to just increase the strength and abilities of monsters using research.  The last way is that your monsters level up as they take down enemies making keeping them alive more important.

Rating - 7/10
Dungeon Keeper fans= should try it out
Other casual players = pick up on sale

author: {'steamid': '76561197970604744', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 434, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 434, 'last_played': 1483246309}
review:
They've come a long way from their first installment.
I genuinely enjoy playing this one.
There's a few details that still bug me, but overall it's a solid game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972357832', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1964, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1501, 'last_played': 1487665007}
review:
Fantastic game.  I've played it for hours and never ran into a bug. I've read some of the negative reviews and I don't get it.  It's far superior to the first Dungeons (which I actually did not care for).  I loved the fact that you can go from the dungeon up to the overworld.  Great mechanic where the control mechanism changes from Dungeon Keeper style of click-to-pick-up to standard RTS style.  It's got many different things to see and do.  Lots to discover and have fun with.  My only real complaint would be that, aside from the lightning spell(which you receive at the start of the game) the rest of the spells are fairly useless.  I appreciate their presence(from a desire to give a player more things to do) but it might have made more sense if certain creatures were immune or highly resistant to one type of spell over another.  As it stands, you hit their healer and/or thief with the lightning spell and let your traps do the rest of the work.  Which reminds me- I love the traps.  They work exactly as you hope they would.  Rolling boulders that hit their targets do a TON of damage, tar pits slow the good guys down, etc.  All the traps have a nice and understandable purpose(unlike most of the other spells).
I'm not going to get down too much into the pros and cons.  I'll simply say that if you liked Dungeon Keeper, I think you'll like this game.
I recommend it unreservedly.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025381055', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 3302, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3302, 'last_played': 1484968328}

author: {'steamid': '76561197990917195', 'num_games_owned': 2953, 'num_reviews': 167, 'playtime_forever': 5296, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4334, 'last_played': 1587869401}
review:
[h1]Préambule :[/h1]
Le jeu a un gameplay unique, c'est une simulation de gestion de donjon dans le monde souterrain et un jeu de stratégie en temps réel dans le monde supérieur.
C'est un jeu bourré d'humour noir.
Il est traduit dans 8 langues dont le français.

[h1]Histoire :[/h1]
Vous êtes le mal incarner, vous avez été vaincu par des héros.
Mais le mal renaît et doit reconquérir son royaume.

[h1]Image et vidéo :[/h1]
Le jeu est vraiment beau et la qualité graphique est bonne.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=503935748
Je ne me suis pas attardé sur les sous-titres car je ne m'en suis pas servi.

[h1]Son et audio :[/h1]
L'audio est en français, les voix sont fluides et le son de bonne qualité.
Le fond sonore est très simple mais pas désagréable.
Les bruitages sont habituels et bien faits.

[h1]Jouabilité :[/h1]
Développez votre base et posez des pièges en souterrain pour vous défendre.
Formez votre armée et attaquez les bases ennemis en surface.
Tout cela est facile car le jeu est très intuitif et facile à manier via la souris.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=500520744
[h1]Succès :[/h1]
Ce jeu a 25 succès à débloquer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027212744', 'num_games_owned': 204, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 2034, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1964, 'last_played': 1492401818}
review: If you loved dungeon keeper, you might want to try this one. Picture dungeon keeper with the option to send your minions outside your dungeon into the realm, and destroy the heroes spawners or even enter your enemy's dungeon to destroy him. DK was the first of it's kind and this game is a decent follower of that path set so many years ago

author: {'steamid': '76561198034928324', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 172, 'playtime_forever': 845, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 845, 'last_played': 1484401354}
review:
Un gioco fantastico, successore spirituale di dungeon keeper che però aggiunge quel pizzico di gioco di strategia alla warcraft 3.
Ovviamente non ha nulla a che vedere con lo stile strategico nudo e crudo, ma riesce a dare quella sensazione stranamente.
Consigliatissimo se si trova attorno ai 10-15 euro.
Molto divertente anche il narratore, merita l'acquisto solo per quello XD

author: {'steamid': '76561198028126448', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 921, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 921, 'last_played': 1484521635}
review:
Feels like it hasn't been revised much. They had some ideas and threw them in there and didn't bother much about consistency. 

This game is narrated with some amount of parody on game design. In that part similar to The Stanley Parable, though not as thought through. I really liked the narrator but I bet some would feel it's too much of humorous remarks. Think there was some dark humor. 

Game controls are unusual. Creature context makes a difference. The controls are different in overworld and underworld. I liked the concept of overworld and underworld but it was a bit annoying at times along the learning curve. 

Difficult to give the creatures precise orders in combat but campaign missions are easy enough to beat anyway. I focused on proper dungeon management and then the conquering went by itself.

author: {'steamid': '76561198307515146', 'num_games_owned': 530, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 2425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2425, 'last_played': 1481934437}
review: Consigliato

author: {'steamid': '76561198000937706', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 3020, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2312, 'last_played': 1509248772}
review:
To summarize this in a few words.  Its a good game. It's definitely not Dungeon Keeper or its like. However its a mix of a few games in one.  

Pros
- Entertaining 
- Gives a few different army mixes and play styles. 
- a new gameplay mechanic. 

Cons. 
- Could have speed up the game a bit as it takes too long to move up the gameplay and the attack speeds
- needed some basic key bindings that can be found in other games like attack move button. 

In conclusion, this game is a 50/50, you will either like it or you wont. Do watch the gameplay vids on Youtube before purchasing it. However, if there is a sale for it, this would be a sure buy.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960783062', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 502, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 502, 'last_played': 1484265212}
review:
Minor UX gripes, and some of the gameplay elements need to find a better way than tooltips and voiceover to communicate gameplay mechanics. It's sadly one of the two and they couldn't be further apart.

It's got a sense of humor and you should enjoy it at your leisure.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052441712', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1726, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1518, 'last_played': 1485481250}
review:
Мультяшный стиль, рассказчик с прикольным юмором, хотя под конец игры начинает надоедать.
Похожа на старый добрый Dungeon Keeper, хотя есть RTS часть на поверхности.
В паре миссий вам дадут управлять демонами-призраками с совсем другими характеристиками и другими (по крайней мере визуально) комнатами.
Что не понравилось:
Кампания очень простая, нет challenge'а. Нет ощущения напряжения, когда ты балансируешь на грани, и твою оборону вот-вот сломят или твоё наступление захлебнётся. Первые миссий шесть вообще кажутся обучающими. Как рассказчик рекомендует нанять трёх орков в одной из первых миссий, так практически всю игру можно пройти 3 орками (прокачивая их, конечно) и парой наг-лекарей. В итоге миссии кампании становятся рутинными и скучноватыми.
Однако в битвах баланс хороший. Уже не так просто даже на самом простом уровне сложности.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043724426', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 5391, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1871, 'last_played': 1507726654}
review:
Mi sento di consigliare questo gioco a tutti gli amanti degli strategici e gestionali. Ogni volta che l'ho giocavo non mi annoiavo mai, nonostante passasserro delle ore. Lho sconsiglio a chi non è molto paziente: dato che per arredare il dungeon, reclutare mostri e potenziarli, e completare una missione ci vorrà molto. Un personaggio che ho molto amato è il narratore: non perde occasione di fare battute, oppure di scocciarsi e brontolando.
Vale la pena acquistarlo!

author: {'steamid': '76561198087680853', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 746, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 746, 'last_played': 1484119635}
review:
So far so good. This game is awesome.

Humour: On point, sitting here laughing my ass off at the campaign.
Dungeon keeper related nostalgia: 10/10 Feels like it could actually be part of the series, rather than inspired by it.
Factions and creatures: Love them so far.

Definately a game worth getting, and I hope the creators make another one like it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991726119', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 1605, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1538, 'last_played': 1524418876}
review:
Partiendo de la base de Dungeon Keeper (DK a partir de ahora), pero sin lograr ser tan profundo cómo éste último, Dungeons 2 cumple con su cometido. 

Me sorprendió gratamente ver el cambio que supuso del primer Dungeons a éste Dungeons 2, el cuál es infinitamente mejor en todos los aspectos. Van por buen camino si lo que quieren es acercarse a DK incluyendo sus propias características. El juego dispensa humor en cada momento, tiene guiños a películas, series y otros videojuegos de corte medival/fantástica muy curiosos y además el juego entretiene bastante, lo cuál, cumple con su cometido.

Si bien 30€ se me antoja un precio excesivo para lo poco que dura su campaña, me esperaría a verlo por debajo de 15€ y a ser posible, si encuentras un pack con los DLC's, mejor que mejor. 

No me quiero entretener más en el análisis, por lo que si te gustaron los DK e incluso War of the Overworld, te recomiendo encarecidamente jugar a este pedazo de Dungeons 2. Una sorpresita bastante grata, desde luego.

Salu2!

author: {'steamid': '76561198139874045', 'num_games_owned': 85, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1099, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1099, 'last_played': 1483654183}
review:
5/10
Playable, without bugs. Gameplay is too slow with little progession and bad screenplay.

At first you feel like yey! This is my good old Dungeon Keepr with new game mechanics. You would almost be right except the fact that the game is not good. It feels unfinished. I encountered only a few minor bugs. But what kills the game is the gameplay. All singleplayer games are absolutely the same. There is no progression or innovation over different levels. The game time is extremly long (we are talking up to 4 hours on a single map) because your workers are just too slow. UI is not very friendly. You constantly get mixed up about where to find upgrades for this or that. Selecting units in dungeon is pain in the ass, because first of all you can only pick them up in dungeon and only one by one. Releasing these units can only be done again one by one even though you can press right button and it goes faster then single clicking. You can control them only on surface. There are three playable races but you won't find much difference between them. First of all they all play the same and second - combat well there is no strategy at all involved. It almost makes no difference what units you build, because the only thing that matters are their upgrades. At last we come to screenwriting. The first mission is great. You won't do much there, it's not very original but still, it is funnny. But further you get in your progression the worse the jokes get. In the end the game tries to play itself as Game of Thrones parody and nothing else. Which is in my opinion great failiure. You are put into a unique position of the Dungeon Master but this fact is hardly explored.

The game has tremendous potential that is never realized except the first very short mission.

author: {'steamid': '76561198117978731', 'num_games_owned': 851, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1034, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1034, 'last_played': 1481052722}
review:
Ich habe Dungeons 2 beinahe am Stück durchgespielt, die Gründe dafür:

- gute Grafik
- bekannte Spielelemente und Spielfunktionen
- liebevolle Dialoge und Erzählungen
- interessante Quests und Maps
- schöne Gut-Böse-Kontraste

Weniger erfreulich:

- Steuerung der Einheiten in der Basis
- Gegner KI könnte etwas intelligenter agieren, kann aber auch an der gewählten Schwierigkeitsstufe liegen

Sollte das Spiel im Angebot sein und dieses Genre spricht Euch an, kann ich es auf jeden Fall weiterempfehlen.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986601587', 'num_games_owned': 97, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1511978579}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198110809564', 'num_games_owned': 591, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 452, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 447, 'last_played': 1497295483}
review:
Абсолютно достойный, нет, не наследник, но продолжатель культовой DK, хотя в подобном плане пытались делать игры.
Поначалу сомневался, брать или нет, так как погорел на том же War for the Overlord, где было абсолютно скучно и уныло.
Dungeons 2 в корне все изменил и заставил не пожалеть о сделанном выборе.
Довольно приятная графика, тонны юмора и пародий на известные игры и фильмы, ОТЛИЧНАЯ озвучка (да-да, русская), ехидные комментарии действий игрока и расслабляюще милое Злодейское Зло. Я уж молчу про имена подопечных, такие как Кардаш-Шьян, Робдауни или Сел-Гомес.
Игра из тех, которые кажутся простыми, на 1-2 часика в день, но не выпускающая из своих уютных объятий. Думаешь, что пора заканчивать и выходить, но через секунду мелькает мысль: "щас вон то золотишко добуду, расширю эту комнату и выхожу". И остаешься еще на добрых 15-20 минут.
В общем, игру стоит брать без сомнений, ибо такое качество сейчас уже не встретить.
Единственный минус для себя в этой игре - отсутствие первого вида, которое присутствовало в DK.

Определенно 10 розовых приторно-добрых единорогов из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561197974238954', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1061, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1061, 'last_played': 1483130901}
review:
Bon j'ai craqué, je l'ai pris en promo sur le store... Ce jeu est le descendant de Dungeon Keeper, graphiquement sympathique, il mélange la gestion de donjon et la conquête en surface, qui ne va pas sans rappeler un petit warcraft 3. Un bon mélange servi par une narration humoristique, qui font donc de ce jeu un bon achat et un bon moment passé a se faire un petit donjon plein de pièges.

Approved!

author: {'steamid': '76561198006640943', 'num_games_owned': 318, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 2073, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1514, 'last_played': 1502651481}
review:
Enjoyed it so much. That i just bought all the DLC. Nuff said.
The only thing thats missing is multiplayer AI. However don't let that stop you because the singleplayer campaign is a blast!
And playing against a friend in mp can also be alot of fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081202728', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 877, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 206, 'last_played': 1485758378}
review:
Where to begin, the Dungeons(1) had a brilliant idea where you had to lure heroes to your dungeon and ooh and ah them to fatting their bags of gold then you get to kill them - the joy factor around this was it was very close to the legendary Dungeon Keeper of Bullfrog BUT it was still unique in their own way, with Dungeons 2 they tried to much to the Dungeon Keeper name, yes indeed they did have some unique features to the game but they killed their title buy removing so many decals that you could build and make and intently luring the hero victims.

The + points: The narrator of the game with his humor was a major element of the game, the idea you control the minions or demons was a nice idea. The - points: this is a very very very short game, very limit rooms and traps and units in the one hand.

The game does offer a skirmish option but it the fun factor dies in 10 minutes

author: {'steamid': '76561197993336746', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 365, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 365, 'last_played': 1483312444}
review:
Spiritual successor to Dungeon Keeper, yay!.. until the game glitches so you can't progress.  Level 5ish, got to a point where no matter how many re-installs and re-starts, I can't hit the thing that allows me to finish the mission.  So.  I'm not even out of the tutorial part of the campaign, I'm still getting the basic minions and tech.

Pros: Dungeon Keeper!

Cons: Gold takes too long to gather, minion management is kind of a pain, syrupy controls don't move quick enough around and you have to constantly middle-click and drag unless you want to scudder along with WASD.  Levels take too long for what they are, if you play conservatively - and if you don't, you don't have enough minions to really sustain themselves and they croak in the overworld.  Overworld missions seems extremely clunky and detract from the fun building aspect of the game - the overworld seems more like a minigame, but it's the focus.

  This game could have used a lot of polish - cool idea, bad execution.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043852064', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 808, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 655, 'last_played': 1486470600}
review:
It's an original game, it blends dungeon design with warcraft type very well. Game is very entertaining, but it seems unfinished on the technical side. For example to send the orcs outside the dungeon I needed to press many times on the dungeon door until I got the exact point. Same to grab stuff with the hand. It becomes annoying after some time. The worst part is path finding. I have all my minions running towards a wall when they should be mining. Patch resolved pathfinding so now the game is playable . Still crashes now and then and auto save is hit or miss.
6.5/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040186589', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 2782, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2782, 'last_played': 1483047973}
review:
This game had wonderful narration, a compelling story and neat gameplay. Which is pretty much overshadowed by the utter lack of content, the abysmal AI and the quite annoying difficulty because of it. 

Dungeons 2 is basically in competition with the game known as "War for the Overworld" and when you compare the two, this one flat out loses. 

Here are a list of things that Dungeons 2 doesn't have, or support.
-Workshop Compatibility.
-Map Editor, and access to all the units, props and environment while in Editor.
-Themed Dungeons.
-Ability to use the "Good" guys and turn them to your side. 
-Survival Mode. 
-Home Realm. (Plays the part of your MAIN Dungeon) 
-Both limited and unlimited variatons of the gold resource. 

And yet it's competitor does. 

When you go into the main menu for both games, Dungeons 2 has next to no options for anything, and War for the Overworld has a whole slew of things for you to do. Ontop of that, the games narrator's are about equal in terms of humor, comedic timing, story telling, helpfulness, and skill. The Campaigns of both games are fairly close as well from a storytelling standpoint. 

(SPOILER)
To addon to the abysmal AI point I made above: From a Narrative standpoint the final battle of the Undead DLC where you bring back the prime evil. The other two aspects of evil are more focused on killing you, than actually claiming the ritual site. Any aspect of evil (Again this is a narrative point) winning, would lead to the creation of the Prime Evil. However the AI actively lets the Good guys win, just so they can focus on attacking YOU. Meaning the AI goes balls to the walls trying to kill you, pretty much avoiding eachother. 

This basically culminates in you losing way more often than you rightly should, as the AI is constantly agressive towards you, pretty consistently neutral/passive towards eachother, and lets good win the day, just for the sake of killing you - One of the Aspects of evil, simply because you're the player. Right, thats a gameplay mechanic.

Ontop of that annoying little mechanic, you will lose. A lot. Due to stupid AI shenanigans, and agressiveness. Meaning early on in the missions, you'll wind up being attacked by quickly overwhelming forces, unless you play perfectly. Which is fine, except in missions such as the one described above, you're attacked right off the bat by two enimies on a set path to your base, and one enemy who randomly teleports into your base. Each force being especially difficult to fight off. 

Atleast the AI in War for the Overworld are more realistic, and consistent. 

But when you come down to it, content wise Dungeons 2 loses by a landslide, the DLC for both games are pretty bad though. Except for like one DLC for each game, Dungeons 2 has a DLC that basically lets you finish the story, and War for the Overworld has a DLC that basically picks up where the games ending left off.

Again though, War for the Overworld has Workshop compatibility, a whole slew of game modes, and an editor. Dungeons 2 has DLC - which do you think is better.

Edit: I just realized that the War for the Overworld team actually replies to comments in their updates, and take feedback and ideas to heart. Holy crap they beat Dungeons 2 so bad.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985261884', 'num_games_owned': 491, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 1649, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 107, 'last_played': 1482946057}
review:
Dungeon Keeper 2ka je zpátky! :D (Pro ty, co znají DK2 recenze končí tady, můžete kupovat. :D )

Pro vás, co DK2 neznáte, protože jste v tý době tahali kačera na provázku, nebo soply z nosu, tak bych Dungeons 2 (D2) shrnul asi takto:

Je to odlehčená, humorná RTSka, kde je dobré být zlý. :D Jste vládce doupěte, ve kterém vyvrhujete z pekla různé vyvrhele, kteří mají každý svou funkci. Je zde pět základních zoufalců, počínaje "usmrkancema", co za vás kopou tunely, těží zlato a budují pasti, až po Trolly, což jsou tuhý a velký hovada. Každá potvora má svojí nezastupitelnou roli a maximální počet "jednotek", vč. usoplenců je tuším 45. Pokud budete mít 10 - 12 usmrkanců, tak jistě chápete, že bitvy jsou daleko víc technické, než "hrr na ně!".

Hra je nesmírně vtipná. Ať už je to díky ukecanému vypravěči (angličtina), některým herním konceptům... Například "domina" šlehá řetězem frajery po zádech jak v německým fekál pornu a zvyšuje tak jejich rychlost práce... :D 

Další vtip je v drobných detailech, jako jsou evidentní narážky a kecy na Hru o Trůny, ať už co se týče postav, nebo celkově světa (ledová zeď na severu). Další detaily co mne pobavily jsou například jména jednotek typu "Naga", takovejch těch hnusnejch hadovitejch samic, co by je člověk po pár panácích stejně vojel, kdyby měl kam... :D Tak jedna se třeba jmenuje Nik Aj Minaj... Nebo další Taj Sswift... :D 

A takových jmenných odkazů a referencí je tam řada. ;)

Hra má naivní grafiku, celkem dobrou hudbu a zajímavé herní principy, na rozdíl od DK2 tu existuje nejenom podzemí, ale i "nadzemí", takže jako pán doupěte můžete svoje potvory jít nechat vyvenčit na nějakých ovcích...

A nemyslím tím nějaké prasárny zezadu, myslím staré dobré, popravy, krvavé oběti a žraní ovcí i s kožichem.. :D 

Single téhle hry máte dohraný za pár hodin, já to hrál cca 4 dny, ale docela hodně, takže ty kačky za to stojí a určitě se k týhle hře budu ještě vracet, protože je to svěží vítr do RTSek, i když pravda, vane z herního dávnověku. ;) Každopádně ironie, vtípků a kulturních referencí není nikdy dost. :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198034614210', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 188, 'playtime_forever': 1657, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1657, 'last_played': 1481906776}
review:
던전 키퍼류 + RTS 요소가 가미된 게임으로
기존의 던전 키퍼류 게임들이
주로 던전의 수비와 운영에 초점이 맞춰줬었다면
던전스는 거기에 지상 침략이라는 요소가 더해졌습니다.

기본적으로는 던전키퍼류 게임답게
지하에서 자원을 채취하고 던전을 건설해 가면서
적의 공격으로 부터 던전을 방어하는 것이 목적이지만
최종적으로는 수비를 하면서 모은 병력들로
지상 위의 적세력을 모두 무력화 시켜야 해야 합니다.

던전 운영 파트와 지상 침략 파트는 조작부터가 꽤 다른데
던전 운영 파트에서는 건물을 짓거나 일꾼에게 일을 명령시키거나
아군 유닛을 들거나 내려놓고, 때려서 재촉하는 정도만 가능한데
지상 침략 파트에서는 C&C나 스타같은 여타 RTS 수준의
세밀한 조작이 가능해져 보다 다이나믹한 전투가 가능합니다.

여기까지만 보면 두가지 요소를 한꺼번에 즐길 수 있는 갓게임!!!
....이라고 하고 싶지만 사실 양쪽 어느 파트도 확실하게 재미있다!!
...라고 하기에는 뭔가 좀 애매모호하게 아쉽습니다.

던전의 운영에는 아군 병력들이 필요한데
침략을 하기위해서도 아군 병력이 필요합니다.
즉, 운영을 하고 있으면 침략을 할 수가 없고
침략을 하고 있으면 운영이 안된다는 이야기 입니다.

결국 안전하게 플레이하기 위해서는 최대한 수비에만 집중하다가
운영이 필요 없어질 정도의 상황이 됐을 때 공격에 나서야 하는데
덕분에 게임이 늘어지는 것도 늘어지는 것지만 
두개의 컨텐츠가 부자연스럽게 연결된 것 처럼 느껴집니다.

물론 그렇다고 해서 게임이 재미없는 건 아닙니다.
전체적인 퀄리티도 상당히 괜찮은 수준이고
한글 번역도 놀랄만큼 충분히 잘 되어 있습니다.

다만 아주 재밌는 게임이 될 수 있었음에도 불구하고
그럭저럭 할만한 수준에서 멈춘 것은 참으로 아쉬울 따름입니다.


참고로 겨울의 게임을 제외한 다른 DLC에서는
캠페인이 아닌 기본 맵들만 제공하고 있으니
구입에 참고하시길 바랍니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045370645', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1798, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1798, 'last_played': 1452018094}
review:
Отличная игрушка для тех, кто помнит Хранителя подземелий 2. Приятная графика, нормальная оптимизация. Есть юмор, есть атмосфера Хранителя. Своих денег по скидке однозначно стоит. Прошел всю компанию, пару свободных мисиий на легком. Мне был интересен сюжет и возможность пройти миссию с первого раза. Я люблю сначала все построить, открыть все исследования, прокачать всех юнитов, открыть всю карту, а потом массой крутых, прокаченных юнитов давить врага. 
Если любите испытания, то просто поменяйте сложность и будут вам испытания.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045671816', 'num_games_owned': 661, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 342, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1529828672}
review: This game tries to be both a Dungeon Builder game and a RTS at the same time, but sadly fails at both.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000640109', 'num_games_owned': 201, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 2855, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1949, 'last_played': 1550924879}
review:
Вот только прошел оригинал, сейчас буду мучать аддоны. Да, это не Dungeon Keeper... Каждый запуск игры я думал об этом, постоянно ворчал, что неплохо было бы это убрать а вот то из ДК добавить.. Час, два, десять - и я вдруг, ворча, прошел игру)) Да, это не ДК, но одно большое НО - эта игра САМОБЫТНА, она по мотивам ДК, и, самое главное, она ИНТЕРЕСНА. Если вы пердящий олдфаг - вспомнить былое - самое то. Что-то не так, но и новое очень грамотно добавлено. Что особо понравилось - переживание за ваших крипов. Они одухотворены - у каждого имя, каждого качаешь - и пытаешься не потерять. Да, игра легкая, но в ней реально отдыхаешь, подперев голову рукой)) 
Из плюсов:
-атмосфера
-фановый сюжет
-приятная графика
-ДУХ ДК (главное) 
минусов мало:
-легкость (ну, тут минус на плюс - отдых в игре, как книжку читаешь)
-бесполезность магии (если в ДК порой было не пройти уровня без нее, то тут я за оригинал ОДИН РАЗ использовал какой-то спелл и то по ошибке))
-бесполезность ловушек - зачем бить врагов ловушками, если можно на них получить экспу своими крипами? ))
-вылеты. Да, прошло столько времени и патчей, но все равно периодически крашится...
В общем, советую игру всем, кто хочет отдохнуть в игре и расслабиться под пивко.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043897638', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 133, 'last_played': 1481457625}

author: {'steamid': '76561197978130221', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 335, 'last_played': 1479970443}
review:
TLDR, There is little freedom in this game, and few choices.

[spoiler]Little freedom is mostly due to the fact that the games are so short. You don't get to fine-tune or OCD anything; to guarantee success you pretty much have to plow through and use your momentum to obliterate your enemies. I was hoping for a little more of a management sim, and this feels like a pure RTS.

Few choices refer to how linear the progression of each level is. The tech tree goes from the bottom to the top; you have neither the time nor the ability to customize your approach. It's similar with the layout of your dungeon; you pretty much have to dig out all the gold and make that space work somehow. I was hoping for an experience resembling tower defense, but again it feels like a pure RTS where you work with what you've got to complete the match quickly and efficiently, rather than careful planning and outlasting.[/spoiler]

On the positive side, the game is beautiful and fun, the way it works makes sense, it's polished and seemingly bug-free, everything that's said in the positive reviews is true.

Unfortunately it isn't for me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004508950', 'num_games_owned': 1089, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 1900, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 950, 'last_played': 1491561264}
review:
Just finished the Game. All i have to say is it is REALLY REALLY good! A game with the just right portion of Humor. The World is lovely done, detailed and changes as soon as u turn it bad :3 The Storyteller... god i just Love this guy. The game is Not too hard but not too easy. Got i for 5€ but i would even pay 30€, it's totally Worth it!
The Eastereggs (warcraft 3, Game of throes, etc.) are well placed and perfect.

author: {'steamid': '76561198251726034', 'num_games_owned': 44, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2676, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2143, 'last_played': 1482234684}
review:
DUNGENS2 MACHT IM GROSSEN UND GANZEN IRRE SPASS, DOCH WAS MICH AM MEISTEN FLASHT IN DIESEM "DUNGEN KEEPER`S" VERSCHNITT SIND DIE GERADE ZU VON ZWEIDEUTIGKEIT STROTZENDEN TEXTE DES ERZÄHLERS.

NICHT NUR "DER HERR DER RINGE" SONDERN AUCH BANALE DINGE WIE "MENTOS" DIE PFEFFERMINZBONBONS ODER "RICOLA" DIE HUSTENDROPS NEIN AUCH NAMEN WIE "DaBROCN", "Tayl´sSwift" ODER "LORD MITTELFINGER" FINDEN IN DIESEM SPIEL VERWENDUNG. ZIEL IST ES EINE MONSTRÖSE ARMEE AUS ORKS, TROLLEN, NAGAS UND GOBLINS ZU REKRUTIEREN UND MIT DENEN DIE SCHRECKLICH FREUNDLICHE WELT DER MENSCHEN, PIXIES, ZWERGE UND EINHÖRNER IN BLUT UND PAIN ZU STÜRZEN.DA BIER ZU EINER EURER HAUPTRESOURCEN ZÄHLT - UND DIES IN RAUEN MENGEN, WIRD DIESES SPIEL BEI ALLEN "HOPFENVERGÖTTERERN" SCHNELL ANKLANG FINDEN. DAS GRABEN VON GÄNGEN UND RÄUMEN WIRD SCHNELL ZU EINER SÜCHTIG MACHENDEN AUFGABE. NEBEN GOLDADERN UND MANAKRISTALLEN STÖSST MAN SCHNELL AUF ARTEFAKTE DIE DIE SCHLAGKRAFT UND EFFEKTIVITÄT EURER TRUPPEN VERBESSERT. DOCH AUCH UNGEBETENE GÄSTE WIE RIESENSPINNEN UND MANAGEISTER WERDEN EUCH HINTER DENN STEINWÄNDEN DER UNTERWELT DAS LEBEN SCHWER MACHEN.


FAZIT: WER EINE VON HUMOR IN DIALOGEN STROTZENDEN FANTASYSAGA ALLES AB KANN, FÜR DEN IST DER SPIELE KLASSIKER AUF JEDENFALL SEIN GELD WERT. GAMEPLAY WIE OPTIK DES SPIELES MACHEN GLEICH SÜCHTIG  UND BRINGEN SCHNELL LUST AUF MEHR VON DUNGEONS2.       KANN DAS SPIEL NUR WÄRMSTENS EMPFEHLEN ;-)

author: {'steamid': '76561198097499566', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1482160033}
review:
Mit diesen kleinen, aber feinen DungeonKeeper-Klon werdet ihr sicher eure Freude haben.  Neben dem bekannten simplen DK-Spielprinzip wie Aufbau und Management des Dungeons, wurde dieses Spiel um unterhaltsame "Oberwelt"-Angriffe a la Warcraft 3 mit Spezialfähigkeiten, sowie Spezialmissionen (z.B Schleichmissionen) ergänzt. Garniert wird dieses Erlebnis mit flotten, witzigen Sprüchen mit Bezug auf Film- und Fantasykultur sowie gesellschaftlichen Ereignissen. Graphisch überzeugt dieses Spiel zudem auch, allerdings läuft es auf sehr alten Systemen (8 Jahrer alter Testrechner) nicht mehr ganz ruckelfrei!
Negativ muss hier eigentlich nur die Kürze der Kampagne sowie der zu leichte Schwierigkeitsgrad des Spiels erwähnt werden.

Eine klare Empfehlung als Dungeon Keeper Substitut....

author: {'steamid': '76561197967354699', 'num_games_owned': 812, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 945, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 657, 'last_played': 1558745303}
review:
You liked Dungeon Keeper?
You liked Warcraft III?
You liked The Stanley Parable? (Yes yes, I'm serious!)

You will like this one!

The only problem I found so far is a strange handling of the cursor position, which sometimes makes you click the wrong thing, but maybe it's platform specific... (I'm on Linux by the way)

author: {'steamid': '76561198194385446', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 990, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 910, 'last_played': 1697027417}
review: Прикольная игрушка. Никогда в подобные не играл. Самый сок в том, что вы тут не за добро, а за зло, причем Абсолютное зло))))) Достаточно атмосферно, что достигается еще и закадровыми комментариями. Поначалу все идет довольно тяжко, нет ускорения процесса, поэтому первые 2-3 часа вы будете наблюдать за медленно тянущимися орками, копающими золото, но со временем начнутся баталии. Тактики тут нет вообще, просто давим числом, хотя чего вы хотели, мы же ЗА ОРДУ! Поэтому парни просто всем скопом наваливаются на врага и выносят его). Есть еще пара миссий за демонов, но они полное дно по сравнению с ордой, ребята и дохлые и медленные, и все там непонятно, в общем за орду интересней. В общем игра юморная и затягивает на 2-3 вечера, но не больше. А так тянет на 8/10! Берите и не пожалеете!

author: {'steamid': '76561197993572885', 'num_games_owned': 1310, 'num_reviews': 159, 'playtime_forever': 850, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 849, 'last_played': 1482092332}
review:
The game is fun enough, I guess. Lacking some depth but overall fun,  buy it on discount and it's worth it.

One thing though... stop it, you're not funny. Every. Single. Line. Of dialogue. Does not need to be another blunt reference to another fantasy universe. Good god this was painful to listen to.

"Oh wrong script"
"Game of Thrones reference"
"Game of Thrones reference"
"Oh wrong script"
"Lord of the Rings reference"
"Game of Thrones reference"
"Warhammer Reference"
"Game of Thrones reference"

You watched Game of Thrones, we get it. Have your recommend and be quiet.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039325168', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 3104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2953, 'last_played': 1481640314}
review:
3.5 stars. Barely enjoyable. Don't buy this without -75% discount (the bundle).

Pros:
Graphic is not bad, although I don't like cartoon style.
Narrator is good.
The idea of the "surface" is not bad.

Cons:
Too few types of creatures and spells.
Too few population points.

There is still a certain amount of fun of "building a dungeon".

author: {'steamid': '76561198039374546', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 385, 'playtime_forever': 1632, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1296, 'last_played': 1483313663}

author: {'steamid': '76561198007266760', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 13356, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12743, 'last_played': 1482479536}
review:
Dungeon Keeper meets Warcraft 3.  Very nice idea, smooth gameplay, and engaging dungeon management.  
I definitely feel I got value for money. Many hours of gameplay working through campaign and DLC with 3 seperate factions.

The humour is where the game fell down.  It did not capture the nostalgic humour of the original DK series. This wouldn't be so bad if it hadn't been trying so desperately to do exactly this. Jokes are clunky,  cheap parodies of everything from LoTR to Frozen just come off as cheesy and the general DK feel that I and many gamers desire is simply not quite there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010277476', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 449, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 449, 'last_played': 1471197731}
review: un Dungeon Keeper "barato" . más para niños que no para intentar disfrtar y recordar buenos momentos , asi que mejor no t gastes el dinero. Da pena ver como sacan el Dungeon Keeper para el Mvl y en pc seguims igual...

author: {'steamid': '76561198033636240', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 1620, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1620, 'last_played': 1481482342}
review:
I'll keep it short: This is a good game. Certainly not Dungeon Keeper since it brings it's own ideas into the mix. This doesn't make it worse in any way or form. 

Some mechanics could be better and more fleshed out but they are solid. 
For example: When in RTS-Mode (Overworld) why can't I Attack-Move my units? Or why can't they take a formation? I have to micro a lot that way leaving my Dungeon to itself. 
Small criticisms that will hopefully be fixed in Dungeons 3 (if they make it, which I hope!).

This though is a very solid and easy pick, narrated by the Stanley Parable narrator who's delivering one trashy, witty, funny line after the other. The Story is full of references and easter eggs to other great fantasy worlds and overall funny but not very special.
I personally like the artstyle and graphics, the sounds are good... yeah. I mean there is nothing else to say really. It's a solid, good game that's just not outstanding but totally worth your time if you like this type of games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056713176', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 238, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 89, 'last_played': 1482103590}

author: {'steamid': '76561198035951540', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 705, 'last_played': 1482307805}
review: I love Dungeon Keeper, and i appreciate games trying to do something new. This is a game frankanstiened from Warcraft III and the old dungeon keeper, Unfurtunately everything about controlling this is garbage. It's just wanna be dungeon keeper with wanna be Warcraft III. The worst is every map has locations that you have no minemap to see. it doesn't exist, every  map there will be major spots that will not be on your map ever.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030336403', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 9322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8234, 'last_played': 1473040576}
review: I played the old Dungeon Keeper series. This is an even better rendition, but when it comes down to it, it fell a little short of advancing the original game. New graphics, new concepts, all wonderful. I loved the different races, and enjoyed the gameplay. The storyline has a very tongue in cheek humor that I appreciate. Overall a good game, but it had the bones to be a great game if they had pushed the development a little further. I played it through once and I was done, but if it had a multiplayer human v. evil component, I could see myself playing this for months here and there. As it is now, after initial play through, it is just a dust collector.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079551304', 'num_games_owned': 602, 'num_reviews': 158, 'playtime_forever': 1145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1145, 'last_played': 1481503053}
review: I've just finished the game and I'm afraid I can't recommend it. This game isn't worth it at all. There are too many RTS elements, much more than I expected for a "Dungeon Keeper-like" game. The story is pretty much empty, there are only references to Game of Thrones and Lord of the rings, no plot, no story, nor nothing. This game is disturbinly uncreative and not original in any aspect. Missions are mostly boring, not challenging and repetitive. In general, it was not a pleasant experience playing this game. I suggest you not to buy it, even on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008356921', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 3104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1766, 'last_played': 1518775530}
review:
Its not Dungeon keeper, the underworld where you can build is very small, and almost all the important stuff takes place in the overworld where the ai spits out the same units over and over again.

If you can buy this cheap its fun for a short time.
