author: {'steamid': '76561198010246355', 'num_games_owned': 245, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 277, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 277, 'last_played': 1481046286}
review:
We'll pretend this is a neutral review...

Overall not a terrible game (would have been super bummed if I’d paid full price for this though)

It felt like it was trying a little too hard to be humorous and thus ends up being more than a little annoying.
Yes, yes there are moments where you smile but they are short-lived and as soon as you deviate from the path and decide to explore your dungeon you have the narrator making comments that make you feel like you're being insulted by a terrible comedian for being slow.

The graphics are better than its predecessors but sadly still doesn’t quite live up to the legacy of its great grandfather "Dungeon Keeper". And so, the wait for a worthy successor continues...

author: {'steamid': '76561197995749658', 'num_games_owned': 1958, 'num_reviews': 1565, 'playtime_forever': 540, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 522, 'last_played': 1482254503}
review:
Dungeon Keeper like.
Habe lange versucht über die Unzulänglichkeiten hinwegzusehen, weil ich echt Lust auf Dungeon Keeper hatte (und das Original nicht gut gealtert ist).
Spielt sich sehr entspannt (wenn man lernt die Kommentare zu ignorieren).
Leider ist es zu sehr gescriptet und unkomfortabel und na ja old-schoolig^^.
Andauernd muss man seine Mannen wieder heim schicken um den Thronsaal zu verteidigen.
Dieses ständige UI Umdenken zwischen Dungeon und Oberwelt und das generell schlechte UI fand ich auf Dauer zu nervig. Außerdem zu Micromanagement lastig.
Der Spielspaß hängt stark davon ab wie lustig man die Kommentare des Erzählers findet (die ich recht nett fand, die sich aber mit der Zeit abgenutzt haben)
Für entspannte Zeitgenossen durchaus zu empfehlen. Schlecht ist es tatsächlich nicht, aber wirklich gut imho auch nicht.
6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197996994134', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 1992, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1992, 'last_played': 1433114289}
review: A psuedo-tower defense in the vein of Dungeon Keeper. Decent mechanics and visuals, though little in the way of technology and upgrades. Somewhat basic, lacking challenege, but enjoyable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077245539', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 921, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 921, 'last_played': 1481153172}
review:
"Dungeons 2" is a mix of DungeonKeeper with elements of a classic RTS and hero-development.
So it covers a lot - from management to tactical, and all in nice graphics.

But: while this is an entertaining game, I can not freely recommend it - 3.365 out of 5 stars.

And here are the problems:
Managing a whole dungeon, one has often to multi-task between overground attacks, angry mobs/attackers in underground, sometimes even a third layer/dungeon and the finer details of special units like the [spoiler]assasin, troll, ....[/spoiler], the nagging narrator, gold&mana grinding, etc.pp.

While I dig this kind of complexity/micro-management, I also hate to micro-manage under pressure. It does not feel like I can enjoy the finer points of the battle/game anymore, and: I can not develop the full potential of my troops.

Too often I know what has to be done, but can not achieve this (in time), because:
[list]
[*] The game can not be paused/slowed at all :(
[*] Selection via mouse is erratic (even with the Shift-modifier), troops are often too close together, time is always an issue (as it can not be paused!)
[*] troops are dumb, one [b]needs[/b] to micro-manage
[*] overworld and underworld have different ways of controlling the troops/heros ... FTW?
[*] running slow/sluggish - ressource-hungry!! ... but maybe thats just me on Linux (i7, 16GB RAM, SSD, NVidia GT730)
[/list]

That being said: Dungeons 2 is a nice game, but it suffers from the permanent pressure and all-too-cool narrative (dude, give it some rest).
In the end I miss the feeling/connection with "[b]my[/b]" dungeon, as I dont have the time to watch&enjoy the dungeon and its creatures at work.

Hint: heavy use of the keyboard is mandatory, and for the RTS/overground-part creatures can be grouped just like in any classic RTS: CTRL+<number> will save a selection of creatures, while <number> selecting that group later on, Shift will add/remove, etc..

author: {'steamid': '76561198049832989', 'num_games_owned': 296, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1920, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1920, 'last_played': 1440591827}
review:
非常棒的建造遊戲....主要是故事題材非常的有趣...有玩方式也非常的特殊..總體評分9/10
畫面: 9/10 畫面物景非常豐富,顏色配置也非常的完善,沒有讓玩家有很生硬的感覺
遊戲性:8/10工匠建造以哥布林為主非常的有趣, 建築物跟資源系統配合也有緊密的配合,基本與其他種族敵對時,戰鬥前後也有做出效果,以完整的描述.但缺點在於兵輛控制設計不太流暢,魔王軍裡的英雄or經驗單位戰都方式沒有很特殊.如果把菁英能做的有像魔王副手的感覺..遊戲會更棒
故事:7/10 故事基本普普,沒有太大的描述. 但由於題材基本就很新鮮,所以還是會感覺到有趣

author: {'steamid': '76561198025515223', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 3500, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3432, 'last_played': 1494558237}
review:
So Overall Good game, not the best. Seemed too limited IMHO. The campaign was funny and interesting. I think that was the main thing was the comedy of the main campaign.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031923739', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 1736, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1736, 'last_played': 1481304329}
review:
Gdyby wyobrazić sobie Dungeon Keepera wydanego w 2015 roku to właśnie tak powinien on wyglądać.
Ogrom odwołań do współczesnej kultury związanej ze światami fantasy (w tym chyba najwięcej do Gry o Tron).
Genialnie wykonana praca narratora i tekściarzy. Z początku trochę żal, że brakło polskiej wersji narratora, ale z drugiej strony chyba lepiej mieć napisy niż nie do końca trafione dubbingi.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044712076', 'num_games_owned': 189, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1599, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1524, 'last_played': 1503891649}
review: Genial

author: {'steamid': '76561198002342605', 'num_games_owned': 2060, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 1687, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1648, 'last_played': 1539919993}
review:
日本語サポートしないけど日本語は表示される。文字サイズも文章そのものも読みづらいのだがサポートしてないので文句は言えない。
そもそも半分はネタトークだし重要なことはたまにしか言わないので上部の字幕を追いかけると下部の情報を見逃すことになる。いや、やっぱりその配置はおかしい。

ダンジョン村作りはデザイン凝ってて楽しいです。地上のRTSパートはよくわからない世界なのでゴリ押しでクリアしました。

author: {'steamid': '76561197974597528', 'num_games_owned': 1054, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 477, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 477, 'last_played': 1521970019}
review:
10/10
- It's like Dungeon Keeper, but it's more. You can go out from the dungeons.
- Good humor. (Narrator)
- Good graphics, sound and music.
- Excellent optimalization. (!!!)

- There are no negatives. This game was a surprise for me.

Thank You Kalypso Media.
I will try out Sudden Strike 4 too.
They are making good games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007174354', 'num_games_owned': 568, 'num_reviews': 126, 'playtime_forever': 1321, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1321, 'last_played': 1481020120}
review:
It's fun, yeah, sure.
Could've been so much better though.

Worth a few bucks, the campaign is 15 or so hours, and you won't play much after that.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031653944', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 748, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 320, 'last_played': 1604092097}

author: {'steamid': '76561197977708158', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 730, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 730, 'last_played': 1480588007}
review:
I wanted to like this game. I feel bad for giving it a negative review. There's so much about it that's well executed. The art is phenomenal, the presentation in general shows just how much effort went into it, and it's based on Dungeon Keeper 2 which I love.

The primary problem completely ruins the experience for me. You're never looking at the problems you face, considering the tools at your disposal, then producing and enacting a plan to do what you need to do. The game constantly, literally tells you what to do, and then nags incessantly whenever you don't do exactly what you've been told. I have extra hate for this game for making me want to punch The Stanley Parable narrator in the face (who gives a great performance, but the writing is very much not to my taste).

The game is also much slower than DK/WFTO, which seemed like a decent idea until I experienced it; getting your dungeon to look how you want it is excruciating, and gold comes in so slow that you're constantly forced to wait, unable to do what you want... while the narrator nags you.

This game looks better and runs better than War for the Overworld, and I had 10% as much fun playing it. I got about half way before giving up the notion that it might get more fun later.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085640140', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 854, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 238, 'last_played': 1497390487}

author: {'steamid': '76561197970388133', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 1934, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1532, 'last_played': 1481413512}
review:
The first Dungeons game took a lot of flak for looking like Dungeon Keeper but only being a Tower Defence game. However I still liked it and felt it was a good beginning of a series I fully expected to get better.

With Dungeons 2 that they addressed that but not by just copying Dungeon Keeper, oh no. In this game they put their own spin on the theme by keeping the Tower Defense game in the Dungeon levels, so you where always defending against something (the original Dungeon Keeper lacked that) and having an over world map for you to go forth and conquer. 

The end result is a very good Dungeon game that sees you attacked repeatedly as with any good tower defence game and a much needed Real Time Strategy Element involving the surface world. 

Add to that the narratives tendency to plagiarize ideas from all over as it blantanty plays the pop culture comedy card for kicks and giggles, you have to wonder, does this actually beat the original Dungeon Keeper at its own game. 

Well I am not sure about that but it comes close.

A few more I's dotted and T's crossed and a little more detail especially on the monsters and it will over throw Dungeon Keeper and take its crown.

I would like to see the generation of evil points used to upgrade dungeons be more directly linked to the Evil Leaders own actions. So the dungeons advancement is linked to the acts the players own character performs. With bonus points for achieving objectives as happens in the current game. 

I feel the evil points could be as important as mana or gold in generating gameplay.

Especially if spells are made so they generate evil points when cast on the enemy, or torturing enemies generates them too, things like that.

I would say the pace of the game feels a tad too slow at times and the campaigns it self is a little too easy but I like to be able to kick back and relax and just enjoy building up my dungeons and minion army sometimes, then send them against a defended town on the surface and see how they do, whilst my defences are tested by repeated attacks from the surface.

Also not being able to put spell casters and archers at the back of my melee troops easily is a bit a of problem that will hopefully be addressed by adding simple formations to the next Dungeon game.

Over all a good game, and it passed my value of game = £1 per hour of gameplay provided by the game test too. The campaign is about 23 hours long and there are additional skirmish maps. So you are going to get 25 hours easily out of this and the game costs £25 brand new. 

A fair price I would say.

Looking forward to Dungeons 3 now....

author: {'steamid': '76561197974085922', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 313, 'playtime_forever': 200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1480456640}
review: A fun strategy/base building game.  It takes four or five campaign missions to really get going, but once you've gotten into the groove it's addicting to build up your base and then head into the overworld with your troops for some traditional RTS style gameplay.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019290658', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 921, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 921, 'last_played': 1480448856}
review:
Juegazo, mezcla humor, mazmorras, creación de bases y el añadido de encarnar al mal.
Me lo pillé en un bundle, por lo que lo recomiendo pero como juego, aunque no pagaría 30€ por el ni loco.

La verdad que el juego se me ha empezado a hacer un poco repetitivo cuando ya estaba acabandolo, pero al mirar las estadisticas, he jugado 15,4 horas en una semana, como para no hacerse repetido, un juegazo.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983364779', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1330, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 840, 'last_played': 1480720823}
review: Bardzo zabawna gra zarówno pod względem fabuły jak takich szczegółów jak opis zdolności czy technologii. Narrator ma podobne poczucie humoru jak w grze Stanley Parable. Najwięcej frajdy sprawia mi rozbudowa podziemi.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038364852', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 526, 'last_played': 1503669346}
review: I have not played this game for long but i played and completed the dungeon keeper 2 game, and in contrast they have made a huge improvement to the gaming mechanics, not saying dungeon keeper 2 was a bad game. I love the difference in the underworld and the overworld.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064790122', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 1273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1244, 'last_played': 1480414150}
review:
It's like dungeon keeper, but instead of keeping a dungeon you play as "The Ultimate Evil" which is evil, thrives on evilness, evil deeds and gold. And mana, monsters and beer. The flesh of unicorns and pixie-blood all build the foundation for great game of thrones references and puns and in the end you cleanse the world from all that is good, jolly, cute and posh. Great to get over the chrismas holidays if you ask me.
(Prepare for punchline)
Definitely a (dungeon-) keeper for me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023226364', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 3224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3224, 'last_played': 1452968892}
review: Me encantan juegos como éste donde el villano es el protagonista, este es un Dungeon of keeper like un tipo de juego de defensa de torres con ofensiva, con muchos de jefes demonios protagonistas y un modo historia simple muy simpático para ese tipo de juegos. Pura maldad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120803274', 'num_games_owned': 1669, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 1689, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1689, 'last_played': 1480234504}
review:
เกมนี้เป็นเหมือนเกมภาคต่อของ dungeon keeper

สำหรับคนที่ไม่เคยเล่น dungeon keeper เกมนี้จะให้คุณรับบทเป็นจอมปีศาจ
ที่ถูกผนึกไว้ แต่ยังสามารถส่งกระแสจิตมาควบคุมสมุนในการสร้าง dungeon ใต้ดิน
รวบรวมลูกน้อง ป้องกัน dungeon จากเหล่านักผจญภัย รวมถึงส่งลูกน้องไปฆ่าพวกฮีโร่
ที่ผนึกตัวเองไว้ โดยเกมจะเน้นไปที่การสร้าง dungeon ใต้ดินเป็นหลัก

ในการสร้าง dungeon ก็จะเป็นการใช้ลูกสมุนไปขุดชั้นใต้ดินจนเป็นที่ว่าง
แล้วปูพื้นทำเป็นห้องประเภทต่าง ๆ ซึ่งห้องแต่ละห้องก็จะใช้ลูกน้อง
ต่างประเภทกันในการให้มันมาทำงานเพื่อผลิตของ อัพเกรดอาวุธ วิจัยเวทย์มนต์ ฯลฯ
โดยเงินก็จะได้มาจากการขุดชั้นหินที่มีทองผสมอยู่อยู่นั่นเอง

ตัวเกมนั้นบอกเลยว่า "โครตง่าย" เนื่องจากกับดักของเกมนี้โครต OP (กล่องสมบัติระเบิด)
วางไว้หลาย ๆ ชั้นศัตรูที่มาตายเกลี้ยงโดยที่ลูกน้องเราแทบไม่ต้องออกแรง 
และเกมนี้ลูกน้องเราสามารถเก็บ LV ได้ด้วย ดังนั้นถ้าคุณรู้จักรักษาชีวิตลูกน้องเอาไว้
อย่าปล่อยให้มันตายพอมันเลเวลสูง ๆ แล้ว ก็จะชนะแต่ละด่านแบบง่ายดายมาก ๆ 

นอกจากชั้นใต้ดินแล้วเกมยังมีโลกภายนอกให้เราส่งสมุนขึ้นไปจากใต้ดินเพื่อไปทำภารกิจด้วย 
ทำให้เกมมีสองแผนที่ในฉากเดียวกัน โดยในโลกภายนอกหากฆ่าพวกศัตรูหรือทำลายฐานทัพแล้ว 
สถานที่บริเวณนั้นจะเปลี่ยนไปจากที่ร่มรื่น น่าอยู่จะกลายเป็นสภาพแวดล้อมเหมือน
โลกปีศาจแทน ซึ่งจะทำให้เราสามารถร่ายเวทย์บางเวทย์จากระยะไกลในโซนนั้นได้ 

จุดเด่นที่น่าสนใจของเกมอีกอย่างก็คงเป็นการบรรยายเนื้อเรื่องของคนพากย์ในเกม
ที่กวนตรีนมาก ๆ มีทั้งสปอยด์เนื้อเรื่อง มีทั้งด่าผู้เล่น(ที่ไม่ยอมทำตามที่บอก) 
และล้อเลียนนิยายดัง ๆ เรื่องอื่นด้วย

ข้อเสียหลัก ๆ ก็เป็นเรื่องของความง่ายของเกมที่ง่ายเกินไป นั่งชิลหน้าเครื่องสบาย ๆ
ศัตรูบุกมากี่รอบ ๆ ก็ตายเกลี้ยงแบบไม่ต้องออกแรงอะไร ลำบากกับการนั่งขุดหินหาทอง
มาอัพเกรดห้องในดันเจี้ยนซะมากกว่าครับ

author: {'steamid': '76561198071242976', 'num_games_owned': 501, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 255, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 255, 'last_played': 1480093611}
review:
If you liked Dungeon Keeper (if you're an old grognard like me, you surely did!), then you can't avoid loving Dungeons 2.
Of all the remakes/reboots, this is probably the most successful, according to me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198143728321', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1651, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1167, 'last_played': 1555442824}
review: В предыдущиесерии игры не играл, так что эта стала открытием.Игра понравилась, нарисована приятно, юмор добрый, надоедать не успевает. Скоротать недельку по вечерам самое то! Рекомендую!

author: {'steamid': '76561198256439490', 'num_games_owned': 389, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 331, 'last_played': 1475422577}
review: Весьма забавная стратегия. Не часто встречаешь игру в которой надо играть за "Абсолютное зло" Впечатления от игры только положительные, о покупке не жалею.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018590656', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3019, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3019, 'last_played': 1480314384}
review: Un híbrido de tower-defence con RTS que te cautivará con sus mecánicas y te hará pasar grandes ratos con el humor de su campaña. Una pena que Kalypso siga apostando por toneladas de dlc en todos sus juegos aunque podemos decir que en este no se han excedido demasiado. Y para mi gusto le falta contenido, aunque debo considerar que quizá sea porque lo he disfrutado mucho y quiera más. Lo interesante del modo cobate (lo que no es campaña) es que te permite centrarte más en las mecanicas y le da mucha vida al juego. Saludos

author: {'steamid': '76561197993639644', 'num_games_owned': 1074, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 1127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 973, 'last_played': 1480289233}
review: Game surprised me by how much I enjoyed it given the poor reception dungeons 1 had. It's not quite dungeon keeper (possibly better than Dungeon Keeper 2 in my own estimation though), its a bit easy and the setting can be a little annoying, that said, really enjoyed the game, transcends it's own numerous flaws.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961602076', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 1554, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1237, 'last_played': 1480283249}
review:
This is sort like a mashup of warcraft, sim ant, and dwarf fortress. As a fan of all those games, I enjoyed it.

Seasoned RTS players like myself may get frustrated with some of the controls in the RTS part of the game, they are not nearly as tight as Blizzard games, micro is frustratingly hamstrung by weird click hitboxes and unit mechanics. However there were enough positives for me to overlook that.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042704633', 'num_games_owned': 820, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 582, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 458, 'last_played': 1453666456}
review:
Замечательная игра для любителей попробовать себя в роли черного властелина!
Если вам опостылело раз за разом отыгрывать правильного добряка, то эта игра для вас. Замечательная, яркая, веселая и своеобразная стратегия, к ознакомлению строго рекомендуется.
9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198060433751', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 19685, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15422, 'last_played': 1457359049}

author: {'steamid': '76561198004162469', 'num_games_owned': 843, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 548, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 548, 'last_played': 1480193909}
review:
[b]Jeu obtenu lors du [i]Humble Nick staff pick Bundle[/i][/b]

Grand fan de [b]Evil Genius[/b], Dungeons 1 et 2 m'intrigruaient depuis un moment mais les critiques, le prix ne me motivaient en rien à sauter le pas. Je l'ai reçu lors d'un bundle pour trois fois rien au milieu d'autre jeu beaucoup plus interessants à mon gout et je dois avouer qu'il est agréable bien qu'il ne soit pas exempt de défaut.

[b]Vue d'ensemble[/b]

A la manière de Overlord, dans Dungeons II, vous incarnez le mal incarné (oui...). Suite à des raids ininterrompu sur votre monde infernal, vous décidez de raser le monde en surface pour dire que "oh, ça suffit hein". Problème, 5 héros vous bannissent à l'aide d'un puissant sort et vous ne pouvez plus compter que sur vos serviteur (gobelins, orc et j'en passe) pour restaurer votre gloire d'antant et vous venger de ces héros.

Le jeu comporte 2 type de gameplay répartis 50/50 a peu de chose près.
Une partie construction de donjon souterrain où il faut explorer, récolter différente ressources, recruter, améliorer et construire différentes salle et pièges et une partie RTS classiques lorsque vous envoyez vos troupes en surface ou dans d'autres donjons.

[b]Les + :[/b]
[list]
    [*]L'humour absurde du jeu, son narrateur qui fait des références geek à tout vas. Que ce soit des "erreur de script" où il se met à carrément tacler gentillement d'autre jeu ou bien carrément se moquer du joueur lorsqu'il tarde à effectuer les objectifs. Les sbires en manque de bière ou d'or peuvent faire grève devant votre trône pancarte à la mains...

    [*]Les graphismes sont chouette et colorés.

    [*]Un mode "escarmouche" sandbox, ce qui manque cruellement dans Evil Genius.

    [*]Le dungeon building est sympa et la transition Base building en souterain / RTS en surface est originale.

    [*]Pas assez de jeu de ce genre.
[/list]

[b]Les - :[/b]
[list]
    [*]L'humour du narrateur à parfois un coté un peu lourd lorsque les références ne sont pas du tout subtiles.

    [*]Les contrôles sont un peu brouillons. Dur de savoir ce que l'on selectionne dans la base.
 
    [*]Aucun contrôle sur les combats dans la base, on se contente de piocher des combattant et de les lacher littéralement dans le combat.

    [*] isoler des unités dans le mode RTS en surface aurait pu être plus "classique" et par conséquent plus simple.

    [*]Aucune réélle difficulté en mode campagne. Au départ on creuse, on explore, on recrute, on améliore et on fait déferler une armée impétable au bout de 10-15 minutes de jeu...

    [*]... vu que cette même armée s'occupe de protéger le donjon ou d'anihiler les point de spawn d'aventurier en surface, les pièges dans le donjon ne servent pas a grand chose d'autant plus que beaucoup de groupe d'aventurier comportent un barde qui va gentillement foutre en l'air tous les pièges un à un. C'est triste pour un jeu de ce genre.

    [*] Dans Evil Genius, différents types d'ennemis attaquent votre base avec chacun leur objectif bien précis et leur compétences propre. Certains cherchent à vous voler de l'argent, d'autre à obtenir des renseignements et certains veulent juste à tout détruire. Ici les aventuriers se fichent complétement de l'or et foncent aveuglément jusqu'à la salle du trône (le coeur de votre base) pour détruire le "nexus" et ainsi vous anéantir. Il ne s'arrêtent que pour livrer bataille lorsqu'ils rencontrent vos sbires. En gros, il n'y a rien a protéger hormis le coeur de votre donjon qui constitue la condition d'echec de la partie.
[/list]

[b]Conclusion[/b]

J'aurai souhaité que Steam mettent un système d'avis moins manichéen. Il est vrai que je passe un bon moment sur ce jeu mais je l'ai obtenu pour 2.30€ au sein d'un bundle avec d'autres jeux et je considère que le prix plein pot par rapport à la réalisation ne vaut pas vraiment l'investissement. Certes l'humour et l'univers du jeu sont vraiment chouette mais le gameplay est brouillon à mon gout et le jeu manque vraiment de challenge. 

Si vous n'y avez jamais joué et que vous voulez du "dungeon building", je recommanderai plutôt Evil Genius qui s'acquiert quant à lui pour quelques euros sur GOG ou steam et qui malgré son manque de mode Sandbox reste une référence du genre à mes yeux. 

Dans le cas contraire, il est vrai que le marché manque de jeux de ce genre et pour quelques euros durant les soldes, Dungeons 2 peut proposer un expérience avec un rapport qualité prix correct.

Merci d'avoir pris le temps de lire cette review, j'espère qu'elle vous aura été utile !

[i](Je précise au vieux de la vieille que malgré le fait qu'il ait été offert plein de fois sur Origin et GoG, je n'ai jamais pu me mettre a dungeon keeper qui a plutot mal vieilli à mon gout.)[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561197998584742', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2441, 'last_played': 1479366969}
review:
ピーター・モリニューの傑作「ダンジョンキーパー」より多大な影響を受けている、いわゆる「DKライクゲーム」の作品。

良い点
・公式でDLCも含めボイス以外完全日本語化済み（何故かショップページには何も書いて無いですが）
・システムの2分割（地下でダンジョンをこつこつ作る「シミュレーションパート」、育てたモンスター達を地上で暴れされる「RTSパート」）
・キャンペーンのボリューム（基本的にキャンペーンをクリアすれば最大限楽しめる作りになってます。DLC"冬のゲーム"で倍のボリュームに！）
・ひたすら喋るナレーション（DLC"冬のゲーム"では将軍との掛け合い漫才が素晴らしいです）

悪い点
・罠不発の多さ（侵入してくるヒーローをトラップ祭りに陥れたいが、常に敵の侵入してきた1PTには１体居る罠解除キャラが強すぎて思うように決めることが出来ない）
・ワンパターン（基本的にどのマップも「育成」と「地上突撃」の繰り返しなので、キャンペーンモードをクリアした後でスカーミッシュをする気にならない程度には飽きる）
・生かし切れていないバリエーションの豊富さ（3種類の悪により、使用可能なモンスターや罠が分かれています。一度に全部使いたいし、モンスターも基本的に上位互換化するので1つの悪につき4種類しかモンスターが居ないのと同等です）


日本でも「勇者のくせに生意気だ」などで有名な「ＤＫライクゲーム」です。
DKではモンスターの直接的な操作はできませんでしたが、それに対してRTSモードを導入してあるのが大きな差別化として作品をワンランク上へと昇華させています。
基本的にすること・出来ることは毎回同じなので飽き易さもありますが、状況によって発言バリエーションが妙に豊富なナレーションのおかげでなかなかプレイが捗ります。
「悪が主役！」という点で日本人では抵抗感がある人もいるかもしれませんが、メタ発言やらプレイヤーいじりなど常にコミカルなノリなので気軽に楽しめます。
ただし、通常価格での購入をオススメするほどの出来では無い為、可能な限りセールを利用するべきです。

絶対的な悪として、正義のヒーローやマイリトルユニコーンを粉砕したくなった貴方にオススメのゲームです！

author: {'steamid': '76561197982098585', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 2533, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 938, 'last_played': 1481786095}
review:
It's improved and modernized Dungeon keeper. Usually this kind of 'remake of an old famous game' gives me only regret about the money I spent but this one only improved things. 
Maps in this game have both underground and outside world and you can send out your minions to attack villages above ground. A huge improvement over Dungeon keeper.

author: {'steamid': '76561198099657930', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1194, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1063, 'last_played': 1480797604}
review:
Fun game. The whole overworld + underworld idea is quite interesting and OK accomplished.

Sadly the game feels way too easy, specially when it comes to the dungeon which, to any DK fan will feel limited and monotone after a while.
The narrator says at some point at the beginning something along lines of "those bast.. oh wait, I better control myself, otherwise those age rating people will be insufferable"; I think it kind of reflects what feels wrong about this game: they played it safe when this could have been a great spooky anti-hero easy-to-learn-hard-to-master 

That being said, the campaign has some crazy stuff in it, is full of geeky, funny and sometimes quirky references. It keeps your interest if you like exploring everything and don't mind being 100% sure you can win any time you set your mind to it.

If (when?) the narrator feels too chatty, remember there is a setting for that :).

author: {'steamid': '76561198024518580', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 4258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4258, 'last_played': 1480295872}
review:
Fixes a lot of the issues with the first Dungeons, has some geniunely funny moments if you enjoy reference humor, colorful cartoon graphics that fits the moods, is fun at first, but despite all that suffers from the biggest flaw of the first game.  It plays itself with very little input or choice from you.  This is re-enforced when the narrator hollers at you for going off the script even slightly, albight in a funny way.

And it's too short with one half campaign for one of the three races that teases dlc the whole game through.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080845303', 'num_games_owned': 773, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 993, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 844, 'last_played': 1516034437}
review: Köstlich. Anspielungen ohne Ende (von Game of Thrones über Warcraft bis Harry Potter) und sehr unterhaltsam. Das Bauen von Dungeons macht Spaß, wenn der Inhalt auch nicht so enorm ist, dass ich hunderte Stunden mit dem Spiel verbringen werde. Zumindest die Kampagne wird noch durchgespielt (schon allein um keine Kommentare des Erzählers zu verpassen) und dann mal schauen...

author: {'steamid': '76561198123260090', 'num_games_owned': 239, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2713, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2713, 'last_played': 1463160180}
review:
Der 2 teil ist von dem Spielziel nicht wie der erste Teil, bei dem ersten Teil musste man seinen Dungeon aufbauen und die Helden zufrieden stellen, um sie dann auszuquetschen. Im zweiten Teil muss man Einhörner und Helden töten, und den Weltenbaum Zerstören (diesmal wirklich). Dennoch kann man immer noch gigantische Schatzkammern anlegen. Ich find es schade das man seinen Dungeon Lord nicht mehr spielen kann, es gibt kein Skillpunkte-system mehr, einzig und allein den Helden (der ein bisschen zu viel schaden macht) über einen Zauber, für eine begrenzte Zeit NUR in eurem Dungeon erscheinen zu lassen, er dient also als verteidigung. Auch der Mehrspieler macht spaß, man sollte sich aber einen Kumpel suchen mit dem man das Spiel spielen kann, da die schnellsuchfunktion nicht so schnell ust. Zumindest habe ich nie was gefunden. 
Fazit: Wer den ersten teil nicht mochte, es aber mag den Bösen zu spielen, der wird diese spiel vielleicht doch mögen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066640738', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 668, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 508, 'last_played': 1554449542}

Вы всегда хотели побыть плохим парнем? Таким всем из себя злодеем всего мира? Сжигать дома и убивать женьщин и детей? ТОГДА ЭТО ИГРА ДЛЯ ВАС

review:
Dungeons 2 makes something wrong in the control method and overview. It's confusing and a little bit awkward.
Got some problems with selection/positioning units.

Otherwise, there is much effort in this game, but sadly the Dungeon Feeling is not really coming up.
It's not as good as the genre king Dungeon Keeper. Of course. ;)
Graphics are more up to date, but that's not enough for me to recommended it for the full price.

AND: There is NO option to skip the registration window launcher! That's really annoying.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995932626', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2545, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 291, 'last_played': 1548608655}
review:
Es un juego que revive el clasico de los 90 (Dungeon Keeper) y ademas le añade estrategia y modos multijugador.
Voces y textos en español es de agreder, ademas la campaña va siendo contada por un narrador que te saca alguna risa es divertido jugarlo.
Calidad grafica muy decente, se ha consevado el sistema de juego antiguo y de esbirros y eso tambien es de agredecer. 
Lo malo como simpre que tenga DLC hay tres uno con una campaña nueva y los otros dos con misiones.
Si te gusto el original Dugeon Keeper este juego sin duda te va agustar.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049726911', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 830, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 830, 'last_played': 1480106059}
review: Весёленькое злодейство, стоит пройти компанию и в целом всё. Как раз за 100 рублей.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999165977', 'num_games_owned': 202, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 3748, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2026, 'last_played': 1524858610}
review:
Lustig, bunt, verspielt, mörderisch - untermalt mit der Erzählerstimme von Rufus aus Deponia und  Originalsynchronsprechern aus Game of Thrones für ihre parodierten Charaktere. Was will man mehr?

Man darf quietschbunte Einhörner abmurksen, seine eigenen Leute verprügeln, mit ansehen wie etliche Charaktere anderer Universen durch den Kakao gezogen werden (Erzähler: "Karl Franz von Reichsland hatte der Horde mit seinem Kriegshammer wenig entgegen zu setzen und wurde vom Chaos geschlagen. Das wird ihn lehren, sich in ein anderes Fantasy-Universum einzuschleichen!").

Herrliches Spiel!

author: {'steamid': '76561198067260171', 'num_games_owned': 280, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 987, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 445, 'last_played': 1606715311}
review:
It's fun, and it's definitely a Dungeon Keeper homage in the same way that Cities:Skylines is to SimCity. When a AAA publisher gets greedy, there is ALWAYS someone to fill that vacuum.

However, there are a couple of flaws:
1. The narrator is funny, then clever, then sarcastic, then annoying. I get REFERENCES LOL but they give him way too much to say. A bit of a nag.
2. Very few monster types.
3. I absolutely appreciate the attempt to blend both the sim and the RTS, however the control changes between the two is always jarring and the RTS element seems particularly half baked.

I'm going to enjoy this one immensely, but make no mistake, there are flaws.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030764962', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2255, 'last_played': 1497988035}
review:
Ein wunderbares Spiel mit viel Liebe zum Detail, einer gehörigen Portion Witz und einem soliden Spielkonzept. Jeder DungeonKeeper Spieler wird sich hier wohl fühlen. Es hat zwar offiziell nichts mit DK zu tun ist aber ein würdiger Nachfolger/Ersatz.

Die Grafik ist gut. Der Sound Ebenfalls. Die Story ist kurz aber gut. Und der Sprecher ist Hervorragend und muss extra erähnt werden. :-D

Ein muss sind übrigens die DLCs!

author: {'steamid': '76561198049924579', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1032, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 760, 'last_played': 1480438980}
review: Se come me hai amato il buon vecchio Dungeon Keeper, compralo subito. È praticamente identico con qualche rinnovamento qua e là, come il fatto di poter uscire dal dungeon. La cosa che mi è piaciuta di più è che hanno ripreso l'ironia del narratore, portandola ad un livello più moderno inserendo citazioni di film o giochi. Consigliato.

author: {'steamid': '76561198101927292', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1708, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1641, 'last_played': 1528895347}
review:
Эта игра наполнена хорошим юмором, сарказмом и отсылками ко многим играм, книгам и фильмам. Геймплей в пещере хорош. Всегда мечтал быть менеджером огромного данджена. Геймплей за пределами пещеры довольно банальный, но простой и не раздражающий. 
Некоторые механики, вроде пива или тренажеров, интересны и улучшают игру. 
Игра не идеальна. Бывают баги, и простые сингл плеер карты, не компания, - очень скучные. 
Мне юмор не надоедал, но это на любителя. Длс не все хороши. Дополнение компании за нежить - единственное годное длс. 
Эта игра заслуживает 7/10 имхо.

review:

던전키퍼를 재밌게 하신 분이라면 추억보정+더 나아진 그래픽으로

author: {'steamid': '76561198005321567', 'num_games_owned': 573, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 828, 'last_played': 1480258780}

author: {'steamid': '76561198015158223', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 6194, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5787, 'last_played': 1674529097}
review:
Ah why did i leave this sitting in my library unplayed?  This game is a ton of fun.  It's a very respectable dungeon-builder of its own right, and it throws in forays into the Overworld conquering the 'rest' of the map.  

You start out with a limited selection of units, but they each have two levels of upgrade which ramps them up into much more impressive creatures with a wide variety of powers.  Later in the campaign, you suddenly get to switch to a wholly different faction which substantially shifts your building style and army composition.  

The Narrator who talks you through the campaign is funny, if a bit stuck on topical humour.  He can be a bit of a nag if you're a slow-paced min-max kind of builder, but there is an option to reduce or eliminate certain types of comments he makes (which is a feature almost every game should have for any speaking character).

If you also go for the Game of Winter DLC, be advised that the difficulty is ramped up considerably.  The assumption is you already know how to play the game well, so a few missions are constant zerg rushes from multiple entrances to your dungeon.  Quickly block corridors and carve a single long route that every invader has to funnel through.  And make sure you sally forth to start neutralizing their overworld spawn points as soon as possible.  

This is actually a well put-together game, and is heartily recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047518160', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2100, 'last_played': 1479338245}
review:
[b] Un bon 7.5 / 8 sur 10! [/b]

[b] Les plus : [/b]
-Un jeu excellement bien conté, le doublage Fr est réussi, la voix parfaite et désopilante colle vraiment bien au jeu.
-Encore une fois, le conteur, vraiment, un job parfait, il vous insulte quand vous êtes trop lents, quand vous ne faites pas les choses à sa façon et j'en passe.
-Beaucoup de références à d'autres jeux / séries / films. Ainsi, vous retrouverez des clins d'oeils à warcraft, The Lord of The Rings, Game of Thrones, Warhammer et j'en passe (pour exemple, Little Finger de GoT, devient ici un personnage atteint du syndrôme de Giles de la Tourette, qui insulte donc tout le monde sans raison et qui porte du coup le doux surnom de "seigneur Doigt d'Honneur", bref c'est plein de trucs de ce style).
-Les noms des personnages, il faut y prêter attention, certains ennemis portent des noms très très proches de certaines célébrités. Vos personnages également (régalez vous à baffer Bieber sans concession)!
-Enormément d'humour, univers plaisant, posé et absolument pas prise de tête
-Contrairement à ce que j'ai pu lire dans quelques reviews négatives, aucun bug de mon côté, pas un seul crash / freez; aucun ralentissement d'unité même au max. RAS de ce côté, tout roule !

[b] Les moins : [/b]
-Campagne beaucoup trop facile à mon gout
-Jeu trop court
-Des aspects de Dungeon Keeper malheureusement disparus 
-Un curseur beaucoup trop gros et absolument pas préçis (dans Dungeon Keeper, on savait en permanence au dessus de quelle case se trouvait notre curseur, là c'est pas le cas, et c'est franchement gonflant par moment)
-Un multijoueur inexistant (bon 1an et demi plus tard on peut pas vraiment blâmer le jeu, il a juste pas été assez suivi)
-On regrettera l'absence du côté gore qui avait rendu le premier opus si culte
-Impossible de posséder ses créatures pour jouer en mode FPS, c'était une véritable option phare pour moi dans Dungeon Keeper, vraiment "triste" de ne pas l'avoir retrouvée

Fan de Dungeon Keeper de la première heure, je me suis tâté un bon moment avant d'acheter Dungeons 2. Les graphismes très cartoon et relativement proches de Warcraft 3 m'ont rebutés et je n'ai acheté le jeu que sur le tard, à savoir près d'un an et demi après sa sortie pour la modique somme de 5€ et à ce prix là, c'est plus un 8/10 mais facilement un 20/10 :D

En bref, le jeu est assez court. j'ai passé 35h dessus en torchant tout ce qui était torchable, en visitant l'intégralité des maps et j'en passe, j'ai toujours aimé tout explorer sur ce type de jeu, celui ci ne déroge pas à la règle.
Cependant, si vous espérez une copie de dungeon keeper, vous risquez d'être déçus -pour ma part, j'ai apprécié la transition et le choix des dévs avec quelques bémols tout de même-.
En effet, et c'est regrettable, le jeu est beaucoup moins sombre, l'ambiance est moins "maléfique", on est le Mal Absolu mais le tout baigne dans une ambiance guillerette (c'est un parti pris),  adieu donc la belle map qui devenait totalement dévastée et sanguinolente au fil de notre progression au sein de la campagne, ce n'est qu'un détail mais ça m'a vraiment déçu de ne pas retrouver au moins ce petit aspect esthétique! Adieu également les salles de tortures extrêmement noires et bien glauques (il y en a mais rien à voir), adieu cimetierre, adieu vampires etc etc etc.

Je n'irai pas jusqu'à dire que les devs ont fait un demi tour à 180 degrés mais on en est quand même pas loin ! En soit et si on ne cherche pas de lien avec Dungeon Keeper, ce jeu est une vraie réussite, un bon moment de rigolade et de clins d'oeil à tour de bras.
Foncez l'acheter si vous hésitiez, vous ne serez pas déçus, sauf si vous vous attendez vraiment un jeu noir, auquel cas, passez votre chemin =)

author: {'steamid': '76561198068003479', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 2366, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2185, 'last_played': 1479164088}
review:
돈 아까워서 끝까지 깨보려고 했으나 게임 오브 윈터 마지막 미션에서 버그걸려서 바르타스를 정해진 시간까지 보호했는데 다음으로 안넘어감 몇 번이나 붙잡고 했으나 실패해서 속편하게 삭제했음.  버그 좆망겜 !!

인터페이스는 정말 욕나올정도로 불편하고 크리쳐 AI에 장애가 있으며옛날 게임도 아니면서 크리쳐 스킬은 일일히  클릭해서 써야하며 마법은 단축키도 없다.

게임 가격과 게임 구성으로 볼때 세일한다고 해도 사지않을 것을 권장함 

(DLC 참고사항으로는 게임 오브 윈터빼고 나머지는 캠페인 형식이 아닌 맵고르고 겜시작 DLC당 맵3개 추가)

author: {'steamid': '76561198018807824', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 194, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 194, 'last_played': 1479157246}
review: I loved 'Dungeons'. I wanted more Dungeons but Dungeons 2 is NOT more Dungeons. It is more Dungeon Master. If that is what you want then you will love this game. If you found this one because you enjoyed the more complex and serious 'Dungeons' game then you will be profoundly disappointed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007636160', 'num_games_owned': 464, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 781, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 697, 'last_played': 1479048780}
review:
Ich mag das gameplay von diesem Spiel , obwohl es größtenteils von Dungeon Keeper kopiert ist. Ich mag den Erzähler dieses Spiels, welcher mich oft zum Lachen gebracht hat. Aber der Schwierigkeitsgrad in der Kampagne ist ein schlechter Witz.

Die Gegner haben keinerlei stärkere Einheiten. Wenn man selbst die stärksten Kreaturen im Dungeon hochtrainiert hat, wird das Level zur Spielwiese. Aber auch am Anfang eines Levels sind die Angriffe der Ki so schwach, dass es mir ein Rätsel ist, wie man in der Kampagne überhaupt verlieren kann.

In Gefechten gibt es glücklicherweise einen einstellbaren Schwierigkeitsgrad. Leider unterscheidet der sich der von Karte zu Karte stark. Bei manchen scheint mir die höchste Stufe "unmöglich" kaum machbar, bei anderen Karten ist diese Stufe recht einfach. Hier hilft wohl nur viel Rumtesten der Stufe bei jeder Karte. 

Ein unterhaltsames Gameplay, dass aber an einer kinderleichten Kampagne und unausgewogenen Gefechtskarten krankt. Insgesamt kann ich es vorallem wegen der viel zu einfachen Kampagne nicht empfehlen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198033342450', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1086, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1086, 'last_played': 1493577563}
review: Hours of fun and torture The fun part is the building the dungeon the bad part is the fighting top world its to slow and to easy not really a challange but multiplayer is awesome

author: {'steamid': '76561198208612560', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 2608, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1498, 'last_played': 1691537549}
review:
First and foremost, Get Ready To Wait, this game is not a fast paced RTS by any means and strategies that end games quickly like in Warcraft3 or Starcraft are not available. That said this game is fun in a different way. Developing a dungeon has the feel of building a model railway or growing and ant colony; in that the fun is building the dungeon, not winning the level.

 The crashes and lag have been patched as of last month and it really is a much smoother experience now.

 The only complaint I really have is that factions other than horde work extremely inefficiently when developing the dungeon. The demons especially are a nightmare in terms of efficiency and it feels like they never want to do anything I tell them to. 

Also, strangely, while your units all feel unique with names and characters and unique bonuses that are unlocked, the heroes that come into your dungeon are insuferably dull, in that they are boring and drink lead based paint for breakfast. Fending them off feels more like a chore than an opportunity to smite intruders evily.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995245458', 'num_games_owned': 110, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 1501, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1501, 'last_played': 1478541065}
review:
Dungeon Keeper es uno de esos juegos atípicos que recuerdas con especial cariño. Azotar a los duendes para que trabajen más, meter enemigos(y aliados) en salas de tortura, alimentarlos a base de pollos, poseer criaturas..puede ser muy divertido ser el malo, suena cruel pero tenía ese toque de humor que lo convertía en una experiencia magnifica. Este Dungeons 2 es una sombra. La gestión de la mazmorra es mucho más simple, menos criaturas, menos exigentes, enemigos fáciles... La campaña es corta y extremadamente fácil, en 10 horas la terminas con calma y prácticamente con todos los logros. Si quieres algo de dificultad tienes que ir a mapas de dlc y ponerlos en modo imposible.

Como añadido, el juego presenta la invasión de la superficie, cambiando las mecánicas a algo similar al Warcraft III cuando envías tus tropas al exterior.

El narrador no para de decir bromas y hacer alusiones a otros juegos y sagas de fantasia, aunque a ratos puede ser muy pesado.

Pros:
Nostalgia, recuerda a Dungeon keeper.
Invasiones de la superficie estilo RTS.
Bromas y alusiones.

Contras:
Corto, simplón y facilísimo.
Muy caro.

Lo compré por Halloween con una rebaja del 90%, lo recomiendo pero bajo una oferta similar.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072195140', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 314, 'last_played': 1478118126}
review:
This game lacks a lot. Story is childish and plain, number of units is really small, their diversity is uninventive, the whole concept has been repeatedly and better done by others, and the whole game looks like some cheap disney ripoff of the older yet better games. And all the units are idiotically "cute".

Do not buy this. Unless you want to be bored to death.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991722181', 'num_games_owned': 830, 'num_reviews': 153, 'playtime_forever': 321, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 321, 'last_played': 1478170279}
review:
В девяностых я обожал Dungeon Keeper. Это была игра-легенда, чистый шедевр. Неудивительно, что со временем на волне ностальгии стали появляться клоны и подражания. К сожалению, до оригинала они не дотягивают. Мягко говоря.

В первую часть Dungeons я тоже играл. Давно, недолго, плохо уже помню. Запомнились в основном туча багов и навороченный, переусложенный геймплей. Вторую часть я из-за этого долго брать не хотел, но в конце концов повелся на отзывы, гласящие, что здесь все гораздо лучше. Что ж... здесь и в самом деле все заметно лучше, но до хорошей игра по-прежнему не дотягивает.

Начнем с того, что создатели крупно ошиблись, попытавшись скрестить тот самый ДК с его непрямым управлением и традиционную РТС, "обведи и щелкни". Они не сочетаются. Играть в подземелье достаточно интересно, на поверхности же... ну скучно, право. Это не РТС, а ее огрызок - просто идти толпой орков и всех выносить.

С менеджментом подземелья тоже все не очень. Куча деталей плохо продуманы, из-за чего баланс хромает на обе ноги. Нет атмосферы - той самой атмосферы холодного сырого подземелья, которой буквально дышала ДК. Да, я все время сравниваю с ДК, но тут уж ничего не поделаешь - игра прямо позиционирует себя как ее продолжателя.

В общем, я не скажу, чтоб все было прямо ужасно. Как вещь в себе, самостоятельная игра - в общем-то обычная игрушка без претензий. Но как попытка вновь войти в ту самую реку... не, простите, это все не то. Я бы предпочел прямо ремейк Dungeon Keeper - с улучшенной графикой... и больше никаких изменений.

5 из 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064588912', 'num_games_owned': 546, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 587, 'last_played': 1509366915}

review:
There are three successors to Dungeon Keeper 1+2 out there. I haven't played Dwelvers (I'm 100% Linux), and there's Dungeons 2 and War for the Overworld for all three platforms. I like both of them, but I find myself playing Dungeons 2 more often than WFTO. Both have a lot to recommend them, but D2 has that certain something (fun) which keeps me coming back to it.

And I'm a Kickstarter backer of WFTO.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991140811', 'num_games_owned': 5786, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 2151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1567, 'last_played': 1580740178}
review:
[b]Dungeons 2 is a dungeon simulator for those craving a Dungeon Keeper experience with a much nicer AI but ultimately falls flat in its experience.[/b]

This review is for Dungeons 2, Dungeons 2: A Song of Sand & Fire and Dungeons 2: Chance of Dragons.

[b]Story[/b]
The story of Dungeons 2 is rather simple. You are the ultimate evil and you must build yourself up from basically nothing to a formidable force that can take down the world's greatest heroes. The story is a little thin in my opinion and relies HEAVILY on Game of Thrones so if you’ve never read the books or seen the show there are some minor spoilers. The narrator talks you through the different levels which is as far as the story goes.

[b]General Gameplay[/b]]
If you’ve ever played Dungeon Keeper then the gameplay is pretty much the same (with the exception of the overworld). You start with a throne room in a bare dungeon and a few ‘little snots’ and from there you must build up your dungeon and minions in order to complete the various objectives. There are various rooms you must build and each room does something different like the treasury which stores your gold, tinkering room for new research, arena to train your units and brewery to craft beer. There are around 10 different rooms in total but some require researching them first or progressing further into the game to unlock. Units are pretty much the same. There are 5 different units (snots, goblins, nagas, orcs and trolls) and each unit has a different attack and advantages. Whilst in your dungeon your units will have free will and carry out any jobs you've set for them when they feel like it but in the Overworld you must control them fully yourself (which isn’t fun, i’ll explain further in). Enemies will periodically attack your dungeon so you’ll have to make sure to set traps or place guard rooms to ward them off, whilst digging out and explanding your dungeon. 

The Overworld is where most of your mission objectives will be found and has it’s own minimap which is on the complete other side of the screen. You can pick up and drop your units through a portal in your dungeon to reach it. Once there you must control your minions yourself the way you would in an RTS however the interface for this is terrible. Different minions have different abilities you can use in combat but you’ll have to select that unit and then its ability each time you want to use this. Considering the battles usually last 5-10 seconds this is completely pointless. Once you’ve researched and built the defib machine any minions that die in the overworld will resurrect moments later in your dungeon so your minions are basically unkillable and you’ll end up just using them like fodder. This makes the Overworld a series of clicking and waiting because there nothing else to do there. There are also dungeons within the Overworld with NO minimap so at times you are forced to watch 3 screens at once which is annoying.

Time passes slowly and you’ll often find yourself staring at your screen waiting for things which is probably to try and make the game drag on more. The campaign is ridiculously short without the DLC and the DLC content really should have been included in the actual game. Despite playing around 27 hour around 6 of them were just for achievements and the first 4 came from card dropping. $50 for under 20 hours gameplay (most of which is waiting) is really really bad in my opinion.

[b]Pros[/b]
--- Dungeon Keeper
--- Humorous at times
--- Pop culture references galore

[b]Cons[/b]
--- Lacking hours of gameplay (unless you’re farming achievements)
--- Small number of units (only 5 in total, barely different from one another)
--- The narrator can get really, really annoying to the point of needing to mute him
--- No time control so some missions drag on for no reason
--- Limited rooms
--- One dungeon trap layout works every time
--- One population ratio works every time
--- Overworld is lifeless and pointless

[b]Summary[/b]
I somewhat enjoyed my time playing Dungeons 2 but the last 6 hours were for achievements only. I wouldn’t recommend buying Dungeons 2 unless it’s on a hefty discount like it was when I purchased (75% and even then I wish the discount had been larger). It fills my Dungeon Keeper needs but so does Dungeon Keeper and it's significantly cheaper and for me it does little else so if you’re looking to buy for that reason it should satisfy your needs but don't expect anything more. There was so much potential in this game I just feel like it was wasted and I really don’t think the content warrants the price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030444292', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1098, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1014, 'last_played': 1476896521}
review: не советую. В игре нет сложности, нет баланса. Из всех ловушек нужна одна, юнитов полно лишних. Как только понимаешь это, игра заканчивается, компания очень короткая, зато отдельно продают какие-то дополнения.  Игровой процесс однобокий - нудные вылазки и тавер дефенс, оряды противника идут мимо всех комнат прямо в центр подземелья игнорируя все прочие постройки. По сравнению с Dungeon Keeper 2 игровой процесс беден. Шутки и "зло" присутствуют, но в меру - никаких тебе разлетающихся куриц, все сглажено и причесано. Игра не лишена обаяния, могло получиться, но надоедает оч быстро за счет черезмерной упрощенности.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006456302', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 2912, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2912, 'last_played': 1477068740}
review:
Я вас категорически приветствую!
Поклонникам Dungeon Keeper покупать однозначно: три играбельные расы, две полномасштабные кампании, причем "Зимние Игры" вышли куда хардкорнее нежели основная. Брать стоит со всеми дополнениями, не пожалеете!
Сюжет в кампаниях довольно интересный и переходит из основной кампании в "Зимние игры" (логичное продолжение), рассказчик и комментатор просто шикарен, годный стёб над многими клише.
Основные плюсы в геймплее знакомы еще с ДК - непрямое управление (в подземелье), постройка ловушек и прочие прелести личного образцово-показательного подземелья. В приятном бонусе, натуральная RTS на поверхности с возможностью самостоятельно выстроить тактику нападений и использование умений ваших подопечных.
И да (зловещий смех) слуг по-прежнему можно отшлепать увесистой хозяйской рукой, придав им ускорения!

10 суккубов из 10!

Update: анонсирована третья часть! Крайне надеюсь, что будет еще лучше, эпичнее и веселее!

author: {'steamid': '76561197960963410', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2725, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2712, 'last_played': 1563149263}
review: So this game I would consider, among my favorite games. Yet... once you master it, it starts to lack replayability. Its hard, then you learn to defend, then you learn to attack to upgrade, then you master your defenses. At higher difficulties it will still push your limits. However, the bottleneck is that... the hardest difficulty is really too hard to get started in, and once you get going... clearing a map takes HOURS and HOURS. Its fun a few times. But the replayability reallly deminishes. I'll give it a 10/10 since you can easily spend more time on this than 90% of the games out there... and its so good, you wish it was just a little better.

review: In a word: awesome! Every person who ever played Dungeon Keeper and was longing for continuation is gonna find himself completed after entering the world of Dungeons II. And if that isn't enough the humor of the game is amazing. Countless references to tv shows, movies and other games makes you laugh as you play the campaign one minute after another. author: {'steamid': '76561198046098584', 'num_games_owned': 440, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1473, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1381, 'last_played': 1508000066}
review:
Ich kann fast nichts negatives über dieses Spiel sagen. Ich war auf der Suche nach einem Spiel das einen würdigen Nachfolger für Dungeon Keeper in meiner Sammlung darstellt und dieses Spiel hat es fast perfekt geschafft dem gerecht zu werde. Ich sage fast weil es eine Sache gab die mich wirklich gestört hat.. Das war das Einheitenlimit. In Dungeon Keeper hatte man die Möglichkeit unendliche viele Monster zu beherbergen solange man ihnen Geld, Platz, Essen und Freiheit boot, danach war ich auf der Suche und damit hat mich das Spiel leicht enttäuscht aber sonst kann ich nichts nagatives Sagen. Schöne Atmosphäre, schöne Gestaltung, gut durchdachte Strategieelemente, einen wirklich witzigen Erzähler und eine Story die man zwar schon erkennt aber trotzdem gerne und mit viel Spaß durchspielt. 

9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198049302257', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 1025, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1025, 'last_played': 1473562031}

author: {'steamid': '76561198024817259', 'num_games_owned': 2013, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 1666, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1374, 'last_played': 1474039536}
review:
Make no mistake, Dungeons 2 is a good game. It's polished, entertaining, and does scratch that Dungeon Keeper itch. It's even funny, so long as pretending to be evil and a narrator that is constantly making ridiculously obvious pop culture references is something you find funny.

For better or worse, the game is extremely easy, and fairly short. I play games quite slowly, and I was finished with the main campaign in 21 hours. That's not much content for a $30 game, especially one where they could've added a lot more content simply by rehashing the same game, but with different objectives, to flesh things out, and it still would have been fun. 

For as polished as it is, there will be a lot of things that send you Googling. The game doesn't do a good job of explaining how you're supposed to do things, such as upgrading minions, so you're left either poking every single option, or looking it up.

All in all, it is a fun 20-something hours, but I would wait for it to go on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198264175863', 'num_games_owned': 418, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1487, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 871, 'last_played': 1542596605}
review: All in all a thoroughly enjoyable game. The mechanics are smooth and the transition between over and under world feels organic. Units are generally easy to manage and the economic system is straight forward and easy to manage. The gameplay is quite easy and relaxed, no grinding or hectic click fests. For a humorous relax session after a long day look no further than Dungeons 2.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041480966', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 3598, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3541, 'last_played': 1471814956}
review:
Dopo aver comprato Dunegons 2, El presidente non sapeva cosa in realtà aspettarsi, e risolto i problemi iniziali dovuti alla scheda grafica e alle prestazioni elevate, El presidente potè finalmente giocare a Dungeons 2.

Inizialmente El presidente non fece caso alla voce narrante fino a che non notò un cambiamento di atteggiamento ad ogni azione giusta o sbagliata e finalmente capì la forte citazione a Stanley Parable. El presidente emise un suono acuto per aver capito la citazione, pensando per un momento di cambiare la lingua. El presidente trovò il gioco molto divenrtente, non solo per le buffe battute del narratore e le citazioni a film, libri e videogiochi fantasy o di cultura popolare (caratteristici dei titoli della Kalypso) ma anche al gameplay innovativo. El presidente infatti notò l'unione tra il famoso Dungeon Keeper e Warcraft 3 nelle parti inerenti alla superfice, giochi nei quali El presidente passò l'infanzia. L'unica critica che El presidente si sentì esprimere fu la troppo rapida campagna dei demoni e la scarsa difficoltà in molti punti. Nel complesso El presidente era felice...
Ma non aveva ancora provato il DLC "a game of winter"... e non sapeva che l'inverno stava arrivando.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078402768', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1455002171}
review: Nice graphics. Interesting features, but no options to speed up or slow the game. No ability to pause, review and issue orders. Overall, not good for anyone who likes planning or thinking about the game or watching his plans in action. Its more of an FPS clicker. War for the Overworld is better for strategy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037928715', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1127, 'last_played': 1472440218}

author: {'steamid': '76561198218174065', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 185, 'last_played': 1605145556}
review: Un juego perfecto si te gustan los juegos de gestion y eres fan de JRR Tolkieny de la literatura fantastica en general

author: {'steamid': '76561198027998028', 'num_games_owned': 454, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 1776, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1507, 'last_played': 1473519986}
review:
Al igual que su antecesor espiritual, el Dungeon Keeper, el juego nos situa en el rol de un Señor Oscuro de fantasía épica, atado a su mazmorra y emperrado en extender el mal y la oscuridad sobre la tierra porque sí, porque puede. Pero Dungeons 2 hace un mucho mejor papel construyendo la idea que el clásico título de Bullfrog. Ya no se trata de construir una mazmorra, esperar al heroe de turno (o villano rival) y pasar al siguiente nivel; ahora la mazmorra sólo es un medio para conseguir un ejercito suficientemente poderosos como para sembrar el caos en la superficie, en forma de RTS sobre un segundo mapa. La sensación de amasar oro y criaturas en el subsuelo para lanzar a la horda sobre los coloridos bosques del munso exterior y ver como a medida que esta avanza se van transformando en un paisaje digno de Mordor funciona, tranmitiendo una sensación de objetivo y logro que pocos juegos de gestión logran alcanzar.

Aunque creo que lo que hace que todo acabe tan bien unido es como los desarrolladores han abrazado a todos los niveles los orígenes y condiciones del juego. Se usan constantemente referencias y lugares comunes sin disimular ni sonrojarse, sin molestarse en crear un nuevo mundo, ni una mínima idea nueva u original. El jugador es el Mal Encarnado de todos y cada uno de los mundos de fantasía más típicos y tópicos, desde Tolkien hasta Blizzard, y tal vez por eso conecta tan rápido y bien.

Mi mayor queja sobre el juego son algunos fallos de usabilidad, pero la dificultad es bastante suave, lo justo para estar atento sin distraerse de la aventura, así que no es algo a tener realmente en cuenta. Y los valores de producción son un poco bajos, cayendo en ese rango entre el AAA y el indie que tan poco juegos cubren hoy en día.

Dungeons 2 tiene muy claras sus referencias, su objetivo y sus limitaciones y el resultado es una experiencia de juego sencilla y muy agradable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048998514', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 886, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 766, 'last_played': 1472281751}
review:
ダンジョン建設RTS
地下でモンスターを増やして地上に攻め込み制圧するゲーム

ダンジョンキーパーと違うと評価が下がるようだが、冷静にいちゲームとして見ればそんなに悪くはない
ただ、不親切な部分もあったりバランスが雑だったりするので良いゲームとも決して言えない

・話の流れ
悪の大王だった主人公が人間の勢力に敗れ、地下に帰ったが手だけの存在になり、復讐のためにダンジョンを作ってモンスターを指揮することにした、という話
プレイヤーのカーソル＝手なので、モンスターをしばいたり掴んだりできる

・地下
初期から雇える労働者である子分たちに指示を出して地下を掘らせる
部屋を作ったら稼いだ資金で設備を整えて役割のある部屋にする
五種類いる子分以外のモンスターを雇うには特定の役割を持つ部屋が必要になる
雇ったモンスターも部屋に配備して働かせることができる
それによって新しい設備を研究したりモンスターの能力を強化したりできる
ある程度の力が揃ったらモンスターを地上に送り込もう

・地上
地上では基本的なRTSの動きをすることになる
モンスターを動かして敵側である人間軍を倒す
周囲の人間側の設備を破壊すると自分側の領域になり、離れていても視界が取れるようになる
キャンペーンのマップはそんなに広くなく、目標が常に表示されているので迷うことはないと思う

・人間側の攻撃
人間側も一定間隔で施設からユニットを生み出してダンジョンに進軍してくる
そのため、地上に全戦力を終結させていると気づいたらダンジョンで暴れていた、なんて事になりかねない
研究することで地下内にトラップを仕掛けられるようになるので、地上のモンスターを戻すまでの時間稼ぎにしたりするといい

・ゲームバランス
一部の設備を建設すれば死なずに復活できるようになる、これを初めとしてプレイヤー側を大幅に強化する設備がゲーム後半では用意されているので、難易度としては簡単な部類
中盤までに登場する金脈は掘り続けていると枯渇するようになっているのでゆっくりとはできない。ゲームシステムを理解することも含めると後半の方が難易度が低い。

・翻訳が雑で、意味は分かるが日本語としてはおかしい部分が多々ある

・キャンペーンだけなら話の中盤まではチュートリアルで、中盤以降すべての能力が使えるようになる

author: {'steamid': '76561198240710314', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3770, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1547, 'last_played': 1490871714}
review:
This game was the PERFECT dungeon keeper 3. I bought it when it was on steam sale and realize it was worth supporting at full cost. 

My only complaint is that it often crashes. A simple script added to a word file helped, but still the game sometimes crashes to windows. I saved often and this was a non issue. 

If you loved dungeon keeper series, then I highly recommend Dungeons 2.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041217662', 'num_games_owned': 1048, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 1467, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1264, 'last_played': 1472862994}
review:
It's like Dungeon Keeper but at a snail's pace. You'll spend well over half of your play hours tediously upgrading everything in your dungeon one by one and watching your imps (snots) mine out gold like you recruited them from the local nursing home. Even fully upgraded the snots are incredibly slow at doing anything. You can tell just by noticing the slow pace and the ui that the game was originally developed with consoles in mind. The UI icons are pretty huge and it's also full of unnecessary submenus that just make getting to everything a little more harder than it should. 

Basically this is the fisher price consolized version of Dungeon Keeper, it's slow, really likes to hold your hand and is really easy. But it is still a decently enjoyable game despite some of its major flaws. if you are looking for another decent Dungeon Keeper game after you have gotten your fill of War for the Overworld then I would recommend Dungeons 2 if it is on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111170088', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 285, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1490306469}
review: Este juego es buenisimo Si puedes pillarlo en oferta aslo sera una Buena compra

author: {'steamid': '76561197977667347', 'num_games_owned': 65, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 5676, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4662, 'last_played': 1479035363}
review: Dungeons 2 et vraiment une version récente de Dungeons Keeper, il lui ressemble beaucoup. Même si le jeu est agréable en solo il en va tout autrement au sujet du mode multijoueur qui est en principe annoncé comme crossplatforme : entendez par là qu'il est possible téhoriquement de jouer par exemple depuis votre P.C. avec un joueur se trouvant sur PS4 par exemple et là tout se complique car il n'y a rien à faire, j'ai essayé avec un membre de ma famille et rien n'y fait, ce n'est même pas un problème de firewall car j'ai vérifié tout mes paramètres même en partie rapide avec des joueurs quelquonque ça ne marche pas : alors que l'éditeur se satisfait d'annoncer que le jeu fonctionne en multijoueurs, force est de constater que l'annonce est mensongère et c'est pour celà que je considère qu'il s'agit d'une véritable escroquerie. De plus la durée de vie du jeu est très courte, même en mode escarmouche ou aucun mode de génération aléatoire de la carte de jeu n'existe et à ma connaissance il n'y a pas d'éditeur de carte : dommage qu'un si bon jeu à la base devienne un tel désastre. Très décevant.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007406367', 'num_games_owned': 248, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1761, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1631, 'last_played': 1452760471}

author: {'steamid': '76561198054921116', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2323, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2285, 'last_played': 1472387193}
review:
hallo leute,

Erstmal vorweg ich bin ehemaliger dungeonkeeper süchtling und habe damals viele sunden damit verbacht mein Horny und die eisernen jungfrauen ein paar helden killen zu lassen. Dungeons 1 und Dungeons 2 ist für mich als ehemaligen keeper eine wohltat nicht so komplex aber sehr gut abgestimmt mit hohen suchtfaktor.

es gibt 3 "Rassen"(mit dem DLC a winter game) die Horde, die Dämonen und die Untoten die alle mit viel liebe zum Detail entwickelt wurde. Alle drei sind gut spielbar und balanced (Singleplayer).

Das Handling der Kreaturen innerhalb dees Dungeons ist leider manchmal ein wenig hackelig und sie erkennen nicht was man als das ultimative,verderbende oder was auch immer Böse von ihnen will lässt sich jedoch meist mit einer zweiten bewegung beheben.Ausserhalb des dungeons ist alles in ordnung und man kann die Allianz gut übertölpeln :) 

Der Schwierigkeitsgrad des Spiels ist vollkommen normal mit ausnahme des DLC`s a winter game welches teilweise echt hart ist.

Da kommen die untoten ins spiel deren Kreatur Nosferatu unabdinglich ist um die missionen zu schaffen leider lässt einem das spiel hier keine alternative :( aber nach unzähligen toden habe ich mich dennoch gefreut auch a winter game abzuschließen! soll bedeuten das einem das spiel auch an der Stange hällt, man will es einfach schaffen. 

kommen wir zu Königsschlund der hauptstadt der Allianz dem total guten :D
nach unzähligen Schlachten um Königsschlund Neu-Königsschlund und was auch immer Königsschlund war ich froh das Städtchen endlich von der erdoberfläche getilgt zu haben.Auch wenn ich jetzt schon eine gewisse Vorahnung habe das es iwann Neu-Neu-Königsschlund oder aber Königsschlund jetzt aber Wirklich wirklich wirklich geben wird.

Die Story/Kampange ist gut gelungen macht Spaß woran auch der Erzähler seinen Anteil trägt und dem ganzen ein wenig humor untermischt.

Von mir gibt es eine uneingeschränkte Kaufempfehlung trotz der kleinen mängel und teils vorhersehbaren gängen oder aber passagen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085195358', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 12504, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7869, 'last_played': 1675819788}
review:
Honestly, I hear that the old Dungeon Keeper was better. Can't say because I've never played it. However, I love this game. I like how they've separated the Ultimate Evil into different factions, broke down your types of troops, and leveling the "Do Gooders" along with your dungeon. I like how in levels like in the dlc, you cannot be too powerful (Smog), To just sweep everything like in the vanilla levels. I do have a complaint. I have played many management games like Dungeons, Age of Mythology, Civilization, and things like that, but the one thing that they have that this game doesn't, is a map randomizer and editor.
If there is anything that I wanted from this game, is the non repetitive skirmish levels. With DLC you get I think 17 maps or so... which mind you is a good... I'd say... 72 hours of gameplay, along with a good 36 hours for the story and 30 for the Game of Winter DLC, but it isn't enough. I want there to be a randomizer. I want a game where the unbreakable rock formations are randomized, amount of mana formations, secret rooms; full of spiders rates, and whatnot. I want a map where you might fight Krowtoes AND Meltysand, or just Grimlin with a big cave. I want there to be a random amount of dungeon entrances, this game has poor programming no offense. If you spent a few days or so creating a seed generator like in Age of Mythology, this game would be at the top of my list; 10/10. This game has potential but they made a sandbox that ends at some point. You're testing the same creatures on the same strategies on the same exact map over and over again. Its gotten to the point that no matter what, if I play the map a second time, I know where everything is, I could tell you where the other mana vessel is on the other side of the map. I. Don't. Like. That. Yea, you can keep the old maps (Smog, Killer Penguins, Isle of Terror, Haunted Forest, etc.) but create a seed generator you know? The game does get easy at a certain point, but if so, the difficulty increase seems to be dramatic to me (then again, I can barely handle Isle of Terror on medium, let alone hard; only at the beginning). I love this game but its too dry, too much repetitivity, not enough creativity. And please oH PLEASE, put a workshop for this game. There is so much the modding community could for this game. People would buy your game not just for the DLC, but for the modding content. I could only imagine what we can do with it, you're playing the bad guy for crying out loud what caN'T YOU DO!? Its sad how story, non free world games manage a workshop and this game, a practical sandbox, management, evil game doesn't.
Okay, sorry, but this game sucks after 100 hours. I only play more because I'm testing different factions on the same levels, or playing the first story mission or the last Game of Winter mission so much. Overall, great game, horrible programming, not nearly enough time put into it. It could take them a week and all these bad reviews would go away, that's all you'd need. Make it a bigger game it's way too restricted and seriously I want the online gameplay to work. I want to join a random server and beat other people senseless and compete against people I don't know. Thank you.
