review: Esta segunda parte de dungeons me ha resultado muy insoportable por varios motivos. el primero de ellos es la insufrible y continuada voz del narrador, la segunda es que el juego usa historias de libros,peliculas,etc conocidos pero cambiandole el nombre, y por ello lo hace nada original, 3 han quitado mucha variedad de unidades para usar.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961888729', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 3686, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1945, 'last_played': 1506816639}
review:
This game was the PERFECT dungeon keeper 3. I bought it when it was on steam sale and realize it was worth supporting at full cost. 

My only complaint is that it often crashes. A simple script added to a word file helped, but still the game sometimes crashes to windows. I saved often and this was a non issue. 

If you loved dungeon keeper series, then I highly recommend Dungeons 2.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986463454', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 3318, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3264, 'last_played': 1483809900}
review:
Ich erinnere mich noch an den ersten Teil von Dungeons und war vom Spielprinzip ziemlich angetan. Eine Art Tower-Defense game/Aufbau-Strategie Spiel. Es hat richtig Spaß gemacht den Dungeon zu bauen und mit den verschiedenen Elementen aufzuhübschen, komplizierte Gänge mit Fallen zu spicken und den Helden dabei etwas fürs Auge und Herz zu bieten. Allerdings hat mir das Dauergekloppe gegen Ende irgendwann nicht gefallen, die immer nur mit den eigenen, steuerbaren Einheiten zu beenden waren. Ich fand diese eigenen, übermächtigen Kreaturen, mit ihren komischen Tasten-Fähigkeiten, irgendwie deplaziert und hatte irgendwann keine Lust mehr auf das Spiel.

Als ich Dungeons 2 also angezockt hatte, war ich schon etwas gespalten. Ich hatte gehofft, sie hätten das Gameplay verfeinert und vielleicht einen höheren Fokus auf den Tower-Defense Charakter gelegt, anstatt auf dieses "Real-Time-Strategy", Einheiten umhergeschicke... Leider war es genau umgekehrt... Während im ersten Teil der Fokus klar auf der Planung des Dungeons und der Plazierung von den verschiedenen Fallen und Monster-Quellen lag, brauch man in Dungeons zwei gar keine Fallen mehr und die Monster-Quellen sind komplett weggefallen, dafür waren sie nun mehr oder weniger steuerbar. Sicher, Fallen sind hilfreich, aber eigentlich sind sie vollkommen überflüssig, wenn man den Fokus auf das Bevölkerungsmaximum und Einheitenforschung setzt und sein "Alarmsystem" intelligent genug platziert, dann ist für alles gesorgt, ganz gleich was der Gegner einem auch schickt.

Es ist schon enttäuschend. Sicher, die Gameplay-Untermalung mit eigenem Erzähler ist teilweise recht lustig und liebevoll und kann das Spiel merklich aufwerten, aber irgendwie hab ich das Gefühl, Dungeons hat sich in die komplett falsche Richtung entwickelt. Als es losging, dass es hieß, Dungeons würde nun auch an der Oberfläche spielen, da war ich ziemlich überrascht und hab mir schon coole Dinge ausgemalt, wie man Wälder mit Fallen spickt oder Hinterhalte vorbereitet... Leider spielt sich die Oberfläche einzig und allein im Real-Time-Strategie Modus... Eine weitere Enttäuschung.

Es ist definitiv kein schlechtes Spiel und sein Geld wert, es macht Spaß, wenn man Freund von Real-Time-Strategie ist. Für mich ist es aber nichts Halbes und nichts Ganzes, vor allem weil ich ganz andere Erwartungen und Hoffnungen auf das Spiel hatte. Nur deswegen, mit Hinblick auf den ersten Teil, würde ich keine Empfehlung für das Spiel aussprechen.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985523236', 'num_games_owned': 1083, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 280, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72, 'last_played': 1478368947}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198005382773', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 1611, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1611, 'last_played': 1471776299}
review:
Po premierze ten tytuł nie przypadł mi do gustu, został odłożony na półkę i totalnie o nim zapomniałem. Gdy pojawił się w promocji za 30 zł - wcześniej miałem wersję pudełkową - postanowiłem dać mu drugą szansę, i uwierzcie mi że było warto ;-) Gra jest pełna bardzo specyficznego humoru i pełna ironicznych wypowiedzi narratora (któremu głosu idziela Kevan Brighting, możecie go kojarzyć chociażby ze Stanley Parable). To od czego odbiłem się wcześniej, to nieco inna mechanika niż ta, której się spodziewałem - jeśli szukacie trzeciego Dungeon Keepera, to zainteresujcie się lepiej War for the Overworld. Tutaj jest inaczej, jest bardziej uproszczona i cała gra jest znacznie wolniejsza i czasem potrafi się dłużyć. Z drugiej strony, dodano elementy faktycznego podboju świata nadziemnego - można wyprowadzić stwory z podziemi i w postaci prostego RTSa walczyć na powierzchni z obrzydliwie dobrymi i szlachetnymi bohaterami. Cała gra jest pełna nawiązań do Tolkiena czy Gry o Tron i potrafi wywołać niejeden wybuch śmiechu.
Jeszcze raz, to nie jest nowy Dungeon Keeper, ale jako duchowy naśladowca gra jest bardzo udana i potrafi wciągąć na długie godziny.
Przejście kampanii zajęło mi nieco ponad 24 godziny, ale weźcie poprawkę na czas spędzony na ciągłym upiększaniu i "maksowaniu" stworów. Jeśli planuesz lecieć przez kampanię z szybkością wywieszania białej flagi przez Francuzów, możesz spokojnie zmniejszyć ten wynik o 1/3.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035169488', 'num_games_owned': 393, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 466, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 466, 'last_played': 1471730147}
review:
Un juego muy divertido.
Hace tiempo que veo juegos de este estilo y nunca me había terminado de decidir tras probarlos, ya que solo estar en la mazmorra se acababa haciendo monótono.
Este juego mezcla a la perfección la gestión de tu mazmorra con misiones y combates en el exterior (como si de cualquier juego de estrategia en tiempo real se tratase) de una manera excelente.
La camapaña es muy divertida y os llevará (haciéndola con calma) entre 10-15 horas. Además te ries mucho, tiene un toque de humor muy bueno el juego y está totalmente doblado al castellano.
En resumen, de los mejores juegos que he jugado ultimamente.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052285677', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 916, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 916, 'last_played': 1471365743}

author: {'steamid': '76561198018634457', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 7465, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2317, 'last_played': 1479631218}
review:
I was a big fan of Dungeon Keeper 1, so-so on 2. The humor and fun of that is in this game, and I loved that the narrator from the original games is back and that it is very forgiving on taking longer to complete each mission than the developers expect or on wasting unique units.
It is really rare to find a game that is amusing and enjoyable just on the basis of having fun for a few evenings of gameplay. I had a great time with it.
Very necessary to set compatibility mode to windows 7 if you are running windows 10. Until I did that, my mouse was not working very well when the screen was busy with effects.

author: {'steamid': '76561197986433428', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1727, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 735, 'last_played': 1501258868}
review:
A la base j'avais mis une évaluation négative suite a des crash a répétition mais il s'agissait d'une imcompatibilité avec avast.

Au final je peux maintenant profiter de dongeons 2 librement et qu'elle joie de retrouver un digne successeur a dongeon keeper.

Tout y est ou presque car evidement le jeux n'est pas tout a fait le même qu'a l'époque.

D'une part la gestion des salles a évoluer,il y en a moins mais elles s'upgradent et se contruisent differement.

on a aussi une limite d'unité mais le jeux reste malgré tout plus simple a prendre en mains et plus facile de maniére globale.

Cette fois on a par contre une 2ème carte qui se deroule hors du donjon et ou il s'agit plus le fait de faire avancer nos unité pour la destruction des villages enemies (la ou dongeon keeper ne le permettais pas).

On a donc un jeux un peux plus aboutie et accompagné d'un narrateur qui passe pas mal de temps a nous guider avec un humour omnipresent et très agréable a la fois.

Je le recommande donc et particulierement a ceux qui ont connu dongeon keeper (1 ou 2) car il en est le digne successeur.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026514227', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1436, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1406, 'last_played': 1494586501}
review:
TLDR: Dungeons 2 is pretty decent strategy game.

Dungeons 2 is successor for 90's game dungeon keeper, and it's as far as I think, a pretty good one. In this game you're playing as an evil dungeon master and you're using your minions to mine minerals and fight against the 'good' guys. Single player campaing is decent, it doesn't take itself very seriously wich makes it suprisingly fun and the narrator is very good. Plus there are quite a lot of references to other stuff like game of thrones for an example.

The only problem that I have with this game is that there's not enough people playing it, therefore it's hard to find any online matches.

review:
If you were a fan of Dungeon Keeper and are seeking that same gameplay then this is the game you're looking for, not War for the Overworld. 

The pace and polish of this gem is amazing.  The writing is clever, art direction whimsical, and the voice acting is spot-on superb.

Outstanding reimagination/reboot of DK!

author: {'steamid': '76561198004466357', 'num_games_owned': 271, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 1243, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1140, 'last_played': 1471888651}
review: Купил на распродаже , вместе со всеми DLC вышло около 500 рублей. Игра полсностью оправдывает цену ! Весело ,интересно ,а главное проходится все на одном дыхании и не надоедает , т.к мисси довольно разнообразны и всегда есть что то новенькое. Элемент RTS сделан не плохо, напоминает warcraft 3 . Ну а остальная составляющая игры ,где нужно обустраивать свое подземелья ,значительно упрощена по сравнению с похожими играми. Но это и не минус вовсе ) Твердая 9/10 . (минус за отсутсвтие редактора)

author: {'steamid': '76561198048030454', 'num_games_owned': 332, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 649, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 649, 'last_played': 1471503947}
review: Game Of The Dungeons, Lord Of The Dungeons, DungeonCraft 3, etc... The point is this game is just filled with references/easter eggs which makes it great! (Also the narrator is the same guy who voiced Stanley Parable!)

author: {'steamid': '76561198259711092', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 3763, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3158, 'last_played': 1563403953}
review:
I absolutely love this game. From the very start it's engaging, hilarious and a challenge. The narrator's mocking, sassy personality makes the whole thing even better! I've never played Dungeon Keeper so I couldn't care less about the 'IT'S NOT DUNGEON KEEPER' malarky. It's not supposed to be Dungeon Keeper. If that's all you came to review, please refrain. 

I almost didn't purchase the game from seeing numerous complaints about it and I'm glad I purchased it anyway. I've played almost nonstop the past few days, fighting for just one more completed campaign. I'm no super fancy expert judge of games but I loved the graphics and the little quirks of the game, especially the slow gathering of new traps and bad guys to work with. 

All in all if you like playing fun, entertaining games where you get to be the Ultimate Evil and extinguish those smug, sanctimonious "heroes" in a myriad of ways you will love this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960480137', 'num_games_owned': 106, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 99, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 99, 'last_played': 1471466900}
review:

Nur leider unspielbar, da es alle 5-15 Minuten abstürtzt (bekanntes Problem) und leider von Seitens des Entwicklers hier wenig unternommen wird.

Alle 30 Sekunden speichern um nicht zu weit zurückzufallen ist nicht wirklich hilfreich beim Spielspaß.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997712549', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 81, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1471276305}
review: While I very much enjoyed the hour or so I had playing the game, the bug of not being able to load saved games renders the game rather useless and unplayable. I do not recommend purchasing this game, no matter how discounted.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002526379', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 457, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 379, 'last_played': 1473447819}
review:
GREAT game- I've been looking for something like a modernized Dungeon Keeper, and this is exactly that.  

The graphics are great - well detailed and animated.

The best part is the narration of the campaign game.  The narrator tells the story of the Absolute Evil (that’s you) and his quest for revenge against the surface-dwelling goodie-two-shoes that imprisoned him.

It’s a little hard to control individual units, but overall a great game with hours of content plus player vs player.  I especially enjoy the wake of corruption I leave when exploring the surface.

If you were ever a fan of dungeon building games like Dungeon Keeper, you will definitely enjoy this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960582939', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 1145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1145, 'last_played': 1468474974}
review:
This game is obviously heavily influenced by the old Dungeon  Keeper games, but somehow doesn't quite capture the old magic of  those games  (which I really liked).

It's kind of an automated RTS where if you don't specifically direct your units to do something, they will get to work on their own.  This lets you focus on building your dungeon without having to micro-manage your units (although on occassion you will want to do so).  You just set tasks, like digging out tunnels or researching new traps, spells or skills and the appropriate dungeon denisons go about the task.

What this adds that DK did not have is an above ground element.  This felt a lot like Warcraft to me and had a much more normal RTS feeling with you directing troops to march across the map and attack units.  I don't know if this element added as much to the game as I thought it would.

Overall, the game is much simpler than DK with less room types, less monster types and overall much easier missions.  I never had  to start a level again and never really felt under pressure from the heros invading my dungeon.  Basically, the game was too easy.  I guess I should have played on hard instead of medium...

Overall, I had fun and it wasn't a big commitment of hours, so I would  definitely recommend it to fans of the DK games and those looking for a light RTS experience.

7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198018547441', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 538, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 212, 'last_played': 1499838781}
review:
En achetant ce jeu et en voyant les commentaires, je me suis dit : Aie, il n'a pas grand chose à voir avec Dungeon Keeper, Aie il rame quand on joue en extérieur du donjon.

Je l'ai quand même acheté gràca aux soldes -75% avec le DLC winter machin chose.

Premier point, la campagne est purement du Dungeon keeper ! L'humour est présent, les mécanismes de jeu bien que légérement différents restent les mêmes, les phases STR en extérieur sont très simplistes mais suffisantes pour proposer une deuxiéme approche.

Concernant les performances du jeu, j'ai du 60 fps constant, que ce soit en donjon ou en extérieur, le seul léger problème que j'ai constater est dans les donjons, en faisant défiler la map certaines parties "réaparaissent" devant mes yeux, les lumières etc. Seul point que j'ai pu remarquer en 4H, je vais bien sur continuer ce jeu excéllent !

author: {'steamid': '76561198024432139', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 725, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 725, 'last_played': 1471143224}
review:
Sadly I have to say that I do not recommend this game, it has some serious memory leak issues.

The gameplay is fun, like a mix of Dungeon Keeper and Warcraft 3.
The narrator is the same guy doing essentially the same part he did in "The Stanley Parable"
Honestly, I like almost everything about the game aside from the technical problems that it has.

So, if you have some kind of monster rig that will shrug off memory leaks and unoptimized games, go ahead.
Otherwise, you'll just get frustrated with the game bogging down and slowly freezing over.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060121604', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 1771, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1649, 'last_played': 1494021456}
review:
8 копчёных видеокарт из 10. (нагрузку на видео исправили, так что 9/10.)

 Игрушка радует взгляд приветливой графикой ну слишком уж напоминающей ВарКрафт3.
Радует она и слух отличным переводом звука (да и текста).
История синглплеера и комментарии в процессе игры на высоком уровне, хотя позже немного приедаются постоянным подшучиванием на одну и ту же тему.

Имеются недочёты при работе с интерфейсом - но они минимальны. 

Самый главный минус - адская нагрузка на видео, где, например, моя 750Ti топит как GTA5 на средних настройках, хотя, казалось бы, картинка не такая уж и детализированная.(было, а теперь всё норм)

Игру однозначно рекомендую, тем более по скидкам, которые на неё уже действуют, поскольку она не так уж нова, однако, я длс к ней брать не буду - увидев там сюжет связанный с зимой поржал когда припомнил как потрогал трубку охладения видюхи и обжёгся. наверное это была очередная подколка от разрабов.

ЗЫ) мультиплеер не опробовал.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000910848', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1471426560}
review:
Les concepteurs de ce jeu n'ont pas pris la peine d'autoriser la réattribution des touches destinées au déplacement de la camera. Résultat elles sont en Querty. Tout le reste peut être réattribué sauf celles-là alors que ce sont les plus importantes ! Inacceptable. 

Et je me fous qu'il me suffise de passer mon clavier en Querty. Si ça vous arrange, ils ont qu'à faire le mapping en AZERTY et vous laisser transformer vos claviers de querty en azerty.

C'est de la merde !

author: {'steamid': '76561198008316896', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 944, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 944, 'last_played': 1471569870}
review:
Jetzt ist das Spiel garnicht mal schlecht ;) 

Leider °Mobil° mit Basteln verbunden....

i7 4702MQ 2.2Ghz -3.2Ghz 
Intel HD 4600 / GTX760M 
32GB DDR3 1333Mhz 

Win 10 Pro 64Bit Stand Update: 1607
Kaspersky Anti-Virus 

Lösungsansatz:

1. Gefore Treiber deinstallieren (aktuell)
2. Geforce Treiberversion 353.54 installieren 
3. Nvidia Einstellungen / 3D Einstellung verwalten / Pfad hinzufügen zu Programmeinstellungen -> NVIDIA Hochleistungsprozessor auswählen 
4. Pfad Dungeon 2 öffnen / Dungeon 2 exe / Admin + Komp. Win 7
5. ThrottleStop 8.10 (für i7 Gen 4) / neues Profil / set Multiplier 28T (2,8Ghz) 
Temp ~80C° -> PROCHOT 93C°

Grafikeinstellungen: 
1920x1080
Niedrig / Mittel (flüssig ~80C°) 
Hoch (lag Temp ~90C°) -> Lag durch Temperaturabriegelung setzt einen Takt aus...

Behobene Probleme: 

1. Einfrieren der Maus 
2. Einfrieren des gesamten Spieles 
3. Slowdowns / lags 
4. zu hohe Temperatur 

weiterhin vorhanden: 

1. Fehlermeldung beim Starte (mit "OK" quittieren

author: {'steamid': '76561198202556707', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 13117, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1104, 'last_played': 1693346045}
review:
Amazing game, i was waiting for a remake for 2 games. Dungeon Keeper II and Battle Realms. for now at least on of this two dreams is true. but there is 3 notes :

- The creatures number is too low. i know it is about 12 creatures or each faction  but at the end of the day we are talking about 4 main creatures which you have to improve off course. in DC II there was about 12 dif creatures. for now i wish that they can add a DLC with a 5th creatures type for each faction and in Dungeons III make it 7 or 8 creatures with one upgrade only.

- The Rooms are really few. i mean you can build the necessary rooms only. i wish if they can add a Casino, Bar or a tavern also Jail or something.

- Add more skirmish maps it is August and we have about 12 maps only. they must make a way so we can create maps or at least release 4-5 maps every month.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993681150', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 12782, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12496, 'last_played': 1474021149}
review:
Игра достойная! Но те, кто сравнивает ее с DК3 не правы. Они похожи также, как NFS и TDU. Прошел все карты, играл всеми фракциями. Действительно, сложность кампаний и первых одиночных карт была не очень высокая. Однако в последней миссии второй кампании вдруг началось полное жоподралово! Особо доставляли альтернативные представители Зла). Рекомендую сначала валить демонов и только потом орков. А вот в доп картах нового формата разрабы явно перестарались. Всю игру прошел на уровне "трудно". Это всего лишь вторая ступень по сложности. Но некоторые карты можно пройти играя ТОЛЬКО за определенную фракцию и строго выполняя каждое свое действие по секундам в самом начале. Причем игра подстраивается под вас. Если подземелье не очень развито - она пришлет отряд послабее. А если вы, поняв что, где и как нужно строить и апгрейдить, решили, что вы умней игры - она пришлет уже совсем другой отряд. Да еще и не один! Я даже не стал пробовать брать сложность выше, ибо явный дисбаланс сил. Но если вы выжили в первые 20-25 минут, то дальше вполне можно играть.
Локализация отменная! Перевод и озвучка достойные! Не часто сейчас такое встретишь в обычных стратегиях.
Самая интересная фракция - это умертвия. Но и самая сложная. У них вообще нет лекарей, а лечение в подземелье практически бесполезное. В основном обновление происходит за счет (что забавно) смерти собственного моба. Они не умирают и не пропадают, как у двух других фракций, что крайне удобно и не надо об этом париться. Они обновляются на кладбище. Удобно, но слишком долго... Однако ими не все миссии можно пройти. Скажем у орков сразу доступны ряд важных комнат для постройки. У демонов очень простое лечение, которое доступно вообще сразу. Также (почему-то) у них уже есть возможность строить кузницу, да еще и апнутую по скорости. А у умертвий нет вообще ничего. И на все нужно время и ресурсы. И еще один момент (минус) - эта фракция весьма глючная. Часто и много тупят, что иногда может и подставить. В игре достаточно мелких багов. Не критичных, но неприятных.
Отмечу один большой минус для себя - ОЧЕНЬ КРУПНОЕ ИЗОБРАЖЕНИЕ! Отдалить карту, как это можно было даже на древних компах играя в ДК3 тут нельзя. И на моем 32-дюймовом мониторе выглядит все ну оооочень крупно, да и возможности занять суперпозицию тоже не хватает.
Игра достойная! Всем почитателям данного направления рекомендую!

author: {'steamid': '76561198157234393', 'num_games_owned': 232, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 603, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 541, 'last_played': 1546313038}

author: {'steamid': '76561197979141701', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1708, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1258, 'last_played': 1470250148}
review:
With mixed feelings, I'm recommending this game.  Read on for the full review and gamer beware.

Dungeons 2 is a worthy heir to Dungeon Keeper legacy and also throws in some War Craft style RTS gameplay.  The mechanics are incredibly polished and storyline is very tongue-in-cheek but amazingly thought out and scripted.  Anyone who was a fan of the original Dungeon Keeper franchise, or RTS's in general will definitely enjoy this title.

Now for the issues which gave me pause.  Unfortunately, I just paid $30 for a tutorial campaign.  That is unacceptable Kalypso.  I love your franchise and this was a COMPLETE DISSERVICE.  After spending less time to complete than almost any other game I've played, it ended just as soon as it had begun, LITERALLY TELLING YOU 'Now comes the real game', and, oh yeah, BUY IT!  As to why I say it's a tutorial campaign, you literally CAN NOT LOSE!  The entire campaign was designed to familiarize the player with the mechanics and trickled just enough resistance to only slow you down before utterly overwhelming your opponent.  Every level was designed to encourage you to easily research all upgrades and 'sandbox' your way to victory at your own pace.  Also, ala Starcraft, you're given the opportunity to try 2 different factions and the third, which I assume wasn't ready for release, is destined for DLC.  Again, the keyword is "TRY".  Even the Heores of Might and Magic franchise provides secondary campaigns with it's admitedly easy to complete tutorials >_<

So yes, with a heavy heart, I recommend this game, but only bcause of what it could be, not because of the TUTORIAL I just completed.  How about throwing us gamers that purchased this product a complentary, real, campaign?

author: {'steamid': '76561197977169082', 'num_games_owned': 200, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1840, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1840, 'last_played': 1469748047}

author: {'steamid': '76561198007267250', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 3847, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3030, 'last_played': 1604590805}
review:
So to start off.

What is a nice throwback and attempt at Dungeonkeeper with some twists on it, its got some issues. Its a great concept and though i said the same about the first Dungeons, this one is actually better and more true to the concept. 

Do note, the gameplay ends up like trying to plug and save a leaking/sinking ship ( depending on how good your at it). Where youll be desperately trying to find gold, fend off waves of enemies and meet the games grueling demands of quest goals. (TL;DR at the bottom, but i advise to read all of it before you buy.)

* The game (and every individual map) actually starts really effing slow. 
Youl find yourself waiting a long ass time for your workers to do anything, especially when your clearing out large rooms. Even more so when those happen to have gold nodes that take longer and has them scurrying off to the nearest gold pile. Youl end up waiting a long time on your mana and research as well. Even more since you need mana and gold to even start your research. (all of it is needless to say, very slow).

* Only when youve risen up a tier or two (3 tiers total) will you get the good stuff instead of the same old bland newbie stuff mission after mission. 
In the campaign, this means nearing the mid and end of the campaign. 
In single this means collecting evil and when you do, theres really only a research need for your minions, not your workers, since theyve usually already done all the digging you need. All they do now is just stand around collecting gold and placing it at their feet (if your smart enough to place a treasury there.)

Hope to christ you have an unlimited gold node on your map (usually is when your mid campaign, try searching the edges of the map) Or your already boned...

The narrator is the same guy from the Stanley Parable, i love his voice and the guys a pro. But the script at times is really forced and cringy and META as FUCK. The best laughs i had were smirks and mild 'ah, i see the reference now' moments. And those get hammered in on repeat till your sick of it.

Its fun to have certain minions from the start till the end, level up, gain more fighting power, a new look and class, more side jobs skill and even titles from finding power books or doing stuff. You get attached so to speak. And the design of most of the units is quite well done. Others (like the naga or the spider bugs) look bland and boring. 

With the Winter expansion, youl be playing 3 evil sides in total. Each with their own play style, units and feel. With some elements staying the same, which is nice. 


On to the more annoying stuff:
Important: THIS GAME DOES NOT GIVE YOU A FUCKING BREAK! ......EVER!!!!!
* Where the campaign starts off slow as fuck. Youl find yourself to be always in need to get all upgrades for your tier before your able to do stuff without too many casualties (they recover at your base, if you have the proper room and devices, thank fuck for that, but it takes a while) 
* As you progress, youl find yourself swamped with wave after wave after wave of increasingly more powerful enemies. At a rate thats actually quite unpleasant and hard to follow because of slow income and reasearch times.
* While you can make long, snaking tunnels filled with traps and doors to bar out invaders, which mind you youve just spent ages researching in between waves and assaults and pay days, youl find that in most invasion parties (Youl mostly be facing the alliance), which even at the very first wave, has a bard. A halfling Bard. Eventually this will be 2-3 Halfling bards. 
This fucker is IMMUNE TO ALL TRAPS and does not trigger them, is programmed to (when seeing a door or trap) head out with the party halted nearby and disarm your doors and traps....as an AOE...yup an area disarm....allowing his remaining party of death to just waltz through your tunnel as if they owned the damn place...
Oh, and the bard also heals and gives a boost to his allies.  YOU WILL HATE THIS FUCKER
Dont even bother setting traps unless its the exploding kind. Heroes cannot help but hit those and get AOE damage (except the effing bard) Or the teleportation thing which is a 1 hit kill for anything enemy like. All of this results that you have to rally your minions to the intrusion anyways...having them run away form their important ( and fucking time consuming) tasks, like research and mana collection for a higher unit cap. Oh and forget picking them up one by one...and placing them down again, one by one...(which even has a small delay on it, fuck that noise). Your dudes will lie there for a second or so and then hobble up, WHILE GETTING ATTACKED if you were careless. So use the rally spell and wait for them to run over.


* Just as important events are starting, which usually are timed and result in an instant GAME OVER, youl find that your still reeling from yet another pay day, yet another wave incoming, or a sudden demon gate spawning end tier demons near your dungeon heart. And youl actually barely be on par to deal with the issue at hand. 

* Timers are too short, enemies have stupid buffs and a lot of support units. Youl get shelled from catapults and towers. Invaded by demons just out of effing nowhere (again, do not even bother setting traps, just set up a guard room with an alarm so that only nearby minions will stop their tasks). 

* Didnt manage to kill that passing caravan i just announced and only needs 2:45 seconds to reach the town?  of which you need a good 30secs to mobilize your forces?  Tough shit asshole, game over or i just made it extra hard for you....oh look, another hero spawner!

* Enemies will heal their allies in an instant for nealy more than half their health. They will charm your units and may even give their allies nasty buffs. Oh, and usually come in 2-3 of everything.  Squad of a bard, 4 amazon berserker ladies and 2 elf druid healers?  yup. 

* Always upgrade your minions to a full unit cap, they arent only better at fighting but also their side jobs. Saving you valuable moments of your life. 

* My God everything is expensive 0.0, you can easily toss 10K on a room with devices. Knowing that a typical worker rakes in between 40-70 gold per haul, thats expensive... And tedious.....And youl need to choose, workers or minions, since both count towards unit cap.  More income and get fucked by the enemy? or have a good army that bleeds you dry. Fun...

* Pay Days are the worst -_- , youve just had one, and lost around 2K in funds. Everyones back to their chores or fighting a wave or resting after having died! and when your workers manage to regain that 2K ...oh guess what , its 'pay day'. Fuck me...i thought 'Payday 2' was economy heavy, Jeezus...

* Cant afford to pay your dudes? Need more housing or food but cant afford it? ouch, tough break Chummer. Were all on strike now!  Fuck working for you! We require more Money Pile-ons (get it?).

* Youl easily find yourself having to do the same map over again for 2-3 times. given your luck maybe even more. And dread to dig in certain areas because of the possible monster spawners there that release an unGodly amount of spiders, weird looking dog lizards and worse homing in for your dungeon Core. Which you need to end or YOU WILL DIE. 

* The entire game feels like your trying to paddle upstream in a leaking and sinking little boat. Constantly trying to replug holes and dunk water overboard while paddling. Once you manage to seal all your holes and get the water out, your good to go, but man is that a chore. And a game isnt supposed to be a chore.

TL;DR:
Game feels like a chore and has enormous potential to be a salt mine for people. 
But damn it if im not invested to see it through...
Still better than Impire.
Recommended cause you get as invested in this as i am. If only just to finish this fucker.

author: {'steamid': '76561198233897628', 'num_games_owned': 69, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 708, 'last_played': 1522906935}

author: {'steamid': '76561198044573399', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 2154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 263, 'last_played': 1660714435}
review:
The game mechanics are not that bad although they are a bit tedious since you have to pick your defenders up literally and move them around by HAND. Granted eventually you figure out how to grab multiple enemies at once but something so critical is not taught in the tutorial.

The constant nagging if you want to play at a slower pace is also very annoying. The constant gold drain with limited income turns this game into a time sensitive game that forces you to micro manage a lot. Some will like that and some wont. I don't. This would be a far more fun game if they let you take your time with it and enjoy building your dungeon up more. Instead it is constantly nagging you to hurry up and finish the objective.

regardless of all that I would give it a thumbs up EXCEPT that the game constantly crashes to the point it should not even be allowed to be sold until they fix it because the constant crashes make it unplayable. No game is fun if you can play it ...

author: {'steamid': '76561197963625792', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 160, 'playtime_forever': 2395, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2393, 'last_played': 1479901026}
review:
Annoying popup at the start where you have to press "skip" every time, then "play game", after you've already launched the game from steam.

Hand holding tutorial in place of campaign, works off of triggers (you can't really skip ahead, invulnerable monsters etc).

Terrible narrator dialog "the goody goody town of goody goodyness". Show don't tell.

Compared to Dungeon Keeper:
Less things, more upgrades.
Less organic dungeon, more RTS.

All the things are there. The "minions". Slapping them. Digging out a dungeon. Placing rooms. 

But it all feels a lot more constricted, and pressured. You can't evolve an evil empire. You have to rush build orcs to fight constant incoming waves that just waltz in from the get-go in every single map.

The one good thing that they have done, is the ability to place back corridors (an issue in the original DK if you just mined out too much, and couldn't make rooms properly. Making it more possible to make an obstacle course for incoming enemies.

Not sure how effective vs players they are, but you can just lightning/fire the halflings of the party, and let the other monsters kill themselves on traps, which is handy if you want to be out adventuring all the time.

Speaking of which, there don't seem to be any down sides to always having your monsters outside - they don't rebel, or get angry/tired. Payday seems to instantly drop gold on them.

The overworld changing appearance is really nice - but it is possible to get your creatures stuck behind scenery. And then there's no way to kill them, meaning that they've just permanently eaten those population slots.

This game doesn't have a useful wiki that I can find either. I had to use trial-and-error to figure out which upgrades did what, and how to get better monster tiers.

(Note: reviewed after game crashed half way through a campaign map and no save. grr.)

After all that, I've managed to finish the token campaign, and get most of the achievements (the mana one being a little absurd)

To find that the game doesn't really have a functioning multiplayer.

There are 6 maps, and no way to search for games online. Or AI.

You either have friends that play this, or it's a very short game indeed.

As for whether it's even balanced for multiplayer, I can't really tell.

It looks like they wanted to put even more races in to it, but just never got the chance, before they ran out of budget.

The whole game feels a bit like that really.

At £2.50, this game would be worth it. At £25.00, not snowflake's chance in hell.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037003719', 'num_games_owned': 4057, 'num_reviews': 385, 'playtime_forever': 649, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 649, 'last_played': 1468690677}
review:
《Dungeons 2》是一款結合即時戰略要素的地城模擬經營遊戲，玩家在遊戲中扮演地城領主【The Ultimate Evil】，與眾英雄們在 King's Ending 交戰時不幸戰敗，力量被封印的地城領主躲進地底世界，只剩下名為【Hand of Terror】手掌能夠自由活動，地城領主決定將入侵地表擊潰正義勢力的重責大任交給忠心的手下。俗話說得好：『君子報仇三年不晚。』，耐心潛伏在地底世界的同時，我們可以擴建地城，建立各項設施來挖掘金礦、研發科技、培育士兵、以及學習法術，最後也不要忘記設立陷阱防範不請自來的冒險者們。


既然提到本作是款模擬經營遊戲，玩家在空間歸納、設施營造、以及資源分配等處理的好壞，都會直接影響到邪惡勢力是否能擊敗正義勢力以取得最終勝利。富國強民的第一步就是確保資源充足，《Dungeons 2》總共有兩項主要資源，分別是金錢與法力，先談談金錢可以拿來做甚麼事情，金錢用途非常廣泛，除了是建造各項設施的必要資源外，生產作戰單位也要花費金錢，且每隔一段時間作戰單位都會到財寶庫領取薪資，如果沒有充足金錢給付薪資，他們可是會耍脾氣罷工的喔！（雖然筆者都直接把抗議份子丟到地獄處死）

法力相較於金幣就比較沒那麼重要了，法力主要是由水晶提供，不再是由勞工挖掘取得，而是透過蛇人族施展儀式來抽取法力，法力除了可以用來研發法術之外，配合金錢資源使用，還能夠提升人口數量上限，讓玩家得以生產更多單位協助作戰。不得不吐槽一下，法力真的是非常雞肋的主要資源，主要原因是法術使用條件必須要在被統治範圍內，這代表著玩家只能在地城或是敵人死光的已佔領區域施放法術，加上好用的法術不多，當遊戲進行到後期階段時，玩家會出現法力資源多到用不完，也不知道該用在哪裡的窘境。


掌握主要資源的運用方法後，接下來就是滿足作戰單位的娛樂需求，要成為一名體恤員工的好老闆，首先一定要了解底下員工的興趣喜好，以單人劇情戰役的主要陣營【Horde】的作戰單位來說，酗酒（和欺負勞工）成為他們最主要的消遣娛樂，所以我們要建立釀酒廠，安排勞工入內生產啤酒，滿足娛樂需求後就不會出現萬人集體上街爭取權益的罷工潮，他們反而會死心踏地為你賣命呢！邪惡勢力要壯大絕對要從善待基層開始，不然上樑不正下樑歪，起內鬨後開始擺爛不做事，讓正義勢力得以趁虛而入來個一網打盡。

『生於憂患，死於安樂。』就算一直沒有冒險者擅闖地城找麻煩，玩家也要提高警覺，建造工作室，安排聰明的哥布林製作工具包和陷阱，陷阱完成後可以擺放在地城任意處，指定建造地點後會扣除特定數量的工具包（陷阱被破壞也要消耗工具包進行維護），陷阱皆屬於自動觸發，不過要注意的是當吟遊詩人出現在冒險者隊伍中，大部分陷阱都會被拆解失效。因為如此，我們可以在地城入口處附近設立守衛室，進駐在守衛室戒備的單位會在敵人入侵時吹響號角警告所有單位前往前線作戰，是十分實用的防禦設施之一。


模擬經營模式講解差不多了，接下來將進入到即時戰略模式，有別於地底世界已設施營造為主、抵禦外患為輔的核心玩法，地表世界完全就是 RTS 即時戰略遊戲模式，透過滑鼠框選單位，點選右鍵移動與攻擊，操作方式基本上跟老牌即時戰略遊戲《Warcraft 3》沒有太大區別，如果你們曾經玩過任何一款 RTS 作品，絕對能夠在短時間內快速上手。讓作戰單位提升戰力的主要方法是擊殺敵方單位獲取經驗值，累積經驗值到一定階段時單位等級會提升，另一種提升戰力的方法是建設名為【地獄熔爐】的地城設施，地獄熔爐的工作單位為巨魔，我們可以在此處升級研發作戰單位的武器和護甲，讓他們傷害更高且更耐打。


《Dungeons 2》是款充滿樂趣的地城模擬經營遊戲，不過本作仍存在著一些無法忽視的缺點，首先是單人戰役內容過短，筆者只花不到十小時就一路打通所有單人戰役關卡，和其他競品遊玩總時數相比之下偏短許多（大多模擬經營作品的單人戰役都有 20 至 30 小時遊玩時數），另外兩項缺點是設施種類偏少、以及地表世界 RTS 模式不需要動腦想戰術，直接用坦打補鐵三角套路，三隻近戰配一遠程一補血就可以打敗天下無敵手。總而言之，本作不是地雷遊戲，可惜之處在於作品格局過小，玩起來像是大成本小製作的手機遊戲，然而建議售價卻標在三十美金，不免讓人有種買貴還不給退差價的失落感。


優點：
+玩膩動不動就拯救世界的遊戲了嗎？擔任地城領主毀滅地表世界吧！
+自己的地城自己建造，妥善分配資源建立邪惡指數破表的致命地城。
+模擬經營結合即時戰略，地底與地表兩種不同的世界、不同的模式。


缺點：
-單人戰役關卡極短，不用十小時即可破關，建議額外購買劇情DLC。
-即時戰略要素深度不足，碰到任何強敵只要靠人數壓過去就能獲勝。


結論：遊戲本身有趣卻不耐玩，有著完整架構但深度不足的平庸普作。


網誌圖文好讀版：
http://mgrim214.blogspot.tw/2016/07/dungeons-2.html

review: This game is pretty fun and really reminds me of Dungeon Keeper (which I loved). The only thing that really has me bummed is the constant crashing to desktop. I bought this on Steam Sale, so I'm not overly mad about it; however, this is getting to be a vey big nuisance. Overall, the game is very enjoyable though. If you liked the Dungeon Keeper series, you will probably also like this one. Pick it up on sale, just know that it has some issues.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987744283', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 2139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1605, 'last_played': 1468197566}
review:
A Day in the Life of a Servant of the Chaotic Evil

6:00 AM: dragged out of bed by the on-shift Evil Mistress, grabbed some coffee and my magi-pick-axe to go mine gold for the glory of the True Evil! 

7:00 AM: finished up my morning mining shift, still have not seen Phil since he was promoted yesterday to Summoning Portal Manager, lucky guy is probably still in bed. I head to the hall of admiration to tell the local Succubus how amazing she looks. Demons never tire of compliments. and least I don't have to praise the Infernals, the contact burns get old fast.

8:00 AM:  Inspect the west annex guard complex for trap resets. Got slapped for walking past a disarmed tentacle. Huh, how'd that happen?

10:00 AM: The previous shift must not be doing there jobs, 3 fire grates, 4 spiders eggs and tentacle trap all left un-reset or disarmed, spider eggs moved in place, a bit of work and the west annex should be secure. would be easier if Phil still worked my shift, but . . . oh well.

10:05 AM: fled in terror from a Dwarf and his solders and the Bard who was clearly responsible for my trap work overtime. Hit the Gong in the west annex. My most abominable Evil hear my prayers, they're at the door, and I don't want to die.

10:15 AM: After a very large rumble outside the door, i peek out to see a group of Pit Fiends playing rugby with the Bard's corpse. Back to work it is. A Mindflayer fell in the carnage, I'll take him for re-summoning, and maybe even see Phil on the way.

Noon: Finish fixing all the havoc and clean out the smell of the heroes from the west annex. get slapped some more for not finishing sooner. Where the heck is Phil, and how can managing Summoning Portals take so much time? He's nowhere, is he just sleeping on the job, or is there a second chamber of summoning Portals i don't know about?

1:00PM: Say Hi to bob as we both head to transports some exploding eggs and fire grates to the south annex. He hasn't seen Phil since yesterday either. Man, that promotion must mean he gets to work directly with the Ultimate Evil.  Lucky him!

2:15PM: Wave and send off the latest group of demons to the surface, may their spoils be glorious yaddah yaddah, good riddance, now to get REAL work done. Bob, Jim and I are going to go expand the south annex, Evil wants mana crystals and there should be some down there.

3:30PM:Jim got promoted thanks to the THREE of us finding a mana crystal and widening a path for an Abyssal and some Succubi to clear out the golem guards. Strange, that Abyssal looks new around here, then again, most demons just look the same to me. He laughed when i asked him if he saw Jim when he got summoned here. Summoning Portal management must be pretty cushy if you get to share jokes with the higher ups.

4:00PM: explain to the the newly hired Servants, Ted and Rick, the finer points of Demon Admiration. on a good day, its all succubi and evil mistresses, on a bad infernals, Mindflayers, and any variety of Fright Demon. you have to fake it till you make it, except for the mindflayers, they'll know, and then your robed fuzzy butt is flayed. but if they enjoy it, i guess that counts as admiration, right?

5:00PM:  Unbelievable, un-f-ing believable, Ted is here for less than a day and Ultimate evil has decided he's management material. At least I dodged a nasty bit by letting Rick get nominated for torture chamber clean up. He can have it. I must be slipping in my work ethic to get passed up.

6:00PM: Assist the Ultimate Evil, and the Abyssal running the Mana forge by expanding in size. This abyssal reminds me of Jim somehow. I must be overworked. get slapped for daydreaming about the Summoning Portal Managers and their cushy lifestyle. I've finished my shift, I'm off to grab some shuteye. Tomorrow is another chance at getting my much deserved promotion.

TLDR: feed workers to hell portals for unit upgrades, 10/10, would burn the countryside every time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198033622157', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 877, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 696, 'last_played': 1468175589}
review:
This is a pretty fun game! I really like the dual game types (build your dungeon, and fight the "bad" guys on the surface). I would definitely recommend this game to anyone who enjoys builders and/or RTS's. 

Regarding all of the negative reviews about the narrator talking too much; there is an option to make him quiet in the "Game" tab in the settings.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960377911', 'num_games_owned': 1102, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 710, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1477514967}
review:
This brings back all memories from Dungeon Keeper II, even though it's a light version of it. It works fine, a bit of humour, a bit of strategy (the campaign is very easy though). Graphics are not what we're looking for in this game but they work fine.
If it's on sale, you can go for it.

review: I bought this game on a steam sale.  I saw reviews speaking of its patch problems. Well the gameplay was exellent and narration was really good, but it has sever gameplay speed. In that i mean the game is increadibly slow. It is alright to have a population limit but this game took it way way way to far. In that the game takes to long to mine out resources and tunnels and minions to explore and conquour the above world. I really liked this game it was a good sequal to dungeon keeper. But those main two draw backs make it unplayable as well as the poor nonexistence AI. Maybe in the future they will make this game more challengeing but at its state a 6 year old can beat it and fall asleep to its mind numbling digging due to lack of population. Why oh Why 15 pop and kill other pop to give you creatures i dont know bad design just bad design,

author: {'steamid': '76561198021959875', 'num_games_owned': 6844, 'num_reviews': 255, 'playtime_forever': 396, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 396, 'last_played': 1462087513}
review:
直接講結論，如果你是衝著地城守護者來的人，不推薦此遊戲。


當年牛蛙的遊戲容易讓人沈迷，除了首創的經營風格之外，其中一味就是獨特的遊戲幽默，許多小細節都會讓人會心一笑，而這個致敬作品，簡單說畫虎不成反類犬。

如果你沒玩過牛蛙系列，還可試試，但對牛蛙信徒來說了無新意的失望感會大過於遊戲本身。

author: {'steamid': '76561197995726636', 'num_games_owned': 606, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 2516, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1970, 'last_played': 1463779302}
review:
I expected a Dungeon Keeper clone and it pretty much is, 
but it is done well enough and has a few key differences in the game mechanics.  

There are a lot of LOTR and GOT jokes in there as well.  

My only problem with it is that the difficulty never picks up and there are no difficulty modes, so overall i'd say the game is a bit on the easy casual end and could overall be a bit more challenging.  
The DLC campaigns are more challenging, but the base game is never going to make you restart a level with a different strategy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013909926', 'num_games_owned': 3464, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 3128, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 831, 'last_played': 1494785110}
review:
After first game being rather weird and not really fun, second game went to be more RTSy. And it really worked, game is very fun. And the fact game offers tons of jokes and easter eggs makes it legen... wait for it... dary (yeah, they use that joke too). 

I'd guess it's main problem could be it's length. As of moment of writing review, I clocked nearly 12 hours. But there's a bit more stuff to do - a little side-campaign to finish - so I guess I'll put few more hours.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000524801', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 18897, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4116, 'last_played': 1526838908}
review: I've bought the game over a year ago, it was fun to play, but a little too easy. It is a RTS game which takes place in dungeons and the Overworld, gameplay is far away from Dungeon Keeper, but it is fun. Patch 1.5 came out in the middle of October 2015, from this day on the game was unplayable with 1 fps or slower. The developers admitted that there is a memory leak, but they like to keep quiet about it and blame everybodies PC. They have 5 answers ready how to fix your problem, mainly update drivers, but if drivers are up to date and the problem carries on you will be ignored from that moment on. I am waiting over 8 months now for a patch to fix the memory leak, but it doesn't look like anything will happen. They ported the game to the PS4 and promised a fix for the PC after they finished the PS4 version, but so far nothing. Take a look at the forum, there are many bug reports without solution, so unless there is a patch which fixes all the bugs don't buy this game unless you want to gamble.

author: {'steamid': '76561198118272933', 'num_games_owned': 573, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 1988, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1988, 'last_played': 1471895278}
review:
[h1]Не просто ЗЛО, а вредное и коварное ЗЛИЩЕ![/h1]

[b]Привет всем!!![/b]
Сегодня вам я расскажу, про интересную игру.
Эники беники вуаля, это игра - Dungeons два.)

Итакс с чего бы начать... 
В этой игре Я - офигительное абсолютное ЗЛО, я такое злостное зло, что своей дланью могу даже шлепать подданных (а некоторые так мило стонут)), я могу изучив заклинания бомбить всех и даже воплотиться в пределах подземелья ..[i]бу-га-га[/i]... трепещите эльфы, да и не только эльфы.. Я иду...

А вообще за само Зло в его боевом великолепии можно поиграть только раз на начальной миссии, где мило потупив и поразглядывав окрестности я замешкалась, на что мне такую тираду вывели:[i]"Сотрясая землю, Неудержимое Зло зашагало к линии фронта. Если оно каким-то ужасно невероятным образом забыло, как это делается, существует всеобъемлющая функция "Помощь"[/i]. И это только начало, там столько шуток, приколов, намеков. Плюс ко всему очень приятно слышать закадровый голос, который мило поведает тебе, что нужно сделать в игре, который подколет тебя в неожиданный момент и который каждые шесть минут орет "День зарплатыыы!" и ты обреченно понимаешь, что весь твой табор пошел за золотом((..
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=702338639
В этой игре иногда разрываешься между подземельем (где хочется покопаться в земельке, поисследовать его, ткнуть тех кто отлынивает от работы, поулучшать строения и солдат своих, ну и полюбоваться как они нежатся в купальнях (нежить), бьют манекен (орда), позируют на подиуме и получают авации (демоны)) и верхнего мира (где так же хочется исследовать все закоулочки, выполнять задания и  убивать).

[b] Плюсы несравненные:[/b] интересные карты, замечательный сюжет. Красивая музыка (единственное что я переносила плохо это рыгания орков беее). Про голос за кадром я уже писала выше. Ну и симпатичные герои, которыми управляешь, их можно взять дланью и поразглядывать, приблизив экран.

[b] Минусищи:[/b] к концу миссии, где уже навалом золота и маны ужасные лаги в игре. Кооператив только друг против друга, а хотелось бы быть союзниками..

[b] Итог:[/b] непередаваемые ощущения от этой игры, рада что она попалась на моем пути и что я ее прошла и выбила все ачивки они кстати на мой взгляд не такие уж и сложные..

Не судите строго вы меня
Обзор для вас писала я
Кто прочитал все до конца
Всем удачи всем пока
Желаю доброго пути
Dungeons два вам всем пройти)))

author: {'steamid': '76561198034365178', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2528, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2359, 'last_played': 1463181711}
review: Das Spiel übernimmt Dungeon Keeper 2 praktisch komplett mit allen Ideen, lässt features und die düstere Atmosphäre weg und verpackt ein Spiel von 1997 (welches damals schon wesentlich umfangreicher war als Dungeons 2 heute) in eine aktuellere Grafik. Und das ohne auch nur den Hauch von neuen Ideen einzubringen. Kombiniert mit einer wirklich kurzen Kampagne, die schon nach einer Hand voll Dungeons nach einem DLC schreit, ist das Ganze sein Geld nicht wert.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004007368', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1080, 'last_played': 1619943454}
review:
I'd love to play the game but I keep getting frequent crashes.  I am keeping an eye on memory util and I am not hitting high enough to make me think it is that as a boundry.  I am playing on my laptop as I am overseas instead of my beefy gaming rig, but I meet specs, if not req specs.  It detects hardware to run at high graphics, and I have tried lowering it all the way down to low.

The crashes on started once I hit the larger maps, the red wedding spoof.  It always hits a point later in map near or just after the dungeon raid if you let all the families gather (going for achievement).

Others had mentioned the stability problems, but I gave the game a go anyway.  Hopefully it will see some more patches soon or I will try it down the road when I get back to having a full gaming rig.  I will update this review in the future either after some new patches or when I can compare on a different rig.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007185938', 'num_games_owned': 224, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 577, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 547, 'last_played': 1465420474}
review:
This is a strange review for me to make. Did i liked the game? yes. to my knowledge its the best Dungeon Keeper look-a-like i've ever played.

Even so, It just makes Dungeon Keeper a much more impressive game so many years on. This game fails to excel in so many things DK did. 

-The humour of the narrator is cheesy at best, and irritating at times. It fails to capture the grim humour of DK, which made it so good. Even the latin grim voice saying "impossenitum" was top class.
-Vast number of creatures you can get, with so many different strategies and interactions they gave you, which you get only a couple in Dungeons.
-The feeling that the humans are really a menace (the game is wayyyyy to easy)

So if you want to get a modern DK clone, you should give it a try if the sale is good enough.

review:
I usually give games bad reviews that are good mainly because I like to drink a lot of beers and i have mental problems. But that might be the same reason this game appeals to me. 
This game is great. To some of us the concepts are familiar. But now you send your dudes through a portal and they come out in the overworld and you fight unicorns and shit. And when you win the terrain becomes evil and shit.
And when you grab your wife by the throat because she won't let you play dungeons 2 in peace, you want to hold a butcher knife to her throat and tell her 'If you wanna live to see tomorrow....'

author: {'steamid': '76561197993502989', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 104, 'playtime_forever': 341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 341, 'last_played': 1439865102}
review:
A fantastic game made in the same vein as Dungeon Keeper. The similarities are remarkable, from monster types to play style. However, this isn't Dungeon Keeper, the game that set the bar. Nothing can reach my expectations when it comes to Dungeon Keeper, the game I couldn't stop playing when I was a kid.

That said, this game brings back that nostalgic feel, that urge to bitchslap minions just 'cause you can. Dungeons 2 was enjoyable. Not Dungeon Keeper enjoyable, but still very enjoyable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198097553990', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2953, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2952, 'last_played': 1606373087}
review: 캠페인 진행은 꽤 재미있는데, 완료하는 순간 정말 재미없는 스커미시 밖에  할게 없음...DLC에서 뭔가 재미있는게 있나 찾아보려고했는데 단순한 스커미시 맵 몇개 추가되는 정도...캠페인 진행하는 15 시간 정도만 게임 가치가 있어 보임

author: {'steamid': '76561198113636022', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 883, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 883, 'last_played': 1453654286}
review:
Commençons directement par mon impression finale : mouais. Un oui timide en quelque sortes. Le jeu n'est pas mauvais, mais il ne vaut globalement pas plus que ça.
Maintenant, les détails : le jeu se compose de deux parties complémentaires que sont la gestion de donjon à l'intérieur et l'aspect RTS à l'extérieur. Du coup il va falloir parler de chaque partie séparément.
L'aspect donjon d'abord, est la raison pour laquelle j'ai pris ce jeu. Et c'est le moins bon des deux, le moins travaillé, et le plus frustrant. L'idée : vous avez une salle du trône reliée à la sortie par un couloir. Il va falloir tout agencer autour de ça, tout en gardant à l'esprit que des aventuriers vont régulièrement tenter de venir tout piller. Vous avez donc pour vous défendre tout un panel de piège, panel composé à tout casser de 6 articles. première grosse faiblesse donc : presque pas de pièges pour défendre son donjon contre l'envahisseur. Ensuite, c'est également dans votre donjon que vous allez éexploiter et générer toutes les ressources nécessaires au deuxième aspect du jeu. Vous allez donc devoir aménager une immense partie de la surface disponnible pour vos bâtiments et structures. Bon, en même temps, c'est pas comme si vous aviez moyen de la recouvrir de pièges, cette surface. Vous créez donc vos unités, vos améliorations, etc... dans votre donjon, la plupart du temps en creusant des galeries au fur et à mesure de vos besoin. En creusant, vous tomberez parfois sur des monstres, qu'il vous faudra donc combattre, avec vos unités déjà créees par exemple. Là, aucune stratégie possible : vous ne controlez rien. Vos unités se battront de manière désordonnée, sans focus, juste comme ça. Deuxième point faible donc (c'est pas comme si un aspect RTS avait été codé....).
L'aspect RTS maintenant. Une fois vos unitées créées et améliorées, vous pouvez les envoyer à la surface pour accomplir les quêtes éventuelles et/ou détruire les bases des humains, elfes et autres nains qui vous menacent. Pour le coup, l'aspect stratégique de la chose est important, et plutôt bien géré. Vous avez des unités faibles à distance, des costaudes au corps à corps, et il va falloir microgérer de manière à ce que vous unités distance restent safe. Point positif. Cependant, vous avez assez peu d'unités différentes, et la plupart des unités sont des évolutions d'unités de base. Les évolutions coûtant généralement plus cher et prenant plus de place au sein de votre armée, vous vous retrouvez souvent à n'avoir qu'une dizaine (quinzaine max) de soldats. Pour le Mal en Personne, ça craint. Autre très gros point faible du titre : la vitesse de déplacement des unités. Dans ce jeu, les healers sont les unités les plus rapides. Du coup, lorsque vous déplacez votre armée, les healers sont systématiquement les premiers à arriver sur place. Et aucune mécanique de formation ne vient régler le problème. Du coup, être obligé de micro-gérer même pour les déplacements, c'est chiant.
Donc, quels sont les principaux points faibles ? Le donjon. Par exemple, il existe des unités humaines, les gnomes, qui peuvent désactiver vos pièges. Sans mana. Sans cooldown (temps de recharge pour les anglophobes). En gros, si UN SEUL gnome entre dans votre donjon pendant que vous êtes à la surface, il va tout simplement tout désactiver jusqu'à votre salle du trône, et ainsi laisser ses potes se balader librement. Déjà qu'il y a peu de pièges, si en plus ils sont inutiles, on va pas aller loin. On se retrouve du coup soit à faire des allers-retour, soit à être obligé de laisser des unités dans le donjon, histoire de réduire un peu plus la taille de notre armée.
Les points forts maintenant : l'histoire. Bourrée d'humour, elle est vraiment agréable à jouer en raison du narrateur et de toutes les références et blagues qu'il peut faire. Elle apporte son lot de difficulté, le moyen d'introduire les différentes unités au fil du temps via le scénario est très bien pensé et foutu. Les missions sont variées, et le fait que l'on soit parfois obligé d'aller dans un donjon autre que le notre est aussi très sympa. L'aspect RTS est bien travaillé et offre des batailles assez sympa durant lesquelles vous pourrez vous délecter du spectacle de vos Orcs et Trolls en trainde démembrer vos adversaires.
Ce qui me dérange avec ce jeu, c'est qu'entre ce qu'il vend et ce qui est, il y a une énorme différence. Et je ne parle pas du cas des mauvais jeux qui font semblant d'être bons sur la boite et qui sont en réalité pourris. Là, c'est juste un RTS qui essaye de se donner un genre de dungeon keeper. Le nom même du jeu est une fausse information. Soyons clair : on passe beaucoup de temps dans notre donjon, mais tous les bâtiments pourraient très bien se trouver à l'extérieur, comme dans un Age of Empire ou Starcraft. La seule chose qui fait vraiment donjon, ce sont les pièges. Et les pièges ba.... voilà.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027942416', 'num_games_owned': 779, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 1014, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 419, 'last_played': 1464560072}
review: Out of all the "Dungeon Keeper" like games in market, this clearly is the best one. It is not trying to be imitating the original too closely, and may be that is for the best. This way it manages to create a different but still humorous style. The few places it deviates from the original (your imps -snots- don't have to pave ground for example) streamlines the game and creates a unique experience (above ground battles). Flawless Linux performance is another plus on this games' account.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074145650', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1689, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1689, 'last_played': 1463939144}
review: Супер игруха!! Приятная графика, неплохой геймплей, умеренная хардкорность. ОЧЕНЬ много реально смешных шуток, в том числе с отсылками к различным популярным книгам и фильмам последних лет. Ну и качество локализации - просто космос. Такой любви к мелочам и такого высокого качества перевода лично я не встречал довольно давно. Из минусов лишь стоит отметить дополнения - дорогие и не особо нужные.

author: {'steamid': '76561198117516969', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 1770, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1592, 'last_played': 1464094146}
review:
At some point it is an enjoyable game, but despite all my experiences so far slapping away minions to work faster for me in the game, I don't seem to think the proper value of $20 with just two factions, not to mention how little the vanilla content offers sit well with me. Don't get me wrong, I'm not exactly saying this game is total crap and here I am protesting for more beer in front of the throne room. Just look at the price of the expansions, disregarding their parodies toward the books written by George R.R. Martin.

All I'm saying, the least they could have done more is to focus on variation of battles. The food capacity to work on isn't enough to stage a grand battle visualized by the player. C'mon, who doesn't want a great war spiced up by the quirky announcer/advisor. 

The main reason I don't want to recommend this game is because of the price and the satisfaction gained. It is not enough to slap every minion to fill my desires of sadism. 

I rather recommend this game during sale. You'll have a better level of satisfaction with a discounted price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008888649', 'num_games_owned': 443, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 1757, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1757, 'last_played': 1463961323}
review:
Comprei esse jogo com o intuito de ter uma experiência como no antigo dungeon keeper. O jogo foi bem melhor que o dungeons 1 no sentido de ter mais liberdade pra montar o dungeon do jeito que vc quiser, mas teve algumas exceções que me desagradaram muito:
1- Você não tortura seus inimigos. Passei o jogo inteiro esperando quando seriam introduzidas as máquinas de torturas, e NADA. Acho isso uma DEFICIÊNCIA em um jogo onde você é o cara mal que controla um calabouço, isso tem que ser uma das primeiras coisas a se colocar nesse tipo de jogo.
2- A campanha é muito curta. Joguei por 27 horas pra finalizar a campanha porque explorei cada pedaço de cada mapa.
3- O negócio de manusear seus minions através de vários mapas ao mesmo tempo é legal, mas acho que faltou sinergia entre os mapas. Achei uma tarefa desnecessária ter que colocar os demonios na porta do dungeon pra poderem ir pro outro mapa, ao invés de poder clicar no outro mapa e eles irem andando.
4- O processo de pegar vários demônios também é demorado, e quando a mão pega o bixo errado é pior ainda.
5- Poucas opções de armadilhas
6- Poucos desafios, sempre os mesmos invasores, na mesma quantidade.. e muito previsíveis.
7- Poucas opções de monstros.. só tem 5 tipos de bixos básicos pra vc ter e cada um pode evoluir pra 2 tipos.
8- Pouquíssima ação.. não me senti pressionado em nenhum momento a ter que cumprir tarefas, defender meu dungeon, e tbm não tem recompensas que te estimulem a agir rápido no jogo ou derrotar mais inimigos.

Acho que a Kalypso não entendeu a demanda e fez mais uma tentativa falha de agradar os jogadores do gênero, que ainda esperam um jogo onde você REALMENTE É O CARA MAU.

Se pegar o jogo com 75% de desconto acho válida a experiência pra quem nunca jogou dungeon keeper, mas em suma, achei um jogo meio sem graça, por isso não recomendo.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985103608', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 577, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 535, 'last_played': 1606827508}

author: {'steamid': '76561198087193380', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 1530, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1530, 'last_played': 1463385650}
review:
던전 내부 인터페이스가 불편합니다. 시설 기능 확인하려고 누르다가 일하던 크리쳐나 시설에 뒹굴고 있는 물건을 집어들질 않나 던전에 적이 침입해도 타게팅 지정이 불가능하고 크리쳐를 이동시키려면 직접 들어다 떨궈놔야 하는데 일어나는 도중에 얻어맞고, 탱커와 딜러가 따로 있으니 떨어뜨리는 순서(=집는 순서)도 신경 써야 합니다. 깃발을 사용하면 원치 않게 전투 가능한 모든 크리쳐가 다 모여드니 비효율적이고요.

 적응하면 그럭저럭 할 만 하지만 적응이 필요하다는 것 자체가 불편하다는 반증 아닌가 싶네요.

 스탠리 패러블로 유명한 나레이터분을 기용하였고 지루할 틈 없이 개그를 던지는 건 재미있는데, 집착에 가까울 정도로 왕좌의 게임을 패러디하는 건 무슨 이유에서인지...

author: {'steamid': '76561198041456961', 'num_games_owned': 451, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1507, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1507, 'last_played': 1463253922}
review:
Духовный наследник Dungeon Keeper с примесью классических RTS.
В подземелье играется как Dungeon Keeper; на поверхности появляется возможность управлять каждым существом в отдельности, использовать их способности, применять различные боевые тактики.
Немного напрягает диссонанс между темпом игры в подземелье и на поверхности: бои просходят очень динамично, порой существа умирают с пары ударов; в подземелье же все очень неспешно, я бы даже сказал чересчур.
В двух словах, приятная графика, неплохая озвучка, юморные отсылки к другим произведениям (Песнь льда и пламени, World of Warcraft и другие).
Количество комнат, существ, заклинаний и ловушек могло бы быть и побольше.
В мультиплеер никто не играет (либо проблемы с поиском игр), не смог даже сделать последнее достижение.

Вердикт: 7 / 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051337060', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 912, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 912, 'last_played': 1462379920}

author: {'steamid': '76561197967942317', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1923, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1923, 'last_played': 1463260906}
review:
Pros:
+ Narrator, realy funny and enjoyable
+ Graphics and design
+ Game concept
+ Worthwile
+ Good varaiaty in factions and flexible leveling system

Cons:
- Dungeon keeper 2 made it better, i get so many flashbacks while playing this.. Casino with the jackpot winner, mistress in the torture chamber torturing the creatures, and those poor poor Imps muhahaha:) Where is "Horny" and his awsome music intro?:(
- Lack of "evil" atmosphere, despite how much the narrator tries to brain wash you.
- Lack of sound effects (goblins sounds redicioulous), little or no atmospheric evil sound effects..
- Missing "cool" creatures, like black knights or "Horny"
- No POV controll of individuall creatures
- Booring spells, for all factions
- "ultimate evil" campaign was way too easy.. Undead campaign was a challange however.

This review is for single player so far. Overall, it is recommneded to play this game, but DK2 is way better..

author: {'steamid': '76561198013846243', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 2674, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2674, 'last_played': 1490652691}
review:
I regret buying this game for $9.99 discounted, then the song of winter DLC for $15 not discounted.

When I saw the 10 dollar temporary pricetag and dungeon manging preview vid (first dungeon managing game mind you) I was sucked into it's style and unit management very quickly. Installing, then playing the game. the campaign though pathetically a day or two long, had some of the most enjoyable voice acting from a narrative voice I've experienced in recent gaming. Not to mention the fun references and pokes to other well known game franchises every 30seconds.

Now why I regretted buying this; it's hollow, and cheap. 
After quickly finishing the campaign I grew easily accustomed to the 'horde' race and was eager to try the demon race. Now being a MAN I simply could not continue playing on normal difficulty. So I ramped it hard, beat a few skirmishes, big whoop. Naturally you only want to try for a better challenge, right? So I skipped very hard right into impossible difficulty. And right there, is where it began to show how flawed the game was built. They knew the dungeon managing experience they were setting to make, however the balancing, difficulty, variance in gameplay, that all fell flat on it's face.

First of all every single race operates the EXACT SAME, build treasuries, build relax room (brewery, admiration, F.R.P.), build a mana room, build a trap resources room, build an upgrade room, then smash some camps, get your evil up, and upgrade. Rinse and repeat. Only I could repeat it barely twice per race before becoming numb.
AND FUSTRATED, because impossible difficulty is well.... IMPOSSIBLE. Literally, I like hard difficulties bordering on the unfair masicism. But it's just not balanced. I couldn't find a single youtube video that showed someone beating this game on impossible. Why? Because impossible is broken. The first half is always fine but as soon as you get swamped with units that disarm your traps, you lose. You, lose. You have no chance fighting 3 times whatever size your army is as a constant stream without your traps.
Lastly let me talk about the races. 'Horde' being probably the most easiest and simple to play as. Demon's being way too ridiculously weak in the beginning to stand any chance above hard difficulty. And then undead which honestly don't add anything new besides the undead theme of rooms and... some units come back when they die?

Anyway.... this game is just so short, vanilla version includes a pitifully short campaign and just two boring races. And when you try to play the game seriously on a difficult that makes you try, it breaks because it wasn't balanced for higher difficulties and maps. It is such an insult when you finish the campaign and open skirmish just to find NO ORIGINAL MAPS. THEY JUST RECYCLE THE CAMPAIGN MAPS. 
It's fun for the first game you play, but just don't buy it. Play at your unlucky friend's who bought it.

EDIT: Oh I forgot to mention? You better turn on 15min auto save or save yourself every 5minutes. I play on win10 and this game CRASHES EVERY 20minutes guaranteed. It WILL crash on you, and it seems to be a lot more likely to crash the longer you go without saving, ironically.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040309181', 'num_games_owned': 113, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 652, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 652, 'last_played': 1463179263}

author: {'steamid': '76561197963675148', 'num_games_owned': 897, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 3563, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2507, 'last_played': 1494037381}
review:
Kaufempfehlung, habs im sale mit allen dlc für 15€ geschossen.

+ Nette Kampagne mit Anspielungen auf Game of Thrones, Herr der Ringe und andere Filme
+  Kommentator hat einige gute sprüche drauf
+ läuft flüssig und überwiegend ohne Bugs (3 abstürze in fast 40 std)
+ Spiel lässt einem Zeit für den Aufbau des Dungeons, entspanntes Spielen möglich ( Beim Dlc A Game of Winter schaut das anders aus. Da wurde der Schwierigkeitsgrad erhöht.
+ Nette mischung aus Dungeon bauen und an der oberwelt Städte/ Dörfer platt machen.
+Einheiten haben leicht veränderte Namen von Charakteren aus anderen Spielen bzw Schauspielern

- ladezeiten von savegames bzw laden von der nächsten karte, dauert manchmal 2-4 min . (Game einmal neustarten sorgt für abhilfe) 
- Steuerung macht manchmal nicht das was sie soll, beim Kreaturen aufheben.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019903376', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 463, 'last_played': 1480654056}
review: Crashes constantly.  Cannot even play 1 level without crashing.    Non stop -  made it 5 levels into the campaign,  then nothing   cannot even play it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044728844', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 1039, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 974, 'last_played': 1462940329}
review:
It was getting there and it didn't meet everything that was hoped for...

To the point

The Good:
-Entertaining Narrator
-Great concept 
-Fun game
-Great Campain humor

The Bad: 
-Upgrading Units was poorly explained
-Lacking in more extensive gameplay and campain
-Fairly short compared to other RTS games I have played 

The Ugly:
-Demons only get 2 levels in campain mode, and the undead are a DLC you have to buy.
-Could have improved the walk speed or the A.I more, I constantly had to beg the little snot to make beer for the striking minions.
-Story never concluded if I get my whole body back :/, they just wanted to split the evil in two so you could have a skirmish >.>. Like I said Demons weren't even that good and lacked alot of things.
-The Game feels rushed as you get towards the end. 
-I have played free flash games that have more levels and challenge than this


I would recommend getting this during a steam sale or humble bundle. Not worth the $40 dollars for a game that only meets half way.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078205417', 'num_games_owned': 161, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1482080587}
review: 这个游戏挺好玩，但1没有中文，2过一会就死机，你让我如何是好！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198268635711', 'num_games_owned': 124, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 462, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 207, 'last_played': 1551000535}
review: 首先，Dungeons 2作为一款使用Unity3D这种渣游戏引擎开发的游戏，游戏画面确实比很多使用该游戏引擎开发的游戏处理的到位，在不看游戏文件结构的情况下完全看不出来其是使用Unity3D引擎制作的。其次，游戏玩法很新颖有特色，双地图模式，感觉上手不怎么容易，特别是语言不通的情况下更是如此。缺点，兵种单位数量限制太死，模糊的经济系统，缺少中文界面，让英语太差的我很难上手，希望官方早日补充。最后，游戏很好，好评！！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198143318210', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1747, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1747, 'last_played': 1463224842}
review:
虽然没有明说，DUNGEONS2应该是被制作者看作为DK2（地下城守护者2）的续作了。我的看法是，当成情怀玩一下，还很不错。但如果一定要把它拿来和牛蛙的DK2相提并论，那就赶不上了。

牛蛙DK2的结局CG里有一段恶魔走出地下城，觊觎地表世界的动画。DOUNGEONS2在游戏中融入了进攻地表的要素，算是承继了牛蛙的未竟理念了。但是DOUNGEONS2做得如何呢？

以下是个人对这款游戏各个元素的看法，观点可能会比较主观。

1、地表模式
地表模式和WAR3的操作很接近，但是操作会有一点卡顿感。喜欢在暴雪游戏里不停按A的要改改习惯了，因为你每次按下F键点地面后，怪物们都要往前走一小段再进攻，不管身边有没有敌人。当然这游戏在中后期有了急救设备以后，基本不用担心死兵的问题，但这点迟滞是还延续到了技能施法里面。

说到施法还有点要说的，到后期，不同兵种会有不同的技能，框框按F显然不方便施法，但总共也就这么几个兵，编个三四队吧，又显得过于小题大作。打到后面，像兽人的放狗和战吼，基本都属于放嘛也就这样，不放嘛也无所谓的鸡肋技能。为什么不能让这些技能都自动施放呢。

地表模式还有很多让新手困惑的大门。这些门，有的关卡里要造地精刺客打开，但有的关卡里，又需要特定剧情打开，有的关卡里是需要杀死守门的卫兵自动打开（但这些卫兵并不是一开始就出现在那里）。心里有数的老手，看到无人把守，又无法打开的大门，自然知道应该绕道别处去触发剧情再回来，但新手可能就会不知所措了。

地表侵略任务也都过于简单，哪怕是最后一关，只要有两三个TROLL抛石者，两三个兽人，一堆娜迦，基本上就横着走了，而凑成这样的部队，却没什么难度。

地表模式还有一个很重要的用途，就是为地下城获取邪恶点数。这个邪恶点数是个很谜的东西，目前只知道打死独角兽，或是破坏房子，杀死特定英雄获得，而这些都是按照剧情要求去做的。也就是说，是不是可以理解为，地下城升级所必需的邪恶点数，只能走剧情获得呢？——可是这样做有什么意义？就为了让玩家回到地下城用鼠标点一下“升级”按钮是吗？要么让邪恶点数成为玩家可控的，可自由“收集”的资源，哪怕像“魔域帝国”中的阴和阳，也都是玩家可以操控的。要么干脆取消这个设定，玩家杀死独角兽，触发剧情地下城自动升一级，也比让新手玩家在这疑惑半天，不知道邪恶点数到底应该怎么收集要好。

而地表模式中的其它地下城也差不多要成为一个灾难性的存在了。第一次进入地表模式地下城的新手，可能会有点不知所措，不知道怎么才能找到自己的兵——我的地下城->地表->地表的地下城，OMG，这俄罗斯套娃……为什么不把这些地下城做到一张图里去？中间用不能拆毁的石墙隔开不就好了？


2、地城房间
和DK一模一样，地下城没有建筑，全部都是一个个的房间。但是……我最爱的刑求室和监狱呢？什么？刑求室送给另一个种族了？DOUNGEONS2将DK2中经典的房间，拆开来，分别送给了各个种族，可玩性提高了吗？

在我看来，没有。不仅如此，我原先可以同时玩到刑求室、监狱、赌场、角斗场，而现在，我只能一次玩其中的一样，要玩别的，得另开游戏去玩别的种族。这算哪门子事嘛！

还有更绝的，好不容易理解了恶魔族的科技树，建出了刑室，这……这这这……这上面吊着一个男的是什么鬼！OMGOMGOMG，不能把魅魔姐姐吊上去吗？不能！你妹！我立马就退出了游戏。

3、兵种
兵种非常单一……非常……单一。和房间思路一样，DOUNGEONS2把DK2经典兵种拆成了几块，分别给了不同的种族。然而即使如此，各种族的兵种之间互相也非常雷同。这就使得DOUNGEONS2的各族兵种，既单一，又雷同……

每个种族都只有四种兵，这四种兵各自只有三个升级。12个兵种？不，因为打到中后期，低等兵基本上没什么用，而这游戏又有严格的人口限制，所以低等兵就是没什么用。真正上地表为你作战的，可能就只有特定的三四种兵而已。这就又回到了地表模式的问题，就这么几个兵，框框A，又不方便施法，每个编队，又小题大作……只要你兵种等级高了，敌兵又都会脆得要死，当你挨个点中放技能的时候，仗已经打完了……所以最终都会变成框框A。

4、挑战
所有游戏都要或多或少给玩家点挑战，让玩家去解决些难题，以此来获得乐趣。比如DK2里，玩家要为怪物们解决的问题有：食物，要多孵小鸡给大家吃；钱，要多挖钱发饷；床位，要多弄点床位让怪物休息；休闲，要造点够乐子的东西让怪物们打发时间。DOUNGEONS2里，怪物们也会给玩家提出挑战，那就是……没错，只有一种，只有一种……部落怪物们只需要喝啤酒就好了；恶魔们只需要赞美；不死族们只需要泡澡……是的，你在DK2中需要面对至少4个方面的问题，而在这里，只有一个。至于钱么，人口控制得这么严格，你真的有发不出工资的时候么？而怪物们没东西玩觉得无聊，也并不会像DK2那样引发严重的后果。掌他一巴掌，就没事了……就没……事……了……至于爱干扰别人的兽人们，我一向最多只造三个，前期对付蜘蛛就够他们忙的了。老实说，就算不理他们任他们干扰别人，也没太大的影响。

5、邪恶
"Its good to be bad."我们要邪恶，不是故作邪恶。我们要压榨敌人的最后一滴血，他熬过了拷打就会为我们效力，熬不过也会供出情报，哪怕是死在监狱里，也是我的骷髅士兵，这叫邪恶。我们甚至还要压迫自己人，我们偷偷在赌场作弊，假如怪物们不开心了，又调高赔率哄哄它们；我们把怪物们扔到角斗场让它们互相打斗；我们把怪物扔进神殿里献祭……这也叫邪恶。我们扇怪物巴掌，不仅仅只是为了让工作进度条走快一点你明不明白……我们要听到怪物的叫声，看到血流出来，看到怪物被打到跌跌撞撞，而不是一边被扇巴掌，一边还向我招手……是的，他被我扇了巴掌还朝我招手！

我要听到旁白用低沉带有尾音的语调缓缓的说：“有个英雄饿死在了你的监狱里，他变成了骷髅。”而不是要听旁白说，“啊，那个英雄（怪腔调），BLABLABLA，唉，我只是个游戏旁白而已……”不不不，不需要你打破第四面墙跟玩家说话，你是个魔仆，是个白发苍苍活了好几百年的恶魔管家，是个……是什么都好，你不是个打破第四面墙又特别爱唠叨的死侍呀！

我不要这样啊。



好吧，说了这么多，我还是点了推荐……在地下城里点来点去指挥小的们拆墙挖矿实在太有乐趣了。
