author: {'steamid': '76561198089541516', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1390, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1390, 'last_played': 1462491518}
review: A hilarious game that easily offers 30+ hours of entertainment if ya include the expansions. The narrator to the game makes the experience all the more enjoyable. Would leave my game running several times just to see what new ways the narrator would start complaining at me doing nothing. Would recommend if ya enjoy a moderately easy difficulty strategy game with a good bit of humor with TONS of movie, TV, and game references and parodies.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023089711', 'num_games_owned': 281, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 2111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 925, 'last_played': 1487710748}
review:
I see a lot of negative reviews on here, and from what i'm reading people are either having the game crash or they say it's not fun. I've had the game crash once, but I was able to just relauch it and it was fine. You just have to let it load fully before you click anything.

As for it not being fun, I disagree completely. The people who say it isn't fun don't like a slow-paced rts, which is what this is. You have to manage your resources, slowly build up your defences and army, and then go on the offensive. It will probably take a few offensive attacks to win the mission, but you'll get there. It's very chill and pretty laid back once you get the hang of it, and they have a funny narrator that says pretty funny references to other popular games and books of the same human vs orc theme.

In the end, if you're looking for a slow-paced game that will take A LOT of time but is very enjoyable and relaxed with a funny joke here and there, this is a great game for you.

Then only bad thing I'd have to say is without the DLC, there is a lack of content. I might have 13+ hours played, but that's just on a 8 or so mission campaign and i'm on the last mission. Although fun, it just shows how long the missions can take.

author: {'steamid': '76561198188513981', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 3442, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1514, 'last_played': 1582684075}

author: {'steamid': '76561198004512031', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1936, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1936, 'last_played': 1462672748}
review:
The game is a lot of fun. Great dialogue, interesting characters and minions, with unique abilities well complemented.
It's a lot like Warcraft, only you're building a dungeon, rather than a city.

The reason for my thumbs down was simply the game is not optimized well for modern systems, or laden with bugs from the outset.Games could take up to 5 minutes to load up. The game would get periodically choppy as a map progressed. And if you get too far on a map, any progress you attempted to save, would become corrupted. Any attempt to load would simply crash the game to windows.

After working a map for a good 2 hours, all saved progress would simply be lost. Even attempts to scatter saves within a minute apart... each would be equally corrupted.

My computer is high spec, so not a hardware issue... at least from requirements.

Very frustrating and disappointing for an otherwise enjoyable game play experience. I wrote the review just to warn people away.

author: {'steamid': '76561197968226477', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 952, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 922, 'last_played': 1462553699}
review:
[b]The Jist[/b] : Not worth full price (currently 39.99€) at all. I Bought it at 9.99€. Scathingly worth it. Relax and chill comedic game you can't lose. DON'T expect it to be anything like Dungeon Keeper.


If you played Dungeon Keeper 2, this game will interest you because you really want Dungeon Keeper III.
This isn't Dungeon Keeper III. Just remove all thought of that. It's Warcraft : Orcs and Humans, with 3D graphics and some rather forced elements of DKII.

[list]
    [*]You're never at risk of losing. The enemy AI is just too dumb, and even the scripting is plain easy. Nothing interesting ever happens. At no point did I ever feel unsafe in my dungeon. So much so, that the only reason I ever saved is because the game crashes occasionally. 
    [*]The overworld feels annoying, and the discontinuity between over and under world control of creatures is poor design. In the overworld it's classic RTS, underworld it switches to DK.
    [*]The story is told by a narrator, and it's quite amusing and full of pop culture references. I actually laughed. Twice.
[/list]


Overall, the gameplay was not engaging enough, but it was engaging enough that I completed the campaign, and side missions. The story is amusing enough, and the voice actor did very well with the material he had. I definately feel I got my 9.99€ worth, and I don't feel like I wasted my time, but there's this burning feeling that they could have done so much MORE. I will probably buy Dungeons 3. When it's on sale. I think Kalypso did a good job. They likely just didn't have the budget to make this game great. 
They probably spent all their money in litigation with EA :p

[i]Note : This review does not take into account any DLC, and the experience was played without any of the DLC.[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561197962691098', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 867, 'last_played': 1471730238}
review:
Ein sehr toller Titel mit viel Humor. Viel besser als der erste Teil und sehr nah am alten Dungeon Keeper Feeling. Viele tolle Features, eine unterhaltsame Kampange und ein wirklich sehr, sehr genialer Erzähler.

Kauft euch bloß gleich alle Add-Ons mit, wenn es mal wieder im Angebot ist! Sonst sitzt ihr nämlich ruckzuck da und wollt weiterspielen und nix ist da ;-)

author: {'steamid': '76561197970576421', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 897, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 897, 'last_played': 1462431196}
review:
The gameplay is basically Dungeon Keeper + Warcraft + Game of Thrones references, without capturing the strengths of any of those three franchises. 

Dungeons 2's story is attempting parody, but really just ends up refering to the source materials rather than building upon or lampooning them.

There's a couple laughs to be had, so if you really like Dungeon Keeper style games and it's on sale, it's playable enough, otherwise I'd give it a pass.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037910144', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 817, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 734, 'last_played': 1463082141}
review:
Im Prinzip an einem Tag (okay, 1,5 Tage) durchgespielt :) Beim zweiten Mal könnte man es schneller schaffen :) Dennoch, interessante und fesselnde Story (konnte nicht aufhören, warum auch immer). Gute Grafik, lustige Kommentare (Synchro), gute Steuerung. 

50 bzw. 40 EUR für das Spiel sind eindeutig zu viel. Hab es im Angebot für 10 gekaut und bereue es nicht! Als "Dungeon Keeper Fan" mag ich "Dungeons 2", wobei von dem Vorgänger war ich nicht sonderlich begeistert.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016655249', 'num_games_owned': 446, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 1647, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1641, 'last_played': 1491594880}
review:
Очень хорошая и веселая игра, юморных отсылок ко всевозможным фентезийным вселенным хоть отбавляй.
 
По геймплею видно, что разработчики вдохновлялись старым добрым "Dungeon Keeper" - тот, кто играл в него, сразу заметит сходство. Но это не содранная копия, здесь все сделано в своем уникальном стиле и с интересными новыми идеями.

Игра представляет собой стратегию с непрямым контролем, в которой мы выступаем в роли Абсолютного Зла. Наша задача вырыть свое подземелье, оборудовать его, населить всякой нечистью, а потом целой ордой вылезти наружу (а вот здесь уже начинается прямое управление армией), чтобы отыскать и стереть с лица земли всю тошнотворную милоту и няшность.

P.S. Если любишь фентези (Игра Престолов, Властелин Колец, Гарри Поттер и т.п.), то в этой игре не останешься равнодушным к огромному количеству шуток и отсылок к разным фильмам, книгам и играм (только комментарии и слова автора не надо отключать, в них заключена бОльшая часть атмосферности и веселья, а локализация здесь отличная).

Вердикт: 10/10 (не к чему придраться, нечего добавить) ИМХО
Если хотите наглядности, посмотрите Let's Play по игре: https://youtu.be/LXd-VmakYfg

author: {'steamid': '76561197992700081', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2521, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1362, 'last_played': 1463707255}

author: {'steamid': '76561198055030327', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 919, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 519, 'last_played': 1657570700}
review:
a bad Dungeon Keeper type version.

-everything feels slow
-limited variety of monsters
-Monsters are not balanced
-every campain mission feels the same

The Narator is awesome and keeps the mood up but at a point even he cant do it any longer ( he is pushing the player to do the mission objective and after time his lines become repititive).

during fights with many  monsters included you cant really tell what is going on and 5 seconds after a fight starts it is already over.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978146154', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 1027, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1027, 'last_played': 1462421329}
review:
Decent game and mostly fun when it's not crashing on me. 

It certainly wasn't review worthy until I got fed up with the crashes. I've also run into some significant pathfinding performance issues which forced me to restart with all new dungeon layouts. The game actually has a number of bugs and most of which is around the pathfinding.

There is also constant narration throughout the game which tries to be funny and helpful but it gets triggered while you're already doing too many things at once so you miss important messages. The narration is so bloated with meaningless bad humor that it's hard to pay attention to at times. 

I really don't recommend this game unless you can handle a fair number of issues. Perhaps wait until a patch and a good 50% off sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035860573', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 3463, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2415, 'last_played': 1539119264}
review:
Ayant fini le jeu , je peux dire qu'il est bon , il n'est pas exeptionel mais il fait passer agréablement le temps .
On est dans le typique mal contre bien , accentué par le coté cartoon du jeu et les petites blagues , jeux de mot sympa de la voix off qui nous accompagne durant la campagne.

Les plus : coté cartoon si on aime.
-On ne s'ennuie pas 
- voix off agréable 
-Très facile à prendre en main
-On n'a pas 2 fois la même carte
-Nombreuses unités : 1 unité qui sert pour les ressources et 4 de combat avec 3 évolutions ; que ce soit avec le protagoniste ou les démons.
-Piège bien pensé : coffre piègé etc..
-Quelques surprises quand on aggrandi son donjon.
-On est accompagné tout le long pour construire notre donjon mais ...

les moins :

- ... En ce qui concerne l'upgrade d'unité , c'était pas trop clair.
-On peut se dire dommage qu'il n'y ai pas plus de suprises quand on aggrandi son donjon !
-On peut dire dommage en ce qui concerne certaines choses à rajouter dans un donjon : quelques morts-vivant , une prison que peut aheter.
-On ne peut torturer qu'avec les démons , ils sont d'ailleurs très très long à monter , les unités de bases sont plus faible que ceux du protagoniste de base.
- La limite d'unité , on est à 60 , ça fait certes beaucoup , mais on est dans une histoire : armée contre armée , donc ça peut être dommage.
- J'aurais bien voulu jouer mon perso ! On ne le joue qu'au début très puissant , ça m'aurait fait plaisir de le jouer quand même , sans la super puissance qu'il peut avoir.
- De bon piège , mais c'est dommage qu'on ne puisse pas débloquer les pièges des autres factions.
-Trop peu d'unité qui viennent s'incruster dans le donjon ce qui fait que si on fait 1.2 pièce bourré de piège on est tranquille. Manque de challenge en tous cas en normal , à voir dans la difficulté supérieur.
-Son prix : je l'ai eu en réduc à 10 euros et he regrette pas , mais je pense pas que ce soit un jeu qui peut valoir 40 euros. Même s'il est sympathique ! je dirais entre 25.30 euros c'est déjà plus abordable.

En conclusion : 

Un jeu vraiment sympathisque à jouer , qui pour résumé les défaults , c'est dommage de ne pas avoir plus de choses de débloquable ou recrutable , pour enrichir notre donjons , que ce soit pour faire un donjon avec de nombreuse spièce différente ou pa forcément les même classes d'unité qui déambule dedans.

Un petit 16/20

author: {'steamid': '76561198007742259', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 2121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2121, 'last_played': 1462400583}
review:
Pretty good game, the game doesn't really hold up to the standard of the classic DK but is still very enjoyable.

+Good Campaign, both the Vanilla and DLC campaign had quite a couple missions which had good build-up, were well-constructed and alot of fun to play

+The narrator: Well written and quite funny to listen to.

+Worker AI works very well, workers prioritize tasks very well even though you don't really have a whole lot of control over it yourself.

+Lots of control over your dungeon. You can fill up corridors back up, you decide where you put your tools, you can even restructure your entire dungeon if you have enough money.

~Unit variation is alright, every factions has 4 different unit types with each 3 different tiers each and potential tactics you can create with that. Problem is that fights are way too quick for you to use any real tactics like assassinating with stealth units

~Faction System: Instead of 1 big faction there are now 2(+1 with DLC). While this brings some variation in game style(although not that much) the Demon faction had only 2, potentially 3, missions while the Horde factions has like 7

-Bland Specializations: On topic of faction variation, while I think the Horde faction was ok, the Undead Faction really lacks the feeling of actually playing undead, sure, they are better at resurrecting their soldiers then the other factions but unlike DK 2 you can't actually turn fallen enemies into soldiers like the Skeleton or Vampire in DK 2, which I think really should have been one of it's pointers. Same with demons, they have a torture room but it's essentially useless, you can't convert enemies like you could in the old games.

-It's somewhat tedious to click on things with the hand-cursor, frequently missing or selecting wrong monsters

-While I liked the narrator, the story and setting itself are quite cartoon'ish and unserious, almost all the characters and even alot of the story are quite obviously a parody of popular high-fantasy settings like Lord of the Rings, Game of Thrones and World of Warcraft.

Despite it's flaws I liked it quite alot. I should however mention that I bought it at a 75% sale and I would really only recommend you to buy it in a sale, it's not really worth €55 euros(with DLC). It's more of a Indie game so €15 is a more appropriate price.

author: {'steamid': '76561197962285864', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 918, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 872, 'last_played': 1448217205}

author: {'steamid': '76561198054393069', 'num_games_owned': 124, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 766, 'last_played': 1577654247}
review:
Sehr gelungenes Spiel! Sehr zu empfehlen!

Du magst schwarzen Humor, Easter Eggs und Dungeon Keeper, sowie Warcraft III ?
Dann bist du hier bestens bedient!
Positiv:
Das Spiel macht Spaß und ist sehr witzig und unterhaltsam aufgezogen. DIe Erzählerstimme unterhält den Spieler oft mit teils witzigen und lustigen Sätzen. 

Die Characternamen sind Weltklasse und die Spielmechanik ist nach anfänglicher EIngewöhnungsphase sehr angenehm.

Gelungene Add-ons

Oberfläche als Spielwelt

Mehrere Fraktionen spielbar

Negativ:
Spieltiefe ( Wer Dungeon Keeper gespielt hat, der erwartet viele Räume, das "Zoomen" in einen einzelnen Character, viele unterschiedliche Charactere,... Das bleibt hier leider etwas auf der Strecke, es gibt mehr oder weniger 8 Räume, die zwar durch verbesserungen aufgemöbelt werden können,allerdings wars das auch. Interessant sind die Fallen und das Craftingsystem in der Schmiede)
-> Aber bei soviel Unterhaltungswert braucht es auch nicht so viele Tiefe ;-)

Fazit: Dungeons 2 macht einfach Spaß. Es ist weder anspruchsvoll (Strategiegenre) noch bringt es deutliche Neuerungen. Trotzdem ist es ein super Spiel und man kann viele Stunden hineininvestieren.

author: {'steamid': '76561197984801272', 'num_games_owned': 550, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 429, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 309, 'last_played': 1576860532}
review:
Qui n'a jamais attendu une suite au célèbre Dungeon Keeper?

Dungeons 2 est un peu le fils spirituel ([i]quoiqu'un peu boiteux et pas totalement fini[/i]) de Dungeon Keeper.
On y retrouve les mêmes mécaniques, mais...Oui il y a un MAIS.

Le système de jeu est lent ([i]ne pensez pas le lancer pour une petite partie rapide en attendant que votre copine se sèche les cheveux...elle aura fini avant vous[/i]). Vos minions et leur compères rivalisent de lenteur par moment pour effectuer leur action.
La prise en main, quant à elle, nécessite de bien se familiariser avec la logique du jeu et donc de bien se pencher sur les didacticiels avant de songer devenir "Le Mal Ultime". Sinon votre aventure infernale risque de tourner court.

L'aspect graphique et scénaristique quand à lui, est superbe, qui par moment m'a fait penser à du Terry Pratchett, du Naheulbeuk et autres joyeustés parodiant le Médiéval Fantastique. Mention spécial au Narrateur en charge de vanter vos exploits et qui vous accompagne tout au long de l'histoire qui à des répliques purement désopilante.

Bref malgré ses défauts, Dungeons 2 est un jeu qui mérite le détour surtout pour sa narration et son côté gentillement méchant.

author: {'steamid': '76561198277519118', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 117, 'playtime_forever': 457, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 339, 'last_played': 1698352130}
review:
What an absolutely dumb game and an horrible homage to Dungeon Keeper. Put it simply this is Dungeon Keeper for dummies. The makers basically removed everything that would make this a Rate-R game and replaced it by prepubescent humor to keep their PG-13 rating. The narrator is as annoying as a preschool teacher. His daddy jokes and incessant picking is a big minus.

Aside from the presentation, there are many game issues. First the units are as dumb as a bag of hammers. You can't have units that exclusively mine or produce beer in Dungeons 2, if you place a number of traps or doors they all drop their tools and all rush to place them. There is no control whatsoever on what they do other than not lining up the tasks for them. Slapping units is completely useless and just another tasteless prop as it yields no reaction. That would just be bad for the game's rating.

Speaking of props, I could have played this without the most annoying hand cursor I've ever seen in a game. It's impossible to grab or drop anything with precision with it. It's a shiny bath toy. Second, you can't actually rotate the camera in Dungeons 2!!! Guess that wasn't a good feature enough for them to concentrate on.

They had to focus on an absolutely corny campaign which is lifted straight from World of Warcraft down to the race's names and present it as if it was any original. It is not. A few hours into this game and I already feel like I've wasted enough brain cells.

One positive, they mashed the RTS genre with the game decently, however crowd control is nearly impossible. You'll never handle more than ~4 units at the same time. It's a challenge to  have a healer heal the unit closest to death. No worries however, the game will never allow you to have much more units than that. Max population seems to be fixed to avoid further technical failures.

Once more all units are as dumb as they could be and this game is one of the dumbest I have in my library.

author: {'steamid': '76561198191537185', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1317, 'last_played': 1462301260}
review:
Dungeons 2 - это игра с черным юморком =)
Для тех кто играл в данжен кипер, игра покажется немного не то.Мне по началу тоже так показалось, но поиграв после первого часа, меня цепануло не хило, что я прошел компанию без читов за 2 дня ))) Сейчас запустил DLC про зиму, но об этом в самом DLC напишу, после прохождения.

И так Подземелье 2, что же оно из себя представляет?
Игрушка как вы уже поняли с черным юморком, Мы "Зло", которое хочет уничтожеть всю няшность и прочее проявление няшности )))) Когда вы увидите всех там единорогов и прочих зайчиков, вы поймете, какое вы "зло", раз собрались все -это разрушить...
Ахаха, да ладно я шучу, игра построенна очень интересно, ее сюжет переплетен с сюжетом и властелина колец, и мира Игры престолов, все так классно внесено в сюжет, что просто не оторватсья от прохождения его.И к тому же, знали бы вы, какая там озвучка!!!!! Юмор коментатора, ни раз заставлял улыбнутсья и даже...скажем так. откровенно поржать! =)
При чем, если вы не сообразите, что сделать, коментатор вам с интеремсным укором напомнит, насколько вы "Тормоз"! 
В игре нам дадут порулить, 2 разными фракциями, со своими юнитами и комнатами.
Графика мультяшная, довольна красочная и насыщенная.
Единственный минус, бывали краши игры, с выходом в виндоус.

Во-общем если вы ее еще не купили, то срочно к преобретению!!! Атмосферка там четкая )
Ну и конечно не забудьте еще купить DLC про зиму, мне больше понравилось за 3 фракцию играть, да да, DLC даст нам 3 Зло!

review: This is a great game!  Its the Dungeon Keeper from my childhod with a cool upgrade.  Lots of missons and campaigns to keep you entertained for HOURS.  One thing to watch though - I found that if I have multiple DLC active at one time I get a crash uploading saved games.  Slight annoyance but still a must have!

review: I really like this game. You get to be the villian that you would usually be going into dungeons to defeat, now you get to build the dungeon kill the heroes looking for XP and treasure. Not only that but you get to take your army to destroy the heroes were they live. The art style is a mix of WOW and older fantasy. I love the humor as well and the narrotor is quite funny too.  Good game finally get to play the villian i always wanted to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030173931', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 82, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1462126520}
review:
This game has a lot of potiential, but as it is, it falls flat on its face.  The UI is not intuitive at all.  The maximum zoom seems like it is designed for a 640x480 screen.  It should be much further out.  Regarding the maps, the game provides 2 maps, one for overworld and one for underworld (which is great).  However, then there are alternate maps that must be frequently interacted with that do not have a "map" that can be quickly cliked on.  Add in a regrowing fog of war, and its too much to handle.  I played a short time, but it was a short, frustrating time, and games certainly should not be frustrating.

Note, this review was when the game and DLC was 75% off.  The idea that this game regularly sells for four times what I paid is absolute insanity.  If you can get over the UI, or play games with keyboards alone, this game might be worth $15-20, but I cannot recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995285223', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 1717, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 998, 'last_played': 1463539343}
review:
Fun and colorful.  Basically a spiritual successor to Dungeon Keeper 2.  Bascially, when you're in the dungeon it's DK2.  When you sned your troops to the overworld, it's a simple RTS.  The graphics are great and the mood is light with good humor in the campaign.      

That said it is slower and more deliberate than your typical RTS (more relaxing).  I enjoy the pace, personally.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003096243', 'num_games_owned': 456, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 104, 'last_played': 1483387692}
review:
This game has been crashing every 10-15 minutes for me since I got it - I barely made it out of the tutorial map - so I can't really speak to the actual gameplay.  From what I've read there are others with the same issue and it started happening after a game update in October 2015.  After posting details of the problem on the bug report thread (along with what I've done to try and fix it myself), a dev quite promptly responded to tell me they think they've identified a fix and it just needs a bit more testing.  I figured hey, last update was just a few weeks ago, I'm sure they'll patch it soon.

Almost half a year later there have been no patches - fix or otherwise - and now any enquiries regarding fixes for this or other problems get the reply that they're working on the PS4 version of the game and there'll be no updates to the PC version while that's going on.  We'll maybe get a re-port of the PS4 version once it's released, which might fix the issue(s), they think, probably, maybe, but details on any of that are hazy at best.

Obviously there's a lot of people playing the game without issue, so it might be worth a look anyway, but I'd definitely keep Steam's no-questions refund criteria in mind and if you do run into problems go that route immediately rather than wait for the problems to be resolved.

author: {'steamid': '76561198135963301', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 2337, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1419, 'last_played': 1681482660}
review:
Ein must have für jeden der auf Strategiespiele und abgedroschenen Humor steht.
Dieses Spiel ist der Wahnsinn ich musste noch nie so oft Lachen bei einem Spiel. Denn in diesem Spiel wird einfach die heutige Kultur (Hipster, Musikbranche, Filme, Spiele vorallem F2P Games :D) so dermaßen durch den Kakao gezogen das ist echt der Wahnsinn.
Nur um mal ein Bsp. zu Nennen es gibt dort eine Einheit die heiß Naga und jeder dieser Naga's hat einen Namen so kommt es auch mal vor das eine Naga z.B. Naga Minaj heißt :'D 
Selbiges trifft man bei Orks usw. 
Und der Sprecher für sich ist auch der Hammer.
Aber mal um auf die Spielmechanik zu kommen, also mich hat das ganze ein wenig an Black and White erinnert. Man hat als Cursor eine Hand, mit der man seine Schergen anheben kann, rumwerfen kann und zum Antrieb auch eine auf den Hintern klatschen kann. 
Ihr könnt bzw. müsst mit euren anfänglichen Schergen zuerst ein Dungeon errichten, dieses könnt ihr durch zahlreiche Forschungen und Räume bzw. Kammern ausbauen, wie in jedem ordentlichen Dungeon gibt es auch hier Fallen welche sich durchaus als nützlich erweisen. Denn ab und an traut sich mal eine Heldenarmee in euer Dungeon welche ihr natürlich abwehren müsst. Des weiteren muss man mit seinen Schergen das Dungeon verlassen und die Heldenstädte usw. vernichten um die Mission zu beenden. Aber auch hier gibt es noch zahlreiche nebenquests die es zu lösen gilt, ein nettes Bsp. ,,Tötet die Einhornfamilie im Fandorn Wald.,, :'D

Also für dieses Spiel klare Kaufempfehlung, es macht einfach extrem viel Spaß nur ist der jetzige Preis etwas sehr teuer, deshalb kauft es euch eher im Sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045182396', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 953, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 953, 'last_played': 1456054323}
review:
Come sospetto sia accaduto per la maggior parte dei giocatori giunti sino qui, l’acquisto di Dungeons 2 è stato pesantemente influenzato dal ricordo di Dungeon Keeper, titolo sviluppato nel 1997 dalla geniale intuizione di Peter Molyneaux, che, all’epoca, si annunciava come una reale e bizzarra novità tra gli strategici in tempo reale, sia a livello di concept, sia a livello di gameplay. 
Personalmente conservo un ricordo indelebile di Dungeon Keeper II, che non manca di bazzicare saltuariamente sul mio PC ancora oggi, nonostante sia passato molto tempo da quel Pentium IV (e da quel paio di occhiali da vista).

Il team tedesco Realmforge trae ispirazione dall’anima di Dungeon Keeper, palpabile fin dall’inizio dalla mano del male da utilizzare per muoversi tra meandri del dungeon e per schiaffeggiare le proprie creature e, più in generale, dall’essenza stessa dell’esperienza di gioco: nei panni di un signore del male, il giocatore dovrà espandere il proprio dungeon a suon di picconate, tunnel e stanze dalle più disparate funzionalità, con l’obiettivo finale di spodestare il reame del bene e tutti i suoi principali campioni. 
Al modus operandi originale, gli sviluppatori hanno introdotto una serie di modifiche, che vanno dalla scontata introduzione di nuove unità, stanze e trappole per differenziarsi dal titolo Bullfrog, fino alla concezione ex novo di due mappe da controllare contemporaneamente, una dedicata alla parte meramente gestionale del dungeon e l’altra focalizzata sul comando delle proprie truppe in superficie contro gli avamposti del bene.

Nonostante la convinzione e il fascino di Dungeon Keeper siano ben lontani dall’essere eguagliate, la formula generale di Dungeons II funziona ed intrattiene discretamente. 
Le incertezze e le mancanze, prima fra tutte una difficoltà di gioco fin troppo accessibile, sono alleviate dalla presenza di una campagna single player longeva e divertente, complice di ciò la voce del narratore che non mancherà di rifarsi a piacevoli citazioni note nel mondo fantasy, e da design fiabesco e cartoonesco dai tratti beffardi e dai colori marcati.

Voto: 7

author: {'steamid': '76561198008883442', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 1964, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1274, 'last_played': 1462311119}
review: Очень хорошая игра в качестве продолжения Данжон кипера. Намного пострадала атмосфера, но это всё тот же кипер. Очень нехватает мультиков между миссиями. На мой взгляд маловато монстров. Но расказчик, это отдельная тема, за него разрабам просто огромный респект!!! Очень советую игру.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059328213', 'num_games_owned': 466, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 3890, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3239, 'last_played': 1494973831}
review:
7/10 - A piece of gold, that sadly get's boring after a while.

Many people see in Dungeons 2 the attempt to revive the success of Dungeon Keeper, but it is much more than that. 
Yes, it has most of the elements Dungeon Keeper had, but it has also some nice improvements to  the gameplay, a campaign that is quite entertaining over a good amount of time and a damn good working Coop- / Versus-mode. Thus the first game of the series had some problems, this one is nearly perfect for what it wants to be. The only difficulty it has, is the balancing of the three fractions. Once you know how they work you have just a limited amount of posibilties to get your opponent down: The orcs are pretty early game, the demons mid-game and the DLC's undead quite late-game. So if you dont act quick enough, you wont stand a chance later on, or vice versa. 

Gameplay - 9/10
Atmosphere - 6/10
Storytelling - 8/10
Graphics - 6/10
Playtime - 8/10
Balancing - 3/10

Total: 7/10 - A fair amount of fun, the DLC is totaly awesome.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998658140', 'num_games_owned': 163, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1495631782}
review: This game can't decide if it wants to be a RPG or a RTS game. Both parts are incredibly clumsy and the mouse pointer (that hand) is probably the most misleading mouse pointer I've ever witnessed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027632809', 'num_games_owned': 182, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 1249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 785, 'last_played': 1702836064}
review:
Dungeons 2 — это наглядный пример того, как можно и нужно делать работу над ошибками. Не слишком удачная первая часть была пересобрана заново, и в итоге на свет появилась пусть и неидеальная, не слишком хорошо оптимизированная, но все равно очень яркая, веселая и увлекательная игра.

Плюсы: интересный игровой процесс; возможность управлять бойцами и выполнять квесты на поверхности; сюжетная кампания, сдобренная юмором и иронией; отличная озвучка и музыка.
Минусы: игра плохо оптимизирована. Моя оценка 9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198020125851', 'num_games_owned': 15680, 'num_reviews': 840, 'playtime_forever': 1854, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1718, 'last_played': 1462958659}
review:
[h1]A Real Time Strategy / Dungeon Management Game[/h1]
https://youtu.be/_sdHXO5tZg8
[b]I played through the entire game, it was worth it[/b]
+ Visually the graphics of this game look fantastic with a lot of detail and color
+ Filled with fantasy charm and references to Game of Thrones and Lord of the Rings
+ Gameplay is fun, you are essentially managing a variety of minions commanding them to mine gold, build structures / traps, and eventually build an army to take out the humans above while they are constantly invading your dungeon to try to take you out.
+ A unique multi-layered map, meaning that there's an overworld on top of your underworld with an entirely different environment and you have to send troops to and from to complete various objectives.
+ Lots of things to build, upgrades, traps, and a variety of troops 
+ An amazing narrator who essentially tells the story through the cutscenes and as you play with some very well written dialogue and some guinuely funny moments. (At one point I noticed him say something like "Is this going too slow for you? Well check out the in-game cash shop and buy 20 gems for $100 to speed up the game by 100% Oh wait....this isn't a free to play game. Carry on")
+ Although the game gets a bit complex later on Dungeons 2 does a remarkably well done job of gradually introducing the player to new game mechanics without the need of any real tutorials or any reading.
+ When controlling units there's a lot of interesting RPG mechanics where you earn exp, can research abilities, find books to upgrade or give units special perks, and strategically mix various units to give various buffs. (example: using a naga to heal from afar while orcs are in front)
+ As you advance in the campaign the game seems to just get better and better
+ At one point in the campaign you get to play as an alternative race with all new units with new abilities, structures, and so on, there's yet another race in the Game of Winter DLC

- You can't rotate the camera it's essentially locked at an angle similar to Starcraft and other RTS games. It's not that bad, but I would have loved to see alternate viewpoints
- The narrator can be incredibly annoying when you take too long to complete an objective.
- You have a low population cap in first few missions at 15, which makes things a bit more difficult than they should. Later on you can increase the cap but you constantly feel limited
- The level before the last of level of the campaign the "A Blood Red Wedding" IS ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE!!!!!!! Why? Well the length of the mission is far too long inflated by tons of timers. To put it simply every 5minutes you get fight a few enemies and then you have to wait 5minutes to fight anymore (literally you must wait for this stupid timer to tick down) meanwhile you just sit there and stare blankly at the screen waiting and waiting and waiting and waiting for hours...until finally the mission ends. :(


I ♥ this game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198005825923', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 760, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 759, 'last_played': 1462438238}
review:
Having played the first I really wasn't expecting much from this one...a rare but very welcome surprise ensued. In fact it wasn't until recently that I even played it for any length consigned until now to the "eventually" pile of games picked up on sale.

Smooth animation and art style is a joy to watch, tonge in cheek humor and campaign which plays around with popular medieval cliches and a certain high profile medieval fantasy series, Game of Thrones makes for a lot of fun.

Where this game differ's from standard dungeon keeper-esque games apart from being in my oppinion at least as good as it's inspiration (which is apparently quite a feet given how many have tried and failed) is in it's multiple evil factions to choose from and the ability to have your cake and eat it too in that you can take to the surface and bring the fight to those do gooders.

If you're a fan of dungeon keeper gameplay and want a modern interpretation this is a very easy reccomendation.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995894805', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 117, 'playtime_forever': 2900, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2900, 'last_played': 1458977354}
review:
I want to like it. Really, I do. I really liked Dungeon Keeper 2. But this game needs a lot of work.

First of all, there are immense memory leaks causing slowdowns and finally crashes on the surface missions. The game is entirely unbalanced, too easy through the main campaign and suddenly stupid hard in the expansion. 

There's promise here, but it's not an overall good game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014589065', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 9672, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3060, 'last_played': 1539924254}
review:
First things first, if you're looking for a game like the first one then skip this one. It's not exactly the same, it keeps the most basic premises and changes everything else. 
Now that we've gotten that out of the way, this is still a good game on its own. If you need a way to waste a few hours of your life you won't be disappointed. You still build a dungeon and fill it with monsters and gold, but this time you get to control your monsters, at the expense of not controlling your dungeon lord. You still get spells, though, so it's kinda like having a dungeon lord anyways. This makes it easier to allocate units across your dungeon where they are needed, like at your core when being attacked. 
The game also adds in the overworld, which gives you a chance to stretch your legs a bit and attack things with your minions. Balancing attacking targets with defending your dungeon gets a bit tricky at times but is easily managed. 
Overall, the game is worth playing. Once you let go of the need for it to be a carbon copy of the first, it's fun and balanced and that's what's important.

author: {'steamid': '76561198154610598', 'num_games_owned': 1561, 'num_reviews': 56, 'playtime_forever': 747, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 747, 'last_played': 1458828662}

author: {'steamid': '76561198022514722', 'num_games_owned': 1080, 'num_reviews': 213, 'playtime_forever': 2667, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2276, 'last_played': 1650638634}
review:
What should I tell you about it?

It is similar to Dungeon Keeper but not really the same.
I liked Dungeons 2 without ever playing the first part.

Who cares?

Pros:
+ The story teller is A+++ (even the german version is parfait)
+ Look & Feel is great
+ Story is "good" (especially the add-on with Mr.Snow)
+ Nice characters
+ Nice leveling system

Cons:
- Controls are sometimes unprecise (I never really know what the hand will grab)
- Some Crashes
- Annoying Bugs (especially the one where Mr.Snow has to collect the power from the stones - timer runs to 0.0 but game won't continue -> solution: let Mr.Snow die and repeat the process again && you are not allowed to make any actions with Mr.Snow while he is in this circle NOR you are allowed to select him -> remove him from any group and never touch him again)
- Chaos fraction feels really crappy to play ... but maybe ... hm ... pretty sure ... I'm just too stupid to play them
- no really long term motivation (you get only few rooms and few traps and reach the limits pretty fast)

But who cares about these problems? For a low price ~15€ with all dlcs, this is a very good deal.
C ya.

author: {'steamid': '76561198131562350', 'num_games_owned': 508, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 950, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 949, 'last_played': 1458741926}
review:
Это игра, в которой вы станете всемогущим злом. В задачу всемогущего зла входит давать подзатыльники рабочим, заставлять их варить пиво для орков, таскать их за шиворот, кидать в новые и непонятные для них места. 

Вы - глава подземного мира. Это понимаешь в тот момент, когда видишь раскачанного орка или нагу, которые уделывают приходящих под землю в соло, хватаешь их за шкирку и со всем могуществом и щедростью кидаешь их в пивную лавку. Все происходящее разбавляют шутки от рассказчика - порой смешные, порой и не очень. Но голос и манера рассказа заставляют тебя расслабиться и получить удовольствие от игры.

А теперь к минусам. Скажу сразу - их немного, но они слишком критичные: 

1) Развитие продолжается достаточно долго. За уровень открывается всего пара новых возможностей, и если поначалу эти возможности кажутся интересной формой развития, то позже ты уже ловишь себя на мысли, что повторяешь уровень из раза в раз за исключением нескольких новых действий. 

2) Копать самостоятельно подземелья - это круто, но потом ты устаешь даже от этого. Поначалу ты говоришь: "А зачем добавили на камнях подсказки в виде узорного рельефа? Я ж не тупой!", но потом ты радуешься этому, потому что тебе предстоит копать очередной уровень. Возможно стоило создать какой-нибудь генератор карт - не такие уж они и большие, чтобы были трудности с генерацией. Разработчики как будто что-то забыли и не доделали: вроде пытаешься раскопать всю карту, найти какие-то забавные вещи, чтобы сказать, что я прошел ВСЮ игру, но вот карта раскопана и понимаешь - "Нет, черт возьми, ничего нового, просто очередной уровень...". В надежде на плохой уровень, ты раскапываешь полностью новую карту, но нет - "Все то же самое...". 

Итоги: я полагаю, что это одна из тех игр, которые вы можете не закончить. По крайней мере, ее окончание потребует продолжительного времени. В игре присутствует онлайн версия, но я не думаю, что она будет пользоваться популярностью - есть игры для онлайна и получше. А кампания - ну слишком долгая и нудная из-за долгого развития. Я поставлю игре 6-7 баллов из 10. Потому что юмор и хорошая идея из Dungeon Keeper - это не то, что может заменить хорошую и продолжительно интересную реализацию.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078833634', 'num_games_owned': 785, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 2432, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2351, 'last_played': 1604852309}
review:
Плюсы - короткая, но интересная кампания из 12 миссий, неплохой юмор рассказчика, разок можно пройти.
Минусы - нулевой мультиплеер, проблемы с коннектом вплоть до того, что поиграть с друзьями не получится. Тормоза в меню и при большом кол-ве существ(40+) на GeForce 1060. Игра местами недоделана - при большом кол-ве растяп имена для них заканчиваются. Невозможно схватить кучу персонажей быстрыми кликами - игра не реагирует(оптимизация! Ау!). Пропадает курсор в бою при наведении на кнопки заклинаний. При захвате и трансформации зоны карты ваши бойцы могут залипнуть в текстурах. В общем - БАГИ, тормоза и недоделки, их много! Если вы думаете, что "ну уж на моём-то суперкомпе за 100500 рублей тормозить не будет" - ага, щаз. У друга те же самые тормоза на компе за 80к+ (в 2017 г.)
DLC очень слабые и не стоят тех денег которые за них просят, особенно при неработающем мультиплеере. По скидке в 50-70% можно купить чтобы пройти основную компанию + Winter Games DLC, но полной цены она точно не стоит, даже не думайте покупать её без скидок, будете разочарованы.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016646963', 'num_games_owned': 514, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 2283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2153, 'last_played': 1497683332}
review:
Quinto juego terminado del año. Muy buen juego, la verdad es que me ha gustado bastante pero porque yo vengo de aquellos míticos Dungeon Keeper que tantas horas me han dado de diversión y éste es una especie de remake con una vuelta de tuerca más que es el poder salir de la mazmorra al mundo exterior y combinar estrategia tipo Dungeon Keeper en la mazmorra y estrategia tipo Starcraft o similares en el exterior. Conserva esos puntos graciosos del Dungeon Keeper aunque lo que sí que me ha faltado es un poquito más de dificultad.

En resumen ha sido como volver hacia atrás en el tiempo y recordar aquel año 1999 en el que salió el Dungeon Keeper 2 que aún conservo con su caja. QUE TIEMPOS AQUELLOS...

author: {'steamid': '76561198006673447', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 824, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 824, 'last_played': 1456090476}

author: {'steamid': '76561198025779396', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2538, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1394, 'last_played': 1456198988}
review:
I liked it a lot. It feels like  how Dungeon Keeper 3 was ment to be! You know that game that was never made. 
It does what dungon keeper 2 does and add and overworld element. Both are don't superbly. With helarous comentray and a lot a self referental humor. 

With both the underworld and overworld. Both are done well.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969535253', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 4185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2288, 'last_played': 1465071210}
review:
Also ganz ehrlich das Spiel ist das Beste was ich seit langem gekauft habe. Es ist vollgestopft mit Witz und Charme der seinesgleichen sucht. Selbst das Original kann da nicht mithalten. Kauft und spielt es und achtet vor allem auf die Details und das was der Sprecher sagt es ist GÖTTLICH! Auch oder gerade in Deutsch! Da wird allerhand aufs Korn genommen. Beispiel? Eine Oberwelt namens Wallstreet wo per Goldlieferungen Banken gerettet werden sorry aber sowas eingebettet in nem Spiel ist tausendmal besser als jede High-End-Grafik und selbst die kann sich hier nicht lumpen lassen. Aus der kitschigen Oberwelt werden sofort düstere Sektoren wenn man sie erobert hat und auch im Dungeon ist alles wie es sein soll. Ich habe nur einen einzigen, wirklich einzigen Kritikpunkt:

Die Steuerung ist manchmal etwas hakelig beim Aufnehmen von Charakteren oder Anklicken von Icons, da muss ich oft zwei- dreimal klicken.

Das wars auch schon. Von mir eine volle Kaufempfehlung! Wer das Spiel sausen lässt ist selber schuld.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961025630', 'num_games_owned': 635, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 1886, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1610, 'last_played': 1456432395}
review:
8.5 / 10 Quality game. 

As a fan of the series, I liked the incorporation of the Overworld missions as well as a change to the previous Hero mechanics. More control over dungeon baddies and a rudimentary RTS mode on the surface added a new look to a solid game that gave a solid 20 hours of gameplay.

It was short lived, however, as the game lacks staying power. There are no difficulty settings and a lack of Custom Gameplay left me feeling a little "Meh" at the end of an otherwise enjoyable gaming experience. It felt like right when I started to enjoy the game, it was all over, leaving the game itself to feel like a 20 hour tutorial rahter than a full game.

A solid bargain for $10 or less, and worth bumping up to $20 for all the DLC, but like so many other games, this game is enjoyable and almost reaches a level of perfection to make it really noteworthy, but falls just short by not having those finishes touches after End Game.

Reminiscent of an old classic called "DragonShard" wih the Dungeons feel they established in the last 2 renditions.

The shameless reference to other RPGs as a vehicle to patch up a bare bones story didn't win it any style points, but if they put the time and effort into developing this basic structure into a more sophisticated and well-rounded game with more diversified long-term options and a few more play modes, Dungeons III could be a really solid game.

But not with the writing they have employed, and definitely not without more hours of game play incorporated into the experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008955053', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 1852, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1852, 'last_played': 1452593131}
review: Прошол игру и все дополнения. Очень хорошая игра с приличным и смешным(местами) сюжетом. Отличный вариант, чтобы скоротать пару вечеров.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960639639', 'num_games_owned': 238, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 3740, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1797, 'last_played': 1478126320}
review:
Great game but just not enough content. I'm an old school Dungeon Keeper fan and this game comes the closest but not close enough. There are not enough creatures or rooms (or things to do yourself) and the fact you have to pay for DLC that's so short it should just be a free update...

This could be amazing game, it just needs a lower price tag and way more content.

If you're looking for a DK style game, this is it. It's just unfortunate that it doesn't even come close to the entertainment DK had.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060596436', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2673, 'last_played': 1455495592}
review:
Great Game :D

I dont usually give a review, but this game keep me hook for hours, so i should give it a proper feedback,

PROS:
1) Great narration, Funny jokes, great refferences.
2. Graphic. Give me a good feeling like playing warcraft III, and the graphic is not so boring, and the unit design are very awesome.
3) Gameplay. Unique Gameplay, and also this is quite refreshing of RTS+Building Sims

CONS:
1) Monster type is limited.
2) Limited Type of Units. 
3) The game might be repetitive for awhile, it needs more function, like a heroes we could level up, or maybe the heroes could take a different kind of weapon/skill/armor/etc.

All in all, a pretty fun game. it could be better thought

author: {'steamid': '76561198064661213', 'num_games_owned': 1381, 'num_reviews': 222, 'playtime_forever': 102, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 102, 'last_played': 1455379540}
review:
This game, unfortunately, just does not offer enough to keep my interest. The gameplay is slow and uninteresting, the character types are too limited and the game just feels like less of what Dungeon Keeper is. The narration is the best part about this game, not surprising as its the same narrator as The Stanley Parable. He does a great job in this as well but its not enough to hold this game together. I had frame drops as well, and I couldn't load my save after trying to reload my last play session so I had to start the campaign mission over again even though I was almost done. Luckily the campaign progress does save properly. 

The good things. First, the tone is exactly what you'd want from a dungeon keeper cloan. Its amusing and it has that generic charm of good vs evil, but its entirely intentional. Second, exploring the overworld while also keeping track of your dungeon adds an interesting dynamic, unfortunatly the gameplay isn't engaging or challenging enough to make it interesting. Just keep orcs in your dungeon and you'll be fine, thats basically the strategy. The game also looks quite good, the design of the dungeon is particularly nice. 

Unfortunately for me this is about where the good ends. The sound design leaves a lot to be desired, from the contact hits to the footsteps, to slapping your minions, it all sounds like it was made by a rookie sound team. The rooms aren't varied enough, the enemy and minion design isn't close to varied enough, even in the sandbox mode. I think this game could have been a lot better with more unique minion types and room types. 

Overall, I think Dungeons 2 was a nice attempt at a fun Dungeon Keeper cloan, but it falls flat. Even if your a fan of the genre I wouldn't bother picking this up unless it has a serious discount

[h1] [u] Worth It In A Bundle or A Deep Discount [/u] [/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198080373322', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 1682, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1706790285}

author: {'steamid': '76561197985363409', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 2053, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2053, 'last_played': 1454927612}
review:
Многие тут сравнивают эту игру с какой-то там легендой жанра. Я же сразу скажу, что для меня Dungeons 2 первая и единственная в своём роде игра, посему сравнивать не с чем.

Сюжет тут не шибко примечательный. Шуток вроде бы много, но лёгкая улыбка у меня возникла лишь раз или два за игру. Быть может это из-за недостаточной актёрской игры русского рассказчика. Геймплей в игре тоже звёзд с неба не хватает. Он всегда проходит по одному и тому же шаблону. Но к счастью, как только игра начинает надоедать из-за этого, она тут же заканчивается.

В целом игра уровня чуть выше среднего. Вытягивает её всё тот же рассказчик. Да, остроумием и актёрской игрой он не поражает, но благодаря его частому бормотанию играть не скучно. В целом я остался доволен. И сразу после прохождения основной кампании приобрёл дополнение A Game of Winter. В нём рассказчика уже чуть меньше, а сложность в два раза выше, в виду чего пришлось вносить существенные корректировки в тактику развития и боя. A Game of Winter является логическим продолжением сюжета оригинала и ставит в нём точку.

author: {'steamid': '76561198141810748', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2864, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1324, 'last_played': 1635182902}

author: {'steamid': '76561197992736251', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 329, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 329, 'last_played': 1454857997}
review:
I like the idea of a spiritual successor to the Dungeon Keeper series, but this falls flat. It's a lot better than the first game, but there are still loads of problems with this:
- There is no sandbox gameplay (Skirmish mode is not sandbox, the dungeon area and top world are not generated but presets, so once you've beaten a level, you'll always beat it)
- The voice acting and writing for campaign mode falls flat. If you want to have a "cutesy comedy evil" approach to the game, that's fine, but stay away from obvious and lame jokes that fall really flat. Either go for it or not, don't half-ass it.
- Having an overworld that plays completely differently (RTS style) while still having a dungeon to maintain is simply not a good split of focus. Is it a dungeon builder or not? For my two cents, I would throw away the overworld and be happy building dungeons all the way instead of bothering about the overworld.

If you want a few hours  fun here and there and the game is on sale, then okay, consider getting it - otherwise, stay clear.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965343601', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1056, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1056, 'last_played': 1454828900}

author: {'steamid': '76561198004416299', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 1200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1200, 'last_played': 1452531462}
review:
Uz sem ve veku, kdy vsechny ty epicke, sahodlouhe a emocne presycene hry jednoduse nestiham.
Vic uz u pocitace pracuji a kdyz uz dojde na tu zabavu, radeji si pustim logicke jednorazovky, nejakeho toho Isaaca nebo strategie, ktere nepotrebuji dlouhodobejsi prupravu a clovek muze hru kdykoliv prerusit a nebat se, ze pri dalsim spusteni nebude vedet, co a jak.

Dungeons 2 jsou to posledni ze jmenovaneho - strategie, ktera hrace nenuti zkoumat principy a ucit se slozite mechanismy, hra, ktera se nebere vazne a hrac si ji dostatecne uziva i bez promakaneho scenare a slozitostmi s tim spojenymi.
D2 je prachsproste okopirovani Dungeon Keepera, strategie z dob tak davnych (1997), ze polovine soucasnych hracu toto dvouslovi nic nerekne a ani jeho vygoogleni tento stav nejspis nezmeni.
Nutno rict, ze ve sve dobe slo o povinost kazdeho nadsence a majitele osobniho pocitace; originalni strategie, kde bylo poprve ve velkem vytezeno tema boje dobra se zlem, tedy zla s dobrem, protoze tady ste nehrali za ty dobre a spravne, tady ste vladli rukou despotickeho sikanatora, jenz slovutne dobro potiral.

Originalni koncept, velice pekna grafika (v te dobe opravdu neco nevidaneho), vtip a hratelnost oslovila hned pri prvnim kontaktu se hrou a nemalo z nas pred monitorem travili dlouhe vecery prokopavanim celeho podzemi za objevenim vseho, co do nej team vtipnych designeru uschoval.
No a takhle sem dopadl ted ja s D2! Kazdou misi, kazdy ten originalni kousek z celkoveho produktu, kazdy ukol sem si vychutnaval tak, ze jsem nad temi dobrymi musel ziskat absolutni prevahu, objevit vse, co podzemi skryvalo, vytezit veskere zlato a pripravit chrabrym rytirum a trpaslikum takovou cestu z pasti, aby nemusel nikdo z me podzemni armady hnout paratem :)
Ve vysledku sem v kazde urovni a scenari travil nekolikanasobne vice casu, nez bylo potreba, protoze hra je sama o sobe pomerne jednoducha a teprve az predposledni level proveril me schopnosti a rychlost rozhodovani.

To ce je ovsem tim nejvetsim plusem a veci, jenz je potreba vytahnout nadevse, je (krom podpory ceskeho jazyka i v ramci MACos!!!) VTIP! Hra je nesmirne vtipna a i kdyz obcas sklouzavala k trapnosti, jeji neustale se obouvani do soucasnych fantasy trendu ze serialu i klasik z pera mistra Tolkiena, bylo proste uzasne sledovat a uzivat.

Takze zaverem - kdo nezna Dungeon Keepera, muze to napravit, je to ale starsi kousek a soucasne hrace jistojiste odradi grafikou a problemy se spustenim v ramci soucasnych systemu a optimalizaci, ale porad je to kus, ktery se do historie nezapsal jen tak pro nic za nic.
Kdo DK zna a miloval ho minimalne z poloviny tak jako ja, ma tu alternativu upravenou presne tak, aby vyhovovala modernim standardum, takze nevahejte!

author: {'steamid': '76561198039814905', 'num_games_owned': 557, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 979, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 979, 'last_played': 1454726324}
review:
Grundsätzlich ist das Spiel nicht schlecht. Die 15 Stunden, die man damit verbringt, sind durchaus unterhaltsam. Es gilt jedoch einige negative Punkte zu beachten:

Pro:
+ Den Dungeon auszubauen macht Spaß
+ Die Einheiten sind liebevoll gestaltet
+ Cooler Comic-Look (wem's gefällt)
+ Der Mix aus Unterwelt/ Oberwelt funktioniert erstaunlich gut
+ Coole Fallen

Cons:
- Der Sprecher
- Der Humor des Sprechers
- Der Sprecher lässt sich nicht abstellen (auch auf der niedrigsten Stufe brabbelt er)
- Die Anspielungen auf Harry Potter, Herr der Ringe, Game of Thrones, etc.
- Die Namen (Throllolo und Gundledore?! WTF)
- Insgesamt sehr kindlich
- Einheiten sind manchmal schwer zu greifen
- Der hohe Preis!
- 0 replayability

Fazit:
Wer über die augenscheinlichen Schwächen hinweg sehen kann bekommt ein ordentliches Spiel. Wirklich nachhaltig begeistern kann es mich jedoch nicht. Den Ausschlag für die negative Bewertung gaben vor allem der Sprecher, der hohe Preis des Spiels (ich hab es im Steamsale für -75% gekauft, mehr sollte man wirklich nicht zahlen) und dass es keinen Grund gibt, das Spiel noch einmal anzufassen nach dem Durchspielen. Ich werde das Spiel schnell vergessen haben.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998613403', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 5631, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2631, 'last_played': 1500579473}

author: {'steamid': '76561198025532553', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3049, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1019, 'last_played': 1453302510}
review: Добротный, смешной и интересный неофициальный наследник Dungeon Keeper. Прочитал отзывы и не пожалел, что приобрел. Хороший геймплей сочетается с забавным и ненапряжным сюжетом, о котором рассказывает голос с множеством шуток. Порадовал качественный русский перевод с озвучкой (даже стоит субтитры отключить).  Малое количество существ компенсировалось возможностью их прокачки. Но вот так и не удалось найти особого применения заклинаниям, кроме одного и особо не нужны были ловушки....  Забавно были продуманы и обставлены стандартные ситуации вроде гибели главных героев, или когда начинаешь делать не совсем то, что не предписано сюжетом. И при этом есть что-то от атмосферы оригинальной игры. Игрой остался доволен и рекомендую всем.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073520298', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 627, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 625, 'last_played': 1494186717}

author: {'steamid': '76561197967516650', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 202, 'playtime_forever': 3316, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1402, 'last_played': 1504369726}
review:
Absolutely amazing.
I read a few reviews telling me it was all rock-paper-scissors and that certain 'builds' were extremely powerful whilst others were weak.
This is not true.
Skirmish is tough as nails and I can't beat any of the skirmishes. I don't play competitive RTS, so haven't tried multi player yet.
The campaign is hilarious, challenging 'enough', and Bullfrog's humour has somehow managed to travel into this release.
I can't find any reason not to buy this, except for the price-tag - but since I'm cheap that really shouldn't discourage anyone who doesn't mind paying the full price for a good game.

Pros: everything about this game is well-executed
Cons: Moneymoneymoney

author: {'steamid': '76561198035821674', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 2097, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1659, 'last_played': 1462191140}
review:
Вы видите цифру "два" рядом с названием игры?! Видите...., так вот, это совершенно другая ничего не имеющая с первым данжеоном, ну почти, юмор и общий плагиат остался, НО теперь это выглядит очень хорошо. 
Итак, общая история такова, вы Саурон, которого победили. Но т.к., Вы самый-самый, то не умерли, а стали инвалидом.
По ходу кампании, Вы восстанавливаете своё величие(но всё равно будете сидеть на троне в виде тени), возвращаете в своё лоно своих прислужников(орки, гоблины, наги, троли).
Вы же помните, что это другая игра? Отлично. Теперь не надо строить пентаграммы на пути следования героев, теперь не надо собирать души этих жалких человечков, предварительно насытив их садо- и мазохистических наклоностей, а также их карманы СВОИМ же золотом. Бегать героем туда, где пентаграмные твари не справляются. 
Теперь всё в лучших традициях последователей DKeeper:
Тронный зал, где Вы сидите и скучаете на своём троне, рядом бегают утырки(или как их там зовут), в общем миньоны, которые копают, варят пиво, устанавливают ловушки и, когда делать нефиг, падают ниц облобызовывая Вас!
Также в тронном зале заместо сердца теперь колодец,из которого Вы заказываете себе существ при соблюдении требования, также имеется лимит существ(60).
Это значица подземелье, но есть ещё и поверхность, откуда постоянно лезут людишки. Копаем золото, наги добывают ману из кристалла, копим силы, не даём спиться оркам и....идём на поверхность мочим феечек и прочих несогласных с нами.
И всё это под звуки отличной озвучки советника(к концу игры чутка поднадоест). Шуточки все связанные с Властелином колец, Игры Престолов и ещё пары фильмов. 
Ах да, там ещё помимо орочей стаи(гоблины,орки,наги,троли), есть ещё и стая демонов, но про них писать не буду, они мне не понравились. Также есть дополнение, где дают стаю нежити. Ну вот и всё.
Отличная игра получилась, особенно в сравнении с тем, что было!

author: {'steamid': '76561198009278251', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 399, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 399, 'last_played': 1451871626}
review:
For some reason... every dungeon management game EVER has been cutsey, cartoony, comical.

WHY???

What the fuck are they thinking?  Does that improve the game somehow?  Is it covering up untalented graphic design, or is it appealing to a wide audience?

I don't know, but it RUINS IT.  I'm trying to be an evil dungeon master and the narrator is telling fart jokes n shit.  Making fun of the whole fantasy paradigm.  The orcs are prancing around like fruit cakes.
like, really???   Is there one dungeon game out there that takes it seriously, like DnD seriously?
Warhammer or Total War kind of SERIOUSLY!?
You can build a torture room for fuck sakes!  This isn't elementary school material.  Get it through your head.
I go to massacre the surface world of men, and the narrator is babbling about fluffy rabbits and other bad cliche jokes about being evil.  Good for you.  Fuck youself.

The graphics remind me of when Warcraft 3 first came out.  Uhh.. wtf is this?  So cartoony.
And, ya the lag.  Omg the lag.  Make it stop.  The screen tearing, the jittery graphics.  It's not me Even the PROMOTIONAL VIDEO for this game lags.  Go watch it.  What a joke.  I don't mean on Steam, I mean it was RECORDED lagging.  And published like that anyway.  Talk about a technical nightmare.

The gameplay is so meh.  There is nothing new from previous titles.  Throw creatures around, slap them, dig out rooms, plant rooms, make military guys.  Would it kill you to make something interesting?
Not to mention it doesn't seem balanced.  For some reason I'm always waiting for something that is taking way too long to do.  Simple tasks take all freakin day.  

The developer doesn't give a fuuuuckk.  And it shows.  I got it on sale and it's still a waste of money.

Don't do it.  Save yourself.  Play Dungeon Keeper of Overlord or something.  They are much less disappointing.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989594656', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3542, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1498, 'last_played': 1499741234}
review:
TL;DR - good campaign, frustrating skirmish mode, no mod support.

the good:   if you like dk2 you will enjoy this.  3 (with expansion) races with different play styles and dungeons.  interesting hybrid gameplay.  dungeon-building and also RTS-style overworld.  campaign is great.  humorous narration and storyline.  I was wondering why this only had an average score of 7 but not anymore. 

After the campaign dries up the skirmish mode that is left is really lackluster.  So lackluster that it really leaves a bad taste in my mouth and after another failed attempt made me salty enough to write this review.

you expect a sandbox-like mode that lets you tinker around and build a dungeon but unfortunately you never get the chance to build with the overzealous waves of ever-hardening enemies that plague your dungeon every 5 minutes.  Ive played 6 skirmishes now and havent made it 45 minutes on normal difficulty (the lowest) after having zero problems with the campaign.  There is no way to lower difficulty further or to decrease wave spawns (in fact some skirmish maps start spawning from 2 bases if you eliminate one to try to give yourself some breathing room.)  Unfortunately again, there is no steam workshop for this so no user-created tweaks and google searches havent provided any mods or tweaks for the game either.  Im a casual gamer.  I dont play to get stressed out or feel rushed or anything like that and I wish there were a lower difficulty for people like me that just want to blow some time and build a dungeon.  

campaign mode is a good 8.5/10, Ill probably end up buying the campaign expansion if I ever see it around 5 bucks.  the skirmish mode (which would provide many more hours of entertainment than the campaign if done right) is a soft 5/10.   The fact that it doesnt have workshop or modding support is dumb as well and I wont recommend a game that doesnt encourage user content.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089719552', 'num_games_owned': 572, 'num_reviews': 215, 'playtime_forever': 2179, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 950, 'last_played': 1641923066}
review:
Este juego pretende parecerse a Dungeon Keeper, pero ni se le acerca. Aun asi, no es malo, ya que Kalypso ha optado por cambiar Dungeons de un TD a una estrategia en tiempo real muy buena, y por supuesto, muy divertida.

Para empezar, podemos elegir entre dos razas bastante diferentes, pero la forma de jugarlas es muy similar.

Luego, un juego 100% traducido. Siempre se agradece poder jugar en tu idioma. El comentarista suele hacer comentarios muy graciosos.

La historia no es un punto a destacar. Esta muy sobreexplotado el argumento que usan. Aun asi, la forma en la que el comentarista te explica la historia hace que valga la pena.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003837486', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 121, 'playtime_forever': 2402, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2286, 'last_played': 1453648109}
review:
J'étais un grand fan de Dungeon Keeper, mais là c'est vraiment bof. Il y a quelques améliorations sympas, mais ça reste très mou, les sauvegardes ne fonctionnent pas (il faut sauver sur une sauvegarde automatique). Vous avez des missions mais vous passez votre temps à être harcelé de toute part, et si vous quittez votre donjon, c'est mort.
Vous mettez des crétaures pour s'améliorer, elles refusent dans 90% des cas.
Il faut au moins 2s pour attraper une unité, ce qui est vraiment pénible.
Les adversaires neutralisent vos piège en 3s.

Bref, c'est bien loin d'être aussi fun que Dungeon Keeper, ça en devient même assez vite pénible à jouer je trouve.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064373133', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 4992, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2301, 'last_played': 1706906209}
review:
It's quite difficult to write reviews for this sort of game without comparing them to Dungeon Keeper, so I won't bother. I've been waiting for a good successor to DK2 for years, and this one looks like a fine fit.

The graphics are good, the gameplay is smooth, and I liked the sound effects. The minions in several flavours are nice. You think you've got about 5 total, but each one can evolve twice for a respectable range of 15 slightly different beasties, in the Horde, the Demons, and presumably the Undead.

I haven't tried multi-player, so I won't comment on that. 

The storyline is silly, quirky, and slightly self-referential, happily dropping in references to other franchises with all the skill and care of a hungover troll. I found them funny, others may not.

There is also a massive amount of spoofing "A Game of Thrones", in utterly shameless fashion :)

While each level can get a little formulaic (expand, develop, build, upgrade) I can't see any way to avoid that in this sort of game, and the ability to send your minions for a walk in the sunshine and a little (crude) RTS combat keeps things interesting. 

Each level seemed to take quite a while, but the campaign went quite quickly.

I bought this on a Steam sale, but intend to pick up the undead DLC (another 8 missions and another faction) at full price.

I would reccomend this game.

Having now completed this game and the Undead campaign DLC, I can confirm that it is very silly, self referential, and mercilessly takes the mickey out of "A Game of Thrones" all the way through....

I still think it's good.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970806701', 'num_games_owned': 391, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1453640234}
review:
As a Dungeon Keeper Fan, I saw this and thought to myself "Maybe it will be like it?"

My Result.......KINDA???

Is is any good......KINDA???

Here's Why

Pros.....
1. Similar look and feel to a Dungeon Keeper - it has the similarity of a Dungeon Keeper game, where you carve out your dungeon, and build rooms for your minions, satifying their needs ect. Also I must say that the Graphics nicely detailed, and very colourfull, something that will be very welcome to Dungeon Keeper fans.
2. Rooms/Units can be upgraded/improved - When yoou build a room, it doesn't just place everything you need, no.... it lets you crate your own room layout, you can reserch new rooms, traps, magic etc, which is really a nice addition, also certain rooms can be used to upgrade and inprove your units, which again is very good, something new and slightly different from Dungeon Keeper.
3. Animation are very good - The animations on the units and buildings are very good, when you see your imps/servants breaking down the wall's you actuallt see them hit the wall and it looks like they are actually hitting it, the movement animations are also very good, each creature has a distinct animation when it comes to movement, idle, attack etc. 
4. Humour is spot on - I can say enough for the Humour in this game, it's spot on, with silly references, and you can't help but either smile, or laugh, just the right amout of comedy without going to far.
5. Invading the Human world - What we were promised when we saw the end of Dungeon Keeper 2, the hope that we can send out minions to the human world and invade comes true here, and it is brilliant, you actually see the upperworld morph from a bright colour area into a dark decrepid place, when you take it over, it's awesome to see.

Cons....
1. WAY TO SLOW!!!! - I can say enough about this, it's is a very slow game, unit movement is very slow, and your basic imps/servants that carve out the tunnels, take a long time to break down the wall, the pacinf just feels a little but too slow if you ask me.
2. Not enough creature variations, when you build your dungeon, you expect loads of different creatures to live in it, and work together.....Nope each dungeon faction gets 5 creaturs each. That's it.... Come on guys, you could only think of that? utterly dissapointed
3. No Dungeon Vs Dungeon - WHAT??? I can go against another dungeon?? Skirmish is basicly endless mode where you build up your dungeon and take over the Human world Map, and that's it. Huge potential missed for some fantastic online VS mode

If i have to give a review score it will be a 7/10

Are there more possitives than negatives....yeah there is but there's something about this game that, just misses out on getting a Higher score, sure the good things are Brilliant, and well recieved. But the Negatives do hit it hard. They're important issues that need to be addressed if they want to continue with this, and make more.

I would say if you are a true Dungeon Keeper fan, then you'll enjoy this, but feel like it's missing what it was to be a Dungeon Keeper. A great attempt, but not there just yet.

If you haven't bought this yet, I would say it's worth it, but only when it is on sale, and not full price. Keep it on your wishlist, and any sales hit this and you're happy to pay for it, go for it, just don't expect Dungeon Keeper 3 just yet. Maybe Dungeons 3 will be what we're looking and hoping for in the future.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011648561', 'num_games_owned': 197, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 2313, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1453661912}
review:
由于是带着牛蛙的《地下城守护者》续作的名号来的 所以直接给差评了
地下城核心玩法就是从牛蛙那抄来的基本上没有创新 地面玩法变成RTS操作什么的也没点手感
满满的war3画风 操作起来的感觉还不如十多年前的war3

作为一个RTS类游戏来说兵种少操作手感渣
一个种族就4种单位 算上后3种能升级也就10种单位
作为《地下城守护者》的续作玩法没有创新只有更加简单

Le tout fait que ce n'est pas agréable.

je passe mon chemin...
