author: {'steamid': '76561198062805798', 'num_games_owned': 430, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1555, 'last_played': 1456831901}
review:
[h1] Schönes Spiel mit kleinen Macken [/h1]

[b] Vorneweg:	[/b]
Ich habe lange und oft Dungeon Keeper 2 gespielt. Werde mich auch darauf beziehen. Außerdem habe ich das Spiel noch nicht durch gespielt (Stand: 01/ 16). Wenn sich dadurch meine Erfahrung ändert, werde ich die Review natürlich anpassen.

[b] Hat dir das Spiel gefallen? [/b]
- Oftmals, ja. Hatte meistens großen Spaß daran.

[b] Würdest du das Spiel wieder kaufen? [/b]
- Salepreis (Steam 10€ / Humble-Store 12 €) definitiv. Zum Vollpreis nicht (siehe Fazit).


[b] Was hat dir nicht gefallen? [/b]
Es gab einige Sachen. Mal mehr, mal weniger störend. Mir gefällt Beispielsweise nicht, dass es nur so wenige Kreaturen gibt. In beiden spielbaren Fraktionen (Horde und Dämonen) gibt es neben den Arbeitern (Imps) nur je vier weitere Kreaturen. Hier muss man allerdings beachten, es git sie in jeweils drei Varianten, also irgendwo doch 13 verschiedene Kreaturen (4*3 +1 ). Man kann später mittels Arena (ersetzt Area und Trainingsraum aus DK2) gezielt Trainieren und bestimmen, welche Kreatur bei rum kommen soll. Beispielsweise kann ein Orc Hauptmann werden, oder ein fieser Schläger in Eisenrüstung. Die Imps werden übrigens auch zum Bevölkerungslimit gezählt, welches meiner Meinung nach mit 15 anfangs sehr niedrig ist. Das kann durch Forschung natürlich witer ausgebaut werden. Doch will man eine Truppe, die sich gegen die "Bösen" wehren kann UND eine fleißige Arbeitertruppe, wirds anfangs eng. Da muss man frühzeitig forschen.

Zufallsgenerierte Karten oder sowas gibt es nicht. Die Kartenauswahl ist mit 5 Maps doch sehr mau. Per kostenfreien DLC kommen drei weitere hinzu, andere DLC's sind kostenpflichtig. Zum Inhalt der kostenpflichtigen kann ich nichts sagen.

Der Humor des Erzählers: Naja. Ich kann damit umgehen, aber das ist Geschmackssache. Die häufige Wiederholung ein und des selben Spruches geht allerdings irgendwann doch auf die Nerven. Das Reportoire an Sprüchen ist groß, und wenn es dem Erzähler nicht schnell genug geht, dann meckert er auch gerne mal. Dennoch werden einige Sprüche (sowohl getriggerte, als auch die Sprüche aus "langeweile") irgendwann langweilig bis hin zu nervig.

Was mich allerdings am meisten genervt hat waren eigentlich zwei Sachen: der Launcher von Kalypso, der jedes mal kommt, mir die Patchnotes des gesamten letzten Jahres präsentiert, meine Kalypso-Accountdaten gespeichert hat (ja, eigenes Konto leider nötig - geht aber sekundenschnell anzulegen) und dann jedes mal auf zwei Knöpfe gedrückt werden muss (weiter - Spiel starten). was total unnötig und nervig ist. Wenn ich ein Spiel starte, muss ich nicht die Patchnotes lesen, und will dann auch ein Spiel spielen, und es nicht noch einmal bestätigen müssen...

Das Zweite, was sehr nervig ist, sind die Abstürze. Ich habe ein sehr gut ausgestattetes System, was weit über den Anforderungen liegt. Daran liegt es nicht. Es stürzt nur regelmäßig ab, direkt zum Desktop mit einer C++ Fehlermeldung. Das ist für 40€ die das Spiel regulär kostet eindeutig zu viel. Sowas DARF NICHT SEIN.

[b] Jetzt zu dem Teil, der mir sehr gut gefallen hat: [/b]
Man merkt ganz klar, dass Dungeon Keeper hier Vorbild war. Damals gab es Gerüchte über einen dritten Teil, der auch an dr Oberfläche spielen sollte. Nun endlich gibt es diesen Teil. Aus Sicht der Spielmechanik gefällt es mir sehr gut. Buddeln und Räume anlegen, Ressourcen sammeln und eine Horde aufstellen. Alles super. Lediglich die kleine Auswahl an Kreaturen ist blöde (s. o.). Es gibt sogar kleine nette Features, die es vorher nicht gab: zum Beispiel kann man jetzt auch Wände erstellen, um Gänge zu erschaffen, oder versehentlich eingerissene Wände wieder zu ersetzen. Kreaturen, die Verbündete heilen ist auch eine coole Sache. Auch die neugestaltung des Kampfraumes und die Möglichkeit, per Schmiede die einzelnen Monster und deren Fähigkeiten zu buffen gefällt mir.


[b] Was würdest du dir noch wünschen? Was könnte man ändern? [/b]
- Weitere Kreaturen und eine Möglichkeit über Spezialtraining die einzelnen Kreaturen auszubilden
- Sowas wie der Symbiose-Spruch aus Dk2 (ich habe es geliebt, den Dungeon aus den Augen der Kreatur zu sehen)
- Rahmen um Einheiten ziehen auch in dem Dungeon
- richtig genial wäre ein Level-Editor, weil die Kartenauswahl ist nicht allzu groß (s. o.)
- Autosave wegen der Abstürze auf 3 oder 5 Minuten einstellbar (Minimum bisher: 15 Minuten) (erledigt, siehe edit)


[b] Fazit: [/b]
Ich habe schon einige Stunden mit dem Spiel verbracht und es werden noch viele weitere werden. Schade, dass die Abstürze noch nicht gepacht wurden. Die sind für mich das ärgerlichste. Der Launcher muss auch nicht sein. Alles Andere, was ich oben geschrieben habe, ist eher "meckern auf hohem Niveau". Das Spiel macht Spaß und ist für mich das inoffizielle DK3. Wenn auch mit einigen Änderungen, die mal mehr mal weniger gut sind. Aber das ist bei "Fortsetzungen" ja nunmal so. Auch, wenn der positive Teil hier recht kurz behandelt wurde, heißt das nicht, dass das Spiel nicht toll ist. Würde sonst kaum weiter spielen. Es ist einfach das Feeling (vielleicht auch etwas getrübt von Nostalgie) und die Mechanik, was die Reihel so ungeheuer erfolgreich hat werden lassen.

Ich würde für das Spiel 20 - 25 Euro ausgeben, den vollen Preis von derzeit 40€ für eine Version, die ohne Launcher, Abstürze und mit den anderen drei DLC's daher kommt.


[b] Edit 1: [/b]
RSF

[b] Edit 2: [/b]
Habe übrigens den Übeltäter gefunden, der für die Abstürze verantwortlich war: Avast. Genauer gesagt die hardwaregestüzte Virtualisierung. In den Einstellungen Ausschalten und neu starten. Läuft seitdem super. Scheint sich einfach nur nicht mit der Unity-Engine zu vertragen.

author: {'steamid': '76561197964866568', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 208, 'playtime_forever': 1230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1135, 'last_played': 1454113539}
review:
Surprise! This game is actually good.
And it is a huge surprise too, seeing as Dungeons 1 was terrible and expansion only sligthly less so.
It is a cool Dungeon Keeper clone, but with it's own ideas and a pretty good execution on those too.
Surface serves for a more RTS style gameplay (Warcraft 3 comes to mind a lot of times), while dungeons is
a classic building we know from DK and DK2. You can now build rooms of any sizes and fit them with equipment that
has various uses, there is research, traps, spells, different creatures - with option to upgrade them to higher tiers.
On top of that, there are factions now, which adds to the gameplay. Bored of horde? Go with the daemons.
The overall graphic style is ok, nothing too fancy, not as serious as DK (again, Warcraft 3 comes to mind).
Traps are very effective, but there are classes now that can disarm them to balance them out. Units use their skills automatically in the dungeon, while on the surface you have to use them via icons/shortcuts (again, WC3).

After games like Dungeons 1 and Impire, I thought this will be a very bad game, so I was waiting with this game for some time. I think it has a solid 8/10 and is probably the best modern take on the old classics.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020010911', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1397, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1360, 'last_played': 1611983860}
review: crashes

author: {'steamid': '76561198006704302', 'num_games_owned': 477, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 1784, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1199, 'last_played': 1496621810}
review:
Absolutely great game!

I remember that I didn't like the first game of Dungeons (the previous game). But Dungeons 2 is a lot different.
I see a lot of people that compare this game with Dungeon Keeper 2. Well if you liked DK2, then I'm sure you'll love this game too!

Gameplay:
I find the game is a bit easy. But this is something I like and it means more people can enjoy this game. The game is slow compared to Starcraft, so if you are used to Starcraft speeds you might get irritated by the slowiness.
The game has character grouping (really handy) and shortcuts to spells and places.
You can play most missions at your own pace, which is also something I really like. I did not try multiplayer.
The cursor (the hand) in the game is a bit difficult to control.
You can build traps, doors and rooms in this game!
There are 2 area's for the average mission: the underground (where you build your dungeon) and the above grounds. Train your minions and take them to wreck havoc on the lands!

Graphics:
On overall I'm satisfied with the graphics.

Sound:
Great music and I like the narrorations (great voice).

Game in overall:
- Nice jokes & easter eggs :-)
- 20 hours of gameplay for me (unless you try to beat the game asap)
- Finally a dungeon building strategy game!
- Ability to fight above grounds
- 12 great spells
- the hints during loading of the level contain some important hints
- stable game (only froze once, but was able to return to desktop)
- DLC available (if you want more)

Cons:
- cursor is a bit difficult to control
- if you have a lot of creatures your computer might become a bit slow (at least for me with a GTX 670)
- some of the hints during loading of the game are only displayed 1 second
- there's a lag when trying to pick up multiple creatures
- No ability to choose difficulty level

Thank you Kalypso, for making this game available to us!

author: {'steamid': '76561198003204979', 'num_games_owned': 278, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 932, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 932, 'last_played': 1452796584}
review:
Главная фишка этой игры - забавный комментатор, который травит шутки со всевозможными отсылками ко всему подряд. Геймплей в свою очередь простоват, но затягивает. Последняя миссия даже заставила попотеть, но не из-за того, что надо было подумать, а потому, что у врага было много войск и предпоследний босс постоянно спавнился пока не разрушишь всю деревню. Приходилось играть тактикой хит-н-ран, постоянно отхиливая свою орду в подземке. Кстати в последней миссии комментатор почти не разговаривает, игра становится в разы скучнее. С Dungeon Keeper'ом практически ничего общего, поэтому не сравниваю.
Я бы поставил 7/10, в принципе мне понравилось, 1 разок можно пройти.

author: {'steamid': '76561198113171953', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1160, 'last_played': 1473331450}

author: {'steamid': '76561198126456974', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1757, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 746, 'last_played': 1507757740}
review: Dungeons 2 is absolutely hilarious. I laughed constantly at the narrator's parodies and references to nerd culture. The flavor text is very clever, and at one point I noticed that my naga archers were named "Lad'Gaga" and "Sel'Gomez", and one of my goblins was named "Beeber" This is not a serious game, and it's not meant to be played seriously. That doesn't mean it isn't hard at times; some of the levels in the campaign took me hours to complete. The RTS elements are woven in quite comfortably to the traditional Dungeon Keeper formula and they feel like natural compliments to each other. The skirmish mode that you might expect to find in an RTS is replaced by a small set of single missions with an underworld map, overworld map, and set of objectives. This is a unique and humorous mix of strategy genres that is completely addictive once you're hooked.

review:
Achete en promo, le melange de simulation et de RTS est tres agreable.

Bon points:

- 2 races a controler, avec un certains nombre de points communs mais une claire difference

Moins bon:

author: {'steamid': '76561197972325946', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 605, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1452714560}
review:
First off, only get this game on a sale, 40 bucks is way to much for this title.

The game plays about as well as one would hope, with minimal technical issues and thought being put into how to interact with your base and minions. It has a nice mix of base building and managment, tower defence, and RTS elements. A good afternoon can be spent playing and you wont feel terrible, but as it does try to be a Dungeon Keeper clone, it does fall short on a few elements. Its not pretty, but the graphics and sound do the job to tell you whats going on.

PROS:
Fun
Base design is kept simple and easy to follow, and the overall game is easy to pick up and just play.
Nice basic RTS and tower defence elements mixed together to create a good experience.

CONS:

Trys really hard in the joke department to the point of becoming cringe worthy. The story just takes every possible current pop culture referance and internet joke and mashes them together. Some find this a pro but I found it to be like that guy who wont stop shouting catch phrases that became old 2 weeks after they became popular.

Some game design flaws here and there. You will start to despise Pay Day (basic upkeep for your minions) not for financal reasons but because production just stops. Outside of your ever diligent miner units erverything that was doing something (working in a forge, collecting mana, training) takes about 1:30-2 minutes to wander slowly to where the gold is, grab the gold, go grab a beer, drink the beer, then start wandering around. When you are on a timed mission this can become maddening to have to constantly grab units and place them back where they should have been, and that doesn't even mean they will do what they are assigned to do. Also suffers from the forced difficulty so many games try to add. Almost every boss has that percentage/timed force field that makes them immune to all damage so they can drag the battle out by adding some random mobs into the mix.


It is a Kalypso game so you need to sign in to your Kalypso account to play. Not as bad as uPlay but still annoying to have to manage another account while on Steam.

All in all a fun game with some decent sized flaws that pull it down to a sale only status.

review:
Ein unglaublich lustiges Spiel das an die alten Dungeon Keepers erinnert. 
Die Kampagne ist liebevoll gestaltet und unglaublich witzig. Macht Mega viel Spaß beim Spielen und beschert einem viele Lacher und lustige Momente. (unter anderem dadurch, dass der Synchronsprecher des Erzählers Monti Arnold ist)
Die Kampagne ist zwar leider viel zu schnell zu Ende, aber dennoch ein gutes Spiel.

author: {'steamid': '76561198232804604', 'num_games_owned': 111, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 3028, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3028, 'last_played': 1452651290}
review:
* 한글 지원되요~ 스팀이 업데이트가 안될줄이야

트레일러 보고 뭔가 진지하고, 심도있는 캠페인을 기대했는데...
전혀 그렇지 안네요 ㅋㅋㅋ 무슨 패러디영화 보는줄 알았어요
진짜 가감안하고 무서운 영화 시리즈 보는 느낌이랄까
스토리도 권악징선(??), 병맛같은 매력이 있습니다.

게임플레이는 약간 지루한 감이 있습니다. 던전 업그레이드 하는데 시간이 너무 오래 걸리고, 인구수 너무 적어!!!!!
그 적은 인구수 때문에 rts가 rts답지 않아요... ㅠㅠㅠ
인구수 적은 대신 함정은 엄청 쎄요.
"Enemy's have entered your Dungeon." 소리나면 음유시인 먼저 조지세요. 멘탈에 지장이 생기기전에

DLC가 있긴 한데, 왜 이걸 따로 파는지는 모르겟네요. 스토리 3개, 맵 3개 추가되는건데... 저는 사는거 비추드립니다.
16000원짜리 DLC가 진짜 확장팩이에요. 새 종족 추가됩니다. 참고하세요~

author: {'steamid': '76561198009306306', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 1650, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1650, 'last_played': 1452542541}
review:
Hah the story teller said that only 10% of buyers would finish this game... currently its 18% and I am one of them!

In your face Kalypso :P

Despite that... the game is fun (if you get all the Game of thrones refferences ... without those the humor is pretty stale). Nothing great to be seen here otherwise. Graphics, Music and Gameplay are a mediocre Dungeon Keeper clone and over all the game is way to easy without the possibility to ramp up the difficulty. 

DONT buy at fullprice ... you will be severly dissapointed. 
I got it around 20€ and still consider this to expansive for the quality and content delivered here. 

Still can reccomend it as there are no dungeon keeper follow ups and so even a mediocre clone is better than nothing 
(still my secret recommendation would be to get Dungeon Keeper 2 on GOG if you did not finish your 10.th campaign).

Oh also... Multyplayer sucks as there is no lobby so you need to find players outside of the game to play a round. That might be the reason why only 0,3% of all players got the "Win a multiplayer match" achievement. Sucks ... but still better than nothing *thumbs up with a very forced grin*

author: {'steamid': '76561197979311493', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 1716, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1716, 'last_played': 1452631971}

author: {'steamid': '76561198005870671', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2169, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2169, 'last_played': 1452949509}
review:
Тот редкий случай, когда после говёной первой части выходит крайне годная вторая часть.
Очень рекомендую всем любителям серии Dungeon Keeper. 
Отсылки к другим игровым и кино-вселенным, замечательнная русская адаптация игры (комментатор - это что-то). Интересная и местами сложная кампания (включая длц Игры зимы). Переданный дух серии DK + грамотное привнесение чего-то нового. 

Немного страдает оптимизация, плюс наблюдаются периодические вылеты, но в остальном отличная игра.
9/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036635472', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 2923, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2855, 'last_played': 1452461466}

author: {'steamid': '76561198018106613', 'num_games_owned': 373, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 810, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 810, 'last_played': 1452451333}

author: {'steamid': '76561198035537734', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 2222, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1285, 'last_played': 1453580235}
review:
Netter Titel, der sich im Gegensatz zum Vorgänger stark an Dungeon Keeper orientiert und wirklich Spaß macht.

Der Humor ist teilweise etwas arg ... kindisch und mit den Andeutungen wird auch gern mal übertrieben. Die Kampagne hätte ebenfalls etwas länger und schwerer sein dürfen, zudem fehlt eine Art Coop Multiplayermodus.

Nichtsdestotrotz macht es Spaß, wenn man Dungeon Keeper bereits mochte.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990504498', 'num_games_owned': 399, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 311, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1461850637}
review:
If you ever liked Dungeon Defender Games, you will love this one.
Unlike Dungeons, Dungeons 2 is more direct remake of Dungeon Defenders 2 with a little more RTS touch to the battles outside your dungeon. Some new fun mechanics and an awesome story line, full of jokes and fun remarks.

I absolutely recomend this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985833596', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 730, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 560, 'last_played': 1459622933}
review:
This game is full of hilarious narration, a good story and depth of units.  The only down side (as of late 2015 and early 2016) is that there are quite a few bugs.  Units will get stuck and pushed, no big deal because you can warp them back down or just pick them up depending.  Units are not smart with work stations and will kick eachother off and sometimes rooms will not be fully utilized as a result.  The game seems to crash quite a bit right now, even though there is an auto save, you have to treat it like a 90's game in Windows 3.1 or DOS.  Save often with multiple files.  Sometimes I get an error where my units will stop interacting with everything and if I save after it wont clear the bug when I load so I have to go farther back.  I still feel the game is worth it especially for the $10 from the winter sale.  AFTER playing, I still would have payed full price and hoped for a patch for bugs later. 

Series Note:  This game plays a bit more like an RTS without the familiar controls even with the setting enabled.  I do sometimes miss the FPS abilities, but this was done fairly well.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111744111', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 282, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 282, 'last_played': 1452443769}
review:
Le jeu est lent et peu intuitif avec une taille d'une main gigantesque ce qui est inutile pour faire office de curseur de sourie ,  pourtant l'idée est bonne mais Dungeons 2 est mal optimisé et ne propose pas assez de contenus .
Ce qui est sympa c'est l'humour de la voix du narrateur qui commente selon les quêtes et les agissements de nos actions .

Pourtant avec les défauts qui persistent dans ce jeu , je me suis amusé a construire mon donjon tout en écoutant cette voix en narration .
Ha.....oui , c'est sympa de jouer du côté du mal mais ce n'est pas de tout repos ;) 

Un jeu qui peut être acheté en solde ou promo mais surement pas a 40 euros .

author: {'steamid': '76561198007566200', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 841, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 841, 'last_played': 1452285943}
review:
Wie der Italiener so schön sagt: weder Fisch noch Fleisch...
Das Spiel hat mich ziemlich gelangweilt. Der Spielfluss (Single Player!) gleicht einem durchgekauten Kaugummi den man so lange weiter kauen muss bis wieder irgendwas passiert, im Falles des Spieles im besten Fall das Ende des aktuellen Levels.
Anstatt das Konzept des ersten Teils neu und aufpoliert zu präsentieren, indem dessen Stärken weiterentwickelt und die Schwächen ausgemärzt weden - und ja Teil 1 hatte wirklich viel Potential - wurde versucht was Neues zu schaffen, bei dem offenbar so viele Kompromisse eingegangen wurden, dass am Ende ein paar Dinge von Nichts zusammengewürfelt und als Spiel deklariert wurden.
Die beiden "Teile" des Spieles sind schlussendlich ein viel zu mageres, optisch enttäuschendes und bezügich Navigation zig Jahre hinterherhinkendes Dungeon-Aufbauspiel das vor allem mit der geringen Auswahl an Räumen völlig enttäuscht, bzw. ein Möchtegern-Echtzeitstrategie das den Namen nicht verdient und eher an das allererste War Craft erinnert, bei den plump gezeichnete und agierende Einheiten in Grüppchen von ca. 10 Figuren noch als wahre Armeen angesehen wurden.
Nein, nicht mal im Sonderangebot, Dungeons 2 ist Geld- und vor allem Zeitverschwendung.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030566453', 'num_games_owned': 498, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1452429834}
review:
Ein schöner, geistiger Dungeon Keeper-Nachfolger aus Deutschland!
Das Spiel hat Humor, den vielleicht nicht jeder mag (Ich persönlich mag es sehr), eine schöne Grafik mit hübschen Settings, außerdem hat es in der Kampagne einen schönen Schwierigkeitsanstieg und macht Lust auf mehr.

Zudem bietet es, neben dem Bau eines eigenen Dungeons, jetzt auch eine Stragiespiel-Komponente, wo man in alter Strategiespielmanier Einheiten über die Karte bewegt und die Gegner tötet. Für mich eine logische und nette Erweiterung, auch wenn es hier und da ein wenig fummelig ist. (Das Rausbewegen der Monster aus dem Dungeon als Beispiel).

author: {'steamid': '76561198120319520', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1256, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1256, 'last_played': 1452541597}
review:
Pour être honnête, je suis plutôt mitigé:
- D'un coté, j'ai passé de bons moment, et j'ai enfin trouvé un jeu ressemblant à Dungeon Keeper, et ça c'est cool. On y retrouve l'univers de DK, avec l'humour qui y était associé.
- D'un autre, j'ai trouvé le jeu un peu trop facile, et peut être aussi limité (peu d'unités, fini assez rapidement, peu de surprise concernant l'assaut de mes dongeons).

Mais bon, avec la promo de -75%, je ne regrette pas cet achat! A 37€ par contre, je pense que j'aurai été un peu déçu...

review:
Kalypso sait bien faire des jeux addictifs. 
Dans dungeons 2, les multitudes d'hommage au grand jeu du moment et le narrateur et ses délires incessant en fond un jeu marrant à souhait. Et en plus on incarne le mal absolu démontant avec sa horde tout héros qui lui barre le chemin. Sa quéte de vengeance est en route et je compte bien l'aider.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012407197', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3303, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3303, 'last_played': 1452932025}
review:
The game is fun, to a extend to some. It may not be a full similarity of Dungeon Keepers Franchise but it has its own charm. Despite of 'attracting' units from the portal like in DK, you are hiring them from the world below to come work in your Dungeon. So therefore, DK players would have to get used to the mechanics that this game has and keep playing.

Here below are my thoughts, it may or may not be the same as anyone else. But its worth saying out. 

Good Points:
- You can build your Dungeon however you like. (Refilling on tiles you might have accidentally unearth.)
- You can make your own specific army.
- You have different fractions of 'Evil' (Demons/Orcs and etc. That is if I have not uncovered them all yet.)
- Upgrade / Research System aka The Forge

Neutral Points:
- Population System/ Evolution Mechnics (Maybe its just me.)
- Minions/Servants carry so little gold.

Bad Points:
- Game crashes on me. (Randomly after few hours or so.)

In short, if you are a gamer like me who LOVES to dig up the whole dungeon (despite having the Narrator annoying you from time to tim for dragging the game so long.) to reveal its secrets of 'free units', books and hidden gem steams. Just remember to save your game every 30 mins or so. Otherwise, a whole dungeon's worth of time will be gone. Which happened to me like three times.

Other than that, have fun conquering the Lands of the Goodies and be evil smacking your Minions / Servants to make them work faster.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059667760', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 2124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1710, 'last_played': 1511634320}
{'steamid': '76561198077938410', 'num_games_owned': 87, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2720, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1848, 'last_played': 1489322526}
review:
МИНУС 
- Покупалась игра из за мультиплеера и он просто убил!5 карт.УЖАСНЫЙ баланс.Ловушки непроходимы вообще!(даже в самом начале достаточно поставить 6 сундуков и вы  в жизни не пройдете их!)Система обезвреживания ловушек,так и манила записаться к психологу на прием!Навалять друг другу по рогам не представляется возможным в этой стратегии...(берегите нервы).Хотелось бы увидеть большего от мультика...
ПЛЮС
-
Все меняется,когда начинаешь играть режим битва на сложном уровне сложности(почему этого нет в мультиплеере не понимаю)! AI лезет без конца,расслабится не дает ни на секунду!Играл 3 часа чтоб прокачаться до второго уровня подземелий!И после этих мучений,AI мне вколол по самые помидоры!))Перепрошол,понял ошибки и победил!Это был Атас!Караул и т.д.Только из за этого стоит ее купить!

author: {'steamid': '76561198030149924', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1452378088}
review:
Bought this game while it was on SteamSale, 75% off. So $10. It felt repetitive even after just a few minutes of gameplay. I can see that the lack of building/room types is going to get old fast. It is a more RTS oriented Dungeon Keeper inspired clone(ish) graphics wise. If you enjoyed Dungeon Keeper 1 and 2 , or Dwelvers then you might possibly like this game enough to pay $10 for it. I would NOT suggest paying any more than that for it though. It just isn't worth the $40 pricepoint of an A class game.

I intend to exercise my rights to a steam refund on this one even though it was only $10. I am also going to click the thumbs UP on it but keep in mind ONLY at the price I paid for it $10 , not at its usual $40 price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084783702', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1201, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1155, 'last_played': 1455033674}
review: Как мне кажется, игра рассчитана в первую очередь на фэнов давно минувшей Dungeon Keeper 2 и вот с этим она как раз не совсем справляется, но пойдем по порядку. Сюжет не замысловат я бы даже сказал, типичен в духе «убей всех, захвати все", по поводу геймплея превратился в также в типичный rts, т.е. теперь почти все бой ведутся на поверхности, разновидностей юнитов тоже поубавилось, зато теперь есть их абгрейд и активные способности (которые в реальности не используются, так попробовал и забил), что до графики она ном звезд с неба не хватает, но и плеваться не будете. Подводя итоги, игра на пару вечеров не более ни какого задродства не потребует, это Dungeon Keeper 2 только лайт.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005078012', 'num_games_owned': 522, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 271, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 236, 'last_played': 1510510222}
review:
Zu allerst, ein sehr atmossphärisches und zu empfehlendes DungeonGame:) Ich schließe mich den Vorpostern an und unterstreiche auch hier die Leistung des Sprechers xD Der absolute Fachmann auf seinem Gebiert^^ Auch das man Monster nun direkter steuern kann ist gelungen im Vergleich zum Vorgänger.

Nur ein paar kosmetische Haken bisher...
Warum schaffen es die Entwickler nicht, den Einheiten ein paar bessere Animationen zu verpassen? Sich spannende Bögen zum Beispiel (Nagas). Allgemein wirken die Kampfbewegungen eher letargisch. Bei Monstern wie bei Menschen. Kann das gepatcht werden? Inform von Schlachtengebrüll und lebendigeren Bewegungen. Oder das Alarmhorn...ein Horn ohne Ton? Oder der O-Mat, der Goblin dreht an einer nicht vorhandenen Kurbel. Ich finde, grad in einem so originellen Spiel wie diesem sollte man auf solche Details achten und umsetzen. Wenngleich es auch sicher nicht einfach ist. 

Ich empfehle das Spiel dennoch wie gesagt, weil es ansonsten wirklich gut gestaltet um stimmungsvoll wie witzig (viiiiel Schwarzer Humor) ist:)
8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198021437781', 'num_games_owned': 380, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 707, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 707, 'last_played': 1452252765}
review:
As a newcommer to the series, i enoyed the game a lot, the narrator made the game more fun as he was very funny.
Basically the goal of the game is to build your evil army horde in the underground and create a big and powerful dungeon capable of creating stronger and bigger armies/horde to attack the goody Alliance.

Game does have some drawbacks , like not much to build upon and unit variety. Its basically just wasting hours every mission building the same base over and over again. Thats not a huge problem as you can change up a bit, the problem is there isnt much to build! just a few rooms. Unlike from what i have heard in the previous series where there was a lot.

Long story short, game is fun and worth your while, also if you watch Game Of Thrones then you will love this game even more as its somewhat of a parody to the TV Show :)    

 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198045321407', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 316, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 315, 'last_played': 1466317375}
review: Простенько и незатейливо! Маст хев!

author: {'steamid': '76561197980585496', 'num_games_owned': 409, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 3134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 860, 'last_played': 1490603873}
review:
If you loved Dungeon Keeper you'll love this, its exactly what I've been looking for fo years to fill the hole the DK series left with its demise.

I have but one complaint, it seems very unstable, I get about half an hour between crashes. Which wilst being a bit of nusance is worth tolerating for that game itself.

I picked it up on offer and it was worth every penny. The instability would have iurked greatly if I had payed full price, however this could be something specific with my system as it doesnt seem a common problem, but it is worth a mention.

Verdict:
DK gameplay with a healthy dose of RTS style pixie bashing, a sarcastic and entertaining narrator and a lot of rampaging evil goodness!

It has room to grow, or in other words feels like it needs some DLC to add extra rooms and some other features that were found in DK (and hopefully some more new ideas, as the originality shown here has great promise).

review: Идея может быть была хорошая, давно ждал продолжения хранителя подземелий, но вот то, что получилось меня разочаровало. Разработчики переборщили с мультяшным юмором, нет атмосферы старых Dungeon Keeper. Да и сама игра, на мой взгляд, сырая, ПОСТОЯННЫЕ вылеты в ОС не дают спокойно играть. Графика приятная, но этот плюс не перекрывает остальные недоделки. Будем ждать патч (хотя с прошлого обновления прошло уже 3,5 месяца), а пока я бы не советовал ее брать.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983014610', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 103, 'last_played': 1452324149}
review:
Le jeu est lent et approximatif. L'idée et l'intention restent bonnes mais en 2016 on pourrait s'attendre à nettement mieux..

Des niveaux plus vastes, le click and drop plus aisé (sérieusement la taille de la main!), un jeu mieux optimisé et bien d'autres choses. 

Pour 9euro en solde ca passe pour 40 euro en neuf passez votre chemin...

review: Ремейк старой игрушки.Давно мечтал о выходе подобной игры,т.к. аналогов просто нет(!)Но в старой иигре было больше постороек.Например можно было построить тюрьму)))Посадить туда беспредельщика,дабы тот подумал над своим поведением))Правда там нельзя было вылазки устраивать.Поправлюсь наверное.Скорее не ремейк,а просто они похожи.Всех прелестей старой версии не помню,т.к. оооочень давно в нее играл.По-моему название ее было Dangeon Keeper.За игру 9 из 10.Т.к. маловато построек.Возможно,будут дополнения в этом плане.Купил со скидкой 6.01.16 с хорошей скидкой.Без DLC.Покупаю DLC 7.01.16 уже без скидки...Но ниче не могу с собой поделать,т.к. очень хочу покатать за нежить....Ну не дурак?Однозначно к покупке!Эмоции гарантированы.Кстати,после покупки не заметил,как 6 часов в ней без отрыва провел...

author: {'steamid': '76561198007987235', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 9597, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6760, 'last_played': 1453184379}
review:
Enjoyable dungeon builder, a little too objective oriented for my taste, but still had fun with it.  Well worth the cost for the number of hours I put into the game, but I'd kind of like to keep playing.  There just isn't anything else to do.  I've done everything in the single player (including all DLC) and have zero interest in multiplayer.

Just wish it had something like a randomized endless survival mode, where invaders keep coming in stronger waves, while minions have their level caps drastically raised to extend progression.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052265357', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2508, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1260, 'last_played': 1675786229}
review:
Великолепная игра, заслуживающая большего внимания со стороны игрового сообщества!
И вот что она из себя представляет:
- Модель классической RTS с нестандартным подходом, а именно - вы повелитель "Зла", которому необходимо исследовать, отстраивать и оборонять своё подземелье, делая вылазки на поверхность с целью победить "Добро" или же в другие пещеры одержать вверх над оппонентами. В лице противоборствия трёх игровых сторон (по состоянию на 07.01.2016 и с учётом dls с "Нежитью"). И каждая игровая сторона по своему уникальна, отличающаяся своим стилем, уникальными юнитами, постройками, исследованиями, магией и даже ресурсами. Так например орда полагается на грубую силу, хлещет пиво и с помощью деталей обустраивает своё подземелье ловушками, демоны же в свою очередь на хитрость, магию, вместо пива демонам необходимо восхищаться собой, а вместо деталей используют паучьи яйца - особый ресурс из которого лепят в своё подземелье ловушки. P.S. нежить пока особо не изучал (растягиваю удовольствие, но уже видно что они так же уникальны). Т.е. Суть классической RTS - вы строите, развиваетесь, и сражаетесь с врагом, в обороне или нападении. И это по моему мнению превосходно, так как классических стратегий в последнее время выходит довольно мало.
- Качество игры, оно на высоте! Красивая графика, атмосфера, проработанный мир и внимание к мелочам (понаблюдайте чем занимаются ваши юниты в подземелье и как проработана каждая комната). И конечно же юмор! Просто начните играть в кампанию и вы уже с самого начала поймёте о чём я. (Абсолютное зло не хотело платить зарплату своим подданным, но ничего не могло с этим поделать... (С.)). И конечно же спасибо за перевод, с прекрасной озвучкой, что тоже оставляет положительные эмоции от игрового процесса.

В общем могу сказать что игру делали с любовью, и старанием! P.S. многие игроки жалуются что игра слишком короткая, так вот хочу сказать что игра не ограничивается прохождением кампанией, можно запустить битву (так например победить надоедливых пингвинов и т.п.) или же сыграть против друзей в мультиплеере. Надеюсь что разработчики не забросят проект и будут дальше радовать игроков дополнениями :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197970491058', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 2064, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 701, 'last_played': 1453861942}
review: Dungeons 2 is a much-improved spiritual successor to the Dungeon Keeper series. Calypso has done away with the goofy mechanics of feeding and harvesting heroes, and instead refocused on what a good dungeon sim is all about: committing acts of hillarious evilness. The base game doesn't have a great deal of depth and the campaign is fairly brief, so I suggest snagging it at a price point of less than $20.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051349852', 'num_games_owned': 215, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 1186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1057, 'last_played': 1452633119}
review: Игра однозначно отличная! 9 из 10 ставлю ей, т.к. игра предоставляет нам очень интересный геймплей, который основывается на развитии своего злодейского подземелия, в котором под вашим контролем находятся различные прислужники орды: орки, гоблины, тролли, наги и др. зверушки. В игре пресутствует экономика, основывающаяся на добываемом золоте; так же имеются различного рода апгрейды, как подземных комнат, так и юнитов. В сюжетной кампании, помимо поседелок с чаем под землей нам так же предстоит вылазить наружу во "внешний мир", где мы в роли АБСОЛЮТНОГО ЗЛА, должны подчинить себе противных и отвратительных "добряков" внешнего, верхнего мира; и здесь уже игра предоставляет нам совсем другой геймплей - RTS, где мы должны опр., небольшими отрядами орды, как в стратегии зачищать локацию от гнусных добрячков. И на протяжении игры наши действия комментирует рассказчик, которого очень хорошо и качественно озвучили, он даёт нам подсказки, шутит и наводит краски на нас, что бы так сказать, не заскучать, хотя, игра достаточно бодрая, и часиков на 30 затянет свободно... то пиво кончится, то откопали комнату с пауками, то гномы нападают... Советую купить, не пожалеете!

author: {'steamid': '76561197978902855', 'num_games_owned': 318, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 290, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 290, 'last_played': 1452130640}
review:
Dungeon Keeper is back ! ... A vos marques ... prêt ... baffez !
Un gros coup de coeur pour la narration du mode campagne qui vous fera passer de bons moments avec un humour bien dosé. 

Les plus :
+  graphismes simples mais efficaces grâce à des jeux d'ombres maîtrisés
+  narration plus que réussie
+  tout ce qu'on aimait dans Dungeon Keeper est là !
+  gameplay et prise en main très facile (tuto intégré au début du mode campagne)

Les moins :
-  prix d'un DLC un peu abusé selon moi
-  prix du jeu de base élevé (hors solde)

author: {'steamid': '76561198110320223', 'num_games_owned': 62, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 87, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1467981078}

author: {'steamid': '76561198044001562', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 116, 'last_played': 1452029907}
review:
Der kan ikke "zoomes" langt nok ud til at man har det nødvendig overblik. Selv i højeste opløsning. Dette er et kæmpe irritationsmoment der gjorde at jeg mistede interessen efter 2 timer.

Selve spillet har potetiale... Hvis producenten får rettet op "zoom-fejlen", så er jeg på igen. Men indtil da, vil jeg ikke anbefale spillet.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999587555', 'num_games_owned': 856, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1434759300}
review:
I bought this game a while ago, presuming it was a sequel the the previous Kalypso game called "Dungeons". I don't think that it's too far of a stretch to imagine that it'd be somewhat the same?

Afraid not. Very different mechanics, very different direction (though the art style stayed somewhat the same).

The humour is good, but I bought this at full price (£30 here in the UK) and it's not funny enough to warrant that price.

I returned it. I'm sure it's a good game to some people, but if you're hoping for more "Dungeons", "Dungeons II" is not the game to buy.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993367969', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 1683, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1194, 'last_played': 1475884873}

author: {'steamid': '76561198006866153', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2626, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 469, 'last_played': 1555898138}
review: Having never played Dungeon Keeper or any other game like that, I've really enjoyed my 10 hours of gameplay. Played the Pumpkin DLC, which was rather hard. Dam penguins kept disabling my traps. After a few hours I was losing and started over. Second match proved to be better and I was able to hold out against them for hours until I finally maxed out my dungeon and lvl'd up a large army that allowed me to kill the Penguin King. Was surprising hard for a tower defense rts based on an older game. I give this game 5/5 stars. Plan on playing more matches after I take a long deserving break.

author: {'steamid': '76561197977751870', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 2037, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2037, 'last_played': 1447016849}
review:
Als netter Zeitvertreib sehr gut geeignet.

Vorteil :

Die Kampagne ist gut gemacht und durch viele kleine Gags auch nicht langweilig.
Die Oberwelt zu erkunden und zu zerstören ist recht Unterhaltsam.
Läuft auch sehr flüssig auf älteren Geräten.

Nachteil :

Viele Karten spielt man in der Kampagne durch und hat daher wenig Motivation diese nochmals im Einzelspieler-Modus erneut zu spielen.
Es gibt ein relativ "geringes" Einheitenmaximum, welches wohl da zu dient den Schwierigkeitsgrad zu erhöhen. Was ich recht nervig fand.

author: {'steamid': '76561197977429045', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 2556, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2500, 'last_played': 1482786645}
review:
Thankfully, this game is nothing like Dungeons 1. Instead, it is a Dungeon-Sim much more in the spirit of the original Dungeon Keeper, with clever new gameplay mechanics, namely sending troops to the surface in RTS-style to attack the Alliance bases. The campaign has been a blast - there's a lot of humour, the narrator cracks me up every time. :-) My only major gripe is the fact that that same narrator keeps chiding me for not fulfilling objectives fast enough when I'm still expanding my dungeon and would like to be left on my own for a while (e.g. "The slovenly Evil had *still* not eradicated that faerie village...!" - this can grate on your nerves let me tell you).
It is also very polished. Had one CTD in 40+ hours, which is okay in my book. I also really enjoy the cartoony graphics, especially the Undead faction have some unbearably cute units. And I saw an orc kick one of my workers, apparently just for fun. :-)
Definitely recommended.

review:
Супер! Супер! Супер! Оч забавная игра! Наполняет радостью и позитивом! :)

но есть прблемы:
1. пройти на одном дыхании невозможно, игра зивсает через несколько часов игры. прихоится выгружать игру и снова запускать, чтоб очистился буфер или что то ещё в компе. 
2. Время от времени начинает тормазить без объяснения причин, также перезапуск игры проблему решает.
3. один раз вылетела, а так вылетела что последние 1,5 часа оказались без сохранений.

Ну а в целом, графика и сюжет суперские! :) вот только разработчикам нао пофиксить баги!

и ещё, играть за демонов на много труднее, так как бойцы демонов гибнут почти мгновенно.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013809258', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1274, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1274, 'last_played': 1452039439}
review: It's a shame really... When I first saw a trailer of Dungeons 2 I thought "Oh, this could be good!" It seemed like Orcs Must Die, with it's dungeon defense, trap building, and mildly entertaining meta-dialogue, but with an RTS aspect as well. As an idea it had a lot of potential but I feel that the developers missed the mark in almost every way. The disconnection between dungeon and the overworld, the control scheme and not being sure where the evil hand is pointing, the confusing and badly designed minion organization in dungeon, with underwhelming overworld combat in comparison, and the limited variety of minions and rooms took a lot out of the game for me. It's been months since it was released and they've had a few updates which have only helped a little. In all, Dungeons 2 was a real dissapointment to me and it doesn't seem to be getting any better any time soon.

review: Самое интересное в этой игре - это черный юмор, осуществленный в лучших традициях Overlord =). Злодейское Зло при помощи своей злой "длани" управляет приспешниками подземелья. Куча забавных комметариев и шуток от закадрового голоса! Озвучка потрясающая! Классная стратегия! Классный баланс! Сюжет - он тут как бы для галочки, но органично вписан в атмосферу всей игры. Определенно, эта игра - достойный продолжатель лучших традиций dungeon keeper =). Однозначно рекомендую!

author: {'steamid': '76561197961720175', 'num_games_owned': 486, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1101, 'last_played': 1703846913}
review:
This game has a lot of nice things going for it, the aestetics are well designed and while the humor is not brilliant it does have its share of chuckle worthy moments. 

But, it is abysmally slow. Like in dungeon keeper you rely on mining gold in order to drive the expansion of your dungeon, but where dungeonkeepers imps are efficient little speedfreaks the worker units in Dungeons 2 move more like arthritic old men and very large ammounts of time are spent waiting for them to collect and move gold to your vault so it can be spent. This is further aggravated by a very restrictive population cap that prevents you from keeping more than a handful of workers around without comprimising your army size. It is possible to upgrade your workers to move at a more acceptable pace, but by the time these upgrades become available you have progressed so far that they no longer usefull.
The game does not, in fact, have very much content to it, but it is artificially padded by this resource throttling. The campaign is fairly short and skirmish play pretty lackluster. Most of the skirmish maps are taken directly from the campaign and simply stripped off their narative and objectives. 

I had some fun with this game, but only after i started cheating to give myself gold and speed up progression to something a little faster than continental drift. I cannot recommend getting this game unless these pacing issues are adressed, which seems unlikely.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045778499', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 469, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 442, 'last_played': 1518722960}
review:
TlDR; It's nothing like Dungeon Keeper and falls off in far too many areas. Not worth over 5$.

Alright to start off I have played Dungeons 1 and the special steam eddition one. 
I should have known after the special edition that it would not be a good game but I tried to believe
in Kalypso. Yeah that didn't work too well. 

So let's talk graphics. They are pretty decent. The landscape changes as you take certain areas in the overworld and that can seem cool for most people. However, if you do not have a good computer it will be terribly laggy when things like this happen.

Minions. The minions are.. alright? I can't find the exact words to use to describe them. They need more diversity. In the original Dungeon they had quite a few interesting minions that actually had decent consepts that simply needed to be refined and expanded. There is an enchantment system where you can give a buff to your minions but the buff tends to rarely be worth anything. Even if it is worth a little something there is no heavy effect on gameplay that would make you want to search for them.

Concept. The concept of sending your minons to the surface is an interesting idea but VERY poorly executed. The positioning of the characters is terrible. There is very little you can do to organize your minions and organize them for battle. You are more or less throwing them at the enemies hoping for the best. 

Comparison. We can compare this to a lot of Dungeon Keeper similar games but let's compare it to the ones that stand out the most. The Original Dungeon. This was what got me so into the game series. Retaking your throne from your crazy girlfriend and having tons of challenges and boss fights up to that point? It was quite a few hours of fun and while the replay value wasn't much it had a lot that could be polished. It got me looking forward to the sequals. Dungeons 2 is nothing like Dungeons. It feels more aimed at children with its very cartoonish feel. It is less dark than Dungeons 1. The Overlord or main character from Dungeons 1 is.. well gone. It may have something to do with the steam special which admitibly I didn't finish because it made me cringe with all its Lord of the Rings references and terrible gameplay. However, it is just not the sequal you'd expect at all. It feels like a new choppy game.
Dungeon Keeper. The god of dungeon games. A lot of people think most games can't hold a damned candle to it and they would be right in my opinion but you have to give other games a chance. The style for most of these games was obviously taken from this then pardon my language but it is as though someone took a big steaming shit on it. I have yet to see a decent revamped version of it and Dungeons 2 is no acception. 

But I'm rambling! Overall, the point of this is that the gameplay is not even close to worth 10$ on sale MUCH LESS 40$. You'd have to have very poor taste to enjoy this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970325736', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1983, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1983, 'last_played': 1511466995}

author: {'steamid': '76561198020029876', 'num_games_owned': 117, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2522, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1977, 'last_played': 1486480012}
review:
[b]Kurz gesagt[/b] kann ich Dungeons 2 mit Addon nur empfehlen, allerdings ist das Spiel schon deutlich anders als der Vorgänger.

[b]Das Spiel ist für Dich richtig, wenn Du... [/b]
- ein in sich stimmiges Spiel suchst
- ein wenig Geduld für den Dungeonbau hast
- mit schwarzem Humor klar kommst
- andere Fantasy-Spiele und -Romane kennst

[b]Das Spiel ist für Dich falsch, wenn Du... [/b]
- kurzweilige Action suchst
- ungeduldig bist
- mit Fantasy als Genre nix anfangen kannst

Zur Stabilität: Leider hat die aktuelle Version ab und zu noch Abstürze unter Windows 10 (und eventuell anderen Betriebssystemen). :-( Autosave auf 15 Minuten runter schrauben und oft speichern ist sehr zu empfehlen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095164846', 'num_games_owned': 399, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 3712, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1818, 'last_played': 1514620869}

author: {'steamid': '76561198047934575', 'num_games_owned': 342, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 9996, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5305, 'last_played': 1495307035}
review:
To be honest, at least for me, this is the new dungeon keeper (It does not play like the first dungeons).

It keeps enough elements of the old dungeon keeper games (traps, dungeon building/rooms, minions etc.), and has build on top of that with a strategie overworld, different factions (that play similar enough to not get confused but different enough with there different units and mechanics, spells etc.) and more.

And the game looks realy good. Not like for example war of the overworld that looks like an updated dungeon keeper 2. WotO may still be a good game but i much prefare dungeons 2.

Seriously if you like dungeon keeper i can not believe you will not like this game. And for that price there is not much you can do wrong.

author: {'steamid': '76561197975452014', 'num_games_owned': 138, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 4272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1671, 'last_played': 1585123738}
review:
Als alter Dungeon Keeper und Dungeon Keeper II Fan, war ich lange auf der Suche nach einem adequaten Nachfolger. Dieser ist in diesem Spiel allerdings nur zum Teil gefunden.

Was ist gleich, was ist besser, was sollte noch besser werden:

Was mich bisher gefesselt hat ist die sehr lustige Story, die sich selber nicht all zu ernst nimmt, das zieht die erste Parallele zu DK Und DK2. Die Anzahl der Monster ist deutlich geringer, es gibt pro Fraktion nur veir Stück die man direkt anheuern kann (diese können dann jeweils in drei Ausprägungen verwandelt werden). Was mich zum nächsten Unterschied bringt, Monster werden angeheuert und kommen nicht aus Portalen. Warum sollte man sich dann noch durch den Untergrund wühlen? Es gibt viele kleine Anreize, immer wieder verschiedene Boni im Erdreich versteckt. Ich fand hier die alten Leveldesigns deutlich ausgefeilter und motivierender. Trotz der guten Story ist das Spiel nach nun gut 30 Stunden doch recht eintönig. Die "normale" Kampagne bietet auch nicht so viel Witz, wie des Add-ons.

Dieser wilde Haufen von Argumenten soll nur eins darlegen, das Spiel ist gut und lustig und wahrscheinlich für 30-40 Stunden Spielspaß zu haben. So wie ich das jetzt sehe, ist dann allerdings die Luft raus. Dafür ist das Leveldesign nach der Kamagne einfach zu eintönig und auch die Spielweise unterscheidet sich kaum. Die Möglichkeiten des Traumdungeons (DK2) fehlen für mich zur Langzeit-Motivation. Der Online-Modus ist zwar sicherlich cool, nur ohne Spieler auch nicht wirklich sinnvoll - dafür kann aber der Entwickler nur auf Grund der fehlenden Langzeit-Motivation etwas, ansonsten kann man ihnen das nicht vorwerfen.

Spiel kaufen? Ja. Macht einfach echt Spaß mal wieder einie Dungeons zu bauen und das Add-on hat wirklich eine sehr gute Kamapagne!

review:
Se han basado en el dungeon Keeper para hacer un juego totalmente nuevo.
Tiene dos fases:
1ª- De gestionar la mazmorra y defenderla, atraer esbirros y entrenarlos.
2ª-De salir a la superficie, rollo warcraft3, y rematar la partida masacrando a todos.
EL juego peca de sencillo y la campaña es demasiado corta, pero aun asi es muy ameno y lleno de humor.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031191057', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 63, 'playtime_forever': 950, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 950, 'last_played': 1449350877}
review:
Приветствую.
 Вы выступаете в роли Абсолютного зла, поверженного однажды, силами добра. Вам предстоит восстановить свою былую мощь, собрать орду из орков, гоблинов, наг и троллей. Обеспечить их пивком, откопать парру миллионов золота и уничтожить этих милых феечек, эльфов, зайчиков и прочих Гендальфов, заточивших вас под землю. Одним словом игра идейный продолжатель серии Dungeon Keeper.
Плюсы:
+геймплей  по ощущению близок к DK1-2
+приятная графика
+юмор
+стёб над популярными фэнтези штампами
+уничтожение сил добра
+хорошая локализация
+наличие надземного мира
Минусы:
- плохая оптимизация, на Core i5 3450, 4 гб ОЗУ, видео AMD 5850 она должна лететь без единого фриза. Однако бывают проседания ФПС. Хотя большую часть времени работает без проблем.
-Периодические вылеты и зависания. Сохраняйтесь почаще.
-нет курятника как в DK )))))))
-маленькие карты
-мало видов монстров в нашем подземелье
-нельзя вселяться в монстров, как в DK
-мало ловушек
-корявый дизай наземных карт

Игру рекомендую. Её минусы не столь фатальны. А если вы любитель сеии Dungeon Keeper, то определённо стоит сыграть. Эта игра продемонстрирует вам, как приятно порой забить парочку фей и пустить на колбасу единорога... Не так много игр которые позволяют нам отыграть роль властелина тьмы.., этакого Саурона. Да ещё и с вполне вменяемыми шутками. Мне игра чем то напомнила Warcraft 3. Не знаю чем, возможно стилем рисовки.  Игра сделала большой шаг вперёд в сравнении с первой частью. Как стратегия игра откровенно слаба. Слишком просто.

Геймплей - 7/10
Графика - 7/10
Звук - 7/10
Интерес - 7/10
Сложность - 6/10
Итого - 7 

Рекомендую к приобретению на распродаже со скидочкой.
Мультиплеер не пробовал, в дальнейшем возможно дополню.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048074571', 'num_games_owned': 512, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1449693624}
review:
Complètement buggé, quasiment impossible de jouer au jeu vu que j'ai un écran noir sur le menu principal, avec seul le curseur qui apparaît,  et même en attendant le launcher comme indiqué par les Dév.

Sachant que la seule fois où j'ai réussi à commencer une partie, en cliquant totalement à l'aveugle dans le "menu", ce n'était pas top, les contrôles sont vraiment mal foutus et graphiquement c'est correct mais pas fou.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013341744', 'num_games_owned': 393, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 2078, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2078, 'last_played': 1449606608}
review:
Worthy successor to Dungeon Keeper.
When I write "worthy" I mean good. Not better, though.


[h1]The evil (meaning fun)[/h1]
+ Awesome compaign, was really surpised by that. Yes it is pretty easy. But worthwile by general design and feel - AND, most importantly, due to that awesome written and spoken narrator! Huge amount of jokes and references to games, movies and books.
+ Graphics are not breath taking but still quite atmospheric. As it is somewhat comic-lookie-lookie, I guess it won't feel "old" too fast, which is good in my opinion.
+ Overworld concept for SP
+ When "liberating" overworld areas, cool change effects to dark side (sadly no cookies)
+ Most creatures are useful on their own way, so it can make sense to not all upgrade them to highest variant (although you don't have to care on normal difficulty)
+ Different races
+ Gold variants make sense (normal, long lasting, infinite)


[h1]The good (meaning not fun)[/h1]
- Music. Pretty boring. Pretty fast boring. I recommend getting the soundtrack from Dungeon Keeper 1+2 (youtube helps) and play that in the background. Ten times better than ingame one.
- Glitches. There are no game braking bugs at least. But there's a ton of smaller stuff getting on your nerves: hardly being able to click a specific monster during a fight. No real feeling for where you drop one. The bright border effect for where you gonna drop/cast at is sometimes really weird. Can't pick up a specific unconsious monster, as the clickable area is not where it lies. Sometimes clicks on spell icons just do nothing, have to click twice.
- Performance. Seriously, this games runs slower than Anno 2070 on a huge map as soon as you have 10+ creatures. And weirdly this is CPU limiting here (100% usage on 4x 2,5 GHz), while my GPU (AMD 7950) was bored. Also when dropping couple of creatures in a row and when digging a new area, there's this "stutter" after every action/digged block. Really smells like badly optimized engine.
- Cannot beat chickens to pulpy messes :/


[h1]When comparing to Dungeon Keeper:[/h1]
- Less stuff to build and do than in DK (i.e. missing prison and torture chamber)
- More casualized feel, e.g. traps damage (remember that huge boulder which just killed everything?), simplified "who works which room" and missing skeleton/ghost/vampire/... mechanics
- No VS mode against AI Keeper. Skirmish maps just drop stronger waves of heroes against you.
- Slower! I do like slower games in general, but sometimes in SP it can get really boring. Mostly due to slow workers (get's better after upgrading them, though)
- Some atmospheric stuff regarding the creatures is missing: monsters attacking each other (spiders vs. flies) or the wizards getting annoyed of all the commotion in the library
- No real "feedback" of higher level monsters. They can cast anything right from the start (after researched), so it feels like you do not have to take such care of them. Which is only partly true, as they DO get stronger. Still feels not as good here as when dropping a couple of level 10 wizards+dragons in DK1 onto the enemy :D (also any creature can be revived anyway)


[h1]Finally[/h1]
Overall this is a good game. If you like the old Dungeon Keeper 1+2 go ahead and give it a try.
I had quite fun playing and guess will start again in the future. And of all DK like games, this is in my opinion the best successor so far.

In direct comparison however, I'd say I still prefer DK1+2 slightly over Dungeons 2.
(Sadly DK2 is not working on mine and many other rigs I know due to graphic driver issues :/ )

author: {'steamid': '76561198152268387', 'num_games_owned': 131, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 5420, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1749, 'last_played': 1585515772}
review:
This game is where you play as the bad guy as the task here is to take over the overworld in a fixed set of missions including where the Ultimate Evil has to wipe out the good guys from the face of the earth including some side missions where the UE can earn evil points for upgrades and things but that is all I will say here as I am not going to spoil anything. The controls may take a bit of getting used to at first but they are easy to master once the player gets the hang of using them. As well as doing missions to conqeur the overworld. You will have to defend and ward off attacks when the overworld good guys try to invade your dungeon. The missions are variable as they get challenging later on in the game as the enemies get stronger. So plan ahead and use tactics will make these missions much easier. The game is great fun to play and the narrator is quite hilarious at times because if you get stuck in the game. He will say some lines to drum up the player to work harder. Or you just laugh at the comments he makes :).

Overall Rating: 8/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007759830', 'num_games_owned': 3051, 'num_reviews': 259, 'playtime_forever': 247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 247, 'last_played': 1442759614}
review:
Bei Dungeons 2 handelt es sich um eine Art Mischung aus Dungeon Keeper und Warcraft 3. Man darf hier jedoch kein ernsthaftes RPG erlebnis oder Schlachterlebnis etc erwarten denn das Spiel nimmt ständig sich selbst oder andere Spiele/ Geschöpfe/Filme auf die Schippe und ist damit eher ein sehr Humorvolles Spiel
Man baut im untergrund in einer Art Dungeon Keeper System seine Basis auf und Verteidigt diese gegen Eindringliche. Zusätzlich kann man seine Kreaturen auf die Oberwelt führen auf der man mit diesen gegnerische Basen zerstören kann oder andere Dungeons infiltrieren/ übernehmen....

Das Spiel läuft sehr solide und es gibt sehr viel Content und anschließend auch weitere DLCs für Leute die das Spiel genossen haben. Desweiteren hat das SPiel sehr viel Humor und spielt immer wieder Textbasiert oder auch NPC basiert auf verschiedene andere Spiele oder Filme an welche es auf die Schippe nimmt. Z.B driftet in einer der Missionen der Erzähler ab und erzählt einem das man den Ring zum Feuerberg bringen muss um ihn dann zu zerstören, berichtigt dann aber danach das er in der falschen Geschichte war.


Pro:
- Viel Content
- Lustige Texte
- Spiel stürzte bei mir nie ab oder verursachte sonst irgendwelche Gamebreaker.
- Unter und Oberwelt System fügen sich gut ineinander ein.
- Ein Erzähler der einem mit viel humor die Geschichte erzählt und auch während dem Spielen immer wieder anfängt wie ein Erzähler die neuen aufgaben zu erklärt oder Geschehnisse kommentiert.

Con: Manchmal wiederholen sich Texte des Geschichtenerzählers der einen immer wieder darauf hinweist was man zu machen hat zu oft. So hört man manchmal wenn man den Dungeon erstmal weiter ausbauen möchte anstatt auf die Oberwelt zu gehen, der Erzähler dies aber will, einen Text 10 x mit immer ein paar Minuten dazwischen, was einen manchmal sehr nerven kann.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970579505', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1452609791}

author: {'steamid': '76561198087766612', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1414, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 656, 'last_played': 1499353051}
review:
В сравнении с прошлыми частями Dungeons игра претерпела изменения, большие изменения, наиболее наглядным является появление собственной армии нечисти, и ее контроль, а также выведение своей армии на поверхность и вырезание этих мерзких святош, из-за этого была урезана особенность игр прошлых серий - а именно искушений героев богатствами, а потом вырезанием из них их духовной силы.
Впрочем, игра стала на порядок легче и приятнее, а рассказчик... выше всех похвал!

author: {'steamid': '76561197994261696', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 5476, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 154, 'last_played': 1490459466}

author: {'steamid': '76561198021278072', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2637, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2426, 'last_played': 1460845299}
review: The only acceptable sequel to Dungeon Keeper! This game manages to keep the lovable Dk mechanics and still innovate, in the form of work units in rooms, manually upgradable units, exploration and conquest of the overworld and even multiple playable factions (2 in base game, 3 with game of winter DLC) Highly reccomended for all the Dungeon Keeper lovers!

author: {'steamid': '76561197977408683', 'num_games_owned': 164, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 982, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 720, 'last_played': 1455399378}
review:
К сожалению, бледная тень Dungeon Keeper 2 даже не смотря на более продвинутый графический движок. Разновидностей юнитов, комнат и заклинаний мало (примерно раза в 2 меньше чем в DK2), в сингле враги умеют ходить только по вашим корридорам, сами копать стены они не умеют (прошёл пока не всю игру, может в конце игры научатся?). Иными словами: есть 3 входа, заставил ловушками и спокойно развиваешься. Если кто и проберётся к комнатам, то это будет жалкая часть того что входило к вам в гости изначально. Из положительного: книги умений (привет WarCraft 3, графика впрочем его очень напоминает), относительно интересный сингл (разнообразнее в сравнении с DK2).
Итог: если вы из тех кто много лет назад просиживал ночи за игрой в DK и DK2, то данную игру стоит приобрести на рапродаже рублей за 100, просто чтобы была.

author: {'steamid': '76561197982815216', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 704, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 703, 'last_played': 1482590350}
review:
8.5/10  buy this if you are modern gamer who want to play dungeon defending game.

This review comes from a person who never care about what DK2 did in the past (actually I always skip reading reviews from people who keep comparing modern games to DK2, MoO, Dwarf Fortress, Baldur's Gate because what I can find in the present is more important for me)

I want to play a polished game that let me be an evil lord who's managing a dungeon, and this game give me what I want.

Pros
- everything is polished and run smoothly when compared with other games in the same genre
- quite hard, I have to restart for many times
- (mostly) focus on dungeon building and defending, while War for the Overworld feel more like RTS game that you have to play Zerg rush to destroy enemy base
- narrator voice can be turn off
- graphic is more acceptable than other 2 games

Cons
- sadly, its focus on building and researching defense mechanics. So, there's no decorations or any thing that make you feel like you are building a base for creatures to live

-take long time to unlock higher tier units, you don't have much freedom in early stage of game

- Enemies portal are too close to player's base. There are not enough distant and space for player to make their dungeon feel like dungeons in RPG games

author: {'steamid': '76561198150648376', 'num_games_owned': 53, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 176, 'last_played': 1449153731}
review: Увидев в ленте слово Dungeon, я сначала пролистал ее не придам этому значение, но потом любопытство взяло верх и я решил таки взглянуть что же это за игра. Когда я увидел ЧТО это, то нераздумывая купил ее, тем более она была по скидке(приятненько). И вот я запустил эту божественную игру, окунувшись в воспоминания из дества об игре Dungeon Keeper. Это было просто прекрасно. Это конечно немного не та игра в которую я играл в детстве, но даже немного лучше. Больше всего мне нравится рассказчик. Есть моменты над которыми можно посмеяться благодаря нему. Ни капли не жалею о потраченных деньгах, в планах приобрести все доступные DLC пусть они уже и не по скидке. Всем поклонникам DK игра обязательна к приобритению! Персональный рейтинг 10 Октоберфестов из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198065292893', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 232, 'last_played': 1434900019}
review:
At first I though the game seemed funny and it does have some great ideas. Compared to other dungeon-builder games, I particularly liked that you bring your forces to the surface and wreck havock.
However, the game is very monotomous, the missions are short and the challenges are not really that creative.
Furthermore, the game includes a lot semi-not-funny jokes from the narrator, which was funny at first but you tire from it after a few minutes. And they are there CONSTANTLY - every mission title is a pun and the narrator comments on everything you do and don't do. You are not allowed to take your time building your dungeon without the anrrator commenting on it in a really annoying way.

So all in all - at first glance, the game brings some great new elements to the genre, but those element are not enough to make up for an otherwise throughoutly annoying game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970641136', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 3461, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1438, 'last_played': 1483297987}
review:
I have a soft spot for this series, but I expected better.  There are simply too many half baked ideas and executions here.  It's a mediocre minion manager, it's a mediocre fantasy RTS.

- The overworld sections are just attack moves.  There's next to no micromanagement necessary and if you lose somene, they'll just get revived.  Unless you lose your entire army at once, you'll never actually lose a single troop in this game as long as you build 3-4 revival pits and plenty of beds.  It really reduces the impact and execution of combat.

- Payday is obnoxious and basically stops gameplay in your dungeon for a while.

+ The narrator really helps the pacing and flow of otherwise incredibly generic sweep the map level design.  But the moment you stop doing something and he stops, you realize how boring this is.

- Reinforcing walls and creating more efficient rooms is completely pointless -- it ends up being +/- 20%, tops, and is really hard to see.

- Your minions have no idea how to behave during combat when a unit has fallen and the enemies are still present.  Hope you weren't depending on a gold infusion to finish off that attack!

- Very little replayability when the campaign is done.

- Spells are just awful.  Good grief.

I still need to sink my teeth into Game of Winter but I don't have high hopes for the remaining DLC based on what I've experienced thus far.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056728682', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 564, 'last_played': 1452089922}

author: {'steamid': '76561197987350411', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 98, 'playtime_forever': 2921, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2702, 'last_played': 1448727563}
review:
A great sequal to Dungeon Keeper. There's not as many creature and room types as DK2, but the ones you have serve the purpose well, and they can be upgraded to more powerful creature types later on. One feature that this game has that DK2 didn't is the ability to fill sections of your dungeon back in so that you can funnel the heroes where you want them. This is, in my opinion, one of the best features in the game.
A lot of people have complained about the surface battles, but I thought they were ok. The developers chose to focus on dungeon management rather than full RTS control. Don't go in expecting Warcraft III. 
The only thing I really miss from DK2 was the ability to capture enemies and imprison them. But, its not that big of a deal.
Overall, this game was well thought out and designed. Loads of fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041150054', 'num_games_owned': 89, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2838, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2734, 'last_played': 1462136441}
review:
Прекрасная сатира на соверменность в сеттинге игр серии DK.
Русская локализация, которой даже ААА проекты в наше время похвастаться не могут. 
В игре есть душа! Геймплей показывает, что разработчики делали игру в своё удовольствие, а не для отбивки очередного миллиона с людей, играя на настальгии!
К покупке рекомендовано всем, кто играл в ДК, кто желает провести время за созданием имерии "Великого и ужасного". 

Отдельная комната в раю для того, кто придумал финт с розовым пони на вертеле! 

Вердикт: побольше бы таких игр!

author: {'steamid': '76561198033050314', 'num_games_owned': 64, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 7848, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2653, 'last_played': 1562481970}

author: {'steamid': '76561198052978463', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 410, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 410, 'last_played': 1446671946}
review:
Classic RTS style, Casual Dungeon Keeper and Narrative Comedy are in rendez-vous!
However, Dungeons 2 doesn't disappoint!

Main Pros:
+ Enjoyable to push snots to build, prepare beer for your warriors & acquire areas in your dungeon!
+ Engaging to attack in the RTS phase and looking at your pillaging orcs.
+ Enough variety to try out different traps, different combinations of minions and tiers of upgrades.

Main Cons:
- Not as intuitive to switch units between the two phases... It becomes tedious when you have to switch between the dungeon, the main RTS map and another RTS mini map.
- Difficult to micromanage one unit to another to unleash specific skills like the Orc Chieftain's Cry.
- Controlling many defending units inside the dungeon becomes hectic fast.

Had the chance to buy it when it was less then 20$ and it's totally worth it!
Plus, you have access to at least one free DLC to extend some time of gameplay and a new mode when you finish once.
