author: {'steamid': '76561198054386024', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 934, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 435, 'last_played': 1549404862}
review:
Неужели зло, так тяжело изобразить просто злом? С первых шагов компании нам дают порулить Абсолютным Злом с перманентым уроном 666, что хорошо, если бы нас не сопровождали: петросянскими шуточками Советника, отсылками к другим проектам, киселём из графина Доты2 и нелепой аурой зла, которая искажает зверушек и окружающую среду. Земля не полыхает огнем и не сочится кровью, анимация искажения сделана в подчеркнутно шутливом стиле. Унылые шутки Советника могут убить своей тоскливостью, но тем не менее идут красной толстой линией сквозь всю компанию. Музыка отвратительна, она абсолютно не соответствует происходящему на экране, что бы вам проще было представить, сходите в какую нибудь забегаловку и посмотрите как под какой нибудь хипстерский дабстеп извивается Мадонна. Курсор ака Рука Зла, не дружит ни с монстрами ни с интерфейсом, она заслоняет собой всё происходящее, зачастую никак не реагирует на интерактивные объекты, запросто может провалиться под панель управления. Она постоянно держит на себе внимание, при наведении или просто при приблежении к монстрам, орки, гоблины, и прочая шалупонь бросает все свои дела, встает по стойке смирно и отдает честь предано глядя в предпологаемыей потолок подземелья. Зачем? ЗАЧЕМ?! Орки без пива или демоны без внимания придут в тронный зал, где восседает на троне Дух Абсолютного Зла встанут на колени и будут в иступленных молитвах умолять обратить Ваше Злобное Начало на проблему, если проблема не решается - они разрушат трон или покинут Подземелье... ха ха ха, только в ваших фантазиях, на самом деле они придут в тронный зал, достанут транспаранты, повернуться к трону спиной и будут вопеть в экран игрока. Теперь Хранители поделены на фракции, которых пока что только две - Орда и Демоны. Не важно за какую фракцию вы будете играть - разнообразие монстров стремиться к нулю. Я уже не говорю про то как они нарисованы. Комнаты нарисованы с излишним вниманием к деталям, тут нет ровно подогнанных друг к другу половых плит или крипичика на кирпичике, Орда оббивает стены, пол и даже потолок (шучу, потолка вы в этой игре не увидите, это жи Подземелье) кривыми и бессмыслеными досками, Демоны - выкладывают какие то красные ромбики, таким образом, чтоб об них даже взгляд игрока спотыкался, на самом деле только взгляд игрока об них и спотыкается, да изредка какую то красную соплю натянут. 
Ловушки и ИИ, попавший в них вызывает самые противоричивые чувства. Ловушка с цепами, например, ломается сама по себе а не потому что умные стражники решили не превозмогать её как Скайримские Дети, и сломали её. Яйца с пауками, которые при приблежении героев лопаются и выпускают из себя пачку злющих паучат, которые развлекают героев, до тех пор пока не будут убиты или не закончится время их жизни. 
Разработчик явно болеет шизофренией, то открещиваясь от ДК2, то позиционируя себя как идейный продолжатель. Как следствие, вы не увидите здесь подземных вод или озер лавы, но комнаты с монстрами, порода с маной, реликвиями и нескончаемыми самоцветами, будут, 
У гномов оказывается теперь есть способности к бафу союзников но полностью отсутствует навык копания. Вообще у героев нет механики копания, а посему укрпеление и обмазывание стен досками/соплями абсолютно не имеет смысла. Вау, да это же мастхэв, я закроюсь от внешнего мира горной породой и никакие ловушки не нужны - нет, скажут вам разрабы, мы запрещаем перекрывать проходы, хотя бы один коридор от выхода во внешний мир должен вести к Трону. 
Механика боя и копания еще сыра и корява, юниты нередко деруться друг с другом спинами. Импы тоже этим болеют и копают коридор.
Тем не менее, если вы всё ещё читаете этот обзор, то увидете немного хорошего. Импы реализованы на 10/10, а если принять во внимание задумку с фракциями то и на все 11/10, шикарнейшие импы у Демонов, я чуть не обблевался радугой когда увидел их в действии. Так же несомненно радуют мотивирующие шлепки, которые были бы еще круче если бы не кривые руки разрабов. Игру я не рекомендую, ровно до тех пор, пока разрабы не приведут игру в играбельный вид и не определятся кто они, идейные продолжатели или же это очередная подделка на всеми нами любимый ДК2. Общие ощущения от игры лично у меня - закрыть глаза, нажать Alt+F4 и забыть как страшный сон.
P.S. Если кто владеет инглишем и может донести этот обзор до разработчиков, прошу сделайте это за меня, как фанат жанра, я всё же верю что у них получится исправить то что они наделали.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007299273', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 1424, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1103, 'last_played': 1432587748}
review:
So i have almost 20 hours of gameplay on this game by now and here are my findings:

So obviously you and I are going to compaire this game to the dungeon keeper (DK) series and the new war for the overworld (WFTO) game. I have played all of these games so i decided that to compaire them for the people that are deciding between these games: 

so lets begin with this games unique feature: the overworld. In this game you can send your minions up to plunder the hometowns of the heroes. Now ofcourse we all agree that this is a remarkebly cool feature but there are also some minor issues with it:

First of all the overworld uses RTS style gameplay instead of dungeon management so you can order your units arround. Now this is verry nice for intercepting incomming raiding parties before they enter your dungeon because you can for example actually force your archers to stay behind your melee guys to save them from a horibly painfull death. Now we all agree that this is nice but unfortunetely the AI in the RTS mode does little more then a "me orc... me bash" approach wich makes it necesarry to micromanage every unit. Also some units refuse to cast their spells automatically wich makes battle difficult because you have to micromanage every single unit. 

Also it should be noted that you do not actually gain anything from plundering the overworld. For example in one the campaign missions you have to stop gold convoys. However when you kill off a convoy you do not actually get any gold. 

Thus far the overworld. Now back to the comparison. In will number my own comments such that you can eassily refer to them should anyone feel the need to post a comment:
1) In case of grapics, this game is in my opnion better then the old DK series but also better then war for the overworld but it also appears to have slightly higher system requirements. I should note here that i do not state that war for the overworld has bad grapics, i just think that these look beter personally.
2) In terms of price. This game is by far the most expensive. The old DK games can be found on gog for about 5 euros. War for the overworld costs about 30 euros and this game costs a whopping 45 euros at the time this review was written. 
3) This game has 2 factions: the horde and the demons. each faction has 12 units devided over 4 catagories and 8 rooms. It should also be noted that there is no way to convert heroes into villans in this game whereas you can do as such in the DK series. In my opinion the number of units and rooms in this game is rather low when i compare it to the WFTO and DK. I would prefer a merged version of the 2 factions in which the number of possible rooms increases.  
4) When comparing the dungeon management gameplay to WFTO and DK, i always had a sense of "i have to rush this" in WFTO. So peronally i like the gameplay in dungeons 2 better then WFTO. But your own experience can be diffrent ofcourse.
5) WFTO has far more skrimish maps in their release version whereas dungeons 2 has only 3. Now i expect that this number will increase at some point in time but i personally fear that they will bring out the "new" skrimish maps as a DLC which would annoy me greatly becasue imo they should present in the base version of the game.

Thus far my comparison of these games. If you feel that i missed something please tell me and i will endevour to add a section about that specific topic.

The only thing left to say would be: Should you buy these games?
My personal opionion? YES! but then i feel this way for all Dungeon-keeper-like-games including DK and WFTO.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041625770', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 1272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1174, 'last_played': 1482154717}
review:
Fun game but a few problems. Campaigns short roughly 10~11 missions no need for real super complex dungeons just 2-3 well placed traps and ai dies and super slow build up for base and army and everything. The biggest negative is the fact it takes and hour to build up anything half decent and the narrator wont shut up about how slow you are.

Those are the most glaring problems i see most people comment on(including myself) i enjoyed the game for what it was. Build dungeon ✔, control little minions  ✔, crush all who oppose you with the might of a massive(20-30 units so not massive massive) armies  ✔. Wont say its worth how much its priced right now but maybe it be best to buy this when its on sale for roughly 20 or less bucks.

Hopefully they add more content or speed up  the progression in the game, do either of those and ill probably play it for another 10-12 hours. But to reiterate, no buy now, buy on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012027596', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1673, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 799, 'last_played': 1488043271}
review:
Фэнтезийный симулятор строительства, ролевая игра и стратегия в одном флаконе. Разработчики хорошо постарались, представив нам очень добротную игру.

Нам предстоит отыгрывать Абсолютное зло, в подчинении у нас орочья орда, силами которой необходимо отстроить подземелье и защитить тронный зал.
Расчищаем подземелье, добываем золото и ману, строим сокровищницы, арены, пивоварни, мастерские, кузницы и прочие объекты инфраструктуры. Выстраиваем линии обороны. Да, силы альянса будут преследовать нас и в подземелье, но это не страшно, ведь в арсенале у нас имеются разнообразные ловушки и заклинания. 

Разделяй и властвуй, 10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197997151195', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 790, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 719, 'last_played': 1430620978}
review:
I am having so much fun with this game. The mechanics are easy to learn but progressively get much deeper. The art is fantastic as well, the soundtrack is great, and the narrator has his moments.

The game lacks an "Attack Move" command, which would greatly improved combat. There are also a couple of audio quirks that I am sure will get patched soon.

Overall, this is an amazing blend of dungeon keeping and real-time strategy. One of my favorite games from 2015.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983199721', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 316, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 316, 'last_played': 1430102761}
review: This is my first Dungeons game so not basing my review on the series. Not worth the $40 price tag (IMO). Parts of the UI are clunky, like trying to click on units. Wish there was an option to just switch to a normal pointer (for better accuracy). Sending units around in the dungeon requires clicking on each one (can stack in hand/pointer) and then dropping them off (a spell helps a little with this later on). Sending units outside always requires clicking on each one and dropping them off on the way out.  Only 3 skirmish maps. The narrator humor is ok but starts to wear on you after awhile.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079762411', 'num_games_owned': 783, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 569, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 569, 'last_played': 1430102719}
review:
分别用两个不同的faction在skirmish模式里都完成了一次游戏，感觉基本上游戏内容就这样了……

十五个小时就可以接触全部的游戏内容，一般小品级游戏的水准。



+可以上到地面征服人类王国

-没有第一人称附身术，那种操作一只怪物瞬间从RTS变成FPS的游戏方式没有了。

取而代之的是在征服人类王国时采用了一般WAR3那样的RTS操作模式，我个人是非常厌恶的。

-兵种与建筑种类稀少，且两个faction之间基本一样，除了外形基本没差别。趣味性不强。

-怪物呆滞，不生动，自主性差。

-敌人也是种类稀少单调，设计上毫无创新，同时AI差劲行动极为愚蠢。

-法术设计糟糕，毫无多样性与趣味性。

总的来说这只是个披着Dungeons外皮的劣质模仿性作品，抛去对于前作的情怀不论，但就游戏性上来看这也只是一款内容很少且极为单调的三流战略游戏而已。

又预购了个逗哔游戏，情怀又受伤了。

如果是冲着前作来找的这游戏，那么我更推荐玩war for overworld
http://store.steampowered.com/app/230190/

author: {'steamid': '76561198075973270', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1615, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 893, 'last_played': 1472192049}
review: As fun as this game could be with some more polish and as entertaining as the commentary can be, this game is poorly optimized and the controls are frustrating. I often get single digit or teen FPS with very low population on screen. Moving your creatures is extremely tedious inside your homeland but tolerable outside of it which is a complete reversal of what I expect. In spite of the occasionally witty commentary, this game advertises at you from time to time as well. In many missions, the commentator actively yells at you and tells you how to play. The potential of this game of being solidly good is so obvious as to make it even more frustrating for why it's not.

author: {'steamid': '76561197983517632', 'num_games_owned': 514, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 861, 'last_played': 1433052934}
review:
Great Game, lots of fun. Controlling your minions with a black and white style brings back all my nostalgia. The tower defense feeling and rts side is outstanding. The game feels a mix of black and white, warcraft 3, Dungeon Keeper, and even a feeling of dwarf fortress. The Combat is entertaining if a little crowded and the AI that handles fighting is extremely smart. Simple right-click into a battle will have your minions not running like idiots to their deaths. If they get hit, they hit back. 

That being said. It feels like it is missing too much content. 

-3 maps for skirmash and 6 maps for multiplayer after the release is a little disappointing. Hoping for community maps maybe.
-Narrator talks too much. Wish I had an option to mute him or skip the dialogue.
-Lag Issues when units are being hit by traps.
-Payday needs to either be longer or instanteous. Half of the time the minions are just walking back and forth between paydays.
-Minions slack off way too easily requires a lot of slapping.
-Demons are currently underpowered and cost too much pop.

This games needs to let you play the human Race, like a game mode of dungeon Invader almost. If new maps come out and the lag issues are handled, this game will be alot more fun. It just feels like it is missing something to keep me playing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039463852', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 347, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 347, 'last_played': 1430097620}

I'd write up a list of things wrong with this game - but it's really not worth the effort.   I loved Dungeon Keeper; this isn't DK.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028839100', 'num_games_owned': 362, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 924, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 678, 'last_played': 1431465669}
review: Отличный подход к повествованию сюжета

author: {'steamid': '76561197999720711', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 3093, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1013, 'last_played': 1502488420}
review:
Для тех кто играл в первую часть Dungeons и разочаровался в потраченных деньгах могу смело сказать что Dungeons 2 это НЕ Dungeons "1". Лично мне первая часть не понравилась абсолютно - она была ни рыба ни мясо, ужасно скучным и однообразным геймплеем,  кривым балансом, а уж на имя "Наследник Dungeon Keeper" претендовать абсолютно не могла. Похоже разработчики и сами, внезапно, это поняли и решили не насиловать труп а сделать все с нуля. Или почти с нуля... 
Если отбросить сходство подземелий и некоторых монстров, то Dungeons 2 - это совершенно новая игра, не продолжение, а именно новая. Она (игра) совсем ушла от канона "Мрачного фэнтези" и превратилась в эдакую пародию со стебом на известные серии (какие - говорить не буду, но думаю догадаться будет не сложно). Повествование сюжета забавное, а учитывая наличие русской озвучки  - даже очень приятное. Разделение игры на - Подземное и Надземное - тоже приятно удивило, и особенно то, что в наземное управление превращает игру в классическую ртс на подобии WC3 или SC. Порадовало отсутствие дурацкой, на мой взгляд, "кормёжки" героев заходящих в подземелье (кто играл в 1ую часть поймут о чем я). Повеселили мелочи типа - украшение подземелья. Когда монстрам нечего делать они начинаю ходить по подземельям и украшать стены каждый в своем стиле (орки приколачивают доски раскрашенные краской, а наги вешают ленточки и т.д.)
По поводу стабильности - да , увы, игра напрягает комп, но жить можно. Были пару раз проблемы с обрывом сигнала сервера. Но в целом у меня все работало стабильно. Из багов видел пару раз зависание монстров в стенах и 1 раз в наземном мире орк просто не хотел двигаться  с места (помогло тп на базу).
Подводя итог - нет, это не Dungeon Keeper 3, но если забыть об этом - то игра получилась хороша. То что разработчики решили привнести в нее что то свое и не гнались за бессмысленным подражанием - сделало игру довольно уникальной, а не пустой копией, ну вы сами поняли чего...Так что всем очень советую.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065174063', 'num_games_owned': 138, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1690491178}

author: {'steamid': '76561197972154981', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1222, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1032, 'last_played': 1508357358}
review:
Ich geb dem Spiel ne 7/10


So nach dem durchspielen mal mein Fazit:

im grossen und ganzen ein solides Spiel, wer DK2 mochte und lange nach einem guten Ableger suchte, kann mit diesem Spiel nichts Falsch machen.
+ Steuerung, Interface, menü etc standart gmacht, was auch gut ist so braucht man keine lange Zeit um sich mit der Steuerung vertraut zu machen. Das Feature mit der Oberwelt find ich sehr gut eingebracht.
Einheiten und Gotteszauber schöner und Spielerisch wertvolles Feature.

- Der kommentator geht gar nicht, nach der 2 mission wurde er in den Optionen ganz Leise gestellt, was der von sich gibt nervt einfach nur. Sol zwar witzig rüber kommen jedoch wenn einer Labbert wie ne Waschfrau kann das einem schon schnell auf den Keks gehn. 
Man hätte sich noch ein paar gimics einfallen lassen können damit das Spiel nicht so eintönig wir. Mehr Kreaturen wären auch nett.


Im grossen und ganzen ein gutes Spiel, jedoch für diese zeit der Gamebranche, im Grunde nur ne Copy mit ein paar addons von DK2. Preisleistung ein wenig übertrieben für die meiner Meinung zu eintönig und zu kurzen Kampgne. Mehrspieler macht Laune jedoch nach paar Partien wirds auch langweilig besonders wenn man ne längere partie hat.


Mfg Stonefall

author: {'steamid': '76561198012949375', 'num_games_owned': 368, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1062, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1062, 'last_played': 1430155689}
review:
Dungeons 2 at it's core is a game that attempts to take on too much and produces too little.

The game is split into two modes, a dungeon mode where you manage your base by digging out the earth and creating specialized rooms.  The other mode is an overworld mode which is RTS lite. 

And the problem is that it does none of them well.  The overworld mode is a point and click affair with little of the RTS intricies one would expect from a modern day RTS.  The fights are against placed enemy units and bases consist of like 3 buildings.  Don't expect to have to do much microing.

The Dungeon mode has you sending out your minons to carve earth and collect gold to fuel the rest of your base.  You get to zone areas for specialized rooms, like a brewery to make beer that will keep the rest of your army happy.  Or a tinker workshop who create toolkits to use for traps and all your research.

And traps.. the game gives the impression you get to build this intricate dungeon full of traps.. and you really don't.  The first trap you get to research, the exploding chest, is about the only thing you need about and 4 of them in a line will finish any parites that go into your party. Unless there is a halfling thief who will just disable all your traps and be immune to them.  The best way is just to throw your military units at the adventurers.

And the game is slow, collecting gold is an almost painful endevour, you have to set treasure rooms all over the place or it takes even longer for your goblins to haul it.  It almost seems on purpose because the amount of content is serverly lacking: only 11 missions in total.

One decently good thing about the game is the narrator, it's the same individual from Stanley's Parable and while there are a number of lines that miss, there are a number that can produce a chuckle.  And while the storyline is about as generic as can be and handled with kid gloves, it is somewhat refreshing to be the 'bad guy' in a game stomping the good guys down.

But at the current price of the game, I can't recommend it, maybe if you could pick it up on sale for like 10 bucks it might be worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006552899', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 664, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 633, 'last_played': 1492915734}
review:
Endlich nach sovielen Jahren des Wartens und nach der Enttäuschung von Dungeons I kommt mit Dungeons 2 das lang ersehnte DK Spiel. :)
Wer Dungeon Keeper 1 & 2 gemocht hat, dürfte auch in Dungeons 2 auf seine Kosten kommen. Es ist grafisch sehr ansprechend gestaltet mit viel Liebe im Detail. Das Bau-Prinzip lässt in vergangenen Zeiten schwelgen und gefällt mir mit den kleinen Neuerungen sogar noch besser als früher.
Die Kampagne und der Sprecher sagen mir ebenfalls zu und ich habe bereits des öfteren Lachen müssen.
Es macht einfach durch und durch Spaß. Ich kann es definitiv empfehlen. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198005841343', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 162, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 162, 'last_played': 1430070803}
review:
Ужасно бомбит после покупки этого треша. 
1. притянутый юмор, жалки и натужный. это не Кипер и не Пратчетт. 
2. игровой процесс... мда. тупо, однообразно, не вызывает желания играть запоем. 
3. не верьте. это не кипер. это даже рядом не стояло, как и чертов импи и все подобные. 
4. интерфейс... ну как сказать. удобно? неа.

Если купились, что это "новый данжеон кипер", то настоятельно рекомендую одуматься. оно не стоит 700 рублей. и времени не стоит то же.

Да нигде, ага. Не продолжение, на него они права не имеют. Но даа, тематика не та, зло не то, рука не та, импы не те, копать землю не то и т.д. Как бы кто не говорил, но ДК зародили стиль, направление в жанре и вообще. Был Оверлорд, который на порядок лучше этого треша, были и. Ну и в принципе, я высказал своё мнение, сказав в начале - "бомбит". Я не журнашл...журналист, я это не для объективности или денег написал. Высказал мнение, построенное на эмоциях на впечатлении от развлечения. Разум, логика и объективность тут не нужны. В моём понимании разработчики изначально поступили нечестно, играя на отсылка к ДК.

author: {'steamid': '76561197966604720', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 972, 'last_played': 1461178365}
review:
[b] Mr Evil empfängt Sie jetzt! [/b]

Dungeons 2 tritt an um sich wie viele andere Spiele vorher mit Dungeon Keeper zu messen. Dabei verbessert es sich definitiv gegenüber dem ersten Teil von Dungeons.

[b]Pro:[/b]
Das Spiel punktet definitiv mit einer sehr stylistischen Comicgrafik das sofort an die Warcraft- Spiele erinnert, die Figuren sind absolut hochwertig und das Gameplay ist funktionell und einfach zu händeln.
Dungeons 2 besticht ebenfalls durch seinen einzigartigen Humor und der guten deutschen Synchro.

[b]Contra:[/b]
Als Negativpunkt muss man aufführen, dass es einfach zuwenig Möglichkeiten im Dungeonbuilding gibt, was das ganze doch sehr einschränkt. Die Kampange spielt man relativ schnell durch.

[b]Fazit: [/b] 

[b] Dungeons 2 macht vieles richtig, aber leider nicht alles [/b]
Es ist ein schönes, liebevoll gestaltetes Spiel mit Humor und viel Charme

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2sYmfS2Cxfs&list=PLYvcMgH75XVj6T89twz4jnbP6dHYiDHlG

author: {'steamid': '76561198069144486', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 422, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 422, 'last_played': 1430558938}
review:
Kurz und Kanpp, es hat viel Ähnlichkeit mit dem Klassiker Dungeon Keeper! Funktionen wurden etwas erweitert, es können beispielsweise Räume ausgestattet werden. 

Größter Unterschied besteht wohl darin das auf zwei Maps gespielt wird (Dungeon und Oberwelt). Die Kreaturen lassen sich durch Portale hin und her schieben. Die Steuerung erfolgt durch die "Hand des Bösen".

Größter Pluspunkt ist für mich der amüsante Erzähler!

Größter Kritikpunkt bisher, man muss die Kreaturen im Dungeon einzeln aufsammeln. Ich hätte es gut gefunden, wenn man über das Kreatur-Icon direkt die Kreaturen aufnehmen kann. Außerdem stehen die Kreaturen sich öfters im Weg (z.B. blockieren eigene Kreaturen, nur 2 können Feinde angreifen, Rest steht rum).

Für Dungeon Keeper Fans, eine Kaufempfehlung. Langzeitspaß kann ich nicht beurteilen, schätze ich aber nicht so hoch ein. Zuschlagen würde ich im Sale, Vollpreis ehr nicht.

Bisher hatte ich teilweise Verbindungsabbrüche (Verbindung zum Server fehlgeschlagen), sonst keine größeren Bugs entdeckt. Mindert die Wertung trotzdem etwas.

6/10 Punkten Gesamt

author: {'steamid': '76561198009453092', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 812, 'last_played': 1512403105}
review:
Definitely must buy on discount.

Full price? it's up to you how much you want to play Dungeon games. 


Pro 
This game is good and nice to play to kill the time if you get bored of most game. The campaign very relaxing and captivating at the same time. The moderator that talks to you love to make jokes and troll on you and they are pretty funny. 

One of your minion you control is a snake women called Naga, so her nick name is Naga Minaj for exp. 

The depth of the above world and under world, the different realm of dungeons, monster abilities, upgrades, and spells are so diverse which kept you interested. Also, the unit specialization you get from a book drop adds cherry on top. 

Cmon, a healer with double the mana capacity. 

In single player mode, you have different factions to play which adds to more of a replayability. Oh did I mention, you will get to play the Horde faction for like 7 missions and then you get the option to do side campaigns of the new faction which I haven't completed yet. But the orc faction doesn't end at 7th mission obviously. 

-lots of upgrades and variety

-variety of neutral lairs, drops and loots

-undoubtedly beautiful game

Negative

-Unbelievably high amount of graphic usage. I have i7 duo processor and 860gtx Nividia, 12gb ram laptop, I have to play this shit on the lowest! WTF!?

-No torture chamber that I can convert goodies to serve ME!!!

- traps OP.

- Not really that many types of rooms

- hard to click the wanted units or room without click something else in your way of your mouse. It doesn't have a good indication of what your will be clicking to grab x,y,z.

-Sign up and login to their game domain every time....why?

-Max population is only 45 for orc campaign, 65 for skirmish.  I think this game should go for 80. each warring creature already takes 2 supplies then +1 more supplies for each creature upgrade, it's too little. 

7/10...and it could easily have been 9/10 or 10/10, but....I don't think they put 100% of effort on this yet.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073036831', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 2751, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2045, 'last_played': 1521346886}
review: I could recommend this game for the narrator alone, his constant joking and reprimanding the player is pure genius. But beyond that the system of micro-management and counquering of the overworld is very well done. Another reason that this game should be an insta-buy is the fact that the monster's AI is actually quite good, the minion's do the jobs you assign them on their own and the same goes for the other monsters as well. Overall a very good game that you will enjoy playing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198086047337', 'num_games_owned': 671, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 1033, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1033, 'last_played': 1430327508}
review:
I am really enjoying this game. I love the mix between dungeon management and rts styles of gameplay. For those of you who have not played the game yet, you are the "Ultimate Evil" and you build up your perfect dungeon in the underworld and periodly send your troops to the overworld to fight, capture objectives, or free allies. You can spend your time making your dungeon be perfect, while also seeing your effect on the overworld by spreading your evil presence. You are attacked periodly in your dungeon, thus building traps, posting guard rooms, and having a good balance of troops in your dungeons and in the overworld. There are 2 factions that you can play: the horde and the demons. Each faction has 4 or 5 units as far as I can tell, and you can train those units and upgrade them into specialized classes. For example, you can train your weak archer's to be healers, etc. 
There are 3 game modes as of right now: Campaign, skirmish, and multiplayer. I have not touched multiplayer so I cannot comment on that but I am loving the campaign. I have played 7 of the missions and the narrator's humor is very enjoyable. Sometimes he does get a bit annoying if you take very very long in a mission, by long I mean over an hour. I am waiting to go into skirmish until after the campaign, but there are 3 maps with some customizable options. The most noteable would be the endless mode option. 

To sum up, I am loving this game. I highly reccommend it if your looking for a Dungeon Management game. The art style, comedy, and mechanics are all very well implemented in my opinion. Enjoy building your dream dungeon!

author: {'steamid': '76561198006630803', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 713, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 170, 'last_played': 1445261297}

author: {'steamid': '76561198026764468', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 2204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 974, 'last_played': 1463922670}
review:
Dungeons 2 is a little gem ! Not without defaults (but what game doesn't have any?) and there is room to improve the game with either addons or a Dungeons 3 ?

There are good ideas, not so good ideas, but overall, I think the devs did the hell of a job and the game is much better than I ever expected.

I do hope the UI problems will be changed in a near future, I do hope other factions will join through addons or DLC.

I hope for more maps and more variety from the narrator in skirmishes.

And eventually, a throne room guardian (bring him back !!!), a more complex evilfying surface gameplay (cutting trees, building machines to corrupt the land) to give us more control over what is happening and also some bonus / debuff to our units and enemy units.

And most of all, the RPG Diablo-like system of Dungeons 1.

I know most won't probably happen but even without them, Dungeons 2 certainly deserve a 18/20 if small annoyance in the game are changed.

Note: I wrote a lenghty review on the forums, complete and exhaustive, there isn't enough space on the review page to copy/paste it but if you want a detail review, if you are interested go to the forums and look for the post named:
"My little review from a DK and Dungeons 1 fan... (for those interested) "

author: {'steamid': '76561197970391999', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 2758, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1754, 'last_played': 1477442258}
review:
Eines vorab: Das Spiel ist nicht wirklich schlecht, innovativ und könnte ich eine Empfehlung "kaufen, wnen es NICHT 45 Euro kostet" abgeben, würde ich das tun.
Warum aber keine Kaufempfehlung?
- Größtes Problem: Die Kampagne ist in ca 15 Stunden durch. Eine Fraktion hat 8 Missionen, eine 2. Dazu hört die Kampagne dann auf, wenn der Schwierigkeitsgrad endlich halbwegs akzeptabel ist(wurde hier vorschnell released?). Die ersten 7 Missionen waren in ca 4 Stunden geschafft und eher Fleißarbeit denn Spielspaß. Dann habe ich 7 Stunden mit einer Dämonenmission verbracht, weil plötzlich ohne Grund alle Kreaturen dort sauer auf mich waren/streikten(lästiger Bug) und ich nicht neu anfangen wollte... und der Rest war dann eigentlich ganz lustig.

- Gameplay: Letztlich ist jedes Level super einfach zu schaffen, indem man die Helden durch einen Haufen Fallen rennen lässt und ggf ein paar Gänge aushebt(brauchen nur Produktionszeit, kosten nichts). 
Außerdem sind die Missionen sehr einseitig: Es gibt keine gegnerischen keeper äää Aspekte des Bösen, sondern immer Helden die in regelmäßig Einheiten aus Gebäuden spawnen und angreifen.
Letztlich wartet man in fast jeder Missionen nur darauf, stark genug zu sein, um ein besonders starkes Heldennest auszuheben. Hier hatte sogar Dungeon Keeper damals schon deutlich mehr drauf.

- Balancing: Die Dämonen haben deutlich schwächere Fallen und auch viel schwächere Einheiten. Und auch die Einheiten untereinander sind vom Supply/Nutzenfaktor total unterschiedlich. 

- Feintuning:
Leider hat Realmforge wie viele andere kleine Studios das Talent, Spiele zu veröffentlichen, bevor sie WIRKLICH gut sind.  Ich kann das zwar gut nachvollziehen, aber ein paar Wochen um das riesige Potential des Spieles auszuschöpfen, hätten da wirklich den Unterschied zwischen einem neuen Dungeon Keeper und ... dem hier bedeutet.

Das fängt schon mit so Anfängerfehlern an wie "Je mehr Spielstände vorhanden sind, desto länger dauert das Laden und Speichern... ", zieht sich aber durchs gesamte Spiel.

Der Strategieteil lässt sich schwer steuern, benötigt aber sowieso keine Strategie, weil ein "alles drauf da" Klick immer ausreichend ist. Aber so einfache Dinge wie eine bestimmte Einheit auszuwählen sollte schon unkompliziert funktionieren ohne in eine riesige Masse klicken zu müssen und hoffen zu treffen.

Der Dungeonteil ist im Prinzip gut. Nur ruckelt das Spiel ab einer gewissen Dungeongröße stark, bei den Dämonen deutlich mehr. Auch hier könnte viel Fummelkram umgangen werden, wenn so einfache Dinge wie "rechtsklick auf die Kreatur in der Kreaturenleiste hebt sie auf" eingebaut wären. Dazu ist die Spielmechanik teilweise einfach nicht durchdacht. Ich kann gratis Fallen bauen, von denen wenige alles an Helden töten, was vorbei kommt... super, aber langweilig.
Schnodderlinge kosten viel Supply grade in den ersten Missionen, was den ganzen Spielfluss hemmt. Essentielle Upgrades werden von Trollen erforscht, die aber die teuersten Einheiten im Spiel sind... was heißt, dass ich bis auf die letzte Mission faktisch ohne Upgrades gespielt hab(was egal war). Und ganz blöd: in all den Dungeons gibt es keine Abwechslung. Gelegentliche Spinnenkammern sind ja toll, aber warum nicht mal etwas größeres, was wirklich für Überraschung sorgt.

Es sind im Endeffekt tausend Kleinigkeiten, von denen keiner wirklich schlimm ist, aber in Summe dem Spiel leider eine "kacke, morgen ist ja schon Releaseday"/unfertige Note geben.

Und auch wenn das jetzt alles negativ klingt:
Für 20 Euro hätte ich gesagt, das Spiel ist ganz nett und ich hatte meinen Spaß. Um mit 45 Euro Titeln konkurrieren zu können und keinen faden Beigeschmack des verschwendeten Geldes zu hinterlassen, hätte aber schon noch etwas mehr passieren müssen, als sich 2 Tage durch immer gleiche Level zu buddeln...

author: {'steamid': '76561197994328615', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 776, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 776, 'last_played': 1430096365}
review:
This is a first impressions review after an evening's play.

Overall 7.5/10

Pros:
[list]
[*] Visuals and monster designs are appealing.
[*] Dungeon management gameplay is solid and on par with the original Dungeon Keeper games.
[*] Some new features improve on DK2 - the ability to fill tiles back in, for example.
[*] Primary writing - cutscenes and level intros - is mostly funny.
[*] The overworld becomes pleasingly despoiled and Mordor-like as your Orcs clear it of enemy soldiers and fluffy bunnies.
[*] Imp slapping
[/list]

Neutral:
Economically feels much harder than DK2:
[list]
[*] Imps cannot carry much gold and move very slowly when doing so
[*] Imps do not seem to level up
[*] Paydays are very frequent
[*] So far there is no equivalent of the infinite gem block
[*] Imps need to work to produce food (beer)
[/list]

Overworld gameplay, while fleshed out enough to feel like more than a minigame, is weak compared to a proper RTS. Exploration is quite engaging but combat is all zerg, all the time. This was in line with my expectations, hence listing as neutral.


Cons:
[list]
[*] The Narrator is only about half as funny as the developers think he is, and would benefit greatly from an option to turn off his obnoxious nag messages whenever you don't rush headlong to complete every objective. In particular, struggling to complete an objective because it introduced a new mechanic without explaining it properly, while the game literally calls you a lazy dunce every 2 minutes, is not compelling gameplay (I'm looking at you, fighting pits).
[*] Embedded advertising is not acceptable in a full-price game and should be removed.
[*] Mouse control is sometimes clumsy. It's not clear where the actual pointer is on the big floaty hand, unlike DK2 where it was always the tip of the index finger. Also the cursor tends to pass behind UI overlay notifications, making them difficult to click
[*] There appears to only be three skirmish maps
[/list]

Overall, the dungeon gameplay *is* Dungeon Keeper 3, and this is enough to overlook the game's shortcomings and keep you coming back after you turn it off because the narrator annoyed you a bit too much for one day.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000402652', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 3408, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 749, 'last_played': 1487912559}

author: {'steamid': '76561197960855019', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 204, 'playtime_forever': 728, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 728, 'last_played': 1430255461}
review:
The good and the bad real short:

Good:

Much like dungeon keeper
Many cool things to do

Bad:

Too much micromanagement in some regards
Creatures rather stupid
Multiplayer very limited and exploitable

Summary:

If there are some small changes made (for example creatures train by themselves, enemy cant avoid hits by moving anymore, more autonomy for the creatures/better selection of priorities/better AI in general) I would rate this 95/100 but the way it sits right now i can only give it:

70/100

author: {'steamid': '76561198018990627', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 948, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 869, 'last_played': 1605100869}
review:
So far a good deal into the campaign, about to finish the Horde campaign and just started the Demon campaign after 10 hours into the game.

The Dungeon Keeper II comparison is a must, but there is no better way to messure the game. Two different Dungeon factions offer low species variety per faction, but a high unit variety with different roles and purposes. There are barely any funny videos, but loads and loads of cheesy commentary from the Stanley Parable announcer. There are less mechanics and rooms (yet?) in terms of the dungeon, like prisons and casinos, but more focus on tech, micromanagement, dungeon control and overworld warfare. 

It is fair to say that Dungeons II orientates itself closer to Dungeon Keeper than before, but instead of copying the formula, they try their own receipe and so far I am very happy with it. If I had to make criticism, then it would be in the amount of non-campaign maps, which is far too low. Overall, the game reaches a 100% of the comparison skala: 50% of the old formula, 50% of own, new ideas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198140972072', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 633, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 452, 'last_played': 1522216604}
review:
So this is my second review to date.......... so dont hate on meh :). So i really liked this game i finally hit that pre purchase button and I am happy I did. This game has a lot of really cool things going for it and I like the direction the developers are taking it. I also like that the developers are so active in the chats and trying to help anyone with bugs/issues. I have a sub par comp and i have absolutley no problems with this game. I think my only problem is the narrator talks to frequently...... thats literally it lol. I mean I could be nit picky but its a good game and i am glad I spent my 35 bucks on it. Def money well spent, if your reading all the negative junk hey you should just stop buying any games because every game will have people griping and complaning till they are red in the face. It doesnt mean you wont like this game because someone found a flaw that they personally didnt like. 

(Read the nagative reviews but keep the positive in mind as well)


Graphics remind me of torchlight two but better. 8.5/10
Gameplay is good no holes has a campaign and multiplayer. 8/10 
Helpful Devs and community. 10/10 
Game didnt ship broken to where i couldnt play it! 1000/10
Overly talkative narrator 4/10 (I am sure they will tone him down in an update/patch)

Overall id give it an 8.5/10 

Its a fun entertaining game definitely worth putting on your wishlist and or buying. If your still hesitant about the price wait for a coupon/sale you will not be dissapointed.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971446994', 'num_games_owned': 471, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2968, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1296, 'last_played': 1513321890}
review:
Whenever there is a launch day patch you know a game was released to early, and things have been rushed. This is the perfect example.
Added controller support causes the game to stutter every few seconds while my unused steering wheel takes over the interface. Hand pointer is inaccurate and clunky to use. No group select or multi pickup of units.
The narrator is a dick and insults you repetitively if you take too long.
Toolboxes are called WP when used, and completely clutter tinkerers shop to the point of making it extremely difficult to click on.
It feels like a $5 fan-made product using an existing engine.

Pros:
The art team did a great job.
You are giving money to a team trying to keep the Dungeon Keeper genre alive.

Cons:
Narrator, narrator script
interface, gameplay, hell pretty much everything else.

author: {'steamid': '76561197968592655', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 1493, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1493, 'last_played': 1430428557}
review: Now this is a Dungeon Keeper successor.  Far better than the other copy cats I've played in recent years - and it adds a lot of it's own RTS flavored mechanics, coated in really attractive detailed graphics. There are some decent jabs at other games of our time (early access failures, EA F2P Dungeon Keeper) from the narrator, who only gets REALLY annoying if you take your time. That's my only complaint at the moment. If you crave some beautiful looking and playing Dungeon Keeper, pick it up!

author: {'steamid': '76561197966163463', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 741, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 700, 'last_played': 1439707362}
review:
Dungeons 2 is certainly a better return to the Dungeon Keeper trough than War for the Overworld.  Even better, while the game pays homage to DK, it is not a clone and brings new ideas to the table -- namely, separate RTS gameplay on overworld maps above your dungeon.  Contrary to other reviews are saying, it's not simply a matter of building up your dungeon then zerging the overworld -- you have juggle managing your dungeon whilst simultaneously dealing with overworld objectives.  The slower pace Dungeons 2 provides is welcome when you are herding your cats in two realms at once, trust me.

+ Actually finished, playtested, and polished by designers with the chops to carry it off
+ Servicable graphics
+ Tried and true DK gameplay combined with a decent (if simplistic) overland RTS engine
+ New ideas brought to the DK formula; not just new units and rooms that you wouldn't use anyway.
+ Challenging scenario design

- UI quibbles, particularly the fact that you have to manually pick up creatures one by one; shifts between interacting between the world (ex. tagging tiles) and clicking on UI elements is trickier than it needs to be
- "Less is more" design sometimes packs too much functionality into a single room type resulting in having to keypress/click and search through nested selections.  Creature types are similarly overloaded.
- Some annoying design decisions.  Remember how, in DK1, if creatures wandered in a library the warlocks would blast them, and how evil creatures fought amongst themselves?  Annoying, so Bullfrog removed both in DK2.  In Dungeons 2, "bored" creatures will pick on your imps.  
- A little micro heavy for me, YMMV.

8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198005510391', 'num_games_owned': 641, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 9951, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2783, 'last_played': 1698177825}

author: {'steamid': '76561198010195713', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 442, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 442, 'last_played': 1430056716}
review:
Dungeons 2 is a very nice game based on Dungeon Keepers, it has its unique way of telling a story and playing it doesnt get boring easily. 
So the main focus on the game is that of a dungeon manager. Build your dungeon with all types of different rooms, serving all types of different purposes. There is quite a lot of content in the game, which justifies the steep price for it. It
's also quite polished and rich. It can get a little boring during the planning stages of the dungeon gameplay part. But nonetheless very amusing.
When youve built an army youll head up to the overworld where good is oh so obviously present. From unicorns to the almost cliché good forces including wood elves, dwarves and knights in shining armor. Visually Dungeons 2 is very satisfying, though it lacks any strategic involvement of you in the RTS style battles. There isnt really any depth in the overworld fighting part. But that doesnt at all weigh out the fun in the dungeons. 
Last, id like to mention the narrator of the game. He also narrates the Stanley Parable. The narration is very funny and often plays a role in the game as big as the gameplay itself. The narrator makes countless references to things like the Lord of the Rings, Game of Thrones, Harry Potter etc. Also the self conscious humor about fantasy clichés the game uses, and lack of certain mechanics the narrator humorously points out. 

In the end Dungeons 2 is a very amusing game. It isnt at all perfect, but is does what a game should do: show you a nice time. If you like fantasy RTS dungeon managers, this is your game. Dungeons 2 is a very honorable homage to the Dungeon Keeper series.

author: {'steamid': '76561197989514979', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 177, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 177, 'last_played': 1430047508}

Ich bin begeistert und habe gerne das Geld dafür ausgegeben. Es lohnt sich...

author: {'steamid': '76561198084002642', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1644, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 929, 'last_played': 1499373763}
review:
Dungeon keeper 2 - поколение за 25, хороше помнит эту игру и именно с ней равняют все сейчашние симуляторы "Зла"
Первый Dungeons был похож на DK только основной идеей и названием, всё остальное было абсолютно "новым и незнакомым" как наследник идеи DK он не состоялся и был полным провалом.
Dungeons 2 - это прорыв по сравнению с первой частью, вернули классическую идею развития подземелья (как в DK2) и добавили интересные элементы (исследование новых ловушек , зданий и т.д.). В этом разработчикам зачёт, сделали интересно.
Но как всегда какой то умник в бочку мёда кинул ложку дёгтя, да и не одну.
1. Управление, если честно, оно ужасное, оно интуитивно непонятное, жмёшь пкм и происходит не то что ожидаешь. Связано это скорее всего с тем что разрабы решили переделать управление которое по сути своей не меняется в RTS уже лет 10-15. Мне как любителю жанра RTS с детства управление не понравилось, и дело не в привычке, а в том что "неитуитивно"
2. Интерфейс - нет маштабирования (не очень удобно), вроде как на экране много чего отображается, и всё равно нет нужного. 
3. Удобство макро и микроменеджмента. Почему для заказа всяких ловушек исследований и прочей фигни я должен клацать по профильному зданию и в его дебрях искать нужную мне вещь? Неужели обычный менеджмент с подразделами тут не подходит?  Я понимаю разрабов что они хотели сделать как в самой интернет активной ртс - SK2, но извините у них производство юнитов исследования и строительство занимает намного меньше места и не нагружено так сильно всякими мелкими деталями и подразделами.
4. Эта лапа на пол экрана, ей богу, могли хотябы сделать на выбор три масштаба, 2015 год на дворе, кастомизация и прочее не слышали?

+ игры
1. На данный момент это наверное самый качественный идейный наследник DK2, да эта игра не является его "доработанным и допиленным" клоном, но она самостоятельна и предлагает свой взгляд на симулятор зла, и этот вгляд шагнул далеко впередё по сравнению с первой частью.
2. Приятная графика. (современная)
3. Слуги вроде как обладают достойным AI и безбожной и выбешивающей тупки замечено не было. Няньчится с ними не нужно.
4. Возможность выбраться на поверхность, достойное нововведение в симулятор зла.

Игра яркая и красочная, очень интересная. Для тех кто ждал клона DK2 она не подойдёт, довольно сильная разница, для остальных будет приятной вариацией на тему DK2.

По поводу оптимизации и производительности ничего сказать не могу. Имею очень мощный комп, производительности которого точно хватит закидать прожорливость неоптимизированного движка. У меня всё на максимуме летает, как у других не знаю.

P.S.  Верным путём идёте товарищи, надеюсь третий Dungeons, будет также развиваться в сторону идей DK2 с додумками, допилами и новыми идеями.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077103572', 'num_games_owned': 349, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 2560, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1549, 'last_played': 1540359742}
review: I like this game however I must rate this game as average. 3/5 stars or points. Reason number ONE. Not enough content for your money. This game is soooooo not worth $40 dollars. It should be like $20 or $30 dollars. Because this game has only one campaign and only 2 factions and only 3 SKIRMISH MAPS. ONLY 3!!!! Multiplayer...... Pfft spent one hour looking for people couldnt find anyone. No one cares about multiplayer..... Also only 5 MULTIPLAYER MAPS. ONLY 5!!!! This game offers you very little content for $40 dollars. Its almost as if Kalypso Media ripped me off with a switch and bait tactic. Reason number TWO. Not enough game modes like Sandbox or Survival mode. Like I said before. This game offers you very very very little content for $40 dollars. This game is so not worth $40 dollars at all it is worth far less. Currently it only has 3 prime game modes. The funny and hilarious Campaign. The useless Multiplayer mode. And the lack luster Skirmish mode that has very little game options. You cant even face off another Dungeonier AI. Would of been nice if they also let you play as the humans too. Or even add another faction. The Undead....

author: {'steamid': '76561198006534021', 'num_games_owned': 109, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1732, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 727, 'last_played': 1431805730}
review:
Having never played, but was always interested in, any of the previous titles that make up this genre I was a but unsure on the purchase. I decided to take the plunge and I can honestly say it is well worth the money.

This game comes across as a well polished title overall and despite some people having performance problems, for me I can report that it runs very smooth and have yet to experience a lockup or crash with graphics maxed out. This on an i7-920;  HD7970; 12 GB RAM running Windows 7 64 bit.

Graphics while they come across as cartoonish, World of Warcraft comes to mind, are very detailed especially when zoomed in, however you will probably be playing the majority of the game zoomed all the way out. When zoomed in your floating hand (cursor) practically fills up the majority of the viewing space anyway. However at any level watching your little minions go about their tasks setting up traps, mining gold, brewing beer, researching tech and especially those who when left idle will take it upon themselves to sure-up and improve the walls in your dungeon, is quite enjoyable and well done.

Gameplay is fun overall and building your dungeon and setting traps for any would be hero who decides to try and steal your gold is done quite well. The top side RTS type of game is not very in depth however you still have units with special abilities etc. and overall had the surface content not been implemented this game would definitely feel as if it was lacking something.  

The humor displayed by the narrator is great and while it may break immersion at times this game is meant to be fun and if you're without a sense of humor perhaps this isn't the right game for you. I do agree with some people in that it can be a bit "too" cheerful and I would like to see more decorations befitting a true evil dungeon (skulls, chains, head on a stick etc.). Also the addition of an auto-save function would definitely be something that needs to be implemented. Despite being bug free for me had I had a crash or lockup I could have lost 2+ hours of a game by the time I realized I had been playing for so long (a positive sign lol) and decided to save on my own. There does not appear to be a map editor and skirmish play is limited to maps that shipped with the game. No randomly generated ones. 

In conclusion despite my limited play time I can say I already have no regrets in making this purchase and as a complete noob to this genre I couldn't be happier. Highly recommend this one to anyone on the fence about making the purchase. That goes for fans and newcomers alike.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993167721', 'num_games_owned': 446, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 570, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 239, 'last_played': 1483116455}
review:
Great game. Really enjoy it.
Dived straight into Skirmish without doing the tutorial. It was fun.. I find it more fun to learn as I go along rather than have it all given to me.

While it is not Dungeon Keeper *3*, it is very similar and very fun.
Worth the money. I just hope they continue developing this game and release free content to further improve the game.

It does have some FPS issues. I class my PC as a high-end PC, however i am getting FPS of around 23 in some situations.
I'm able to run GTA V on Ultra with 60+ FPS, so this game should be able to run at least 120 fps.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053666800', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 1159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1154, 'last_played': 1459346439}
review:
c'est la première fois que je joue a ce genre de jeux ( enfin, être le mal incarné bien sur... a part overlord, c'est plutôt sympa... mais pas génial non plus niveau qualité/prix ) 

tout d'abord, je trouve la campagne assez sympa bien que un poil courte et simple, la seule réelle difficulté se trouve dans la défense quand nous commençons la partie, la ou nous devons faire nos troupes/défenses/amélioration, après ce stade la, tu rentres comme dans du beurre, un peu comme les vidéo de jacquie et michel ( oui je sais .. mais merci qui ? )

évidemment, quand nous finissons la campagne, on peut forcément jouer tout seul sur diverses cartes, mais encore une fois, peu de diversité, la dessus il se sont pas grater hehe...
si .. alors il y'a une chose pas mal, nous pouvons jouer la race de base, ainsi que la race des démons ( S&M, narcissique et j'en passe ) assez sympa, mais encore une fois, trop faible au début, puis imbattable a la fin, franchement le niveau est décevant, 40e pour un jeu qui avait l'air prometteur, mais niveau difficulté, c'est pas ça, et il n'y a pas que ça ! 

évidemment nous sommes dans une sorte de grotte cachant divers piège ( araignée géante, rat, d'autre porte menant a l'extérieur ), libre a nous de faire nos salles/labyrinthe, salle au trésor/taverne et j'en passe, la dessus c'est pas mal, on peut faire 10 borne de labyrinthe le temps que l'ennemi viennent ( si il arrive, en général après 5 borne de piège, il reste plus rien, a part un gnome, ils sont viieux les con ! ) 

le seul soucis est que quand nous voulons sélectionner un de nos bot, obliger de l'attraper et le déplacer ou l'on veut, certes c'est pas plus mal me direz vous, mais quand on veut jouer stratégie dans notre donjon, on peut pas, comment se servir de son assassin et de son abilité spéciale pour tuer le healer ennemi ? c'est du random ! enfin, si il se sert de son invisibilité.. la dessus, très décevant, mais c'est une broutille, la difficulté sera juste un chouya plus dur

sinon mes points préféré sont le côté animé du jeux, la voix narrative qui est plutôt sympa et pas trop chiante a force, et enfin les énormes clin d'oeil a divers séries/films/jeux que vous pourrez découvrir si vous achetez ce jeux ! ( aussi y'a pas mal de nom de stars du style miley cyrus/lady gaga et j'en passe, chaque soldat a un nom, c'est dommage pour celui qui s'appelle bieber.. direct au sacrifice ! 

ensuite pour le côté multijoueur, je n'ai pas pu le testé a cause du manque de joueur, aucune partie trouver en 10 min, donc je ne pourrai pas m'avancer dessus, mais ça peut être sympa de jouer avec 2-3 pote et se foutre sur la gueule 

pour résumé, je noterai le jeux 7/10, -2 point a cause du prix, 40e pour un jeux ou il n'y a pas vraiment de difficulté et de diversité en map, je trouve ça franchement dommage, c'est du gachis

je recommande quand même ce jeux ! mais pas a ce prix, attendez une énooooorme promotion du style 20-25e car la, il le méritera vraiment

si vous cherchez un jeux de ce genre, soit vous jouez aux anciens du genre DK ( la base ) soit vous cherchez des jeux en accès anticipé qui paraissent prometteur ( dwelves je crois, enfin, faites des recherches et lisez bien les commentaires, ça pourrait peut être vous permettre d'économiser de l'argent ) 

si besoin d'autre info, n'hésitez pas !

author: {'steamid': '76561198073380932', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 262, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1437759880}
review:
The game is a mix of Dungeon Keeper and Warcraft. 

The world is split in two zones: The underworld and the overworld.

In the underworld the game behaves just like a good old dungeon keeper "light". On the first view it seems a bit shallow due to only a few different units. But once you are fully into the game you recognize a lot of depth there, especially with the split skills for working and combat. And the specialization by books. 
Same goes for rooms where you have to build the room first but you need to plan properly since most rooms need additional tools for function. Walls have influence on the rooms efficiency as well.
In the underworld itself you need to gather resources to prepare for your fight against the heroes in the overworld

On the overworld the game mechanics are just like a Warcraft "light" you can command your units with special skills in nearly exact the same way. In the overworld you can cripple the enemy heroes by destroying their buildings so they can´t send more troops.

The narratives and voice acting is quite nice and funny (at least in German language with the Deponia Rufus speaker) but especially the voice acting is a bit too often and too repetitive. A longer timer between the monologues would help.
A very good thing is the pace of the game. There is most of the time no need to hurry. You can go and explore the world and build a massive dungeon - one of the things I loved at Dungeon Keeper - and in contrast to War For The Overworld. The controls are ok but still need some polishing. It is a bit annoying that you only get information about your units by dragging them up for example.

Beside the campaign there are more game modes like skirmish. Furthermore it has a Multiplayer support. But haven´t tested anything but campaign yet.

There are still some bugs and glitches but no gamebreakers (yet) 

It is a really great game and worth the price. Actually I don´t understand the "low" meta score.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051193014', 'num_games_owned': 454, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 3294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 923, 'last_played': 1507051627}
review:
Definitely a dungeon keeper faithful. As many say there are some optimization tweaks that need to be done where the game lags hard on large dungeons but im running max settings and have encountered very few problems none of which were game ending.

There is a screen where it ask you to sign up when you first start the game but you click skip and it merrily goes on along. Some people are too lazy to do even that and gripe about it :P

Its got a good bit of light hearted humor in the typical overlord style and the graphics are not that bad.

The only real downside to the game for me was the narration.... the opening story line goes on and on and on, at some point you go screw it and hit skip. And in game every 5 mins the narrator is reminding you to do this objective or that, even with a colorful tone its still damn annoying.

Get a better narrator and swap out for shorter story lines to get to the point, some bug fixing and the game will not be anything revolutionary but it will be damn good fun especially if your a big old school dungeon keeper fan.

well made game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026236139', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 772, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 722, 'last_played': 1443454340}
review:
I haven't played the retro dungeon keeper but I have played games that copy the style (eg. Evil genius).
I've been wanting to play a dungeon keeper game for a while but I heard about the EA Games version of dungeon keeper and how they milked the name and turned it into a huge pay to win game. 
So whenever the occasional dungeon keeper style game pops up I'm fairly wary of developers that might try to follow suit.

So far of what I've played this game seems to give you everything it sells you. From what I know of dungeon keeper, it's usually limited to the underground area only. This game adds a new interesting aspect by allowing you to travel to the surface. The campaign is entertaining, and teaches you mechanics/units of the game. The narration is quite humorous, although at times can begin to borderline nag you when you're not completing tasks. I was pleased to see you could play as two different 'factions', the horde and the demons. Horde being ogre/trolls and nagas, and demons being worshippers/insectoids/firedemon and succubus units.

Pros:
+Pretty good graphics
+Two playable factions horde and demons
+Good variety of units
+Can go onto the surface to destroy the heroes camp
+Entertaining campaign
+No serious bugs encountered yet
+Narrative is comedic
+No EA microtransaction milking

Neutral
~Space for more maps/factions (dlc maybe)
~Drops below 60fps in some areas on powerful computer
~Narator has presented subtle advertisements under the ruse of a humorous context
~Combat animations aren't terrible, but I've seen better

Cons:
-Narrator can boderline nag when being slow completing tasks
-AI can be a little strange at times
-Encountered some minor bugs here and there
-No server browser
-3rd party launcher that requests an account and login

author: {'steamid': '76561197960482833', 'num_games_owned': 912, 'num_reviews': 386, 'playtime_forever': 354, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 262, 'last_played': 1530836126}

author: {'steamid': '76561198022695937', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 638, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 638, 'last_played': 1429989643}
review:
Итак, добро пожаловать в симулятор дня зарплаты... Видимо у разработчиков... наболело.) в результате именно эта часть игры получилась, просто получилась. 

Начну с минусов, которые МОГУТ быть исправленны:
- 3 карты одиночной игры, ВСЕГО три, маленьких карты... с ФИКСИРОВАННЫМИ расположениями ВСЕГО. Сокровища, мобы, ресы, волны... вообще все. После разового прохождения - финита, проиграть можно только целенаправленно...
- бесконечная игра - есть в настройках... Нет по факту... Совсем нет. Идея построить империю зла и причинять, причинять, причинять - не сработает. Тупо кончаются ресурсы.
- В походах - следите за юнитами, они застревают на карте в проходах и на поворотах, тупят, немогут подойти к цели и бить её... Вообщем все сложно.
- Подземелье коротышек - вы НИКАК не УЗНАЕТЕ прошли вы его или нет, не полутаете золото, о том что ловушки можно и нужно разряжать - узнаете только методом научного тыка...
- вынося область - можно вынести ЧАСТЬ и рухнет все, или вынести все с тем же результатом... От чего зависит падение - хз, и нет речь не о главном здании..
- количество нужных дефибриМАТоров - по кол-ву существ... Только вы об этом не узнаете.)
- ЛЮБУЮ волну можно раздергать подходом\отступлением и завалить, так же бой в лазарете с большой вероятностью заканчивается в вашу пользу.
- красивое ловушечное комбо? забудьте...  максимум что получится зделать - шаром из камня загнать под молотилки протащив по плитам с шипами...
- редактор карт? компаний?  не, неслышали...

вообще конешн за 2 дня игры - игру не узнать полностью, но уже сейчас можно сказть, игра еще сырая.

Ну а в плюс - игра с ОГРОМНЫМ потенциалом.)

А теперь немного советов от вашего К,О,
- сокровищница должна быть одна и рядом с тронным залом, все что на стороне и далеко - получает пол для накопления денег но не стены, перетаскивать золото из дальних забоев в ближнюю сокровищницу лучше самостоятельно.
- больничка напротив входа в зал - тру.
- 2-3 шара в прямом коридоре на входе с поверхности, расположенных в ОТДАЛЕНИИ от входа - очень тру.
- лучше иметь в начале одного орка и двух гоблинов с нагой - чем 3х орков...

Ну и на последок, ЕСЛИ ВАШИ войска в СВОЕМ подземелье попадут под ВАШ катящийся камень - они залипнут. Показываются живыми, лежат мертвыми, перенести в больничку их нельзя.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198074245934', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 1435, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1246, 'last_played': 1471087390}
review:
It´s a decent game the definately gets my thumbs up. It plays as a mix of dungeon keeper and a light RTS strategy game, dungeon keeper in the underground and RTS elsewhere.

The narrator guides you through the campaign and is a hit/miss implementation with a dodgy sence of humor, you will either like or hate him, I find myself doing both at times. Too childish and/or annoying at times but with some nice comments in between.

The game itself seems rather polished and wether the price is justified compared to other similar games in early access I dont know, havnt played the others. I can only speak for myself and I am happy with my purchase.

There are a few things I would have done differently in regard to the UI and picking up minions isn´t done as I would want to, but overall I dont have that many complaints.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024068323', 'num_games_owned': 284, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 879, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 767, 'last_played': 1438513112}
review:
Warcraft 3 meets Dungeon Keeper in this fantastic game! 

Voiced by the asshole who guides you though The Stanley Parable this game is both fun and funny. All the animations are clean and its a very balanced game. 

One little thing that bugged me when I first stared playing is that i didn't know how to add items to rooms. You have to click the room then the item which wasn't that intuitive in my opinion. Either way, its a lot of fun, if a bit patronising (as can be expected from the guy from Stanley Parable).

EDIT: The campaign mode is actually a lot shorter that I thought it would be, the ending wasn't that satisfying or even obvious at the time. "Okay we killed the elves! What next?! Wait what?" Its a very blunt ending that makes it seem that there is perhaps more to come (i hope) either way, a fun game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971502761', 'num_games_owned': 493, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 3358, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 851, 'last_played': 1638595555}
review:
As a fan of the original Dungeons game as well as Dungeons the Dark Lord - Dungeons 2 does not disappoint!  This edition of the game goes in a different direction than the first rendition of it and while that is the case this game introduces the idea of going “above ground” to attack enemies on their own turf.  The narrator, [url=http://thestanleyparable.wikia.com/wiki/Kevan_Brighting] Kevan Brighting [/url]  is the voice actor whose sarcasm from the game The Stanley Parable is brought over to this game and he, generally, does a great job of guiding you through the nuances of the game as well as adding just a bit more fun to it.  If you enjoy Dungeon defense style games, and you liked Dungeons, Dungeons 2 is a must have.

Enjoy, it’s a lot of fun!! :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198015299085', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 961, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 723, 'last_played': 1439619116}
review:
Игра является идейным наследником серии Dungeon Keeper, однако при этом разработчики не стали заниматься простым копированием DK на новый движок, а постарались привнести в игру новые геймплейные элементы. Мир игры разделен на два уровня. Первый - это непосредственно ваше подземелье, в котором вы добываете золото, обустраиваете за счет него свое логово, нанимаете войска и улучшаете их. Вскоре в ваше уютное подземелье начнут врываться силы добра, которые будут пытаться уничтожить вашу базу и всех ваших преспешников. Второй уровень - это поверхность земли, где расположены города людей, из которых и отправляются на ваше уничтожение отряды противника. И если на первом уровне игра представляет собой переделанный DK со всем характерным для него менеджментом подземелья и точечной возьней с каждым отдельным юнитом, то на поверхности земли игра превращается в полноценную RTS, что заметно оживляет геймплей. 

Кампания играется бодро, с режимом сражений ознакомиться еще не успел, но сразу смутило, что в нем пока доступно только три игровых карты, будем надеятся, что разработчики добавят с патчами еще карт.

Графика симпатичная, хотя звезд с неба и не хватает, в отзывах читал о проблемах с производительностью, но на моей конфигурации компьютера все идет без лагов. Отдельно хочется отметить русскую озвучку, которую в последнее время редко встретишь в локализациях, причем сам по себе перевод выполнен на хорошем уровне. Юмор в игре присутствует, конечно врят ли местные шутки заставят вас посмеяться от души, но тем не менее местный "рассказчик" время от времени выдает весьма забавные ехидные комментарии к происходящему на экране. 

В целом всем поклонникам DK стоит ознакомиться, даже если вы уже играете в недавно релизнувшийся War for the Overlord. 

Итог по моему мнению:  7,0 из 10 для широкой аудитории; 8,0 из 10 для любителей серии DK и симуляторов злодея по типу Evil Genius.
